quotes.quote: It is never just disagreement but always intellectual dishonesty that is the apologist's worst enemy. And its apprentice is ignorance.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: The hallmarks of a dishonest society are cash for silence, non-disclosure agreements and the illegal removal of rights of those in the know.
quotes.author: Steven Magee

quotes.quote: Dishonesty is like a boomerang. About the time you think all is well, it hits you in the back of the head.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: Cunning grows in deceit at seeing itself discovered, and tries to deceive with truth itself.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: If you wear a mask for too long, there will come a time when you can not remove it without removing your face.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: It is as easy to deceive one's self without perceiving it, as it is difficult to deceive others without their finding out.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: It is vain to find fault with those arts of deceiving wherein men find pleasure to be deceived.
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.quote: It's hard to believe that unscrupulous people would take advantage of the public's generosity at times like these, but it does happen.
quotes.author: Sam Reed

quotes.quote: Dishonesty is so grasping it would deceive God himself, were it possible.
quotes.author: George Bancroft

quotes.quote: The most effectual way to be deceived is to believe oneself more cunning than one's neighbors.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: There was certainly a dishonesty there that I think is totally regrettable and inexcusable. The ringleading, the bullying: not totally true.
quotes.author: Lance Armstrong

quotes.quote: Dishonesty of any kind will create a blemish.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: Dishonesty increases disorder exponentially. It's hard enough to communicate when you're telling the truth.
quotes.author: Karen Marie Moning

quotes.quote: Dishonesty, lack of integrity catches up with you.
quotes.author: Dawn Steel

quotes.quote: Lies will always stand out in the light of the day.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: Dishonesty is like an incurable disease, some people have it and which is why they miss the bigger picture when it comes because they invest in lies
quotes.author: Tare Munzara

quotes.quote: Dishonesty is not only the destroyer of beauty, but of what beauty creates, even out of ugliness understanding. Dishonesty is the extinguisher of understanding, and understanding is the foundation of compassion
quotes.author: Gizmo

quotes.quote: Lying to ourselves is more deeply ingrained than lying to others.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quotes.quote: Dishonesty is the raw material not of quacks only, but also in great part dupes.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Hatred and dishonesty generally arises from fear of being deceived.
quotes.author: Luc De Clapiers

quotes.quote: Dishonesty, cowardice and duplicity are never impulsive.
quotes.author: George A. Knight

quotes.quote: For theÂ machine, because of the way it is built, can work only in a given direction, no matter who pulls its levers.
quotes.author: Rudolf Rocker

quotes.quote: No machines will ever truly fully figure the brain out, because the brain's performance is constantly altered or else constrained by this inanimate, rogue artifact you can't control, namely, speech.
quotes.author: Tom Wolfe

quotes.quote: Machines were mice and men were lions once upon a time. But now that it's the opposite it's twice upon a time.
quotes.author: Moondog

quotes.quote: Machines were, it may be said, the weapon employed by the capitalists to quell the revolt of specialized labor.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: The arithmeticalÂ machineÂ produces effects that approach nearer to thought than all the actions of animals. But it does nothing that would enable us to attribute will to it, as to the animals.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: A learningÂ machineÂ is any device whose actions are influenced by past experience.
quotes.author: Nils John Nilsson

quotes.quote: Machines are worshipped because they are beautiful and valued because they confer power; they are hated because they are hideous and loathed because they impose slavery.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: TheÂ machineÂ enslaves, the hand sets free.
quotes.author: Lanza del Vasto

quotes.quote: Machines are neither Republicans nor Democrats and therefore can never be consciously or even unconsciously biased,
quotes.author: James Baker

quotes.quote: The first ultraintelligentÂ machineÂ is the last invention that man need ever make, provided that theÂ machineÂ is docile enough to tell us how to keep it under control.
quotes.author: Nick Bostrom

quotes.quote: OurÂ machines are disturbingly lively, and we ourselves frighteningly inert.
quotes.author: Donna J. Haraway

quotes.quote: How typical of aÂ machineÂ to think it knows better.
quotes.author: Vasileios Kalampakas

quotes.quote: Only a well-oiledÂ machineÂ runs smoothly.
quotes.author: Ron Kaufman

quotes.quote: Machines have altered our way of life, but not our instincts. Consequently, there is maladjustment.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: It is the duty ofÂ machines and those who design them to understand people. It is not our duty to understand the arbitrary, meaningless dictates ofÂ machines.
quotes.author: Donald A. Norman

quotes.quote: As machines take over the decision-making that saves lives, we are left with fewer chances to save lives later.
quotes.author: Greg Gutfeld

quotes.quote: Machines can only find what ignorant men have programmed them to find.
quotes.author: Poul Anderson

quotes.quote: TheÂ machineÂ does not control the mind of man, though it affects the mind of man; it is the mind of man that can and should control theÂ machine.
quotes.author: Hilaire Belloc

quotes.quote: Our technology, our machines, is part of our humanity. We created them to extend ourselves, and that is what is unique about human beings.
quotes.author: Ray Kurzweil

quotes.quote: If aÂ machineÂ is expected to be infallible, it cannot also be intelligent.
quotes.author: Alan Turing

quotes.quote: If you want a machine to be able to interact with people, it better not do things that are surprising to people.
quotes.author: Rodney Brooks

quotes.quote: The machine does not isolate man from the great problems of nature but plunges him more deeply into them.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: To curb the machine and limit art to handicraft is a denial of opportunity.
quotes.author: Lewis Mumford

quotes.quote: TheÂ machines men are so intent on making have carried them very far from the old sweet things.
quotes.author: Sherwood Anderson

quotes.quote: NoÂ machineÂ can wind a better sounding or tighter wind than a well trained person,
quotes.author: Leo Fender

quotes.quote: Machines need to talk easily to one another in order to better serve people.
quotes.author: Nicholas Negroponte

quotes.quote: Machines deprive us of two things which are certainly important ingredients of human happiness, namely, spontaneity and variety.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: When aÂ machineÂ begins to run without human aid, it is time to scrap it - whether it be a factory or a government.
quotes.author: Alexander Chase

quotes.quote: You cannot endow even the best machine with initiative; the jolliest steam-roller will not plant flowers.
quotes.author: Walter Lippmann

quotes.quote: Machines were devised not to do a man out of a job, but to take the heavy labor from man's back and place it on the broad back of theÂ machine.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: There is a pleasure in being mad, which none but madmen know.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: It's not about being mad at everything. It's about being really mad at the right things.
quotes.author: Ice T

quotes.quote: Being mad is even pleasant. But only a madman understands that.
quotes.author: Irving Stone

quotes.quote: You see all of us go through the same doubts. We are afraid of being mad; unfortunately for us, of course, all of us are already mad.
quotes.author: Carlos Castaneda

quotes.quote: Resisting madness is the maddest way of being mad.
quotes.author: Norman O. Brown

quotes.quote: In a mad world, only the mad are sane.
quotes.author: Akira Kurosawa

quotes.quote: The worst of madmen is a saint run mad.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: Life is too short to be mad for too long.
quotes.author: Judith L. Harper

quotes.quote: The man who never dreams, goes slowly mad.
quotes.author: Thomas Dolby

quotes.quote: Mad desire, when it has the most, longs for more.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: Madmen always think it's the others who are mad.
quotes.author: Carlos Ruiz Zafon

quotes.quote: The sane are madder than we think, the mad saner.
quotes.author: Anthony Storr

quotes.quote: The madman who knows that he is mad is close to sanity.
quotes.author: Juan Ruiz de Alarcon

quotes.quote: When you are mad at yourself, you are mad at everybody.
quotes.author: Nicole Sullivan

quotes.quote: A mad person sees what isn't there; A visionary sees what isn't there yet.
quotes.author: Judith Thurman

quotes.quote: Even the company of the mad was better than the company of the dead.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: When a mad man walks naked, it is his kinsmen who feel shame, not himself.
quotes.author: Chinua Achebe

quotes.quote: There are worse things than being mad.
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

quotes.quote: Women who are inclined to write poetry at all are inspired by being mad at something.
quotes.author: Amy Clampitt

quotes.quote: Most men are within a finger's breadth of being mad.
quotes.author: Diogenes

quotes.quote: A mad man sees what he sees.
quotes.author: George R. R. Martin

quotes.quote: Don't get mad except on purpose.
quotes.author: Morton Blackwell

quotes.quote: Never go to bed mad. Stay up and fight.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: Not to be mad is another form of madness
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: You have to be mad in the language you're mad in.
quotes.author: Chris Crutcher

quotes.quote: You can choose to be mad in a negative way where it fuels you to do mean, hateful things, or you can let your madness fuel your art and channel it in a positive way.
quotes.author: Allie Gonino

quotes.quote: When you get mad, it's the time you lose.
quotes.author: Hiroko Sakai

quotes.quote: In a mad world, it is the mad who are sane.
quotes.author: Craig Nicholls

quotes.quote: There is no great genius without some touch of madness.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: You're only given a little spark of madness. You mustn't lose it.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: Madness is rare in individuals - but in groups, parties, nations, and ages it is the rule.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: It is madness for sheep to talk peace with a wolf.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Too much sanity may be madness.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: Madness in method, that's genius.
quotes.author: Frank Herbert

quotes.quote: Madness is surprisingly freeing.
quotes.author: Mira Grant

quotes.quote: Sanity is madness put to good use.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Madness is no madness when shared.
quotes.author: Zygmunt Bauman

quotes.quote: Madness is the acme of intelligence.
quotes.author: Naguib Mahfouz

quotes.quote: Every desire has a relation to madness.
quotes.author: Luce Irigaray

quotes.quote: You just have to trust your own madness.
quotes.author: Clive Barker

quotes.quote: Resisting madness is the maddest way of being mad.
quotes.author: Norman O. Brown

quotes.quote: At the edge of madness you howl diamonds and pearls.
quotes.author: Aberjhani

quotes.quote: You have to quit confusing a madness with a mission.
quotes.author: Flannery O'Connor

quotes.quote: To be sane in a world of madman is in itself madness.
quotes.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quotes.quote: Sometimes it's only madness that makes us what we are.
quotes.author: Grant Morrison

quotes.quote: Madness is the result not of uncertainty but certainty.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Madness is just what a genius looks like to a tiny mind.
quotes.author: Steven Moffat

quotes.quote: Madness is only an amplification of what you already are.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: Madness need not be all breakdown. It may also be break-through.
quotes.author: R. D. Laing

quotes.quote: Our occasional madness is less wonderful than our occasional sanity.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Madness is badness of spirit, when one seeks profit from all sources.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Truly great madness can not be achieved without significant intelligence.
quotes.author: Henrik Tikkanen

quotes.quote: Optimism is the madness of insisting that all is well when we are miserable.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Madness was only a handicap only if you couldn't control its irrationalities.
quotes.author: Stuart Hill

quotes.quote: Madness is a divine release of the soul from the yoke of custom and convention.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Madness might sometimes give access to a kind of knowledge. But was not a guarantee.
quotes.author: Shirley Hazzard

quotes.quote: Madness is only a variety of mental nonconformity and we are all individualists here.
quotes.author: Marjorie Kinnan Rawlings

quotes.quote: Madness is a regenerating thing. Like a phoenix, when one strand dies, another burns anew.
quotes.author: Chris Galford

quotes.quote: Madrid is enjoyed most from the ground, exploring your way through its narrow streets that always lead to some intriguing park, market, tapas bar or street performer. Each night we'd leave our hotel to begin a new adventure in Madrid and nine out of 10 times, we'd walk through the Plaza Mayor.
quotes.author: Emilio Estevez

quotes.quote: To go to bed at night in Madrid marks you as a little queer. For a long time your friends will be a little uncomfortable about it. Nobody goes to bed in Madrid until they have killed the night. Appointments with a friend are habitually made for after midnight at the cafe.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: God worked six days, and rested on the seventh: Madrileños rest the six, and on the seventh...go on the bullfight.
quotes.author: H O'Shea

quotes.quote: At best Madrid is a hole, but in rainy weather it is a place fit only to drown rats in.
quotes.author: Henry Adams

quotes.quote: The haunting of history is ever present in Barcelona. I see cities as organisms, as living creatures. To me, Madrid is a man and Barcelona is a woman. And it's a woman who's extremely vain.
quotes.author: Carlos Ruiz Zafon

quotes.quote: Madrid will be remembered as the time when North America and Europe came together to shape the course of a new century, ... United by common purpose and shared values, the new alliance stands ready to shape a brighter, more secure future.
quotes.author: Javier Solana

quotes.quote: In the political confusion and the torrid heat, I convinced myself that Madrid was the world's stomach and that I had been chosen for the task of restoring this digestive organ to health.
quotes.author: Leonora Carrington

quotes.quote: Here is a city built in a wilderness. Philip II chose the site for no other reason than that it was the geographic centre of Spain.
quotes.author: Gerald Brenan

quotes.quote: I would sooner be a foreigner in Spain than in most countries. How easy it is to make friends in Spain!
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: There is no night life in Spain. They stay up late but they get up late. That is not night life. That is delaying the day.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: There's a lot of people from the States and from Madrid who feel a kinship and deeper understanding of what we have been going through.
quotes.author: Sven Eriksson

quotes.quote: The problem is that they are all stars at Madrid. You need someone to carry the water to the well.
quotes.author: Diego Maradona

quotes.quote: Madrid is a big city. It's very dynamic and cosmopolitan.
quotes.author: Xabi Alonso

quotes.quote: I love Spanish cities, particularly Barcelona, Madrid and Palma, which has the most amazing cathedral that I once went to for a wedding.
quotes.author: Louise Nurding

quotes.quote: Magic becomes art when it has nothing to hide.
quotes.author: Ben Okri

quotes.quote: Indubitably, magic is one of the subtlest and most difficult of the sciences and arts. There is more opportunity for errors of comprehension, judgment and practice than in any other branch of physics.
quotes.author: Aleister Crowley

quotes.quote: Never ever doubt in magic. The purest honest thoughts come from children, ask any child if they believe in magic and they will tell you the truth.
quotes.author: Scott Dixon

quotes.quote: Magic and all that is ascribed to it is a deep presentiment of the powers of science.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Magic is not a practice. It is a living, breathing web of energy that, with our permission, can encase our every action.
quotes.author: Dorothy Morrison

quotes.quote: Real magic is not about gaining power over others: it is about gaining power over yourself.
quotes.author: Rosemary Guiley

quotes.quote: I think magic is very related to happiness. So it is not there all the time, but there are beautiful moments of magic in everyone's life.
quotes.author: Penelope Cruz

quotes.quote: Magic is not about having a puzzle to solve. It's about creating a moment of awe and astonishment. And that can be a beautiful thing
quotes.author: David Blaine

quotes.quote: Magic is believing in yourself, if you can do that, you can make anything happen.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: The second principle of magic: things which have once been in contact with each other continue to act on each other at a distance after the physical contact has been severed.
quotes.author: James Frazer

quotes.quote: Magic lies in challenging what seems impossible.
quotes.author: Carol Moseley Braun

quotes.quote: The real secret of magic lies in the performance.
quotes.author: David Copperfield

quotes.quote: Effective magic is transcendent nature.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: There is magic, but you have to be the magician. You have to make the magic happen.
quotes.author: Sidney Sheldon

quotes.quote: Disbelief in magic can force a poor soul into believing in government and business.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: There is no magic when one no longer believes.
quotes.author: Hilda Lewis

quotes.quote: That's the thing with magic. You've got to know it's still here, all around us, or it just stays invisible for you.
quotes.author: Charles De Lint

quotes.quote: Real magic can never be made by offering someone else's liver. You must tear out your own, and not expect to get it back.
quotes.author: Peter S. Beagle

quotes.quote: Magic has always been an element of Witchcraft, but in the Craft its techniques were practiced within a context of community and connection.
quotes.author: Starhawk

quotes.quote: There is a lot of comedy in magic, and magic going wrong, and also it is a dramatic subject.
quotes.author: J K Rowling

quotes.quote: There's a bit of magic in everything, and then some loss to even things out.
quotes.author: Lou Reed

quotes.quote: The magic doesn't come from within the director's mind, it comes from within the hearts of the actors.
quotes.author: James Cameron

quotes.quote: Magic's an art where you use slight of hand or illusion to create wonder. And I was just intrigued with that idea.
quotes.author: David Blaine

quotes.quote: Magic doesn't suit everyone. Only those prepared to take full responsibility for themselves should apply.
quotes.author: Peter J. Carroll

quotes.quote: Magic, like technology, is a tool.
quotes.author: Mercedes Lackey

quotes.quote: A little magic can take you a long way.
quotes.author: Roald Dahl

quotes.quote: There is not enough magic in a bloodline to forge an instant, irrevocable bond.
quotes.author: James Earl Jones

quotes.quote: If you see the magic in a fairy tale, you can face the future.
quotes.author: Danielle Steel

quotes.quote: Real magic in relationships means an absence of judgment of others.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: And where does magic come from? I think that magic's in the learning.
quotes.author: Dar Williams

quotes.quote: Magicians are the most honest people in the world; they tell you they're gonna fool you, and then they do it.
quotes.author: James Randi

quotes.quote: To most magicians, cards themselves are marvels...For one thing, they feel special in your hand. Touching them, holding them, shuffling - the whole process is almost poetic. If you're in a room full of magicians and someone just mentions the word cards, within seconds, everyone is digging into their pockets and pulling out a deck of cards. It's one of the most amazing feelings ever.
quotes.author: David Blaine

quotes.quote: Magicians have done controlled testing in human perception for thousands of years.
quotes.author: Teller

quotes.quote: The magician and the politician have much in common: they both have to draw our attention away from what they are really doing.
quotes.author: Ben Okri

quotes.quote: A magician is strong because he feels the pain between what the world is and what he would make of it.
quotes.author: Lev Grossman

quotes.quote: A good magician's performance tells a story. Each act should build on the next, becoming ever more engaging to fill the audience with wonder. It's a bud that unfurls into a flower, meant to woo the audience.
quotes.author: Laura Lam

quotes.quote: A magician makes the visible invisible. A mime makes the invisible visible.
quotes.author: Marcel Marceau

quotes.quote: The art of a magician is to create wonder. If we live with a sense of wonder, our lives become filled with joy.
quotes.author: Doug Henning

quotes.quote: Every magician knows there is no such thing as magic. They are masters of making things possible out of a situation that seems impossible. The key to getting what you want in life is to know that the only reason why something is, is because it was made possible. It can only be if it is possible for it to be. Make it possible and let it be.
quotes.author: Timothy Simpson

quotes.quote: Most magicians are afraid of magic.
quotes.author: Max Maven

quotes.quote: First rate magician perform first rate magic effects, second rate magician performs third rate magic effects.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: A bad magician never gets the good props.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Magicians disappear all the time, but as soon as a regular person does it, everyone is all scared. "Tom's gone!" "Is he a magician?" "No." "Then let's print up some flyers!"
quotes.author: Mitch Hedberg

quotes.quote: Magicians will always tell you the trick is the most important thing, but Im more interested in telling a story.
quotes.author: Marco Tempest

quotes.quote: The magician must expect the exposure of his tricks sooner or later, and see what it has required long months of study and time to perfect dissolved in an hour. The very best illusions of the best magicians of a few years ago are now the common property of traveling showmen at country fairs.
quotes.author: Alexander Herrmann

quotes.quote: Magicians made magic but critics made it tricks.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: For a professional magician, a stack of playing cards is as good as a stack of money.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: It is the unspoken ethic of all magicians to not reveal the secrets.
quotes.author: David Copperfield

quotes.quote: A magician reveals himself not only by the magic he presents but also by the respect and entertainment he gives to his audience.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Magicians can do more by means of faith than physicians by the truth.
quotes.author: Giordano Bruno

quotes.quote: A magician with decreasing practice sessions will give defective performances.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Magic is not what magicians can do, but what they can't do.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: As a magician you will miss the hundred percent of the applause if you don't perform.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Think like magician, present like magician and perform like magician.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: He is indeed the true enchanter, whose spell operates, not upon the senses, but upon the imagination and the heart.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: A Magician must be the best storyteller in the world.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: As a magician, you must think about chaos and order. Those are the two forces that control the universe.
quotes.author: Rick Riordan

quotes.quote: The Magicians brilliantly explores the hidden underbelly of fantasy and easy magic, taking what's simple on the surface and turning it over to show us the complicated writhing mess beneath. It's like seeing the worlds of Narnia and Harry Potter through a 3-D magnifying glass.
quotes.author: Naomi Novik

quotes.quote: A magician is an actor playing the part of a magician.
quotes.author: Jean Eugene Robert-Houdin

quotes.quote: Most magicians consider the palm an easy move to make. They are inclined to believe that they are 'getting away with it,' when they are in fact fortunate enough to have a polite audience.
quotes.author: Dai Vernon

quotes.quote: There is a magnet in your heart that will attract true friends. That magnet is unselfishness, thinking of others first; when you learn to live for others, they will live for you.
quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.quote: The emotional magnets beneath home and workplace are in the process of being reversed. Work has become a form of 'home' and home has become 'work.'
quotes.author: Arlie Russell Hochschild

quotes.quote: You are a livingÂ magnet. What you attract into your life is in in harmony with your dominant thoughts.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Just like the poles of a magnet, some people are drawn to death and others are repulsed by it, but we all have to deal with it.
quotes.author: James Hetfield

quotes.quote: The man who attracts luck carries with him the magnet of preparation.
quotes.author: Clifton Fadiman

quotes.quote: You might find it hard to imagine gravity as a weak force, but consider that a small magnet can hold up a paper clip, even though the entire earth is pulling down on it.
quotes.author: Lisa Randall

quotes.quote: If you keep a clear vision for your future, it will pull you like a magnet through your toughest times.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: You are a living magnet. What you attract into your life is in in harmony with your dominant thoughts.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Your mind is the most powerful magnet. What you think, you attract.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: An innocent person is really like a magnet and it attracts, he attracts, the people towards himself, just like a flower attracts a bee towards itself.
quotes.author: Nirmala Srivastava

quotes.quote: Our minds become magnetized with the dominating thoughts we hold in our minds and these magnets attract to us the forces, the people, the circumstances of life which harmonize with the nature of our dominating thoughts.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Gratitude is like a magnet; the more grateful you are, the more you will receive to be grateful for.
quotes.author: Iyanla Vanzant

quotes.quote: Optimism is a happiness magnet. If you stay positive, good things and good people will be drawn to you.
quotes.author: Mary Lou Retton

quotes.quote: We are all human magnets. Our deeds, attitudes and thoughts attract in kind. Gets back with interest exactly what he sends.
quotes.author: Sterling W Sill

quotes.quote: We are all powerful magnets,Â attractingÂ unto us more of the way we feel at any point in time.
quotes.author: Esther Hicks

quotes.quote: In the world of existence there is no more powerful magnet than the magnet of love.
quotes.author: Abdu'l-Bahá

quotes.quote: Man is a magnet, and every line and dot and detail of his experiences come by his own attraction.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Towne

quotes.quote: When you give without reservation, you'll become a magnet that pulls the world toward you.
quotes.author: Russell Simmons

quotes.quote: Goals are like a magnet - they pull. And the stronger they are, the more purposeful they are, the bigger they are, the more unique they are, the stronger they pull.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Memory is a magnet. It will pull to it and hold only material nature has designed it to attract.
quotes.author: Jessamyn West

quotes.quote: We are all humanÂ magnets. Our deeds, attitudes and thoughts attract in kind. Gets back with interest exactly what he sends.
quotes.author: Sterling W Sill

quotes.quote: Our thought is the unseen magnet, ever attracting its correspondence in things seen and tangible.
quotes.author: Prentice Mulford

quotes.quote: Good values are like a magnet â€“ they attract good people.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Life is so magical, mysterious, magnificent, and peaceful.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Own your magnificence. The world needs your brilliance and grace.
quotes.author: Cheryl Richardson

quotes.quote: When you realize your own magnificence, you will only attract magnificence in your life.
quotes.author: Anita Moorjani

quotes.quote: If people aren't able to see your magnificence, that's their loss, not yours.
quotes.author: Scott Stabile

quotes.quote: The magnificent cause of being, the imagination, the one reality in this imagined world.
quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

quotes.quote: Her magnificence is deeper than skin.
quotes.author: Delano Johnson Poet

quotes.quote: Only if you have been in the deepest valley, can you ever know how magnificent it is to be on the highest mountain.
quotes.author: Richard Nixon

quotes.quote: You can only embrace the magnificence of your own reality when you stop envying the moments on her highlight reel.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It's such a magnificent thing to be able to love someone and expect nothing from them.
quotes.author: Essie Davis

quotes.quote: Be magnificent. Life's short. Get out there. You can do it. Everyone can do it. Everyone.
quotes.author: Andy Serkis

quotes.quote: There are three things we cry about in life, things that are lost, things that are found, and things that are magnificent.
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.quote: Let us remember that within us there is a palace of immense magnificence.
quotes.author: Teresa of Avila

quotes.quote: The most magnificent being you'll ever be is you.
quotes.author: Layne Beachley

quotes.quote: Find magnificence in each moment.
quotes.author: Panache Desai

quotes.quote: Your magnificence has made me a wonder. Your charm has taught me the way of love.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Reality can be magnificent even when life is not.
quotes.author: Liv Ullmann

quotes.quote: Limitless is your potential. Magnificent is your future.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: Magnificence is likewise a source of the sublime. A great profusion of things which are splendid or valuable in themselves is magnificent. The starry heaven, though it occurs so very frequently to our view, never fails to excite an idea of grandeur.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: The winners in life treat their body as if it were a magnificent spacecraft that gives them the finest transportation and endurance for their lives.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: People are inherently good. Our souls are magnificent and capable of extraordinary performance.
quotes.author: Glenn Beck

quotes.quote: You already are the magnificence that you seek.
quotes.author: Gail Lynne Goodwin

quotes.quote: There are couple of ways to avoid death, one is to be magnificent.
quotes.author: Ian Dury

quotes.quote: A cause may be inconvenient, but it's magnificent. It's like champagne or high heels, and one must be prepared to suffer for it.
quotes.author: Arnold Bennett

quotes.quote: Knowledge is beautiful but wisdom is magnificent.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: It is the restraint of patience that yields the magnificent in life.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: The more we can purge ourselves of these diseases we create, the more we can become magnificent people.
quotes.author: Judith Light

quotes.quote: The moment one gives close attention to any thing, even a blade of grass it becomes a mysterious, awesome, indescribably magnificent world in itself.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: Just be in love. Life is such a magnificent art, so shield it with love.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: I am who I am because the tears of my past have watered the magnificence of my present.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: The time to embrace your magnificence is now.
quotes.author: Rhonda Byrne

quotes.quote: I've always felt there is something sacred in a piece of paper that travels the earth from hand to hand, head to head, heart to heart.
quotes.author: Robert Michael Pyle

quotes.quote: I love the rebelliousness of snail mail, and I love anything that can arrive with a postage stamp. There's something about that person's breath and hands on the letter.
quotes.author: Diane Lane

quotes.quote: A real thank you does not come by e-mail. They come in the mail in an envelope. And what comes out of an envelope is a beautiful thing to touch and to handle and to pass around for everyone to read.
quotes.author: Letitia Baldrige

quotes.quote: Letters are above all useful as a means of expressing the ideal self; and no other method of communication is quite so good for this purpose. In letters we can reform without practice, beg without humiliation, snip and shape embarrassing experiences to the measure of our own desires.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Hardwick

quotes.quote: The post office has a great charm at one point of our lives. When you have lived to my age, you will begin to think letters are never worth going through the rain for.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Letters are among the most significant memorial a person can leave behind them.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: I think I became a writer because I used to write letters to my friends, and I used to love writing them. I loved the idea that you can put marks on a page and send it off, and two days later, someone laughs somewhere else in the world.
quotes.author: David Nicholls

quotes.quote: To send a letter is a good way to go somewhere without moving anything but your heart.
quotes.author: Phyllis Theroux

quotes.quote: The letter suddenly seemed like my most important possession, and like all the real, handwritten, postally delivered letters these days, an instant relic from a previous era, before time and space collapsed and we started sending messages to each other's pockets.
quotes.author: Anne Gisleson

quotes.quote: I have now attained the true art of letter-writing, which we are always told, is to express on paper exactly what one would say to the same person by word of mouth.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: A love letter lost in the mail, forgotten, misdelivered and then discovered years later and received by the intended is romantic. A love letter ending up in someone's spam filter is just annoying.
quotes.author: B.J. Neblett

quotes.quote: At a time when the Post Office is losing substantial revenue from the instantaneous flow of information by email and on the Internet, slowing mail service is a recipe for disaster.
quotes.author: Bernie Sanders

quotes.quote: SPAM is taking e-mail, which is a wonderful tool, and exploiting the idea that it's very inexpensive to send mail.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Getting snail mail is one of my favorite indulgences, and I think receiving mail is actually a common joy.
quotes.author: Mary Lambert

quotes.quote: I got a card in the mail from a close college friend saying that she was proud of me and what I've been doing. It was very sweet and honest. Nobody writes letters anymore, so when you get one in the mail, it feels very special.
quotes.author: Chris Wood

quotes.quote: What a wonderful thing is the mail, capable of conveying across continents a warm human hand-clasp.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: We lay aside letters never to read them again, and at last we destroy them out of discretion, and so disappears the most beautiful, the most immediate breath of life, irrecoverable for ourselves and for others.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Mail from home was so important when you were traveling. It kept you in touch with the familiar, even the part you were running from.
quotes.author: Helen Van Slyke

quotes.quote: I consider it a good rule for letter-writing to leave unmentioned what the recipient already knows, and instead tell him something new.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: Always write angry letters to your enemies. Never mail them.
quotes.author: James Fallows

quotes.quote: Letters are something from you. It's a different kind of intention than writing an e-mail.
quotes.author: Keanu Reeves

quotes.quote: I grew up writing thank-you notes. Real, honest-to-goodness, pen-and-ink, stamped and posted letters. More than simple habit, it's about what the commitment to expressing your thoughts and feelings in writing says about the character of the writer. About the joy, such notes bring to the reader.
quotes.author: Taylor Mali

quotes.quote: One serious drawback about letters is that, in order to get them, one must send some out. When it comes to the mail, I feel it is better to receive than to give.
quotes.author: Joseph Epstein

quotes.quote: Sadly, e-mail has triggered the decline of the handwritten note; I have seen its near-disappearance in my lifetime.
quotes.author: Jami Attenberg

quotes.quote: Letter writing is the only device for combining solitude with good company.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: I sometimes think one of the great blessings we shall enjoy in heaven, will be to receive letters by every post and never be obliged to reply to them.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: How wonderful it is to be able to write someone a letter! To feel like conveying your thoughts to a person, to sit at your desk and pick up a pen, to put your thoughts into words like this is truly marvelous.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: A letter is never ill-timed; it never interrupts. Instead it waits for us to find the opportune minute, the quiet moment to savor the message. There is an element of timelessness about letter writing.
quotes.author: Lois Wyse

quotes.quote: In an age like ours, which is not given to letter-writing, we forget what an important part it used to play in people's lives.
quotes.author: Anatole Broyard

quotes.quote: Letter writing is an excellent way of slowing down this lunatic helter skelter universe long enough to gather one’s thoughts.
quotes.author: Nick Bantock

quotes.quote: The branch had unquestionably been whacked from a tree in the woods behind our son's house in Maine and had made the long trip south. It wore the look and carried the smell of authenticity.
quotes.author: E.B. White

quotes.quote: I would really rather feel bad in Maine than good anywhere else.
quotes.author: E.B. White

quotes.quote: You can certainly learn to spell 'moccasin' while driving into Maine, and there is often little else to do, except steer and avoid death.
quotes.author: E.B. White

quotes.quote: I think of those first five years in Maine as the time when this happened to me... I was suddenly seeing, feeling, and listening as a child sees, feels, and listens.
quotes.author: E.B. White

quotes.quote: Maine out of season is unmistakably a great destination: hospitable, good-humored, plenty of elbow room, short days, dark nights of crackling ice crystals.
quotes.author: Paul Theroux

quotes.quote: Maine is a joy in the summer. But the soul of Maine is more apparent in the winter.
quotes.author: Paul Theroux

quotes.quote: Maine is a movable music festival in the summertime.
quotes.author: Sue Hubbell

quotes.quote: In Maine we have a saying that there's no point in speaking unless you can improve on silence.
quotes.author: Edmund Muskie

quotes.quote: This was what you might call a bran-new country; the only roads were of Nature's making, and the few houses were camps. Here, then, one could no longer accuse institutions and society, but must front the true source of evil.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The New York papers carried pages of coverage for an entire week, stating that the Maine had been purposely blown up and that the Spanish had done it.
quotes.author: Jan R. Van Meter

quotes.quote: You cannot be absolutely dumb when you live with a person unless you are inhabitant of the North of England or the state of Maine
quotes.author: Ford Madox Ford

quotes.quote: As Maine goes, so goes the nation.
quotes.author: Susan Ratcliffe

quotes.quote: In less than half a century the Island, first regarded as merely a rock, barren , and largely inhospitable wilderness, far distant from emerging metropolitan centers along the Eastern seaboard became a scenic destination for thousands of Americans.
quotes.author: Pamela Belanger

quotes.quote: Maine people have a live-and-let-live philosophy, and tend to be fair and open-minded.
quotes.author: Chellie Pingree

quotes.quote: In Maine, there's a deeply ingrained sense that you can always get a little more use out of something.
quotes.author: Tim Sample

quotes.quote: I grew up on a dirt road in Maine, and pretty much everybody on that dirt road was related to me, and they were old. And so grumpy.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Strout

quotes.quote: The beauty of Maine is such that you can't really see it clearly while you live there. But now that I've moved away, with each return it all becomes almost hallucinatory: the dark blue water, the rocky coast with occasional flashes of white sand, the jasper stone beaches along the coast, the fire and fir forests somehow vivid in their stillness.
quotes.author: Alexander Chee

quotes.quote: I am a big lover of the environment. I actually come from Maine, which is pretty much all environment.
quotes.author: Noah Gray-Cabey

quotes.quote: When I was a child growing up in Maine, one of my favorite things to do was to look for the sand dollars on the seashores of Maine, because my parents told me it would bring me luck. But you know, these shells, they were hard to find. They're covered in sand. They're difficult to see.
quotes.author: Sarah Parcak

quotes.quote: The forests are largely primeval. Oaks, beeches, birches, maples, ashes, poplars and many other deciduous trees of our eastern ranges, here found in full luxuriance, mingles with groves of pine and giant hemlock. The typical shrub of northeast America are in equal abundance. Wild flowers abound.
quotes.author: Franklin K. Lane

quotes.quote: I never fastened my door, night or day, though I was to be absent several days; not even when the next fall I spent a fortnight in the woods of Maine. and yet my house was more respected than if it had been surrounded by a file of soldiers.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Located on the East Coast of the United States, Main is famous for its wild, untamed scenery. Rocky, windswept beaches line the coast.
quotes.author: Robin S. Doak

quotes.quote: Spring and fall are also comfortable. Maine's fall foliage attracts visitors from around the world.
quotes.author: Robin S. Doak

quotes.quote: Maine is wonderful. It can be very hard. I mean, if you look at the profile maps it doesn't look it, but somehow when you get out there it's really steep and hard.
quotes.author: Bill Bryson

quotes.quote: Maine out of season is unmistakably a great destination: hospitable, good-humored, plenty of elbow room, short days, dark nights of crackling ice crystals.
quotes.author: Paul Theroux

quotes.quote: My grandfather once told her if you couldn't read with cold feet, there wouldn't be a literate soul in the state of Maine.
quotes.author: Marilynne Robinson

quotes.quote: Maine is a beautiful place that I paradoxically want to hoard to myself and share with everyone I meet.
quotes.author: John Hodgman

quotes.quote: Maine out of season is unmistakably a great destination: hospitable, good-humored, plenty of elbow room, short days, dark nights of crackling ice crystals.
quotes.author: Paul Theroux

quotes.quote: There's a quality of life in Maine which is this singular and unique. I think. It's absolutely a world onto itself.
quotes.author: Jamie Wyeth

quotes.quote: To demonstrate how difficult it had been to clean the mirrors, he asked he maintenance man to show the girls how much effort was required. The custodian obliged, took out a long-handled squeegee, dipped it in the toilet, and cleaned the mirror with it. SInce then, there have been no lip prints on the mirror.
quotes.author: James Brigleb

quotes.quote: For three years, out of key with his time, / He strove to resuscitate the dead art / Of poetry; to maintain the 'sublime' / In the old sense. / Wrong from the start.
quotes.author: Hugh Selwyn Mauberley

quotes.quote: The removal, so far as possible, of all economic barriers and the establishment of an equality of trade conditions among all the nations consenting to the peace and associating themselves for its maintenance.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: My mom said the only reason men are alive is for lawn care and vehicle maintenance.
quotes.author: Tim Allen

quotes.quote: Political freedom...is a necessary condition for the long-term maintenance of economic freedom.
quotes.author: Milton Friedman

quotes.quote: But I still maintain that, by all the canons of our modern books on comparative religion, baseball is a religion, and the only one that is not sectarian but national.	But I still maintain that, by all the canons of our modern books on comparative religion, baseball is a religion, and the only one that is not sectarian but national.
quotes.author: Morris Raphael Cohen

quotes.quote: Quoting behavior encourages the maintenance of traditional values by pointing out to individuals in usually non-threatening ways that they have strayed from these values.
quotes.author: Joyce Penfield

quotes.quote: When you move into a house, the best advice is to go slowly. Then make changes to suit your tastes and style, indulging your interests in one area and perhaps reducing maintenance in another.
quotes.author: Better Homes and Gardens

quotes.quote: Whether you are moving into a house and thinking for the first time about how to maintain the yard, or simply want to be a bit more organized and confident about the maintenance you're already doing.
quotes.author: Better Homes and Gardens

quotes.quote: Most yards have some areas devoted to annual or perennial flowers, vegetables, or herbs. Note the sizes of these gardens and think about the time and energy required to plant and maintain them.
quotes.author: Better Homes and Gardens

quotes.quote: Should you rent or buy? Buying may seem appealing because you will put an end to escalating rent and can build equity. But the reality of routine home maintenance and repairs can quickly drain a bank account.
quotes.author: Michelle Higgins

quotes.quote: A modest degree of order is necessary for cleaning.
quotes.author: Nancy Hopkins Reily

quotes.quote: The mind of the man is so much occupied with thoughts about maintenance that the world surpass the position of angels if he were to devote as many of them to the giver of maintenance.
quotes.author: Sa Di

quotes.quote: Eat not so much that it comes up to your mouth / Nor so little that from weakness thy soul comes up. / Although maintenance of life depends upon food / Victuals bring on disease when eaten to excess.
quotes.author: Vanessa Diffenbaugh

quotes.quote: If it be accepted to insure tranquillity of mind from cares for food and o obtain leisure for devotion, it is lawful but if it be taken for maintenance, it is forbidden.
quotes.author: Sa Di

quotes.quote: When he protested, not too solemnly, / That for a world's achieving maintenance / The crust of overdone vicinity / Lacked aliment, they called it recreance.
quotes.author: Edwin Arlington Robinson

quotes.quote: Whether thou strivest for a maintenance or not / God the most high and glorious will send it to thee; / And if thou rushest into the jaw of a lion or tiger / They will not devour thee unless on the day decreed.
quotes.author: Sa Di

quotes.quote: Masseur and manicurist / Or anything by chance / They vilify their husbands— / And draw the maintenance.
quotes.author: Henry Lawson

quotes.quote: Development is maintenance.
quotes.author: Brian Marick

quotes.quote: Every feature has some maintenance cost, and having fewer features lets us focus on the ones we care about and make sure they work very well.
quotes.author: David Karp

quotes.quote: PreventiveÂ maintenance: Don't start today by doing yesterday's work.
quotes.author: Deniece Schofield

quotes.quote: The secret of landscapes isn't creation...It's maintenance.
quotes.author: Michael Dolan

quotes.quote: We take better care of the maintenance of our cars than we take care of the maintenance of our bodies.
quotes.author: David H. Murdock

quotes.quote: If the relentless personal maintenance plan has taken over your life, give it a rest.
quotes.author: Willie Geist

quotes.quote: Another flaw in the human character is that everybody wants to build and nobody wants to do maintenance.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: You are the most rare & majestic you there ever was and ever will be.
quotes.author: Jenna Marbles

quotes.quote: Each of us is like seed, planted by the Good Gardener so we might grow into something majestic.
quotes.author: Seth Adam Smith

quotes.quote: There is nothing more majestic than the determined courage of individuals willing to suffer and sacrifice for their freedom and dignity.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King

quotes.quote: Ive seen the majestic beauty of nature and the overwhelming perfection of it. To me, theres nothing closer to God than that.
quotes.author: Cote de Pablo

quotes.quote: We have a gift that no one else has. That gift is the majestic scenery and the diversity and the beauty of our state that allows people to come here and have a new experience at every turn.
quotes.author: Kim McClelland

quotes.quote: Release your majestic mind, embrace your untamed inner spirit. Break free from captivity, avoid society...You were born to be free.
quotes.author: Melanie Muller

quotes.quote: There is nothing more majestic than the determined courage of individuals willing to suffer and sacrifice for their freedom and dignity.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King

quotes.quote: The best way to see majesty is to strip away everything that pretends to be majestic so that which is fake wholly collapses in the face of that which is majestic. And God in a manger is likely the most remarkable example we have of such a monumental truth.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: Silence is the element in which great things fashion themselves together; that at length they may emerge, full-formed and majestic, into the delight of life, which they are thenceforth to rule.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: The sea, the majestic sea, breaks everything, crushes everything, cleans everything, takes everything...from me.
quotes.author: Corinne Bailey Rae

quotes.quote: The law it is-a majestic edifice, sheltering all of us, each stone of which rests on another.
quotes.author: John Galsworthy

quotes.quote: Release your majestic mind, embrace your untamed inner spirit. Break free from captivity, avoid society...You were born to be free.
quotes.author: Melanie Muller

quotes.quote: It can be a beautiful experience to look for the magic that is hidden within the realm of our lives; but let's not let the process blind us to the majesty that is right in front of us.
quotes.author: Dr.Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: You are resplendent with light, more majestic than mountain rich with game.
quotes.author: Psalm 76:4

quotes.quote: Meditation on the majestic energy of the universe should increase our love for humanity, should widen, not narrow, our hearts.
quotes.author: Richad Holloway

quotes.quote: How majestic is naturalness. I have never met a man whom I really considered a great man who was not always natural and simple. Affectation is inevitably the mark of one not sure of himself.
quotes.author: Charles G. Dawes

quotes.quote: Sunrise offered a very beautiful spectacle; the water was quite unruffled, but the motion communicated by the tides was so great that, although there was not a breath of air stirring, the sea heaved slowly with a grand and majestic motion.
quotes.author: George Grey

quotes.quote: We talk of sunshine and moonshine, but not of cloud-shine, which is yet one of the illuminations of our skies. A shining cloud is one of the most majestic of all secondary lights.
quotes.author: Alice Meynell

quotes.quote: The pure sky, the majestic sun which seemed to descend proudly into the waters as if to refresh itself, the luminous ray reaching out from it even to us, gilding the waves lightly stirred by the evening breeze.
quotes.author: Saint Mother Theodore Guerin

quotes.quote: There is a majestic grandeur in tranquillity.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: Look at all the majestic creatures the univerese has created and know that you too were created equally magnificent.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A glory gilds the sacred page, majestic like the sun, it gives a light to every age, it gives, but borrows none.
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.quote: There is a certain majesty in simplicity which is far above all the quaintness of wit.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: Knowledge of the eternal is all-embracing. To be all-embracing leads to righteousness, which is majestic.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: For myself, faith begins with a realization that a supreme intelligence brought the universe into being and created man. It is not difficult for me to have this faith, for it is incontrovertible that where there is a plan there is intelligence--an orderly, unfolding universe testifies to the truth of the most majestic statement ever uttered--'In the beginning God.'
quotes.author: Arthur Compton

quotes.quote: There is music in my heart. There is art in my heart and there is majesty in my heart, because there is love in my heart!
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: Good wine, well drunk, can lend majesty to the human spirit.
quotes.author: M.F.K. Fisher

quotes.quote: By investigating God's majestic and awesome creation, science can actually be a means of worship.
quotes.author: Francis Collins

quotes.quote: The law, in its majestic equality, forbids rich and poor alike to sleep under bridges, to beg in the streets, and to steal their bread.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: Our community belongs to us and whether it is mean or majestic, whether arrayed in glory or covered in shame, we cannot but share its character and destiny.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.quote: Infuse your life with action. Don't wait for it to happen. Make it happen. Make your own future. Make your own hope. Make your own love. And whatever your beliefs, honor your creator, not by passively waiting for grace to come down from upon high, but by doing what you can to make grace happen, yourself, right now, right down here on Earth.
quotes.author: Bradley Whitford

quotes.quote: Some people want it to happen, some wish it would happen, others make it happen.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: You have the ability to choose which way you want to go. You have to believe great things are going to happen in your life. Do everything you can - prepare, pray and achieve - to make it happen.
quotes.author: Ben Carson

quotes.quote: Never let life impede on your ability to manifest your dreams. Dig deeper into your dreams and deeper into yourself and believe that anything is possible, and make it happen.
quotes.author: Corin Nemec

quotes.quote: Never be complacent about the current steps; don't agree and follow the status quo. Be determined that you are making an indelible impact with great change. Now, dress up and go to make it happen!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Stop complaining and start doing.
quotes.author: Kevin Abdulrahman

quotes.quote: Infuse your life with action. Don't wait for it to happen. Make it happen. Make your own future. Make your own hope.
quotes.author: Bradley Whitford

quotes.quote: Some people dream of success, while other people get up every morning and make it happen.
quotes.author: Wayne Huizenga

quotes.quote: Good things come to those who initiate.
quotes.author: Susan RoAne

quotes.quote: You can't just sit there and wait for people to give you that golden dream. You've got to get out there and make it happen for yourself.
quotes.author: Diana Ross

quotes.quote: Whatever you can do, or dream you can do, begin it. Boldness has genius, power, and magic in it. Begin it now.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Ideas are a dime a dozen, but people who put them into effect are extremely rare. Be the minority and make it happen!
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Don’t make excuses for why you can’t get it done. Focus on all the reasons why you must make it happen.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.quote: There is no scarcity of opportunity to make a living at what you love; there's only scarcity of resolve to make it happen.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: One day you will wake up and there won't be any more time to do the things you've always wanted. Do it now.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Apply yourself. Get all the education you can, but then, by God, do something. Don’t just stand there, make it happen.
quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

quotes.quote: Faith does not make things happen. It merely breeds perseverance; which helps one persist in making things happen.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: The dreams you have that may meet mockeries from the lips of negative people will yield the success that will squeeze tears from their eyes later! Dare to resist every negative criticism and persist to make it happen!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Once you make a decision, the universe conspires to make it happen.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: It's not about ideas. It's about making ideas happen.
quotes.author: Scott Belsky

quotes.quote: Never give up! People don't understand how persistent you have to be. You come up against an obstacle and you have to find a way of moving forward. You take detours, navigate between the obstacles and make it happen. Unless you are very strong and convinced you can succeed, you will be swept away.
quotes.author: Frank Lowy

quotes.quote: Life is what you make of it. Don't make excuses, make it happen.
quotes.author: Chamillionaire

quotes.quote: You must see it. You must believe it. And then you must never stop working to make it happen.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: Don't make excuses for why you can't get it done. Focus on all the reasons why you must make it happen.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.quote: Whatever you want to have happen to you make it happen for others now and eventually but inevitably you will reap the seeds you have sown.
quotes.author: Sharon Gannon

quotes.quote: Don’t tell people your plans. Show them your results.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Action is the foundational key to all success.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote:
Set a goal, and in small, consistent steps, work to reach it. Get support
from your peers when you start flagging. Repeat. You will change.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: You are the only one who can make it happen for you. Others can support and encourage you, but you have to find the energy within in order to step into the center of your own life and take charge.
quotes.author: Lynda Field

quotes.quote: All teenage girls like to look good and tennis players are no different.
quotes.author: Maria Kirilenko

quotes.quote: Maturity begins to grow when you can sense your concern for others outweighing your concern for yourself.
quotes.author: John MacNaughton

quotes.quote: Freedom and democracy are dreams you never give up.
quotes.author: Aung San Suu Kyi

quotes.quote: It has been said that democracy is the worst form of government except all the others that have been tried.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Democracy is when the indigent, and not the men of property, are the rulers.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The spirit of democracy is not a mechanical thing to be adjusted by abolition of forms. It requires change of heart.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Democracy passes into despotism.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Our great democracies still tend to think that a stupid man is more likely to be honest than a clever man, and our politicians take advantage of this prejudice by pretending to be even more stupid than nature made them
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: The end may justify the means as long as there is something that justifies the end
quotes.author: Leon Trotsky

quotes.quote: Democracy is a device that ensures we shall be governed no better than we deserve
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Democracy is the theory that the common people know what they want and deserve to get it good and hard.
quotes.author: H.L. Mencken

quotes.quote: As I would not be a slave, so I would not be a master. This expresses my idea of democracy.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Democracy works when people claim it as their own.
quotes.author: BILL MOYERS

quotes.quote: The strongest democracies flourish from frequent and lively debate, but they endure when people of every background and belief find a way to set aside smaller differences in service of a greater purpose.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Democracy is the road to socialism.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: The many are more incorruptible than the few; they are like the greater quantity of water which is less easily corrupted than a little.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Democracy means that anyone can grow up to be president, and anyone who doesn't grow up can be vice president.
quotes.author: Johnny Carson

quotes.quote: Democracy is a charming form of government, full of variety and disorder, and dispensing a sort of equality to equals and unequal alike.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Democracy substitutes election by the incompetent many for appointment by the corrupt few.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: No man is good enough to govern another man without that other's consent.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Democracy give every man the right to be his own oppressor.
quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

quotes.quote: Democracy means simply the bludgeoning of the people by the people for the people.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Democracy consists of choosing your dictators, after they've told you what you think it is you want to hear.
quotes.author: Alan Corenk

quotes.quote: Democracy means government by discussion, but it is only effective if you can stop people talking.
quotes.author: Clement Atlee

quotes.quote: Democracy without morality is impossible.
quotes.author: Jack Kemp

quotes.quote: Democracy is the name we give the people whenever we need them.
quotes.author: Marquis de Flers Robert and Arman de Caillavet

quotes.quote: The great thing about democracy is that it gives every voter a chance to do something stupid.
quotes.author: Art Spander

quotes.quote: A government of the people, by the people, and for the people shall not perish from the earth.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: These are the people we elected and if we are not satisfied we should get new candidates. It is in our hands. It is our country. It is a very simplistic view that politicians are to blame for everything.
quotes.author: Robert Stanfield

quotes.quote: A man will fight harder for his interests than for his rights.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Make-up can only make you look pretty on the outside but it doesn't help if you're ugly on the inside. Unless you eat the make-up.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: That's why I began doing makeup in the first place: I was hoping that through helping people see the beauty in themselves, I could try and find it in me.
quotes.author: Kevyn Aucoin

quotes.quote: Makeup is not a mask that covers up your beauty: it's a weapon that helps you express who you are from the inside.
quotes.author: Michelle Phan

quotes.quote: Makeup is something that a female has to reckon with every single day. Whether you wear it or don't, you're always making decisions about wearing it or not, or how you're wearing it, and what that means.
quotes.author: Alexandra Kleeman

quotes.quote: Creativity is your best makeup skill, don't be afraid to experiment.
quotes.author: Pat McGrath

quotes.quote: Makeup is a way for a woman to look and feel like herself, only prettier and more confident.
quotes.author: Bobbi Brown

quotes.quote: I feel more confident if my makeup looks good.
quotes.author: Ellie Goulding

quotes.quote: Makeup can help you capture a moment.
quotes.author: Carine Roitfeld

quotes.quote: Beneath the makeup and behind the smile I am just a girl who wishes for the world.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: The most beautiful makeup of a woman is passion. But cosmetics are easier to buy.
quotes.author: Yves Saint-Laurent

quotes.quote: A makeover is the rebranding of a human being.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: I love the confidence that makeup gives me.
quotes.author: Tyra Banks

quotes.quote: All the makeup in this world can never cover up an empty brain.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: The best thing is to look natural, but it takes makeup to look natural.
quotes.author: Calvin Klein

quotes.quote: Good skin is the best foundation for your makeup.
quotes.author: Holland Roden

quotes.quote: To me, beauty and makeup and color is like the finishing touch on everything.
quotes.author: Marc Jacobs

quotes.quote: I don't think I could live without hair, makeup and styling, let alone be the performer I am. I am a glamour girl through and through. I believe in the glamorous life and I live one.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.quote: Personalized beauty is about each woman being able to create her own makeup routine that complements her coloring and style.
quotes.author: Bobbi Brown

quotes.quote: To me, natural, healthy looking skin is really beautiful. With a little concealer, eyeshadow, liner, gloss and bronzer, I love my lighter makeup look. I've saved so much money on facials!
quotes.author: Giuliana Rancic

quotes.quote: Whether I'm wearing lots of makeup or no makeup, I'm always the same person inside.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.quote: Makeup is very important for a show. It's really an accessory on the runway. You have to be sure that it fits the clothes.
quotes.author: Francois Nars

quotes.quote: I love natural beauty, and I think it's your best look, but I think makeup as an artist is so transformative.
quotes.author: Marina and the Diamonds

quotes.quote: Makeup is scary. When I do it myself, it's just mascara, and sometimes I forget even to do that.
quotes.author: Sandra Bullock

quotes.quote: I just like playing with makeup and clothes...so I really don't feel like there are rules, and if there are rules, then I think it's up to you to break them.
quotes.author: Kesha

quotes.quote: For beautiful eyes, look for the good in others; for beautiful lips, speak only words of kindness; and for poise, walk with the knowledge that you are never alone.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Your eye makeup says so much about you and your style.
quotes.author: Laura Mercier

quotes.quote: For makeup, I prefer to keep it simple for the daytime.
quotes.author: Chiara Ferragni

quotes.quote: We know grooming is important for people. To get their hair done, to get makeup and things like that - that makes a person feel better.
quotes.author: Kenneth Williams

quotes.quote: There are no rules when it comes to makeup!
quotes.author: Kevyn Aucoin

quotes.quote: Some people think wearing powder ages them, but try it anyway. For me it mattes my makeup and blends it well.
quotes.author: Marcia Cross

quotes.quote: It's easy to make a buck. It's a lot tougher to make a difference.
quotes.author: Tom Brokaw

quotes.quote: We must not, in trying to think about how we can make a big difference, ignore the small daily differences we can make which, over time, add up to big differences that we often cannot foresee.
quotes.author: Marian Wright Edelman

quotes.quote: You're the only one who can make the difference. Whatever your dream is, go for it.
quotes.author: Earvin Magic Johnson

quotes.quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Being a man or a woman is a matter of birth. Being a man or a woman who makes a difference is a matter of choice.
quotes.author: Byron Garrett

quotes.quote: If you think you're too small to make a difference, you've obviously never been in bed with a mosquito.
quotes.author: Michelle Walker

quotes.quote: It's not what you do once in a while, it's what you do day in and day out that makes the difference.
quotes.author: Jenny Craig

quotes.quote: It's not what you've got, it's what you use that makes a difference.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: It's your unlimited power to care and to love that can make the biggest difference in the quality of your life.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: Sometimes just a smile on our face can help to make this world a better place. Stand up for the things that are right. Try to talk things out instead of fight. Lend a hand when you can. You can help to make a difference . . .
quotes.author: Robert Alan

quotes.quote: When it's all over, it's not who you were. . . it's whether you made a difference.
quotes.author: Robert Joseph Dole

quotes.quote: We must remember that one determined person can make a significant difference, and that a small group of determined people can change the course of history.
quotes.author: Sonia Johnson

quotes.quote: It's a great satisfaction knowing that for a brief point in time you made a difference.
quotes.author: Irene Natividad

quotes.quote: It's not what abilities you have that makes a difference it's what you do with these abilities that's paramount.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Little things done over and over again add up to making a difference in a big way.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: I realize it's possible in ways both large or small to make a difference in someone's life.
quotes.author: Yanni

quotes.quote: People don't understand that not only can they make a difference, it's their responsibility to do so.
quotes.author: Florence Robinson

quotes.quote: There is no greater joy nor greater reward than to make a fundamental difference in someone's life.
quotes.author: Mary Rose Mcgeady

quotes.quote: You cannot get through a single day without having an impact on the world around you. What you do makes a difference, and you have to decide what kind of difference you want to make.
quotes.author: Jane Goodall

quotes.quote: You may find that making a difference for others makes the biggest difference in you.
quotes.author: Brian Williams

quotes.quote: It is better to have a meaningful life and make a difference than to merely have a long life.
quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.quote: It takes ONE FAMILY to make a difference in this COMMUNITY. It takes ONE PERSON to make a difference in this FAMILY.
quotes.author: Nisandeh Neta

quotes.quote: It's important to see what we can do to make a difference, but it's more important to me to do it every single day.
quotes.author: Alicia Silverstone

quotes.quote: We can really make a difference in the world, just one heart, one kind word at a time.
quotes.author: Noelani Musicaro

quotes.quote: It is important to nurture any new ideas and initiatives which can make a difference
quotes.author: Wangari Maathai

quotes.quote: Don't accept that you can't make a difference. Because if you can't make a difference, you won't make a difference, and if you put a multiplier on that we will continue on an unsustainable pathway.
quotes.author: Maurice Strong

quotes.quote: None of us alone can save the nation or world. But each of us can make a positive difference if we commit ourselves to do so.
quotes.author: Cornel West

quotes.quote: To make a difference in someone's life, you don't have to be brilliant, rich, beautiful, or perfect. You just have to care.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Go out and make a difference in your community. You don't need endless time and perfect conditions. Do it now. Do it today. Do it for twenty minutes and watch your heart start beating.
quotes.author: Barbara Sher

quotes.quote: Any time you have an opportunity to make a difference in this world and you don't, then you are wasting your time on Earth.
quotes.author: Roberto Clemente

quotes.quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Maybe it's not always about trying to fix something broken. Maybe it's about starting over and creating something better.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Success occurs when your dreams get bigger than your excuses.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Taking a new step, uttering a new word, is what people fear most.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

quotes.quote: Change is going to be hard, but that doesn't mean it isn't worth it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The world hates change, yet it is the only thing that has brought progress.
quotes.author: Charles Kettering

quotes.quote: If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: You cannot change your future, but you can change your habits, and surely your habits will change your future.
quotes.author: Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: Nobody can go back and start a new beginning, but anyone can start today and make a new ending.
quotes.author: Maria Robinson

quotes.quote: Your success in life isn't based on your ability to simply change. It is based on your ability to change faster than your competition, customers, and business.
quotes.author: Mark Sanborn

quotes.quote: People Underestimate their capacity for change. There is never a right time to do a difficult thing.
quotes.author: John Porter

quotes.quote: You never change things by fighting the existing reality. To change something, build a new model that makes the existing model obsolete.
quotes.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

quotes.quote: Don't let the concept of change scare you as much as the prospect of remaining unhappy.
quotes.author: Timber Hawkeye

quotes.quote: The greatest mistake you can make in life is to be continually fearing you will make one.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Change means that what was before wasn't perfect. People want things to be better.
quotes.author: Esther Dyson

quotes.quote: Change the way you look at things and the things you look at change.
quotes.author: Wayne W. Dyer

quotes.quote: Never too old, never too bad, never too late, never too sick to start from scratch once again.
quotes.author: Bikram Choudhury

quotes.quote: Unless you are prepared to give up something valuable you will never be able to truly change at all, because you'll be forever in the control of things you can't give up.
quotes.author: Andy Law

quotes.quote: The secret of change is to focus all of your energy, not on fighting the old, but on building the new.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Everything is in a process of change, nothing endures; we do not seek permanence.
quotes.author: Masatoshi Naito

quotes.quote: Some changes look negative on the surface but you will soon realize that space is being created in your life for something new to emerge.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: The people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world are the ones who do.
quotes.author: Walter Isaacson

quotes.quote: And suddenly you just know. It's time to start something new and trust the magic of beginnings.
quotes.author: Meister Eckhart

quotes.quote: Incredible change happens in your life when you decide to take control of what you do have power over instead of craving control over what you don't.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: To improve is to change; to be perfect is to change often.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: When we are no longer able to change the situation, we can always change ourselves.
quotes.author: Viktor E. Frankl

quotes.quote: The world as we have created it is a process of our thinking. It cannot be changed without changing our thinking.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: They must often change, who would be constant in happiness or wisdom.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Sometimes our lives have to be completely shaken up, changed, and rearranged to relocate us to the place we are meant to be.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: To exist is to change, to change is to mature, to mature is to go on creating oneself endlessly.
quotes.author: Henri Bergson

quotes.quote: A penny saved is a penny earned.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Don't let money run your life, let money help you run your life better.
quotes.author: John Rampton

quotes.quote: Making money is art and working is art and good business is the best art.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.quote: Making money is certainly the one addiction I cannot shake.
quotes.author: Felix Dennis

quotes.quote: The safest way to double your money is to fold it over and put it in your pocket.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.quote: The money you make is a symbol of the value you create.
quotes.author: Idowu Koyenikan

quotes.quote: The key to making money is to stay invested.
quotes.author: Suze Orman

quotes.quote: Never depend on single income. Make investments to create a second source.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: Don't stay in bed, unless you can make money in bed.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: Expect the best. Prepare for the worst. Capitalize on what comes.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: If you would know the value of money, go and try to borrow some.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Making money isn't hard in itself. What's hard is to earn it doing something worth devoting one's life to.
