quotes.author: Carlos Ruiz Zafón

quotes.quote: Everyday is a bank account, and time is our currency. No one is rich, no one is poor, we've got 24 hours each.
quotes.author: Christopher Rice

quotes.quote: Today, the concept of business is to make money. Making money is the name of the business.
quotes.author: Muhammad Yunus

quotes.quote: I have ways of making money that you know nothing of.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.quote: To acquire money requires valor, to keep money requires prudence, and to spend money well is an art.
quotes.author: Berthold Auerbach

quotes.quote: An investment in knowledge always pays the best interest.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The longer you're not taking action the more money you're losing.
quotes.author: Carrie Wilkerson

quotes.quote: Making money isn't hard in itself. What's hard is to earn it doing something worth devoting one's life to.
quotes.author: Carlos Ruiz Zafon

quotes.quote: Investing is simple, but not easy.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: The real key to making money in stocks is not to get scared out of them.
quotes.author: Peter Lynch

quotes.quote: Life started getting good when I started making money.
quotes.author: Balthazar Getty

quotes.quote: Money is usually attracted, not pursued.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: A wise person should have money in their head, but not in their heart.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: Money is a terrible master but an excellent servant.
quotes.author: P.T. Barnum

quotes.quote: Rule No. 1: Never lose money. Rule No. 2: Never forget rule No.1.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: The only point in making money is, you can tell some big shot where to go.
quotes.author: Humphrey Bogart

quotes.quote: There is a gigantic difference between earning a great deal of money and being rich.
quotes.author: Marlene Dietrich

quotes.quote: Money is like a sixth sense and you can't make use of the other five without it.
quotes.author: William Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: The more you learn, the more you earn.
quotes.author: Frank Clark

quotes.quote: To make peace, one must be an uncompromising leader. To make peace, one must also embody compromise.
quotes.author: Benazir Bhutto

quotes.quote: In a relationship, no amount of extra effort on your part can make up for a lack of effort on theirs.
quotes.author: John Mark Green

quotes.quote: This world's anguish is no different from the love we insist on holding back.
quotes.author: Aberjhani

quotes.quote: Let the angry word be answered only with a kiss.
quotes.author: Thomas Hill

quotes.quote: While we are making up our minds as to when we shall begin, the opportunity is lost.
quotes.author: Quintilian

quotes.quote: We each after a while have to become reconciled to what it is that our talents and appetites lead us.
quotes.author: Tobias Wolff

quotes.quote: As a society we cannot seem to make peace with nature. As individuals, it's hard for us to be at peace with ourselves.
quotes.author: Terence McKenna

quotes.quote: Make peace with the past, so it doesn't spoil your present.
quotes.author: Regina Brett

quotes.quote: It is not enough to win a war; it is more important to organize the peace.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Learn to make peace with your past, or your future will become a constant battle that you'll never win.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Quarrels are a natural part of relationships. Making up is always the best part.
quotes.author: Maureen Johnson

quotes.quote: There are two ways of lying. One, not telling the truth and the other, making up statistics.
quotes.author: Josefina Vazquez Mota

quotes.quote: Man's greatest blunder has been in trying to make peace with the skies instead of making peace with his neighbors.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Be calm in arguing for fierceness makes error a fault and truth discourtesy.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: We must all make peace so that we can all live in peace.
quotes.author: Jean-Bertrand Aristide

quotes.quote: Peace is not the absence of conflict, but the ability to cope with conflict by peaceful means.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: Most folks are as happy as they make up their minds to be.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: The first to apologize is the bravest. The first to forgive is the strongest. And the first to forget is the happiest.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If you want to make peace with your enemy, you have to work with your enemy. Then he becomes your partner.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Without doubt, Malaysia is the great economic star of the Muslim world.
quotes.author: Martin Jacques

quotes.quote: Malaysia is a country unlike any other: Full of promise and fragility. Its history, cultural and religious diversity make it a rich, compelling and surprising land.
quotes.author: Taric Ramadan

quotes.quote: In Malaysia, where Western culture was extremely influential, I'd grown up listening to Elvis and the Beatles and watching American movies. People wanted to be like Americans. In contrast, when I got here, I saw prosperous middle-class American college students wanting to somehow join the Third World.
quotes.author: Feisal Abdul Rauf

quotes.quote: Justice is the most important thing. In a plural society like Malaysia, you cannot have two laws - one law for the Muslim, one law for the non-Muslim.
quotes.author: Mahatir Mohamad

quotes.quote: In the eyes of the world, Malaysia has become a pariah state, a state where anyone can be hauled up and questioned by the police, detained, and charged through abusing laws of the country.
quotes.author: Mahatir Mohamad

quotes.quote: Developing countries like Malaysia should have a say in changing the world financial system since we have faced the problems that it has caused.
quotes.author: Mahatir Mohamad

quotes.quote: That whole country, Malaysia has a history of telling other countries back off, we`ll do our business. They`re pretty stubborn bunch of people. So they will do what they have to do.
quotes.author: Christopher R. Hill

quotes.quote: Malaysia-Singapore bilateral relations can blossom beautifully if cultivated and nurtured like an orchid plant.
quotes.author: Najib Razak

quotes.quote: There is great potential and deep fragility [in Malaysia] that can be used by any group that stresses on religion, pushing towards Islam, rejecting people and alienating migrants - anything can be used to win the next elections. So these are the signs of fragility that is very much there.
quotes.author: Tariq Ramadan

quotes.quote: Most developing countries would know Malaysia quite well. Why? It is because we believe in contacts. We offer them some help for training, for example. We call it ‘technical cooperation'.
quotes.author: Mahatir Mohamad

quotes.quote: In spite of the huge diversity in Malaysia in terms of religion, culture, race, ethnicity and so forth, we've really gone very far in developing this country.
quotes.author: Najib Razak

quotes.quote: When my father was posted to Malaysia, we'd take bacon-and-egg sandwiches in our backpacks and go hiking in the jungle or make bamboo rafts to sail down rivers.
quotes.author: Rory Stewart

quotes.quote: We were constantly traveling between Malaysia and Singapore, which is connected by a bridge at the southernmost end of Malaysia. In fact, when I was a child, I had to go between countries twice a day to go to school, because I was living in Malaysia at the time but attending primary school in Singapore.
quotes.author: Ronnie Chieng

quotes.quote: Malaysia has got all the things in place to continue growth: the policies are there; the mechanisms are there. So, I think even when I am not around, Malaysia can do with other people who are converse with our policies.
quotes.author: Mahatir Mohamad

quotes.quote: When the British ruled Malaysia, they burnt millions of acres of Malaysian forests so that they could plant rubber.
quotes.author: Mahatir Mohamad

quotes.quote: By linking something to race or religion, politicians distract Malaysians from the core issue while also garnering support from those whose identities depend heavily on their racial or religious identities - meaning most Malaysians.
quotes.author: Brian Yap

quotes.quote: Detention without trial is history in Malaysia.
quotes.author: Najib Razak

quotes.quote: All talk on Islamic States is just an empty dream. No man in his right sense would accept a nation which bases its political administration on religion, and in a country like Malaysia with its multiracial and multireligious people, there is no room for an Islamic State.
quotes.author: Tunku Abdul Rahman

quotes.quote: The male is a domestic animal which, if treated with firmness and kindness, can be trained to do most things.
quotes.author: Jilly Cooper

quotes.quote: We are born male. We must learn to be men.
quotes.author: Kent Nerburn

quotes.quote: It is funny the two things most men are proudest of is the thing that any man can do and doing does in the same way, that is being drunk and being the father of their son.
quotes.author: Gertrude Stein

quotes.quote: All men are created equal, it is only men themselves who place themselves above equality.
quotes.author: David Allan Coe

quotes.quote: The most mediocre of males feels himself a demigod as compared with women.
quotes.author: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.quote: Men always want to be a woman's first love - women like to be a man's last romance.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Men are nicotine soaked, beer besmirched, whiskey greased, red-eyed devils.
quotes.author: Carrie Nation

quotes.quote: About 10,000 years ago, males and females were acting equitably and were treating one another as equals, and then males took over the power, because they have physical power and physical strength.
quotes.author: Jane Elliot

quotes.quote: Males have probably always enjoyed watching the defeat of other males, but without the invention of numerals and the subsequent invention of the concept of keeping score, we could never have had a million sports channels.
quotes.author: Patricia Marx

quotes.quote: All male animals, including men, when they are in love, are apt to behave in ways that seem ludicrous to bystanders.
quotes.author: Francis Galton

quotes.quote: A guy is a lump like a doughnut. So, first you gotta get rid of all the stuff his mom did to him. And then you gotta get rid of all that macho crap that they pick up from beer commercials. And then there's my personal favorite, the male ego.
quotes.author: Roseanne Barr

quotes.quote: I have this theory that alpha males are actually not alpha males. They're actually very scared - particularly scared of competition from a lot of men.
quotes.author: Joel Edgerton

quotes.quote: Males transmit signals in courtship through behavioral displays.
quotes.author: Peter R. Grant

quotes.quote: The difference between men is in energy, in the strong will, in the settled purpose and in the invincible determination.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Men are like shoes. Some fit better than others. And sometimes you go out shopping and there's nothing you like. And then, as luck would have it, the next week you find two that are perfect, but you don't have the money to buy both.
quotes.author: Janet Evanovich

quotes.quote: The real man smiles in trouble, gathers strength from distress, and grows brave by reflection.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: Nearly all men can stand adversity, but if you want to test a man's character, give him power.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: The male - I have found - is a domestic animal which, if treated with firmness and kindness, can be trained to do most things.
quotes.author: Jilly Cooper

quotes.quote: The mark of the true male is courage, but to have courage the man must take heart.
quotes.author: Theun Mares

quotes.quote: Male egos require constant stroking. Every task is an achievement, every success epic. That is why women cook, but men are chefs: we make cheese on toast, they produce pain de fromage.
quotes.author: Belle de Jour

quotes.quote: Men of lofty genius when they are doing the least work are most active.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Domesticated males aren't much use for adventure.
quotes.author: Jim Elliot

quotes.quote: Inside every adult male is a denied little boy.
quotes.author: Nancy Friday

quotes.quote: Even bad men love their mamas.
quotes.author: Russell Crowe

quotes.quote: Mama was my greatest teacher, a teacher of compassion, love and fearlessness. If love is sweet as a flower, then my mother is that sweet flower of love.
quotes.author: Stevie Wonder

quotes.quote: My mama taught me that anything worth doing in life should be a little scary.
quotes.author: Terry McMillan

quotes.quote: Mama was crying, and the rain made it seem as if the whole world was crying.
quotes.author: Lois Lowry

quotes.quote: A mother's love liberates.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: All mothers are working mothers.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: Mother's love outlives everything.
quotes.author: David Duke

quotes.quote: A Mother is the heart of the home.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: A mother is God's deputy on earth.
quotes.author: Rahel Varnhagen

quotes.quote: We have nothing to fear but our mothers.
quotes.author: Anne Taintor

quotes.quote: Mothers are the most instinctive philosophers.
quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.quote: Being a mother makes everything more urgent.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: The mother's heart is the child's schoolroom.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: An ounce of mother is worth a pound of clergy.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: A mother who is really a mother is never free.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: Mothers reflect God's loving presence on earth.
quotes.author: William R. Webb

quotes.quote: One good mother is worth a hundred schoolmasters.
quotes.author: George Herbert Palmer

quotes.quote: A mother is a mother still, The holiest thing alive.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: The moment a child is born, the mother is also born. She never existed before. The woman existed, but the mother, never. A mother is something absolutely new.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: All mothers have intuition. The great ones have radar.
quotes.author: Cathy Guisewite

quotes.quote: Being a mother is an attitude, not a biological relation.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: A mother is a child's first looking glass into the world.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: Being a mother is magical.
quotes.author: Ellen Pompeo

quotes.quote: Mother's love grows by giving.
quotes.author: Charles Lamb

quotes.quote: A good mother is irreplaceable.
quotes.author: Adriana Trigiani

quotes.quote: A mother is the truest friend we have.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: Only a mother knows a mother's fondness.
quotes.author: Mary Wortley Montagu

quotes.quote: Mothers can get weaned as well as babies.
quotes.author: Thomas Chandler Haliburton

quotes.quote: The mother's kiss is the sweetest thing ever.
quotes.author: William Allingham

quotes.quote: Mothers got a hard road to travel, believe me.
quotes.author: John Kennedy Toole

quotes.quote: Management manages by making decisions and by seeing that those decisions are implemented.
quotes.author: Harold S. Geneen

quotes.quote: All of management is about self confidence.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.quote: Quality management is needed because nothing is simple anymore, if indeed it ever was.
quotes.author: Phil Crosby

quotes.quote: Constant endeavour plus management amounts to success.
quotes.author: G.S. Alag

quotes.quote: Management means the development of people, not the direction of things.
quotes.author: Bob Proctor

quotes.quote: Time management is really personal management, life management. and management of yourself.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Management by objectives works if you first think through your objectives. Ninety percent of the time you haven't.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Management has to be where the action is.
quotes.author: Dieter Zetsche

quotes.quote: Management is all about managing in the short term, while developing the plans for the long term.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.quote: Management is, above all, a practice where art, science, and craft meet.
quotes.author: Henry Mintzberg

quotes.quote: In every business, in every industry, management does matter.
quotes.author: Michael Eisner

quotes.quote: Because management deals mostly with the status quo and leadership deals mostly with change, in the next century we are going to have to try to become much more skilled at creating leaders.
quotes.author: John P. Kotter

quotes.quote: Management is nothing more than motivating other people.
quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

quotes.quote: So much of what we call management consists in making it difficult for people to work.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Time management is a misnomer, the challenge is to manage ourselves.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: The secret of successful managing is to keep the five guys who hate you away from the four guys who haven't made up their minds.
quotes.author: Casey Stengel

quotes.quote: It is the quality rather than the quantity that matters.
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: Good management is the art of making problems so interesting and their solutions so constructive that everyone wants to get to work and deal with them.
quotes.author: Paul Hawken

quotes.quote: We're just delighted that management has come around to my way of thinking.
quotes.author: Paula Zahn

quotes.quote: When a management with a reputation for brilliance tackles a business with a reputation for bad economics, it is the reputation of the business that remains intact.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: Management's job is to convey leadership's message in a compelling and inspiring way. Not just in meetings, but also by example.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Gitomer

quotes.quote: When you manage people, you must first convince them they need managing. So you create the problems and then let the people cry for solutions.
quotes.author: Barbara Marciniak

quotes.quote: The essence of management is to make knowledge productive.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: This time, like all times, is a very good one, if we but know what to do with it.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The conventional definition of management is getting work done through people, but real management is developing people through work.
quotes.author: Agha Hasan Abedi

quotes.quote: Time management is only a set of skills and tools to help us more efficiently control the eventsour our lives.
quotes.author: Hyrum W. Smith

quotes.quote: Management must speak with one voice. When it doesn't management itself becomes a peripheral opponent to the team's mission.
quotes.author: Pat Riley

quotes.quote: Bank failures are caused by depositors who don't deposit enough money to cover losses due to mismanagement.
quotes.author: Dan Quayle

quotes.quote: There is not the management of time, there is only the management of you.
quotes.author: Darren Hardy

quotes.quote: Success in management requires learning as fast as the world is changing.
quotes.author: Warren Bennis

quotes.quote: Being a manager is about getting into the minds of the people you represent.
quotes.author: Sandy Gallin

quotes.quote: A manager is responsible for the application and performance of knowledge.
quotes.author: Peter F. Drucker

quotes.quote: A manager is an assistant to his men.
quotes.author: Thomas J. Watson

quotes.quote: Basically, a manager is a father figure to 20 or 25 blokes. It's about trying to get the best out of them and creating team spirit.
quotes.author: Alan Shearer

quotes.quote: A manager must always provide the employees opportunities to continuously improve their skills and reassure them that they have a promising future.
quotes.author: Abhishek Ratna

quotes.quote: The true measure of the value of any business leader and manager is performance.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Hire people who are better than you are, then leave them to get on with it. Look for people who will aim for the remarkable, who will not settle for the routine.
quotes.author: David Ogilvy

quotes.quote: The one word that makes a good manager decisiveness.
quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

quotes.quote: If you pick the right people and give them the opportunity to spread their wings and put compensation as a carrier behind it you almost don't have to manage them.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.quote: Managers and investors alike must understand that accounting numbers are the beginning, not the end, of business valuation.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: The manager cannot share his power with division superintendent or foreman or workman, but he can give them opportunities for developing their power.
quotes.author: Mary Parker Follett

quotes.quote: Managers who don't know how to measure what they want settle for wanting what they can measure.
quotes.author: Russell L. Ackoff

quotes.quote: In the end, as a manager or coach, you have to keep your heart pure and do your best as a manager or a coach.
quotes.author: Tony La Russa

quotes.quote: The sign of a good manager is his ability to give and take negative feedback.
quotes.author: Richard Pascale

quotes.quote: A manager's ability to turn meetings into a thinking environment is probably an organization's greatest asset.
quotes.author: Nancy Kline

quotes.quote: Managers can waste a lot of time at the outset of a crisis denying that something went wrong. Skip that step.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.quote: A manager is not a person who can do the work better than his men; he is a person who can get his men to do the work better than he can.
quotes.author: Frederick W. Smith

quotes.quote: For a manager to be perceived as a positive manager, they need a four to one positive to negative contact ratio.
quotes.author: Ken Blanchard

quotes.quote: Managers are important: they are leading the company and guiding and have to provide vision and manage the daily business.
quotes.author: Hasso Plattner

quotes.quote: Any manager can do well in an expanding market.
quotes.author: W. Edwards Deming

quotes.quote: It's not about money. It's about the people you have, and how you're led.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Managers who are skilled communicators may also be good at covering up real problems.
quotes.author: Chris Argyris

quotes.quote: A good manager will always have the big picture in mind and guide the employees through a series of small targets in order to achieve overall success.
quotes.author: Abhishek Ratna

quotes.quote: Managers maintain an efficient status quo while leaders attack the status quo to create something new.
quotes.author: Orrin Woodward

quotes.quote: Managers must see themselves as experimenters who lead learning, not dictators who impose control.
quotes.author: Peter R. Scholtes

quotes.quote: The manager as manager is a rational, consulting, persistent, tough-minded, analytical, authoritative problem solver using position power to achieve things; the manager as leader is a passionate, creative, flexible, inspiring, innovative visionary using personal power to achieve things.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A good manager is a man who isn't worried about his own career but rather the careers of those who work for him.
quotes.author: H. S. M. Burns

quotes.quote: The manager accepts the status quo; the leader challenges it.
quotes.author: Warren Bennis

quotes.quote: The manager has his eye on the bottom line; the leader has his eye on the horizon.
quotes.author: Warren Bennis

quotes.quote: Managers must have the discipline not to keep pulling up the flowers to see if their roots are healthy.
quotes.author: Robert Townsend

quotes.quote: Manchester is the belly and guts of the nation.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: Living in Manchester was like living on the moon. Wherever that might be.
quotes.author: Johnny Giles

quotes.quote: Manchester is a city which has witnessed a great many stirring episodes, especially of a political character. Generally speaking, its citizens have been liberal in their sentiments, defenders of free speech and liberty of opinion.
quotes.author: Emmeline Pankhurst

quotes.quote: You know Manchester is always a bit of a hard place for people coming from London, just with all the history. Manchester has this immensely huge and healthy history musically.
quotes.author: Graham Coxon

quotes.quote: Certainly Manchester is the most wonderful city of modem times.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: The thing about Manchester is...it all comes from here
quotes.author: Noel Gallagher

quotes.quote: Certainly Manchester is the most wonderful city of modern times!
quotes.author: Asa Briggs

quotes.quote: It never rains in Manchester, but it pours.
quotes.author: Kevin Keegan

quotes.quote: In England, they say that Manchester is the city of rain. It's main attraction is considered to the timetable at the railway station, where trains leave for other, less rainy cities.
quotes.author: Nemanja Vidic

quotes.quote: Manchester, one of the greatest, if not really the greatest mere village in England.
quotes.author: Daniel Defoe

quotes.quote: The shortest way out of Manchester is notoriously a bottle of Gordon's gin.
quotes.author: William Bolitho

quotes.quote: You're never alone on the dole in Manchester.
quotes.author: Ian Brown

quotes.quote: Manchester has a certain reputation of being cool.
quotes.author: Alice Lowe

quotes.quote: Manchester's got everything except a beach.
quotes.author: Ian Brown

quotes.quote: When your nails are part of your outfit, they become more than nails. They become an accessory.
quotes.author: Holland Roden

quotes.quote: Any woman can wear a great outfit, but it is her nails that make the statement.
quotes.author: Tammy Taylor

quotes.quote: Nails are the period at the end of the sentence. They complete the look.
quotes.author: Prabal Gurung

quotes.quote: You can't buy happiness but you can get a mani and pedi and that's kind of the same thing.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A woman is helpless only while her nail polish is drying.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Having a manicure pulls a look together. Hands are the first thing people see after your face.
quotes.author: Julia Restoin Roitfeld

quotes.quote: Maybe your life isn't sparkly but your nails can be.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You know you're a nail polish addict when you start matching your manicure to your outfits.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Life is not perfect, but your nails can be.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You're never fully dressed without a good manicure.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You're never full dressed without a good manicure.
quotes.author: Essie

quotes.quote: When in doubt, paint your nails.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: There's nothing a fresh manicure can't fix.
quotes.author: Uknown

quotes.quote: The beauty of a woman is not in a facial mode but the true beauty in a woman is reflected in her soul. It is the caring that she lovingly gives the passion that she shows. The beauty of a woman grows with the passing years.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Manicures which are basically just holding hands with a stranger for forty five minutes whilst listening to Enya.
quotes.author: Miranda Hart

quotes.quote: I believe in manicures. I believe in overdressing. I believe in primping at leisure and wearing lipsitck. I believe in pink. I believe happy girls are the prettiest girls.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: You can manifest the life you truly want with clear intention, emotional intelligence and imagination like it or not, your life is what you have chosen.
quotes.author: Gregg Braden

quotes.quote: You will manifest your sacred character when you connect to the Creator.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Whatever you are inside, the good and bad will manifest in the outside world. It will come out in some way. It will come out in your work. It will come out in words. It will come out.
quotes.author: Hrithik Roshan

quotes.quote: Dreams. They start in your beautiful mind. Think of beautiful things and it will manifest into actions because your body will listen to you. Like it always does.
quotes.author: Diana Rose Morcilla

quotes.quote: Manifest the divinity within you and everything will be harmoniously arranged around it.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: You must have a vision before you can manifest anything.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: The person of old had the same brilliance of mind that we assume we have now. But that which made a thing become manifest for the first time is our great moment of creative happening.
quotes.author: Louis Kahn

quotes.quote: Never let life impede on your ability to manifest your dreams. Dig deeper into your dreams and deeper into yourself and believe that anything is possible, and make it happen.
quotes.author: Corin Nemec

quotes.quote: Within you is the divine capacity to manifest and attract all you desire.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: What you pray for today, will be manifest tomorrow.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: The true measure of success is how many times you can bounce back from failure.
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: Everyone sees the unseen in proportion to the clarity of his heart, and that depends upon how much he has polished it. Whoever has polished it more sees more unseen forms become manifest to him.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: You manifest based on who you are already so you must own the identity of the dream in order to manifest it.
quotes.author: Joy Page

quotes.quote: Our purpose here on earth: to manifest the very nature of our spirit, which is touched by the spirit of God.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: To manifest your hearts desires you must be what your heart desires.
quotes.author: Joy Page

quotes.quote: All mankind's inner feelings eventually manifest themselves as an outer reality.
quotes.author: Stuart Wilde

quotes.quote: A flow of happiness and abundance will manifest when you have reached the deepest level of yourself.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: We manifest character when self-sacrifice for the sake of our principles becomes more important than compromise for the sake of popularity.
quotes.author: Myles Munroe

quotes.quote: Each of us can manifest the properties of a field of consciousness that transcends space, time, and linear causality.
quotes.author: Stanislav Grof

quotes.quote: We like things to manifest right away, and they may not. Many times, we're just planting a seed and we don't know exactly how it is going to come to fruition. It's hard for us to realize that what we see in front of us might not be the end of the story.
quotes.author: Sharon Salzberg

quotes.quote: Be mindful of your thoughts and words for they are the pen writing that which will manifest.
quotes.author: Sanjo Jendayi

quotes.quote: Fully inhale your dream and completely exhale manifestation of it.
quotes.author: T.F. Hodge

quotes.quote: Manifest kindness to embrace greatness.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: You empower whatever you try and resist and long as you try to resist it. If you give your time and energy to something you are in effect empowering it. The more you put energy into acknowledging and resisting the more the problem seems to present. You must give your energy and time to that which you wish to cultivate rather than to resisting that which you don't want. Remember, you only have so much energy to go around, use it to help and not hinder yourself!
quotes.author: Akiroq Brost

quotes.quote: The life you want is a manifestation of self-realization.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: When you have done your part it's time to release your work into the universe and let it do its part.
quotes.author: Maria Erving

quotes.quote: One day enough work will have been done. Enough prayers will have been said. Enough confidence will have been formed. One day with effortless certainty your dreams will manifest into physical form; proving dreams really can come true.
quotes.author: Renae A. Sauter

quotes.quote: Fully inhale your dream and completely exhale manifestation of it.
quotes.author: T.F. Hodge

quotes.quote: When you are aligned with the truth of who you truly are, then you experience bliss.
quotes.author: Vivian Amis

quotes.quote: You are the author of your life. If you don't like how it goes, write it differently.
quotes.author: Iva Kenaz

quotes.quote: Everything you perceive, externally, is the manifestation of some internal part of you. If it was not, it would not be present in your perceived reality.
quotes.author: Tony Warrick

quotes.quote: The universe is not outside of you. Look inside yourself; everything that you want, you already are.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: The true measure of success is how many times you can bounce back from failure.
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: The highest manifestation of life consists in this: that a being governs its own actions. A thing which is always subject to the direction of another is somewhat of a dead thing.
quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.quote: Manifestation blossoms when we turn down or tune out doubtful noise.
quotes.author: T.F. Hodge

quotes.quote: Manifestation is a process by which we transform seemingly unrealizable imaginations to reality.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Self discovery is the best investment that you can make.
quotes.author: Michele Scholz-Evers

quotes.quote: Darkness is subject to light, and can never manifest itself in the presence of light.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: All life is a manifestation of the spirit, the manifestation of love.
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.quote: In the external reality, an action is required for the manifestation, but in the internal reality, all you need is your presence. Just with the inner presence, things begin to unfold.
quotes.author: Roshan Sharma

quotes.quote: Reality is a projection of your thoughts or the things you habitually think about.
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: Be mindful of your thoughts and words for they are the pen writing that which will manifest.
quotes.author: Sanjo Jendayi

quotes.quote: It's only after you've found what you want inside of you that you can find it outside of you.
quotes.author: Cory Groshek

quotes.quote: Failures and mistakes are lessons to be learned from. They are opportunities for growth.
quotes.author: Avis J. Williams

quotes.quote: The power to reach our goal is always in the moment. When the moment arrives, be ready to perform the action that will help you reach your goal, and be aware when the moment is now.
quotes.author: Russell Eric Dobda

quotes.quote: Reality is the manifestation of the inner workings, carried out by the supreme powers. Whatever you think and do right now, either positive or negative is working on your behalf because you are a co-worker of the divine.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Creativity is the state of consciousness in which you enter into the treasury of your innermost being and bring the beauty into manifestation.
quotes.author: Torkom Saraydarian

quotes.quote: Manifestation is an act of trust. It is the soul pouring itself out into its world, like a fisherman casting a net to gather in the fish he seeks; with each cast properly made, we will bring what we need to us, but first we must hurl ourselves into the depths without knowing just what lies beneath us.
quotes.author: David Spangler

quotes.quote: You have an inner prosperity guide: your intuition. When you begin to pay attention to it, it will lead you to this truth - Abundance is your birthright.
quotes.author: Lynn A. Robinson

quotes.quote: Your mind is a magic pot, from which you pick the things, and manifest life out of it. If you don't tell your mind, your priorities, it will be easier for your mind, to pick anything, to serve you with your life.
quotes.author: Roshan Sharma

quotes.quote: Keep expecting and believing that your due season is coming. Declare that the good you have harvested in your life will manifest.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: If you never try, you'll never know. You are what you manifest.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: To witness miracles unfold in your experience, count your blessings and be thankful. Perceived small blessings accumulate to be the most powerful.
quotes.author: T.F. Hodge

quotes.quote: Manipulation, fueled with good intent, can be a blessing. But when used wickedly, it is the beginning of a magician's karmic calamity.
quotes.author: T.F. Hodge

quotes.quote: The basic tool for the manipulation of reality is the manipulation of words. If you can control the meaning of words, you can control the people who must use the words.
quotes.author: Philip K. Dick

quotes.quote: One of the methods of manipulation is to inoculate individuals with the bourgeois appetite for personal success.
quotes.author: Paulo Freire

quotes.quote: Everybody has the ability to be manipulative, to be hateful and deceitful.
quotes.author: Neil LaBute

quotes.quote: Are you trying to manipulate me? It's working.
quotes.author: Bridget Moynahan

quotes.quote: If you want to know the outcome of a game before the game has even started, you need to control each side.
quotes.author: David Icke

quotes.quote: The best way to manipulate a man is to make him think he is manipulating you.
quotes.author: John Smith

quotes.quote: Manipulation can give you anything in life you want, if you can afford it.
quotes.author: M.F. Moonzajer

quotes.quote: Men are used as they use others.
quotes.author: Bidpai

quotes.quote: The measure of a man is what he does with power.
quotes.author: Greek Proverb

quotes.quote: One man with a gun can control 100 without one.
quotes.author: Vladimir Ilyich Lenin

quotes.quote: Manipulating people is what's so fun about poker. I love that you can just look into someone's eyes and lie - and it's perfectly acceptable.
quotes.author: Cheryl Hines

quotes.quote: Foreknowledge of the future makes it possible to manipulate both enemies and supporters.
quotes.author: Raymond Aron

quotes.quote: If you don't give education to people, it is easy to manipulate them.
quotes.author: Pele

quotes.quote: It's so easy to manipulate an audience, but it's nearly always clear that you are being manipulated. I think even people that are not critically attuned are aware of cynical manipulation in film.
quotes.author: John Boorman

quotes.quote: All writing is a form of manipulation, of course, but you realize that a plain sentence can actually do so much.
quotes.author: Colm Toibin

quotes.quote: One must change one's tactics every ten years if one wishes to maintain one's superiority.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Any kind of manipulation with human embryos should be prohibited.
quotes.author: Ian Wilmut

quotes.quote: As I have said a thousand times, no manipulation can put stocks down and keep them down.
quotes.author: Edwin Lefevre

quotes.quote: Whoever controls the money controls you.
quotes.author: Sharon Law Tucker

quotes.quote: It's amazing how much manipulation is going on in parasites.
quotes.author: Jacob Koella

quotes.quote: One should be able to control and manipulate experiences with an informed and intelligent mind.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.quote: The art of pleasing is the art of deception.
quotes.author: Luc De Clapiers

quotes.quote: When it comes to controlling human beings, there is no better instrument than lies. Because you see, humans live by beliefs. And beliefs can be manipulated. The power to manipulate beliefs is the only thing that counts.
quotes.author: Michael Ende

quotes.quote: When you know what a man wants you know who he is, and how to move him.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.quote: The conscious and intelligent manipulation of the organized habits and opinions of the masses is an important element in democratic society. Those We manipulate this unseen mechanism of society constitute an invisible government which is the true ruling power of our country...We are governed, our minds are molded, our tastes formed, our ideas suggested largely by men we have never heard of.
quotes.author: Edward Bernays

quotes.quote: Her childhood, then her adolescence, had taught her patience, hope, silence, and the easy manipulation of the weapons and virtues of all prisoners.
quotes.author: Colette

quotes.quote: Manipulation is moving someone's settings away from the ideal in ways that are typically not in her self-interest, or likely not in her self-interest in the present context.
quotes.author: Robert Noggle

quotes.quote: Manipulation aims to modify another person's choices by directly, but clandestinely modifying a person's psychology.
quotes.author: Michael Cholbi

quotes.quote: Free will does not mean one will, but many wills conflicting in one man.
quotes.author: Flannery O'Connor

quotes.quote: Mankind's greatest gift is that we have free choice.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.quote: Mankind always sets itself only such tasks as it can solve; since, looking at the matter more closely, we will always find that the task itself arises only when the material conditions necessary for its solution already exist or are at least in the process of formation.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: Mankind are more disposed to suffer, while evils are sufferable, than to right themselves by abolishing the forms to which they are accustomed.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: The human race is governed by its imagination.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Man was designed in a way in which he must eat in order to give him a solid reason to go to work everyday. This helps to keep him out of trouble. God is wise.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Man is the only animal that laughs and has a state legislature.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: Mankind may amuse themselves with theoretic systems of liberty but we can only discern its true value by the practical and wretched effects of slavery.
quotes.author: Mercy Otis Warren

quotes.quote: Mankind are greater gainers by suffering each other to live as seems good the themselves, than by compelling each other to live as seems good to the rest.
quotes.author: John Stuart Mill

quotes.quote: All mankind being all equal and independent, no one ought to harm another in his life, health, liberty or possessions.
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.quote: The strength of every individual is the grace for great work.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: All human beings are also dream beings. Dreaming ties all mankind together.
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

quotes.quote: Humans beings always do the most intelligent thing after they've tried every stupid alternative and none of them have worked.
quotes.author: Richard Buckminster Fuller

quotes.quote: Mankind must learn to coexist with each other to create a peaceful world.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Mankind invented a system to cope with the fact that we are so intrinsically lousy at manipulating numbers. It's called the graph.
quotes.author: Charlie Munger

quotes.quote: Mankind must remember that peace is not God's gift to his creatures; peace is our gift to each other.
quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

quotes.quote: The deepest principle in human nature is the craving to be appreciated.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Mankind will discover objects in space sent to us by the watchers.
quotes.author: Nostradamus

quotes.quote: Mankind, which has always been a part of nature, has reached a point where it is too much for nature to accommodate.
quotes.author: Kobo Abe

quotes.quote: Mankind must live in a harmony with one another in order to have a peaceful world.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Mankind is divided into rich and poor, into property owners and exploited; and to abstract oneself from this fundamental division; and from the antagonism between poor and rich means abstracting oneself from fundamental facts.
quotes.author: Joseph Stalin

quotes.quote: All mankind is divided into three classes: those that are immovable, those that are movable, and those that move.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Man is not worried by real problems so much as by his imagined anxieties about real problems.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Mankind has a divine duty, to be stewardship of the natural resources.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Mankind is like ocean, we only see the things which comes up! If we wanna know someone better we need a deeper dive.
quotes.author: Irfa Adam

quotes.quote: Human nature is just about the only nature some people experience.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Mankind is interdependent, and the happiness of each depends upon the happiness of all, and it is this lesson that humanity has to learn today as the first and the last lesson.
quotes.author: Hazrat Inayat Khan

quotes.quote: Man is the only creature who refuses to be what he is.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: The greater part of mankind judge of men only by their fashionableness or their fortune.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: A man's manners are a mirror in which he shows his portrait.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Manners are very communicable: men catch them from each other.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Manners are made up of trivialities of deportment which can be easily learned if one does not happen to know them.
quotes.author: Emily Post

quotes.quote: Good manners sometimes means simply putting up with other people's bad manners.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: Good manners is the art of making those people easy with whom we converse. Whoever makes the fewest people uneasy is the best bred in the room.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: Good manners are just a way of showing other people that we have respect for them.
quotes.author: Bill Kelly

quotes.quote: Manners that would keep you starving are no manners worth respecting.
quotes.author: Scott Lynch

quotes.quote: Manners are the ornament of action.
quotes.author: Samuel Smiles

quotes.quote: Manners without sincerity, is called polite society.
quotes.author: Josh Stern

quotes.quote: Manners require showing consideration of all human beings, not just the ones to whom one is close.
quotes.author: Judith Martin

quotes.quote: Manners are of such great consequence to the novelist that any kind will do. Bad manners are better than no manners at all, and because we are losing our customary manners, we are probably overly conscious of them; this seems to be a condition that produces writers.
quotes.author: Flannery O'Connor

quotes.quote: Manners are like primary colors, there are certain rules and once you have these you merely mix, i.e., adapt, them to meet changing situations.
quotes.author: Emily Post

quotes.quote: Manners are like the shadows of virtues, they are the momentary display of those qualities which our fellow creatures love and respect.
quotes.author: Sydney Smith

quotes.quote: Good manners are appreciated as much as bad manners are abhorred.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: Good manners have much to do with the emotions. To make them ring true, one must feel them, not merely exhibit them.
quotes.author: Amy Vanderbilt

quotes.quote: Manners are about imagination, ultimately. They are about imagining being the other person.
quotes.author: Lynne Truss

quotes.quote: Good manners can render even virtue tolerable.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Good manners are made up of petty sacrifices.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Manners are the happy ways of doing things; each once a stroke of genius or of love, now repeated and hardened into usage.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Manners are the ability to put someone else at their ease by turning any answer into another question.
quotes.author: Tina Brown

quotes.quote: Manners will become important to children only if they are important to their parents.
quotes.author: Thomas Lickona

quotes.quote: Our manners have been corrupted by communication with the saints.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Manners are especially the need of the plain. The pretty can get away with anything.
quotes.author: Evelyn Waugh

quotes.quote: Good manners is the fabric that holds the community together.
quotes.author: David Esabwa

quotes.quote: Good manners is just being respectful of others. Whether you know them or not, you should show respect for all people.
quotes.author: John Patrick Hickey

quotes.quote: Manners come down to a single principle, talk of nothing that might actually prove interesting.
quotes.author: Meredith Duran

quotes.quote: Manners are the basic building blocks of civil society.
quotes.author: Alexander Mccall Smith

quotes.quote: Manners, really good ones, make it possible to live with almost anyone, gracefully and pleasantly
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: Manners easily and rapidly mature into morals.
quotes.author: Horace Mann

quotes.quote: Bedside manners are no substitute for the right diagnosis.
quotes.author: Alfred P. Sloan

quotes.quote: Gratitude is the greatest prayer. Thank you is the greatest mantra
quotes.author: Swami Nithyananda

quotes.quote: A mantra is a very powerful word. It vibrates like music does, only not on this plane but on other planes of reality. It creates a powerful force. It starts the kundalini moving
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Mantras are passwords that transform the mundane into the sacred.
quotes.author: Deva Premal

quotes.quote: The mantra that you're given in Transcendental Meditation you keep to yourself. The reason being, true happiness is not out there, true happiness lies within.
quotes.author: David Lynch

quotes.quote: Expertise is the mantra of modern medicine.
quotes.author: Atul Gawande

quotes.quote: For a true disciple, the repetition of the mantra is like food
quotes.author: Mata Amritanandamayi

quotes.quote: Food should be consumed while chanting your mantra inwardly. This will purify the food and the mind at the same time
quotes.author: Mata Amritanandamayi

quotes.quote: A mantra is a thought. Use a mantra to help you still your mind initially and then move into silent meditation
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: A mantra is basically a means of talking with your thoughts and feelings. It's a time-honored method sometimes referred to as prayer, but really it's an opening of a conversation between the heart and the mind.
quotes.author: Tsoknyi Rinpoche

quotes.quote: I think there is no mantra for success. One just has to be positive and keep doing good work. One must
quotes.author: Madhuri Dixit

quotes.quote: If you tell yourself something often enough you will start to believe it, that is why you must make self love your mantra.
quotes.author: Leon Brown

quotes.quote: The biggest guru-mantra is: never share your secrets with anybody. It will destroy you.
quotes.author: Chanakya

quotes.quote: We meditate so that our minds can be sharp and alert. We chant mantras so that your souls may be ignited like candles. We walk in the light of this beauty.
quotes.author: Harbhajan Singh Yogi

quotes.quote: ...Mantras are not thought of as products of discursive thought, human wisdom or poetic fantasy, but ”flash-lights of the eternal truth, seen by those eminent men who have come to super sensuous contact with the Unseen.
quotes.author: Gonda

quotes.quote: The Mantra may be used in any life situation and even during our daily routine to relax and quieten the mind. It will bring clarity and the ability to think positively.
quotes.author: Sri Tulsidasji

quotes.quote: We all need mantras, I guess - stories we tell ourselves to keep us going.
quotes.author: Lauren Oliver

quotes.quote: A Mantra is composed of certain letters arranged in definite sequence of sounds, of which the letters are the representative signs. To produce the designed effect, Mantra must be intoned in the proper way, according to rhythm and sound...a Mantra is a potent compelling force, a word of power.
quotes.author: Sir John Woodrofe

quotes.quote: The definition of mantra is 'that which protects the mind.' That which protects the mind from negativity, or that which protects you from your own mind, is called mantra.
quotes.author: Sogyal Rinpoche

quotes.quote: A mantra is nothing more than a collection of words strung together to create a positive effect
quotes.author: Robin S. Sharma

quotes.quote: It is more important to repeat a mantra several times with total absorption than to parrot it for hours on end.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: It was one of those March days when the sun shines hot and the wind blows cold: when it is summer in the light, and winter in the shade.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: March came in that winter like the meekest and mildest of lambs, bringing days that were crisp and golden and tingling, each followed by a frosty pink twilight which gradually lost itself in an elfland of moonshine.
quotes.author: L.M. Montgomery

quotes.quote: March is the month of expectation, the things we do not know, The persons of prognostication are coming now. We try to sham becoming firmness, But pompous joy betrays us, as his first betrothal betrays a boy.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: My father was often impatient during March, waiting for winter to end, the cold to ease, the sun to reappear. March was an unpredictable month, when it was never clear what might happen. Warm days raised hopes until ice and grey skies shut over the town again.
quotes.author: Tracy Chevalier

quotes.quote: Indoors or out, no one relaxes in March, that month of wind and taxes, the wind will presently disappear, the taxes last us all the year.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: In March the soft rains continued, and each storm waited courteously until its predecessor sunk beneath the ground.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: March, when days are getting long, Let thy growing hours be strong to set right some wintry wrong.
quotes.author: Caroline May

quotes.quote: The stormy March has come at last, With winds and clouds and changing skies; I hear the rushing of the blast That through the snowy valley flies.
quotes.author: William C. Bryant

quotes.quote: March is the month God created to show people who don't drink what a hangover is like.
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.quote: In march winter is holding back and spring is pulling forward. Something holds and something pulls inside of us too.
quotes.author: Jean Hersey

quotes.quote: March is a month of considerable frustration it is so near spring and yet across a great deal of the country the weather is still so violent and changeable that outdoor activity in our yards seems light years away.
quotes.author: Thalassa Cruso

quotes.quote: Springtime is the land awakening. The March winds are the morning yawn.
quotes.author: Lewis Grizzard

quotes.quote: Spring makes its own statement, so loud and clear that the gardener seems to be only one of his instruments, not the composer.
quotes.author: Geoffrey Charlesworth

quotes.quote: Even when there's no one there for you march on / Even when the days are long for you march on / Like soldier
quotes.author: Joel madeen

quotes.quote: The stormy March is come at last / With wind, and cloud, and changing skies / I hear the rushing of the blast / That through the snowy valley flies.
quotes.author: William Cullen Bryant

quotes.quote: Up from the sea, the wild north wind is blowing / Under the sky's gray arch; / Smiling, I watch the shaken elm-boughs, knowing / It is the wind of March.
quotes.author: John Greenleaf Whittier

quotes.quote: We march, we fight, we live / We scream, we die, we give / We want the world to know / We are the human radio
quotes.author: Brent Smith

quotes.quote: The march of time it has begun / Somewhere far beyond your reality / And then the march of time begins
quotes.author: Hans Juergen Kuersch

quotes.quote: So raise the flag once more / And the eagle will be fed / Once again we march to war / For victory or death
quotes.author: Ted Oscar Lundstroem

quotes.quote: The march of conquest through wild provinces, may be the march of Mind; but not the march of Love.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: A windy March is lucky. Every pint of March dust brings a peck of September corn, and a pound of October cotton.
quotes.author: Julia Peterkin

quotes.quote: March out of the common line; make bold steps ahead and dance to the tune of a sweeter, better and nicer tone of your own music. March out of the tiny box!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: March on. Do not tarry. To go forward is to move toward perfection. March on, and fear not the thorns, or the sharp stones on life's path.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: And as the players tried to take the field, the Marching Band refused to yield.
quotes.author: Don McLean

quotes.quote: Without music life would be a mistake.
quotes.author: Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche

quotes.quote: The regular rhythm and upbeat tunes of military music or marching bands positively affect your mood even if you don't actually 'enjoy' listening to it.
quotes.author: Liz Miller

quotes.quote: And I had to look at the marching band. Skip accross the pavement, nobody's there.
quotes.author: Deerhunter

quotes.quote: Marching band is life. The marching band brings about memories that you would never get anywhere else.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I chose the trombone because the trombone players in the marching band got to be up front with the majorettes (because of the slides) and I loved that!
quotes.author: Quincy Jones

quotes.quote: I got my first set of drums when I was around 3. I went from band to marching band to Latin jazz band - it's like riding a bike.
quotes.author: Jeremih

quotes.quote: Followed like a goat on a halter, hungry dog closing on his just-filled dinner bowl, water-bottle and towel carrier behind the tuba section of a marching band.
quotes.author: Dennis Vickers

quotes.quote: Music and rhythm find their way into the secret places of the soul.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Music is your own experience, your own thoughts, your wisdom. If you don't live it, it won't come out of your horn.
quotes.author: Charlie Parker

quotes.quote: Marching band, the sport for intelligent people.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Every battalion has its marching songs.
quotes.author: Patrick MacGill

quotes.quote: That awkward moment when you realize the marching band works harder than the foortball team.
quotes.author: Kathleen Alcock

quotes.quote: I did the marching band all throughout junior high and high school. Music was one of my favorite things in school.
quotes.author: Tommy Lee

quotes.quote: You know, if I can survive marching band, I can survive anything.
quotes.author: Nellie McKay

quotes.quote: Band is not proud because it performs well; it performs well because it is proud.
quotes.author: George Parks

quotes.quote: Marching band, sacrificing all respect from your peers so that you get to wear funny hats.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: My heart is like a marching band. I'm a fan in the stands.
quotes.author: OutKast

quotes.quote: Listen to the drums go hard. Like a marching band (like a marching band). Repeating every step, every sound, every word.
quotes.author: Ricky Dillon

quotes.quote:
The marching band plays along. Plays the morphine song on the charity ward.
Yeah the marching band plays its song.
quotes.author: Ray Davies

quotes.quote: On any other day there'd be a marching band. But I stole away before they cut me down.
quotes.author: Delays

quotes.quote: The marching band's warming up under the football lights.
quotes.author: Luke Bryan

quotes.quote: While some marching band keeps. Its own beat in my head.
quotes.author: Jon Bon Jovi

quotes.quote: A marching band's on the street. In the city that always sleeps. A bitter sweet rhapsody.
quotes.author: Naked Lunch

quotes.quote: Marching with the bands 'cause I think that I can.
quotes.author: Tobi Lou

quotes.quote: Take my hand, lets find a marching band that beats the rhythm of our hearts.
quotes.author: Joe Brooks

quotes.quote: It means like a drum in a marching band. Can't help what it does I just follow where it leads. How my heart feels about you baby makes perfect sense to me.
quotes.author: Randy Travis

quotes.quote: Where's the marching band. Just in time to take the town.
quotes.author: Barry Manilow

quotes.quote: Listen over marching bands playing out their time.
quotes.author: U2 band

quotes.quote: Light the fireworks, bring out the marching band.
quotes.author: LL Cool J

quotes.quote: Mardi Gras a time to let down your hair. Not put it up.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Zambrano

quotes.quote: She pulled me in a world of wonder / It's a charade trying to love her / It's like trying to save a soul from Mardi Gras / From Mardi Gras
quotes.author: Natalie Hemby

quotes.quote: Down in New Orleans / Where the blues was born / It takes a cool cat to blow a horn / On La Salle and Rampart Street / The combo's there with a mambo beat / The Mardi Gras mambo, mambo, mambo
quotes.author: Lou Welsch

quotes.quote: In Gert Town where the cats all meet / There's a Mardi Gras mambo with a beat / Join the Chief with the Zulu gang / And truck on down where the mambo's swing
quotes.author: Lou Welsch

quotes.quote: Common take me to the Mardi Gras / Where the people sing and play / Where the dancing is elite / And there's music in the street / Both night and day
quotes.author: Paul Simon

quotes.quote: Hurry take me to the Mardi Gras / In the city of my dreams / You can legalize your lows / You can wear your summer clothes / In the New Orleans
quotes.author: Paul Simon

quotes.quote: Take your burdens to the Mardi Gras / Let the music wash your soul (let it wash your soul) / You can mingle in the street / You can jingle to the beat / Of Jelly Roll
quotes.author: Paul Simon

quotes.quote: While boys and girls are dancing / While sweethearts are romancing / Life is like a Mardi Gras / Funiculi, funicula
quotes.author: Eldo Di Lazzaro

quotes.quote: How we danced, as we dreamed at the Mardi Gras / Was romance what it seemed at the Mardi Gras / Was the love that we made just a brief masquerade / Was it gone with the song that the orchestra played
quotes.author: Johnny Mercer

quotes.quote: With a sigh, with a glance at the moon above / Was it just by chance we spoke of love / Or did you somehow feel that the wonder was real / While we danced at the Mardi Gras
quotes.author: Johnny Mercer

quotes.quote: When I see the Mardi Gras / I wanna know what's carnival for / Going down to New Orleans / I've got my ticket in my hands
quotes.author: Henry Roeland Byrd

quotes.quote: If you go to New Orleans / You ought to go see the Mardi Gras / When you see the Mardi Gras / Somebody'll tell you what's Carnival for
quotes.author: Roland Byrd

quotes.quote: I might've woke up in a reservoir / I might've got robbed at Mardi Gras / Everybody wanna see a falling star
quotes.author: Sean Daley

quotes.quote: The Mardi Gras memories / Of creole tunes that fill the air / I dream of oleanders in June / And soon I'm wishing that I was there
quotes.author: Eddie De Lange

quotes.quote: Fat Tuesday, last day before Lent’s forty day fast; / Mardi Gras magic exudes from every pore, / Elaborately costumed krewes toss beads off floats, / Give rise to fanciful celebrations of the dead, / Historic carnival steeped in Catholic doctrine.
quotes.author: Sterling Warner

quotes.quote: Mardi Gras gives a glimpse into religion, history, politics, economics, music, folklore, theater, and social structure.
quotes.author: Errol Laborde

quotes.quote: Mardi Gras has been celebrated in southern Louisiana since the French first settled in the area.
quotes.author: Marcia G. Gaudet

quotes.quote: Mardi Gras (or Fat Tuesday) marks the day before Ash Wednesday, the beginning of Lent, and a time of repentance in the Catholic Church.
quotes.author: Marcia G. Gaudet

quotes.quote: New Orleans Mardi Gras is to serve as a symbolic unifier of diverse groups and attitudes, at least for that day.
quotes.author: Marcia G. Gaudet

quotes.quote: Consequently they usually portray the Mardi Gras only as a surreal procession of masked drunks falling all over themselves, chasing chickens, and sometimes maiming the chickens and themselves in the process.
quotes.author: Marcia G. Gaudet

quotes.quote: It is Mardi Gras custom for all gentlemen to bow and all ladies to curtsy when presented to the Mardi Gras King and Queens.
quotes.author: Huber

quotes.quote: Mardi Gras, with its laughter-moving tomfooleries, must go the way of all other institutions, and reposing on its past glory, may content itself with sneering at the hard realities of the present locomotive, telegraphic age.
quotes.author: Schindler

quotes.quote: Mardi Gras is a festive holiday. People dress up and throw parties. People have fun at the celebrations and parties.
quotes.author: Molly Aloian

quotes.quote: During Mardi Gras people eat delicious foods, such as craw fish jambalaya.
quotes.author: Molly Aloian

quotes.quote: Mardi Gras traditions began long ago during winter festivals. Late, Christians saw it as a time to eat rich foods before fasting, or not eating, during lent. Today, everybody joins the fun.
quotes.author: Molly Aloian

quotes.quote: Mardi Gras has different names. Many people from around the world call this festive time carnival.
quotes.author: Molly Aloian

quotes.quote: A Mardi Gras float, or a platform on wheels, is pulled by a tractor, and is decorated with a subject, or theme, chosen by each krewe.
quotes.author: Beverly B Vidrine

quotes.quote: Mardi Gras is a holiday, or a day of freedom from work and school, in many cities that celebrate this special day.
quotes.author: Beverly B Vidrine

quotes.quote: Many parade goers enjoy dancing to the band music played by the brass horns during the Mardi Gras parades.
quotes.author: Beverly B Vidrine

quotes.quote: An American has not seen the United States until he has seen Mardi Gras in New Orleans.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The margaritas always taste better in Mexico.
quotes.author: Richard Shepard

quotes.quote: Two pieces shaking, white caps a-breaking / We ain't feeling no pain, it goes like / One margarita, two margarita, three margarita, shot / Don't worry 'bout tomorrow
quotes.author: Josh Thompson

quotes.quote: I sat down in the sand / A drink in my hand / And in the glass looking back at me / I got a bug in my margarita / Seems bad luck won't leave me alone
quotes.author: Alan Jackson

quotes.quote: So we put our drinks together / And toasted rainy weather / And the women that had done us wrong / Then we threw back margaritas
quotes.author: Alan Jackson

quotes.quote: We can do the bar / Sip margarita's / Stay on the floor / Go with me for a ride / Aren't you feeling nice? / Doesn't It feel nice? / Is everybody high
quotes.author: Pat Brown

quotes.quote: I'll trade you 20 Margaritas for your moonshine / 'Cause I like to have a party all the time / I'll trade you 20 Margaritas for your moonshine / 'Cause I hear that stuff can really blow your mind
quotes.author: Kenny Alphin

quotes.quote: Oh tonight I need a Margarita and I need it bad / I'm hoping that the tequila is gonna take me back / Give me the salt and the lime
quotes.author: Dana Hunt

quotes.quote: We're just drinking margaritas at the mall / That's what this stuff adds up to after all / Magenta, orange, acid green / Peacock blue and mercury / Drinking margaritas at the mall
quotes.author: David Berman

quotes.quote: Farther south, where the sweet tequila flows / Tiny clothes, Yo te amo, México / Señoritas, we are sipping margaritas on the beach / They got something you can't teach
quotes.author: Sante Pucello

quotes.quote: I'm on Patron / Tequila / I'm drunk on margarita / That Patron / Tequila / Me and my mamacita (yeah)
quotes.author: Esther Dean

quotes.quote: They are all wondering what I'm gonna do / Oh my hand's on the glass / It's my last margarita / And my mind is on you
quotes.author: David Loggins

quotes.quote: Today the tequila-laced margarita is the most popular mixed drink in America.
quotes.author: Anthony Dias Blue

quotes.quote: There are many people who claim to have invented the Margarita, which, as Spanish for 'daisy' and a popular woman's name, would have been a very common name for a drink.
quotes.author: Simon Difford

quotes.quote: The margarita--the drink that's a lifestyle!
quotes.author: W. Park Kerr

quotes.quote: The margarita's beauty and allure is steeped in mystery.
quotes.author: W. Park Kerr

quotes.quote: The margarita is always beckoning us to celebrate the lush heat of tequila and the citrusy zest of orange and lime.
quotes.author: W. Park Kerr

quotes.quote: When it comes to making the ultimate margarita, the key is in the balance between the sweet, the tart, and the feisty.
quotes.author: W. Park Kerr

quotes.quote: Frozen margarita mixes are usually made with crazy amounts of sugar.
quotes.author: Bethenny Frankel

quotes.quote: The story goes that the Margarita was created by a woman named Margarita Sames.
quotes.author: Kim Haasarud

quotes.quote: A great Margarita enhances--and does not mask--the essence of these tequilas.
quotes.author: Kim Haasarud

quotes.quote: A balance of sweet and sour notes with the right amount of tequila is what makes a good Margarita great.
quotes.author: Kim Haasarud

quotes.quote: Fire and water, sweet and sour---this is the balancing act that goes into the perfect Margarita.
quotes.author: Kim Haasarud

quotes.quote: What constitutes a truly great margarita is not that easy to define. It is at once elusive and unforgiving.
quotes.author: Al Lucero

quotes.quote: A great margarita--a real margarita--must contain three primary ingredients: real tequila, real orange liqueur, and real freshly squeezed or lime juice.
quotes.author: Al Lucero

quotes.quote: If life gives you limes, make margaritas.
quotes.author: Jimmy Buffett

quotes.quote: Take every birthday with a grain of salt. This works much better if the salt accompanies a large margarita.
quotes.author: Maxine

quotes.quote: To remove blood stains from your conscience try frozen margaritas.
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.quote: If liking Katy Perry and drinking margaritas is gay, then who wants to be straight?!
quotes.author: James Franco

quotes.quote: It's 4:58 on Friday afternoon. Do you know where your margarita is?
quotes.author: Amy Neftzger

quotes.quote: We usually have margaritas on Thursdays, but since it's Tuesday I'll make an exception.
quotes.author: Chelsea Handler

quotes.quote: When you smoke marijuana, you are in the moment and you are happy. You forget about any worries of the past or the future.
quotes.author: Tommy Chong

quotes.quote: Of course I know how to roll a joint.
quotes.author: Martha Stewart

quotes.quote: Smoking helped put me in touch with the realm of the senses.
quotes.author: Hugh Hefner

quotes.quote: Marijuana is probably the most dangerous drug in America today.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: I have found in my study of these patients that cannabis is really a safe, effective and non-toxic alternative to many standard medications.
quotes.author: Philip Denney

quotes.quote: Alcohol and marijuana, if used in moderation, plus loud, usually low-class music, make stress and boredom infinitely more bearable.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: Smoking marijuana, as long as you leave the nicotine out of it, is certainly no more damaging than having a drink, and I suspect better for you than having a drink.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: Marijuana has killed far fewer people than swimming pools; it's the war against it that does all the violence.
quotes.author: Lawrence Reed

quotes.quote: I think people need to be educated to the fact that marijuana is not a drug. Marijuana is a flower. God put it here.
quotes.author: Willie Nelson

quotes.quote: That is not a drug. It's a leaf.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: It really puzzles me to see marijuana connected with narcotics dope and all of that stuff. It is a thousand times better than whiskey. It is an assistant and a friend.
quotes.author: Louis Armstrong

quotes.quote: The legalization of marijuana is not a dangerous experimentâ€”the prohibition is the experiment, and it has failed dramatically, with millions of victims all around the world.
quotes.author: Sebastian Marincolo

quotes.quote: Marijuana is beneficial to many patients.
quotes.author: Jocelyn Elders

quotes.quote: Marijuana is a very dangerous drug. Some people smoke it just once and go directly into politics.
quotes.author: Barry Crimmins

quotes.quote: Herb is the healing of a nation, alcohol is the destruction.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: Marijuana is quite possibly the finest of intoxicants. It has been scientifically proven, for decades, to be much less harmful to the body than alcohol when used on a regular basis.
quotes.author: Nick Offerman

quotes.quote: I have always loved marijuana. It has been a source of joy and comfort to me for many years. And I still think of it as a basic staple of life, along with beer and ice and grapefruits -and millions of Americans agree with me.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.quote: It makes me feel the way I need to feel.
quotes.author: Snoop Dogg

quotes.quote: The first time I smoked was at home with my mother and stepfather; they were like, â€˜If you are going to do this, we'd rather you did this with us.
quotes.author: Matt Damon

quotes.quote: Make the most you can of the Indian Hemp seed and sow it everywhere.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: The weed is for the people. It's the people's weed.
quotes.author: Jonah Hill

quotes.quote: A weed is a plant that has mastered every survival skill except for learning how to grow in rows.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: I think pot should be legal I don't smoke it, but I like the smell of it.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.quote: I find it quite ironic that the most dangerous thing about weed is getting caught with it.
quotes.author: Bill Murray

quotes.quote: The War on Drugs has been an utter failure. We need to rethink and decriminalize our marijuana laws.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Why is marijuana against the law? It grows naturally upon our planet. Doesn't the idea of making nature against the law seem to you a bit . . . unnatural?
quotes.author: Bill Hicks

quotes.quote: More than anything, the weed really helped with my mental state, because marijuana works on the brain. And if anything, it soothes the brain.
quotes.author: Tommy Chong

quotes.quote: Some of my finest hours have been spent on my back veranda, smoking hemp and observing as far as my eye can see.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Instead of taking five or six of the prescriptions, I decided to go a natural route and smoke marijuana.
quotes.author: Melissa Etheridge

quotes.quote: Marijuana is a proven medicine.
quotes.author: Tommy Chong

quotes.quote: So the Marine Corps really did teach me to conquer fear, and then to go for higher causes, higher purposes.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: The Marines have landed and the situation is well in hand.
quotes.author: Richard Harding Davis

quotes.quote: We have two companies of MARINES running all over this island and thousands of ARMY troops doing nothing!
quotes.author: John W Vessey Jr

quotes.quote: Every Marine is, first and foremost, a rifleman. All other conditions are secondary.
quotes.author: A. M. Gray

quotes.quote: The Marine Corps is supposed to be the toughest and most rigorous of its class.
quotes.author: Adam Driver

quotes.quote: The United States Marine Corps, with its fiercely proud tradition of excellence in combat, its hallowed rituals, and its unbending code of honor, is part of the fabric of American myth.
quotes.author: Thomas E. Ricks

quotes.quote: The Marines I have seen around the world have the cleanest bodies, the filthiest minds, the highest morale, and the lowest morals of any group of animals I have ever seen. Thank God for the United States Marine Corps!
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: In the Marine Corps, everything had a purpose.
quotes.author: Adam Driver

quotes.quote: We're really talking about the Army and Marine Corps here for almost all these ground combat jobs. They want to move in a careful, deliberate manner.
quotes.author: Renee Montagne

quotes.quote: A Marine should be sworn to the patient endurance of hardships, like the ancient knights; and it is not the least of these necessary hardships to have to serve with sailors.
quotes.author: Bernard Montgomer

quotes.quote: We're a family, the Marine Corps. We take care of each other, and that includes supporting the spouses and families of Marines who are left behind during a deployment. We all take care of one another.
quotes.author: Brad Milton

quotes.quote: The Marine Corps is some of the best acting training you could have. Having that responsibility for people's lives, suddenly time becomes a really valuable commodity and you want to make the most of it. And for acting, you just have to do the work, just keep doing it.
quotes.author: Adam Driver

quotes.quote: Marines die, that's what we're here for. But the Marine Corps lives forever. And that means YOU live forever.
quotes.author: Phil Hartman

quotes.quote: A Marine likes a good fight and respects a good fighter. You've got yourself one fine Marine for an escort and the whole Marine Corps behind you.
quotes.author: Bud Rudesill

quotes.quote: We are United States Marines, and for two and a quarter centuries we have defined the standards of courage, esprit, and military prowess.
quotes.author: James L. Jones

quotes.quote: There are only two kinds of people that understand Marines: Marines and the enemy. Everyone else has a second-hand opinion.
quotes.author: William Thornson

quotes.quote: The future success of the Marine Corps depends on two factors: first, an efficient performance of all duties to which its officers and men may be assigned; second, promptly bringing this efficiency to the attention of the proper officials of the government, and the American people.
quotes.author: John A. Lejeune

quotes.quote: Something I learned in the Marine Corps that I've applied to acting is, one, taking direction, and then working with a group of people to accomplish a mission and knowing your role within that team.
quotes.author: Adam Driver
