quotes.quote: I have learned two important lessons from my association with the Marine Corps: always be on time and always be ready to do what is required when you get there.
quotes.author: Ed Mcmahon

quotes.quote: For over 221 years our Corps has done two things for this great Nation. We make Marines and we win battles.
quotes.author: Charles C. Krulak

quotes.quote: There's a mindset of flexibility and adaptability that comes with us. We don't mind hardship. We don't mind somebody saying, 'Go in and do this nasty job.' Whatever the job is, we can do it. That's why the nation has a Marine Corps.
quotes.author: James F. Amos

quotes.quote: The Marine Corps has just been called by the New York Times, 'The elite of this country.' I think it is the elite of the world.
quotes.author: William Halsey

quotes.quote: And all of these together, as much as any campaign the Marine Corps has ever pursued, have brought an unrelenting, never-ceasing pride to all of us who have ever claimed the title of United States Marine.
quotes.author: Jim Webb

quotes.quote: One of the first things I learned in the Marine Corps is that any military mission has to be defined as precisely as you can possibly define it, and then you size the force and equipment force to accomplish that mission without fail.
quotes.author: John Glenn

quotes.quote: The Marine Corps taught me how to kill, but it didn't teach me how to deal with killing.
quotes.author: Karl Marlantes

quotes.quote: The Marine Corps represented honor more than he could ever express. He went into the Marine Corps because it meant honor to him.
quotes.author: John Broughton

quotes.quote: Some people spend an entire lifetime wondering if they made a difference in the world. But, the Marines don't have that problem.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: Freedom is not free, but the U.S. Marine Corps will pay most of your share.
quotes.author: Ned Dolan

quotes.quote: Men do not fight for flag or country, for the Marine Corps or glory or any other abstraction. They fight for one another. And if you came through this ordeal, you would age with dignity.
quotes.author: William Manchester

quotes.quote: The Marine Corps is proud of the fact that it is a force of combined arms, and it jealously guards the integrity of its air-ground team.
quotes.author: Keith B. McCutcheon

quotes.quote: The soldier is the Army. No army is better than its soldiers. The Soldier is also a citizen. In fact, the highest obligation and privilege of citizenship is that of bearing arms for one's country
quotes.author: George S. Patton Jr.

quotes.quote: Your soul may belong to Jesus, but your ass belongs to the marines.
quotes.author: Eugene B. Sledge

quotes.quote: The only easy day was yesterday.
quotes.author: U.S. Navy SEALs

quotes.quote: Old breed? New breed? There's not a damn bit of difference so long as it's the Marine breed
quotes.author: Chesty Puller

quotes.quote: Look, many of us here are regular marines... I will die as a marine because that is my dream.
quotes.author: Jerry Jones

quotes.quote: It was my duty to shoot the enemy, and I don't regret it. My regrets are for the people I couldn't save: Marines, soldiers, buddies. I'm not naive, and I don't romanticize war. The worst moments of my life have come as a SEAL. But I can stand before God with a clear conscience about doing my job.
quotes.author: Chris Kyle

quotes.quote: If you're coming from America to Iraq, then how are you supposed to be objective? I mean, you could pay lip service to being objective, but how are you going to objective when you're embedded with the Marines? The Marines are saving your life every day and they're protecting you.
quotes.author: Shane Smith

quotes.quote: There are only two kinds of people that understand Marines: Marines and the enemy. Everyone else has a second-hand opinion.
quotes.author: Gen. William Thornson

quotes.quote: I come in peace, I didn't bring artillery. But I am pleading with you with tears in my eyes: If you fuck with me, I'll kill you all.
quotes.author: Marine General James Mattis

quotes.quote: Being ready is not what matters. What matters is winning after you get there.
quotes.author: Lt.Gen Victor H. Krulak

quotes.quote: Marines die, that's what we're here for. But the Marine Corps lives forever. And that means YOU will live forever.
quotes.author: The mythical GySgt. Hartman

quotes.quote: The deadliest weapon in the world is a Marine and his rifle
quotes.author: Gen. John "Black Jack" Pershing,

quotes.quote: The MARINES have landed and have the situation well in hand
quotes.author: Richard Harding Davis

quotes.quote: People sleep peaceably in their beds at night only because rough men stand ready to do violence on their behalf.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: A ship without MARINES is like a garment without buttons.
quotes.author: Adm. David Porter

quotes.quote: Marines I see as two breeds, Rottweilers or Dobermans, because Marines come in two varieties, big and mean, or skinny and mean. They're aggressive on the attack and tenacious on defense. They've got really short hair and they always go for the throat
quotes.author: RAdm. "Jay" R. Stark

quotes.quote: A Marine should be sworn to the patient endurance of hardships, like the ancient knights; and it is not the least of these necessary hardships to have to serve with sailors.
quotes.author: Field Marshal Bernard Montgomery

quotes.quote: The bended knee is not a tradition of our Corps.
quotes.author: General Alexander A. Vandergrift

quotes.quote: I am convinced that there is no smarter, handier, or more adaptable body of troops in the world.
quotes.author: Prime Minister of Britain

quotes.quote: Marines I see as two breeds, Rottweilers or Dobermans, because Marines come in two varieties, big and mean, or skinny and mean. They're aggressive on the attack and tenacious on defense. They've got really short hair and they always go for the throat.
quotes.author: RAdm. Jay R. Stark

quotes.quote: For over 221 years our Corps has done two things for this great Nation. We make Marines, and we win battles.
quotes.author: Gen. Charles C. Krulak

quotes.quote: The Marines have landed, and the situation is well in hand.
quotes.author: Richard Harding Davis

quotes.quote: In space, no one can hear you scream-unless it's the battle cry of the United States Marines!
quotes.author: Sgt. Major Frank Bougus

quotes.quote: If our country continues to provide us with great young Marines like that, we can go anywhere and do anything that this nation asks.
quotes.author: Commandant James Conway

quotes.quote: They had to make alot of decision's in those six seconds and one of them was to die. They wouldn't have stood there and done what they did unless they were Marines right down to their DNA.
quotes.author: Major General John Kelly

quotes.quote: Even by the standards expected of Marine grunts their bravery was exceptional.
quotes.author: Major General John Kelly

quotes.quote: When the pin is pulled, Mr. Grenade is not our friend.
quotes.author: US Marine Corps

quotes.quote: Without discipline, there is no Marine Corp.
quotes.author: R Lee Ermey

quotes.quote: Men do not fight for flag or country, for the Marine Corps or glory or any other abstraction. They fight for one another. And if you came through this ordeal, you would age with dignity.
quotes.author: William Manchester

quotes.quote: It is courage, courage, courage, that raises the blood of life to crimson splendor. Live bravely and present a brave front to adversity.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Marketing's job is never done. It's about perpetual motion. We must continue to innovate every day.
quotes.author: Beth Comstock

quotes.quote: Marketing is no longer about the stuff that you make, but about the stories you tell.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: Content is the atomic particle of all digital marketing.
quotes.author: Rebecca Lieb

quotes.quote: Marketing is telling the world you're a rock star. Content marketing is showing the world you are one.
quotes.author: Robert Rose

quotes.quote: Marketing is too important to be left to the marketing department.
quotes.author: David Packard

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to get creative and experiment with your marketing.
quotes.author: Mike Volpe

quotes.quote: In marketing I've seen only one strategy that can't miss -- and that is to market to your best customers first, your best prospects second and the rest of the world last.
quotes.author: John Romero

quotes.quote: Marketing takes day to learn. Unfortunately it takes a lifetime to master.
quotes.author: Philip Kotler

quotes.quote: No great marketing decisions have ever been made on qualitative data.
quotes.author: John Scully

quotes.quote: The best marketing doesn't feel like marketing.
quotes.author: Tom Fishburne

quotes.quote: Marketing is really just about sharing your passion.
quotes.author: Michael Hyatt

quotes.quote: Switch it off, get away from it all, and stop reading Marketing on your holiday.
quotes.author: Will Harris

quotes.quote: The heart of marketing is behavior modification, and this will remain our focus.
quotes.author: Jennifer S Nelson

quotes.quote: Marketing is marketing. It's easy to drape new media in magic but it comes down to whether it's a good business or not.
quotes.author: Carl Lyons

quotes.quote: Marketing is not a function, it is the whole business seen from the customer's point of view.
quotes.author: Peter F Drucker

quotes.quote: Marketing goes wrong when it is perceived by companies as a bolt-on activity.
quotes.author: Michael Perry

quotes.quote: Marketing people have every reason to be grateful for the existence of reluctant consumers: if it weren't for them, we wouldn't have jobs.
quotes.author: Jeremy Bullmore

quotes.quote: Advertising is a tax for having an unremarkable product.
quotes.author: Robert Stephens

quotes.quote: The aim of marketing is to know and understand the customer so well the product or service fits him and sells itself.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: The sole purpose of marketing is to sell more to more people, more often and at higher prices. There is no other reason to do it.
quotes.author: Sergio Zyman

quotes.quote: Marketing is what you do when your product is no good.
quotes.author: Edwin Land

quotes.quote: We're obviously going to spend a lot in marketing because we think the product sells itself.
quotes.author: Jim Allchin

quotes.quote: Marketing is merely a civilized form of warfare in which most battles are won with words, ideas, and disciplined thinking.
quotes.author: Albert W. Emery

quotes.quote: Marketing is a contest for people's attention.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: Money coming in says I've made the right marketing decisions.
quotes.author: Adam Osborne

quotes.quote: The basic idea that marketing is wrong at its core is one of the main reasons why innovation seems blocked and unpredictable.
quotes.author: Clayton Christensen

quotes.quote: The aim of marketing is to make selling superfluous.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: If you have more money than brains you should focus on outbound marketing. If you have more brains than money, you should focus on inbound marketing.
quotes.author: Guy Kawasaki

quotes.quote: The aim of marketing is to get customers to know, like and trust you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Business has only two functions - marketing and innovation.
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.quote: Some people ask the secret of our long marriage. We take time to go to a restaurant two times a week. A little candlelight, dinner, soft music and dancing? she goes Tuesdays, I go Fridays.
quotes.author: Henry Youngman

quotes.quote: Marriage is an alliance entered into by a man who can't sleep with the window shut, and a woman who can't sleep with the window open.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: One advantage of marriage is that, when you fall out of love with him or he falls out of love with you, it keeps you together until you fall in again.
quotes.author: Judith Viorst

quotes.quote: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: A great marriage is not when the perfect couple comes together. It is when an imperfect couple learns to enjoy their differences.
quotes.author: Dave Meurer

quotes.quote: Marriage is a mosaic you build with your spouse. Millions of tiny moments that create your love story.
quotes.author: Jennifer Smith

quotes.quote: A long marriage is two people trying to dance a duet and two solos at the same time.
quotes.author: Anne Taylor Fleming

quotes.quote: Chains do not hold a marriage together. It is threads, hundreds of tiny threads which sew people together through the years.
quotes.author: Simone Signoret

quotes.quote: Marriages are like fingerprints; each one is different and each one is beautiful.
quotes.author: Maggie Reyes

quotes.quote: The difference between an ordinary marriage and an extraordinary marriage is in giving just a little extra every day, as often as possible, for as long as we both shall live.
quotes.author: Fawn Weaver

quotes.quote: Marriage is like watching the color of leaves in the fall; ever changing and more stunningly beautiful with each passing day.
quotes.author: Fawn Weaver

quotes.quote: In marriage, each partner is to be an encourager rather than a critic, a forgiver rather than a collector of hurts, an enabler rather than a reformer.
quotes.author: Norman Wright and Gary Oliver

quotes.quote: Marriage is not a noun; it's a verb. It isn't something you get. It's something you do. It's the way you love your partner every day.
quotes.author: Barbara De Angelis

quotes.quote: The goal in marriage is not to think alike, but to think together.
quotes.author: Robert Dodd

quotes.quote: Being in a long marriage is a little bit like that nice cup of coffee every morning - I might have it every day, but I still enjoy it.
quotes.author: Stephen Gaines

quotes.quote: A happy marriage is a selfless journey in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own.
quotes.author: George & Yvonne Levy

quotes.quote: To keep your marriage brimming,With love in the loving cup,Whenever you're wrong admit it;Whenever you're right shut up.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: Marriage is like a phone call in the night: first the ring, and then you wake up.
quotes.author: Evelyn Hendrickson

quotes.quote: After marriage, husband and wife become two sides of a coin; they just can't face each other, but still they stay together.
quotes.author: Hermant Joshi

quotes.quote: The secret of a happy marriage remains a secret.
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.quote: Marriage is our last, best chance to grow up.
quotes.author: Joseph Barth

quotes.quote: Many marriages would be better if the husband and the wife clearly understood that they are on the same side.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: The great secret of successful marriage is to treat all disasters as incidents and none of the incidents as disasters.
quotes.author: Harold George Nicolson

quotes.quote: A good marriage is the union of two good forgivers.
quotes.author: Ruth Bell Graham

quotes.quote: Marriage, ultimately, is the practice of becoming passionate friends.
quotes.author: Harville Hendrix

quotes.quote: Marriage, like a submarine, is only safe if you get all the way inside.
quotes.author: Frank Pittman

quotes.quote: A good marriage is a contest of generosity.
quotes.author: Diane Sawyer

quotes.quote: The greatest marriages are built on teamwork. A mutual respect, a healthy dose of admiration, and a never-ending portion of love and grace.
quotes.author: Fawn Weaver

quotes.quote: A long-lasting marriage is built by two people who believe in -and live by- the solemn promise they made.
quotes.author: Darlene Schacht

quotes.quote: A great marriage isn't something that just happens; it's something that must be created.
quotes.author: Fawn Weaver

quotes.quote: You can choose to love whoever you love.
quotes.author: Jay-Z

quotes.quote: Marriage equality is the law of the land. Officials should be held to their duty to uphold the law-end of story.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.quote: Marriage equality is about more than just marriage. It's about something greater. It's about acceptance.
quotes.author: Charlize Theron

quotes.quote: Same-sex couples should be able to get married.
quotes.author: President Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Marriage is good for society. It reduces promiscuity. It encourages people to look after each other. It creates financial stability. It is the first line for health care. It encourages people to eat proper meals. It provides for survivors without putting a burden on the welfare system. It provides a stable environment to raise kids. It makes people feel relaxed, trusting, stable and cared for. The reasons it is good for women are the same ones it is good for men. For the same reasons it is good for straight people, it is also good for gay ones.
quotes.author: RoedyÂ

quotes.quote: In my heart, I know that marriage equality for every human being isn't a question of if, but only a matter of when. I ask those who feel that giving freedom to others somehow binds you, to please take a good look at what you are standing behind.
quotes.author: Russell Simmons

quotes.quote: There's no need to legalize gay marriage. I have plenty of friends who are committed couples; some of them call themselves married, some don't, but their friends treat them as married. Anybody who doesn't like it just doesn't hang out with them.
quotes.author: Orson Scott Card

quotes.quote: Same sex marriage isn't gay privilege, it's equal rights. Privilege would be something like gay people not paying taxes. Like churches don't.
quotes.author: Ricky Gervais

quotes.quote: The marriage-equality issue should be recognized for what it truly is - a civil rights issue that must be approved to assure that every citizen is treated equally under the law.
quotes.author: Bruce Springsteen

quotes.quote: Marriage equality changed life for people.
quotes.author: Andrew Cuomo

quotes.quote: In the unification of two minds, orientation of sexuality is irrelevant.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: LGBT Americans are full and equal citizens and deserve the rights of citizenship - that includes marriage.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.quote: Gay marriage is a complete red herring to distract everyone from the economy and the war and health care and education.
quotes.author: David O Russell

quotes.quote: Marriage should be between a spouse and a spouse, not a gender and a gender.
quotes.author: Hendrik Hertzberg

quotes.quote: Marriage equality does not diminish the worth of your relationships; it simply recognises the worth of ours.
quotes.author: Penny Wong

quotes.quote: No union is more profound than marriage, for it embodies the highest ideals of love, fidelity, devotion, sacrifice, and family. In forming a marital union, two people become something greater than once they were.
quotes.author: Anthony Kennedy

quotes.quote: Gay marriage is inevitable. The next generation, they get it. It is just a matter of time before it becomes a reality.
quotes.author: Brad Pitt

quotes.quote: Marriage equality is coming, and not merely to a theater near you.
quotes.author: Suzanne Brockmann

quotes.quote: Yes, gay marriage is about symbolically blessing a relationship, but the larger issue is about transmitting a fundamental message about equality. Gay people should have equality in law everywhere.
quotes.author: Daniel Radcliffe

quotes.quote: Marriage equality is a term so ridiculous on its face that when you hear it mentioned, you would think you were in Riyadh. Years from now, perhaps we can lose the equality part, the same-sex part and call it what it is - marriage.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: Love has no gender - compassion has no religion - character has no race.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: I believe a marriage isn't between a man and woman, but between love and love.
quotes.author: Frank Ocean

quotes.quote: The nature of marriage is that, through its enduring bond, two persons together can find other freedoms, such as expression, intimacy, and spirituality. This is true for all persons, whatever their sexual orientation.
quotes.author: Justice Anthony Kennedy

quotes.quote: Marriage equality is not a choice. It is a legal right.
quotes.author: Cory Booker

quotes.quote: The real question that should be debated is not whether gay marriage should be allowed, but rather, is marriage really something we need anymore?
quotes.author: David Vakalis

quotes.quote: Marriage is a civil right. If you don't want gay people to marry in your church, good for you. But you can't say they can't marry in your city.
quotes.author: Julian Bond

quotes.quote: Equality. Absolutely. That's what defines us. It's what makes us great. If it doesn't sit well with your religion, let your God sort it out in the end, but that's us. We're equal.
quotes.author: Brad Pitt

quotes.quote: It's a no brainer. If you're not for gay marriage, don't marry a gay person.
quotes.author: Whoopi Goldberg

quotes.quote: No one has the right to tell anyone what makes a family.
quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

quotes.quote: I think to each its own, if nobody is hurting anybodyâ€”who caresâ€”everyone should be able to do what they want and be happy. Who you love is who you love. That's the way I see it.
quotes.author: Jennifer Hudson

quotes.quote: Mars tugs at the human imagination like no other planet. With a force mightier than gravity, it attracts the eye to the shimmering red presence in the clear night sky.
quotes.author: John Noble

quotes.quote: A permanent base on Mars would have a number of advantages beyond being a bonanza for planetary science and geology. If, as some evidence suggests, exotic micro-organisms have arisen independently of terrestrial life, studying them could revolutionise biology, medicine and biotechnology.
quotes.author: Paul Davies

quotes.quote: The planet's famous red colour is from iron oxide coating everything. So it's not just a desert. It's a desert so old it's literally rusting.
quotes.author: Andy Weir

quotes.quote: The most true path of the planet Mars is an ellipse, which DÃ¼rer also calls an oval, or certainly so close to an ellipse that the difference is insensible.
quotes.author: Johannes Kepler

quotes.quote: Mars still remains the astrobiology community's number one choice for 'nearest rock with life,' but there are many researchers who argue that the moons of Jupiter are better bets. In particular, Europa, Ganymede, and Callisto are all thought to hide vast oceans of liquid water beneath their icy, outer skins.
quotes.author: Seth Shostak

quotes.quote: Mars is the symbolic and totally stimulating next objective that could so dominate the next century's exploration efforts. From Mars, the resources of all the asteroids will become readily available.
quotes.author: Buzz Aldrin

quotes.quote: Mars has a bit of air pressure; maybe we can build up that atmosphere to be a bit more accommodating to humans.
quotes.author: Buzz Aldrin

quotes.quote: Mars has long exerted a pull on the human imagination. The erratically moving red star in the sky was seen as sinister or violent by the ancients: The Greeks identified it with Ares, the god of war; the Babylonians named it after Nergal, god of the underworld. To the ancient Chinese, it was Ying-huo, the fire planet.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: Mars is the only known planet inhabited solely by robot.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Mars could very well be a staging location for the resources of the asteroid belt. We have to learn how to get a payback somewhere, but it's beyond Mars that the real payoff will come from minerals.
quotes.author: Buzz Aldrin

quotes.quote: Mars is the only place in the solar system where it's possible for life to become multi-planetarian.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.quote: Mars is far more attractive as an outpost colony for earthlings than the moon is.
quotes.author: Buzz Aldrin

quotes.quote: Some day people will travel to Mars. It will be a long trip, but fun. This will be a big step for mankind. We would be able to find out if there was life on this planet. It probably will look like a red desert.
quotes.author: J. Stephen Hartsfield

quotes.quote: Mars is a long ways away. The moon is only 240,000 miles, but Mars is in the millions. It's too risky without spending more time going to the moon.
quotes.author: Jim Lovell

quotes.quote: The thing that sets Mars apart is that it is the one planet that is enough like Earth that you can imagine life possibly once having taken hold there.
quotes.author: Steven Squyres

quotes.quote: Mars has been flown by, orbited, smacked into, radar inspected, and rocketed onto, as well as bounced upon, rolled over, shoveled, drilled into, baked, and even laser blasted.
quotes.author: Buzz Aldrin

quotes.quote: Mars is essentially in the same orbit Mars is somewhat the same distance from the Sun, which is very important. We have seen pictures where there are canals, we believe, and water. If there is water, that means there is oxygen. If oxygen, that means we can breathe.
quotes.author: Dan Quayle

quotes.quote: Understand that the essence of martial arts is not the art itself, but what's hidden deep within yourself.
quotes.author: Gogen Yamaguchi

quotes.quote: Martial arts are a vehicle for developing your human potential.
quotes.author: Joe Rogan

quotes.quote: Martial arts is not about picking your fights and picking how things go; it's about adapting to the how things are.
quotes.author: Gunnar Nelson

quotes.quote: It's not what you're going to take from martial arts, it's what you have to give to martial arts.
quotes.author: Saulo Ribeiro

quotes.quote: Martial arts is the kind of action that does tie in well to the supernatural.
quotes.author: Scott Derrickson

quotes.quote: A quick temper will make a fool of you soon enough.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: You win battles by knowing the enemy's timing, and using a timing that the enemy does not expect.
quotes.author: Miyamoto Musashi

quotes.quote: In the martial arts, the guys respect the women fighters.
quotes.author: Bonnie Canino

quotes.quote: Think of your opponents hands and feet as swords.
quotes.author: Gichin Funakoshi

quotes.quote: The path of Martial Arts begins and ends with courtesy. So be genuinely polite on every occasion.
quotes.author: Mas Oyama

quotes.quote: All martial arts is simply an honest expression of one's body with a lot of deception in between.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Mixed Martial Arts is a dangerous practice that could result in injuries and loss of life.
quotes.author: Akshay Kumar

quotes.quote: A martial art that has no rules is nothing but violence.
quotes.author: Kenji Tomiki

quotes.quote: Martial arts is not about fighting; it's about building character.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.quote: A positive attitude may not solve all your problems, but it will annoy enough people to make it worth the effort.
quotes.author: Herm Albright

quotes.quote: He landed on cheap shot, but I knocked him out of the tournament.
quotes.author: Josh Waitzkin

quotes.quote: In jiu jitsu, we often fall into the trap of simply trying a technique harder, rather than recognizing that it is a poorly chosen tool for the task at hand.
quotes.author: Chris Matakas

quotes.quote: The very essence of martial arts is the thirst for knowledge and the truth about ourselves.
quotes.author: Frank Shamrock

quotes.quote: Tenderness relieves strength that encumbers.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: I try to keep the martial arts up. It's a good thing, not just physically but also for your mind.
quotes.author: Dolph Lundgren

quotes.quote: The true martial artist yields to the weak, while withstanding the strong.
quotes.author: Neil Young

quotes.quote: Karate is action, survival, living; hesitation is paralysis, reaction, mortality
quotes.author: Soke Behzad Ahmadi

quotes.quote: Use only that which works, and take it from any place you can find it.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: In martial arts, the biggest enemy is self. Inside you struggle because you want to prove something.
quotes.author: Jet Li

quotes.quote: Martial Arts does not teach you how to fight, it teaches you why not to.
quotes.author: Lakshya Bharadwaj

quotes.quote: I see martial arts as moving forms of meditation. When you're sparring or drilling techniques, you can't think of anything else.
quotes.author: Joe Rogan

quotes.quote: I practice martial arts not to win over other people but to win over my own heart.
quotes.author: Tony Jaa

quotes.quote: For me, the martial arts is a search for something inside. It's not just a physical discipline.
quotes.author: Brandon Lee

quotes.quote: We learn martial arts as helping weakness. You never fight for people to get hurt. You're always helping people.
quotes.author: Jackie Chan

quotes.quote: Put Karate into your everyday living, that is how you will see true beauty.
quotes.author: Gichin Funakoshi

quotes.quote: I’m not talking a cup of cheap gin splashed over an ice cube. I’m talking satin, fire and ice; Fred Astaire in a glass; surgical cleanliness, insight.. comfort; redemption and absolution. I’m talking MARTINI.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I am prepared to believe that a dry martini slightly impairs the palate, but think what it does for the soul.
quotes.author: Alec Waugh

quotes.quote: Happiness is finding two olives in your martini when you're hungry. It's certainly become much more en vogue lately.
quotes.author: Michael Luria

quotes.quote: Martinis are the only American invention as perfect as a sonnet.
quotes.author: H.L.Mencken

quotes.quote: One martini is all right. Two are too many, and three are not enough.
quotes.author: James Thurber

quotes.quote: When I have one martini, I feel bigger, wiser, taller. When I have a second, I feel superlative. When I have more, there's no holding me.
quotes.author: William Faulkner

quotes.quote: A fine martini has a surface tension. It should stun, then cascade through your being.
quotes.author: Richard Darcy

quotes.quote: There is something about a Martini, A tingle remarkably pleasant; A yellow, a mellow Martini; I wish that I had one at present.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: The martini (a.k.a. The Silver bullet, The Cold War, White Lightning, Olive Soup, and See-Through) is not just a drink. It is the soul of cocktail—a liquid icon.
quotes.author: Nannette Stone

quotes.quote: Martinis . . . have a muting effect on the constant ringing in my ears, and as five o'clock approaches, my thoughts turn toward the elixir of quietude. Gin stops the bell from tolling.
quotes.author: E.B. White

quotes.quote: The three-martini lunch is the epitome of American efficiency. Where else can you get an earful, a bellyful and a snootful at the same time?
quotes.author: Gerald R. Ford

quotes.quote: Martinis are glamorous but also so simple because they only have a few ingredients, and you can really taste the vodka.
quotes.author: Stephanie Sigman

quotes.quote: Russians really needed a product that would be not as strong as vodka and not as feminine as cheap sparkling wine, so Martini was a good solution.
quotes.author: Roustam Tariko

quotes.quote: A good martini, a good meal, a good cigar and a good woman..or a bad woman. Depending on how much happiness you can stand.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: A well-made Martini or Gibson, correctly chilled and nicely served, has been more often my true friend than any two-legged creature.
quotes.author: M.F.K. Fisher

quotes.quote: I'm not a drinker, my body won't tolerate...eh...spirits, really. I had two martinis New Years Eve and I tried to hi-jack an elevator and fly it to Cuba.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: A word of caution to neophyte Martini drinkers: When taken to excess, this perfectly civilized drink can lead directly to uncivilized behavior. . . . The purpose of the Martini is to enhance the evening, not to obliterate it.
quotes.author: Bernaby Conrad III

quotes.quote: The two-martinis-for-lunch bunch would love for us to fight each other over the resources they have made scarce.
quotes.author: Barbara Mikulski

quotes.quote: A priest is sent to Alaska. A bishop goes up to visit one year later. The bishop asks, How do you like it up here? The priest says, If it wasn't for my Rosary, and 2 martinis a day, I'd be lost. Bishop, would you like a martini? Yes. Rosary, get the bishop a martini!
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.quote: A raise is like a martini: it elevates the spirit, but only temporarily.
quotes.author: Daniel Seligman

quotes.quote: Suffering is as necessary to entertaining as vermouth is to a Martini - a small but vital ingredient.
quotes.author: Phyllis McGinley

quotes.quote: R-E-M-O-R-S-E! Those dry martinis did the work for me; Last night at twelve I felt immense, Today I feel like thirty cents.
quotes.author: George Ade

quotes.quote: If you are willing to kill for your beliefs, you are a murderer; if you are willing to die for your beliefs, you are a martyr.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: No martyr ever went the way of duty, and felt the shadow of death upon it. The shadow of death is darkest in the valley, which men walk in easily, and is never felt at all on a steep place, like Calvary. Truth is everlasting, and so is every lover of it; and so he feels himself almost always.
quotes.author: William Mountford

quotes.quote: A man must be prepared not only to be a martyr, but to be a fool. It is absurd to say that a man is ready to toil and die for his convictions if he is not even ready to wear a wreathe around his head for them.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: A martyr can never cooperate with death, go to death in a way that they're not trying to escape.
quotes.author: Stanley Hauerwas

quotes.quote: The martyr endured tortures to affirm his belief in truth but he never asserted his disbelief in torture.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: While we may not be called to martyr our lives, we must martyr our way of life. We must put our selfish ways to death and march to a different beat. Then the world will see Jesus.
quotes.author: Michael Tait

quotes.quote: The problem with martyrs is that they're all dead. What do they have to do with us that are simple enough to still be alive? Should we just give up and want to die because death is better than dishonor? But suicide is a sin too so we really are damned if we do and damned if we don't.
quotes.author: Rosamund Hodge

quotes.quote: Martyrs do not underrate the body, they allow it to be elevated on the cross. In this they are at one with their antagonists.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: The martyrs shook the powers of darkness with the irresistible power of weakness.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: Let us all be brave enough to die the death of a martyr, but let no one lust for martyrdom.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The people who have really made history are the martyrs.
quotes.author: Aleister Crowley

quotes.quote: The sad truth is that societies that demand whistleblowers be martyrs often find themselves without either, and always when it matters the most.
quotes.author: Edward Snowden

quotes.quote: Martyrdom, as a rule, establishes the sincerity of the martyr, never the correctness of his thought. Things are true or false in themselves.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.quote: The victim to too severe a law is considered as a martyr rather than a criminal.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: Martyrs are needed to create incidents. Incidents are needed to create revolutions. Revolutions are needed to create progress.
quotes.author: Chester Himes

quotes.quote: If you die and enough people are watching, then you become a martyr, you become a hero, you become well-known.
quotes.author: Marilyn Manson

quotes.quote: A martyr is someone willing to die for what he believes in. A fanatic is someone willing for you to die for what he believes in.
quotes.author: Marsha Hinds

quotes.quote: One, with God, is always a majority, but many a martyr has been burned at the stake while the votes were being counted.
quotes.author: Thomas Reed

quotes.quote: What a trajedy to be a martyr for love, yet we worship the characters anyways because they remind us of how we struggled.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Martyrdom has always been a proof of the intensity, never of the correctness of a belief.
quotes.author: Arthur Schnitzler

quotes.quote: The martyr cannot be dishonored. Every lash inflicted is a tongue of fame; every prison a more illustrious abode.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: A willing heart will believe anything and die for anything.
quotes.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.quote: The Martyr finds her way to self-knowledge through pain, suffering, and surrender.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Martyrdom is the only way a man can become famous without ability.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: Marxism is like a classical building that followed the Renaissance; beautifu in its way, but incapable of growth.
quotes.author: Harold MacMillan

quotes.quote: Basically National Socialism and Marxism are the same thing.
quotes.author: Adolf Hitler

quotes.quote: Marxism does not make sense, and I am the first one to say this.
quotes.author: Todor Zhivkov

quotes.quote: We are indebted to Marx, Engels, Lenin and Stalin for giving us a weapon. The weapon is not a machine-gun, but Marxism-Leninism.
quotes.author: Mao Zedong

quotes.quote: The Marxist maxim is 'agitate, agitate, agitate', and that is precisely what today's reds are doing with race.
quotes.author: Paul Kengor

quotes.quote: Marxism is not only the theory of socialism, it is an integral world outlook, a philosophical system, from which Marx's proletarion socialism logically follows. This philosophical system is called dialectical materialism.
quotes.author: Joseph Stalin

quotes.quote: After the Soviet collapse, Marxism is a relic, a pathetic anachronism reduced to its last redoubts: North Korea, Cuba, and the English departments of the more expensive American universities.
quotes.author: Charles Krauthammer

quotes.quote: Marxism has not only failed to promote human freedom, it has failed to produce food.
quotes.author: John Dos Passos

quotes.quote: Marxism, famously a cry of pain rather than a science, has had its poets, but so has every other major religious heresy.
quotes.author: Harold Bloom

quotes.quote: Marxism is the opium of the intellectuals.
quotes.author: Edmund Wilson

quotes.quote: The important part of Marxism was its demand for active, constant, practical, class-war.
quotes.author: Francis Parker Yockey

quotes.quote: Karl Marx was right, socialism works, it is just that he had the wrong species.
quotes.author: Edward O. Wilson

quotes.quote: Marxism is now a world faith and must be allowed to enter into a continuous dialogue with other world faiths, including religios faiths.
quotes.author: Tony Benn

quotes.quote: When I was young, I believed in three things: Marxism, the redemptive power of cinema, and dynamite. Now I just belive in dynamite.
quotes.author: Sergio Leone

quotes.quote: It's not my fault if reality is Marxist
quotes.author: Che Guevara

quotes.quote: If anything is certain, it is that I myself am not a Marxist.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: Marxism is the only doctrine that both sastisfies the demands for progress and provides a safe outlet for moral expressin in a skeptical age.
quotes.author: Paul Craig Roberts

quotes.quote: Marxism is a revolutionary worldview that must always struggle for new revelations.
quotes.author: Rosa Luxemburg

quotes.quote: Marxism is the capitalism of the working class.
quotes.author: Oswald Spengler

quotes.quote: There may be thousands of principles of Marxism, but in the final analysis they can be summed up in one sentence: Rebellion is justified.
quotes.author: Mao Zedong

quotes.quote: Marxism: The theory that all the important things in history are rooted in an economic motive, that history is a science, a science of the search for food.
quotes.author: Gilbert K Chesterton

quotes.quote: It is capitalism, not Marxism, that trades in futures.
quotes.author: Terry Eagleton

quotes.quote: It was not Marxism that made Lenin a revolutionary but Lenin who made Marxism revolutionary.
quotes.author: Orlando Figes

quotes.quote: Marxism requires that we destroy God, because government must become God. And the only way for government to become God is to destroy the concept of God.
quotes.author: Ted Cruz

quotes.quote: What guides Marxism, then, is a different model of society, and a different conception of the function of the knowledge that can be produced by society and acquired from it.
quotes.author: Jean-Francois Lyotard

quotes.quote: The Soviet Union tried for 70 years to plant Marxism with bayonets in Eastern Europe. Today there are more Marxists on the Harvard faculty than there are in Eastern Europe.
quotes.author: George Will

quotes.quote: As long as the decent people refuse to believe that morality must manifest itself in every sphere of human activity, including the political, they will not meet the challenge of Marxism.
quotes.author: Fulton J. Sheen

quotes.quote: Unity is a great thing and a great slogan. But what the workers' cause needs is the unity of Marxists, not unity between Marxists, and opponents and distorters of Marxism.
quotes.author: Vladimir Lenin

quotes.quote: If people don't like Marxism, they should blame the British Museum.
quotes.author: Mikhail Gorbachev

quotes.quote: Marxism is not scientific: At best, it has scientific prejudices.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Celebrate your inner beauty, but buy mascara as a backup.
quotes.author: Payal Puri

quotes.quote: She should use more mascara. When one is young, one should use a lot of mascara. When one is old, they should use much more.
quotes.author: Dame Sybil Thorndike

quotes.quote: I won`t cry for you, my mascara`s too expensive.
quotes.author: Adriana Lima

quotes.quote: Men are like mascara, they run at the slightest display of emotion.
quotes.author: Kabir Bedi

quotes.quote: Every woman deserves a man to ruin her lipstick, not her mascara.
quotes.author: Charlotte Tilbury

quotes.quote: Your soul shines through even if you haven't got mascara on.
quotes.author: Louise Rennison

quotes.quote: He already ruined your mascara dont let him ruin your life.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: And since gin to artifice bears the same relation as tears to mascara, her attractions at once dissembled.
quotes.author: Truman Capote

quotes.quote: Dreams make those eyes more enchanting than mascara ever can.
quotes.author: Subiya Hussain

quotes.quote: Had the eyes not held back the tears, the mascara would have walked away telling everyone about a broken heart.. Even make up teaches sometimes..
quotes.author: Onkita

quotes.quote: Smile and love are the best mascara and shades of girl's eyes.
quotes.author: Pavithra Sundarrajan

quotes.quote: I remember watching the mascara tears flood the ivories and I thought, 'It's OK to be sad.' I've been trained to love my darkness.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.quote: If you think there's no such thing as a magic wand you've clearly never used mascara.
quotes.author: Payal Puri

quotes.quote: I never wear mascara; I laugh until I cry too often.
quotes.author: Jeanne Calment

quotes.quote: Earlier, watching her apply mascara with ritual concentration, he'd wondered just how beautiful a woman had to be before she believed it.
quotes.author: Alison Fell

quotes.quote: Yeah, Im hurting but on goes the mascara & lip gloss. That's right. I'll be the prettiest wreck you've ever seen.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: These people are amazing. It's so emotional I was thinking about wearing waterproof mascara.
quotes.author: Victoria Beckham

quotes.quote: Inner beauty is great but a little mascara never hurts.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Fake mascara didn't matter. The kajal of her life was already smudged.
quotes.author: Prerona Chatterjee

quotes.quote: You know, you go home and you try on a new mascara, and I guess a male CEO can't do that.
quotes.author: Andrea Jung

quotes.quote: Fighting is essentially a masculine idea; a woman's weapon is her tongue.
quotes.author: Hermione Gingold

quotes.quote: You don't have to play masculine to be a strong woman.
quotes.author: Mary Elizabeth Winstead

quotes.quote: Masculine ideals have become very confused in the modern world.
quotes.author: Andrew Dominik

quotes.quote: Masculine people, by their nature, tend to want to make everything into a journey with a goal.
quotes.author: Arjuna Ardagh

quotes.quote: At the heart of the matter of masculine excess is a great longing for the love and approval of a father, a man who can tell another man that his masculinity is splendid enough and he can now relax.
quotes.author: Frank Pittman

quotes.quote: Masculine pride is an exceedingly precious and fragile thing.
quotes.author: Loretta Chase

quotes.quote: The masculine energy was about survival. The male was the hunter who risked his life and had to be in the fight-flight mode.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: There's nothing masculine about being competitive. There's nothing masculine about trying to be the best at everything you do, nor is there anything wrong with it. I don't know why a female athlete has to defend her femininity just because she chooses to play sports
quotes.author: Rebecca Lobo

quotes.quote: The usual masculine dissillusionment is discovering that a woman has a brain.
quotes.author: Margaret Mitchell

quotes.quote:
The masculine in each of us struggles for greater freedom
and tries to achieve it through financial, creative, or political challenges.
quotes.author: David Deida

quotes.quote: Fathering is the most masculine thing a man can do.
quotes.author: Frank Pittman

quotes.quote: A man with a weak masculine is especially prone to despise and fear these qualities and may attempt to suppress the more destructive elements of the Feminine force in his partner.
quotes.author: David Deida

quotes.quote: Nothing great will ever be achieved without great men, and men are great only if they are determined to be so.
quotes.author: Charles De Gaulle

quotes.quote: An idea that is confident always looks masculine.
quotes.author: Thom Browne

quotes.quote: Dirt makes a man look masculine. Let your hair blow in the wind, and all that. It's OK. All you have to do is look neat when you have to look neat.
quotes.author: Hedy Lamarr

quotes.quote: Men weren't really the enemy - they were fellow victims suffering from an outmoded masculine mystique that made them feel unnecessarily inadequate when there were no bears to kill.
quotes.author: Betty Friedan

quotes.quote: The male has paid a heavy price for his masculine 'privilege' and power. He is out of touch with his emotions and his body. He is playing by the rules of the male game plan and with lemming-like purpose he is destroying himself-emotionally, psychologically and physically.
quotes.author: Herb Goldberg

quotes.quote: Man is least himself when he talks in his own person. Give him a mask, and he will tell you the truth.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Life is a masquerade. Everywhere you look are people hiding behind masks.
quotes.author: Ridze Khan

quotes.quote: His appearance in reality a hidden masquerade.
quotes.author: Justin Bienvenue

quotes.quote: The defenders of the status quo often masquerade as the preservers of harmony.
quotes.author: Mark Sheppard

quotes.quote: We are so accustomed to masquerade ourselves before others that we end by deceiving ourselves.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Stripped of all their masquerades, the fears of men are quite identical: the fear of loneliness, rejection, inferiority, unmanageable anger, illness and death.
quotes.author: Joshua L. Liebman

quotes.quote: The mask in which you choose to disguise yourself uncovers who you subconsciously are or want to be. Masks reveal in the eyes the face that lies hidden as if the mask is a dark glass mirroring your soul.
quotes.author: Chloe Thurlow

quotes.quote: Why should we grope among the dry bones of the past, or put the living generation into masquerade out of its faded wardrobe?
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: During times of war, hatred becomes quite respectable even though it has to masquerade often under the guise of patriotism.
quotes.author: Howard Thurman

quotes.quote: Remember, you cannot be both young and wise. Young people who pretend to be wise to the ways of the world are mostly cynics.
quotes.author: Stephen Colbert

quotes.quote: And many more destructions played in this ghastly masquerade, all disguised, even to the eyes, like bishops, lawyers, peers, or spies.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.quote: Freedom is no guarantee of anything. It is only defined today by what it is not. What it is takes forms strange and of infinite variety - bizarre as in a masquerade.
quotes.author: Josephine Winslow Johnson

quotes.quote: Modern society is a biological disaster masquerading as progress.
quotes.author: Steven Magee

quotes.quote: Pretending can be a bold form of experimentation and inventiveness. In pretending joy or happiness, we may discover or enhance our capacity for it.
quotes.author: Harriet Lerner

quotes.quote: No one can long hide behind a mask; the pretense soon lapses into the true character.
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: Let's be honest. You let yourself be pulled in because it felt good to be wanted, needed. But then it went too far, as projected images always do. If it's not a real image, but one that has been projected on to you, then you can keep up the masquerade for only so long before the mask cracks and the paint on the mask peels away.
quotes.author: Tori Amos

quotes.quote: Wearing a mask wears you out. Faking it is fatiguing. The most exhausting activity is pretending to be what you know you aren't.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: A most insidious form of fear is that which masquerades as common sense or even wisdom, condemning as foolish, reckless, insignificant or futile the small, daily acts of courage which help to preserve man's self-respect and inherent human dignity.
quotes.author: Aung San Suu Kyi

quotes.quote: Masks reveal the shape of your soul and the state of the world and, in today's world, everyone wears a mask.
quotes.author: Chloe Thurlow

quotes.quote: And, after all, what is a lie? 'Tis but the truth in a masquerade.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: All is as if the world did cease to exist. The city's monuments go unseen, its past unheard, and its culture slowly fading in the dismal sea.
quotes.author: Nathan Reese Maher

quotes.quote: Civilization is the lamb's skin in which barbarism masquerades.
quotes.author: Thomas Bailey Aldrich

quotes.quote: You were my favorite mistake. A masquerade that nice guys can persuade with such charming ways and leave you with such heartache.
quotes.author: Celia Rouge Hofin

quotes.quote: Precise forecasts masquerade as accurate ones.
quotes.author: Nate Silver

quotes.quote: Such subtle covenants shall be made, 'til peace itself is war in masquerade.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: Most of the confidence which I appear to feel, especially when influenced by noon wine, is only a pretense.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: The present always masquerades as a beginning; maybe we couldn't endure it if we realized at the time that it was a peak, or even an ending.
quotes.author: Robin Morgan

quotes.quote: Masks reveal. They don't conceal. Masks reveal your cravings, your passion, your deepest most secret desires.
quotes.author: Chloe Thurlow

quotes.quote: The closing years of life are like the end of a masquerade party, when the masks are dropped.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: Because these consequences are distributed globally, the problem masquerades as a distraction. Because the length of time between causes and consequences stretches out longer than we're used to dealing with, it gives us the illusion that we have the luxury of time. Neither of those things is true.
quotes.author: Al Gore

quotes.quote: What the mass media offers is not popular art, but entertainment which is intended to be consumed like food, forgotten, and replaced by a new dish.
quotes.author: W.H. Auden

quotes.quote: There's plenty to criticize about the mass media, but they are the source of regular information about a wide range of topics. You can't duplicate that on blogs.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: All of us who professionally use the mass media are the shapers of society. We can vulgarise that society. We can brutalise it. Or we can help lift it onto a higher level.
quotes.author: William Bernbach

quotes.quote: The greatest power of the mass media is the power to ignore. The worst thing about this power is that you may not even know you're using it.
quotes.author: Sam Smith

quotes.quote: There is a cultural factor promoting violence which nowadays undoubtedly is highly effective is the mass media. And particularly everything that enters our minds through pictorial media.
quotes.author: Alva Myrdal

quotes.quote: The effect of the mass media is not to elicit belief but to maintain the apparatus of addiction.
quotes.author: Christopher Lasch

quotes.quote: It is advertising and the logic of consumerism that governs the depiction of reality in the mass media.
quotes.author: Christopher Lasch

quotes.quote: People shouldn't expect the mass media to do investigative stories. That job belongs to the 'fringe' media.
quotes.author: Ted Koppel

quotes.quote: Nowadays, truth is the greatest news. The mass media are the wholesalers, the peer groups, the retailers of the communications industry.
quotes.author: David Riesman

quotes.quote: Mass media provides the essential link between the individual and the demands of the technological society.
quotes.author: Jacques Ellul

quotes.quote: It is the emergence of mass media which makes possible the use of propaganda techniques on a societal scale.
quotes.author: Jacques Ellul

quotes.quote: The mass media molds everyone into more passive roles, into roles of more frantic consuming, into human beings with fragmented views of society. But what it does to everyone, it does to women even more.
quotes.author: Alice Embree

quotes.quote: The mass media, their influence is everywhere. They tell us what to do, what to think, and they tell us to think about ourselves all of the time.
quotes.author: Tricia Harris

quotes.quote: The mass media serve as a system for communicating messages and symbols to the general populace. It is their function to amuse, entertain, and inform, and to inculcate individuals with the values, beliefs, and codes of behavior that will integrate them into the institutional structures of the larger society. In a world of concentrated wealth and major conflicts of class interest, to fulfil this role requires systematic propaganda.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: Since anti-racist individuals did not control mass media, the media became the primary tool that would be used and is still used to convince black viewers, and everyone else, of black inferiority.
quotes.author: Bell Hooks

quotes.quote: Because of a mass media more interested in gossip and sensationalism than real issues, I would say a vast majority of the American public doesn't have a clue about how the Congress functions and what goes on.
quotes.author: Bernie Sanders

quotes.quote: With today's mass media obsession, it's good to be able to raise awareness about our environment.
quotes.author: Robin McLeavy

quotes.quote: After the 9/11 incidents, Islam has become a big question mark among westerners, especially Americans. The mass media constantly raise the issue of relationship between Islam and terrorism.
quotes.author: Abdolkarim Soroush

quotes.quote: Mass media over-represents persons of color in negative ways, especially as criminals, relative to the share of crime actually done by such persons.
quotes.author: Tim Wise

quotes.quote: I'd rather get a massage and get the problem rubbed out than taking a pill and just feel drugged out.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Massage has had a possitive effect on every medical condition we've looked at.
quotes.author: Tiffany Field, Ph. D.

quotes.quote: The way to health is to have an aromatic bath and a scented massage every day.
quotes.author: Hippocrates

quotes.quote: Anyone wishing to study medicine must master the art of massage.
quotes.author: Hippocrates

quotes.quote: Massage is the only form of physical pleasure to which nature forgot to attach consequences.
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: Sometimes massage is the only thing that makes sense.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A massage is just like a movie, really relaxing and a total escape, except in a massage you're the star. And you don't miss anything by falling asleep!
quotes.author: Elizabeth Jane Howard

quotes.quote: There are some things in life where it's better to receive than to give, and massage is one of them.
quotes.author: Al Michaels

quotes.quote: Aromatherapy without massage is like an orchestra without a conductor.
quotes.author: Robert Tisserand

quotes.quote: Massage is not just a luxury. It's a way of a heathier, happier life.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Massage is the answer...Who cares what the question is!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Time spent getting a massage is never wasted.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: My massage therapy is not a luxury, it's a necessity.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: We have nothing to fear but missing our massage appointment time.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Massage is a luxury you can't afford to miss!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Never put off your massage until tomorrow if you can get it today.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: When all else fails, get a massage.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Massage is the study of anatomy in braille.
quotes.author: Jack Meagher

quotes.quote: I need a drink, a man, or a massage... or a drunken massage from a man.
quotes.author: Dr. Cristina Yang (Grey's Anatomy)

quotes.quote: Your calm mind is your ultimate weapon against your challenges. So relax.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: Learn to massage. Physical contact through massage can be rewarding.
quotes.author: Allastair Wiliams

quotes.quote: A good spirit is like a muscle. If you do not work and exercise it and massage it in a good and positive way it will eventually wither and die.
quotes.author: Brandon Astor Jones

quotes.quote: Massage has few if any side-effects, is cost-effective, produces at least short-term benefits, and since people typically enjoy massage, they tend to be compliant about attending sessions.
quotes.author: Sandy Fitz

quotes.quote: Indian women traditionally practise Indian head massage for the health benefits that the massage provides.
quotes.author: Francesca Gould

quotes.quote: The massage not only has excellent physical effects but also helps with bonding and is a way of showing affection.
quotes.author: Francesca Gould

quotes.quote: Gentle massage given overtime can release tension and encourage acceptance of touch.
quotes.author: Marybetts Sinclair

quotes.quote: Massage of course is a celebration of the sense of touch and since ancient times this art has found practitioners in almost all cultures, who used it for relaxation, for therapy, for rehabilitation, and for remediation of health problems.
quotes.author: Dr. Nicholas J. Vardaxis

quotes.quote: Massage like the sense of touch has always been a constant in the background, its practice uninterrupted during the passing of the centuries.
quotes.author: Dr. Nicholas J. Vardaxis

quotes.quote: Massage is being embraced in more and more situations of the modern world, an affirmation of its effectiveness throughout the centuries.
quotes.author: Dr. Nicholas J. Vardaxis

quotes.quote: Though the art of massage has sometimes faced extinction, somewhere, sometime throughout these threats, someone believed in it enough to speak highly of it and thereby influence the views of the public and medical fraternity.
quotes.author: Lisa Casanelia

quotes.quote: The mark of your ignorance is the depth of your belief in injustice and tragedy. What the caterpillar calls the end of the world, the Master calls the butterfly.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: You are always a student, never a master. You have to keep moving forward.
quotes.author: Conrad Hall

quotes.quote: We are all apprentices in a craft where no one ever becomes a master.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Poor is the pupil who does not surpass his master.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Where ignorance is our master, there is no possibility of real peace.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: No man is free who is not master of himself.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: He who is not a good servant will not be a good master.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: The eye of the master will do more work than both his hands.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: One can be the master of what one does, but never of what one feels.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.quote: No man is good enough to be another's master.
quotes.author: William Morris

quotes.quote: Money is the excellent slave and a horrible master.
quotes.author: P. T. Barnum

quotes.quote: Any person capable of angering you becomes your master.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Better to master one mountain than a thousand foothills.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: The master's tools will never dismantle the master's house.
quotes.author: Audre Lorde

quotes.quote: You are not the victim of the world, but rather the master of your own destiny. It is your choices and decisions that determine your destiny.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: The master is not the one who teaches; it's the one who suddenly learns.
quotes.author: Joao Guimaraes Rosa

quotes.quote: You are the master of your destiny. You can influence, direct and control your own environment. You can make your life what you want it to be.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: We are masters of the unsaid words, but slaves of those we let slip out.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: You gave too much rein to your imagination. Imagination is a good servant, and a bad master. The simplest explanation is always the most likely.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: The trouble with anger is, it gets hold of you. And then you aren't the master of yourself anymore. Anger is. And when anger is the boss, you get unintended consequences.
quotes.author: Jeanne Duprau

quotes.quote: Face your deficiencies and acknowledge them; but do not let them master you. Let them teach you patience, sweetness, insight.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Man has demonstrated that he is master of everything except his own nature.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: Pride is the master sin of the devil, and the devil is the father of lies.
quotes.author: Edwin Hubbell Chapin

quotes.quote: The master of the garden is the one who waters it, trims the branches, plants the seeds, and pulls the weeds. If you merely stroll through the garden, you are but an acolyte.
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: Man is the master of the unspoken word, which spoken, is master of him.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: In order to become the master, the politician poses as the servant.
quotes.author: Charles De Gaulle

quotes.quote: One heart cannot serve two masters.
quotes.author: Robin LaFevers

quotes.quote: Emotions will either serve or master, depending on who is in charge.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: A man who is master of himself can end a sorrow as easily as he can invent a pleasure.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: To know how to grow old is the master work of wisdom, and one of the most difficult chapters in the great art of living.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: Mastermind and collaborate with other smart entrepreneurs if they have futures that are even bigger than their present.
quotes.author: Yanik Silver

quotes.quote: The mastermind, the man with the plan.
quotes.author: Mikey Way

quotes.quote: The mastermind principle cannot obtain where perfect harmony does not prevail.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: To think health when surrounded by the appearances of disease or to think riches when in the midst of the appearances of poverty requires power, but whoever acquires this power becomes a mastermind. That person can conquer fate and can have what he or she wants.
quotes.author: Wallace D. Wattles

quotes.quote: There's a magic that comes from playing entirely to who you are. I've got my specialist subject - in the Mastermind sense - and I wouldn't change it, or who I am.
quotes.author: Chris Ofili

quotes.quote: My dad is a marketing mastermind.
quotes.author: Serena Williams

quotes.quote:
You might be this mastermind who can make
awe-inspiring machines and engineer marvels
that leave others gaping.
quotes.author: Maheen Salman Ahmad

quotes.quote: Intellectuals solve problems, geniuses prevent them.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Everyone is born a genius, but the process of living de-geniuses them.
quotes.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

quotes.quote: Genius... is the capacity to see ten things where the ordinary man sees one.
quotes.author: Ezra Pound

quotes.quote: The difference between stupidity and genius is that genius has its limits.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: There is no great genius without a mixture of madness.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Any intelligent fool can make things bigger and more complex… It takes a touch of genius – and a lot of courage to move in the opposite direction.
quotes.author: Ernst. F. Schumacher

quotes.quote: Everyone is a genius at least once a year. The real geniuses simply have their bright ideas closer together.
quotes.author: George Christoph Lichtenberg

quotes.quote: Hear genius hear thy children's cry not always should thou love to brood.
quotes.author: Robert Southey

quotes.quote: Hear genius hear thy children's cry not always should thou love to brood.
quotes.author: Robert Southey

quotes.quote: Where seas of sand toss their hot surges high nor genius should the midnight song.
quotes.author: Robert Southey

quotes.quote: Ah linger not to hear the song genius avenge thy children's wrong.
quotes.author: Robert Southey

quotes.quote: Who in a troubled world unjust and blind bears genius treasure of celestial birth.
quotes.author: Victor Marie Hugo

quotes.quote: Pursue the son of genius he will rise.
quotes.author: Victor Marie Hugo

quotes.quote: Command the roof great genius and from thence into this house pour down thy influence.
quotes.author: Robert Herrick

quotes.quote: Conversation with a genius like mountains on his brow laurels of praise.
quotes.author: Marina Ivanovna Tsvetaeva

quotes.quote: Genius a hundred generations have gone into its making with all their love and tenderness.
quotes.author: Lucy Maud Montgomery

quotes.quote: Do I believe sayest thou Genius what the masters of wisdom would teach me.
quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.quote: Beyond genius the spirit flies, beyond genius the mood decries.
quotes.author: Kurt Philip Behm

quotes.quote: Beyond genius the heavens sing beyond genius that final thing.	Beyond genius the heavens sing beyond genius that final thing.
quotes.author: Kurt Philip Behm

quotes.quote: Genius feels no dread within his heart at the tempest nor the rain.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Nature glows in every classic line still genius dictates still the verse is thine.
quotes.author: Mary Darby Robinson

quotes.quote: Taste is a rare to be found as a true genius. That most men are born with some taste.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: The honors due to real genius share.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: A masterpiece doesn't so much transcend its time as perpetuate it; it keeps its moment alive.
quotes.author: Arlene Croce

quotes.quote: A masterpiece is a piece that masters things.
quotes.author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

quotes.quote: Each species is a masterpiece, a creation assembled with extreme care and genius.
quotes.author: E. O. Wilson

quotes.quote: A true masterpiece does not tell everything.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: A masterpiece does not unfurl its wings immediately. It takes time. It will fly when it is ready.
quotes.author: A.D. Posey

quotes.quote: The Universe is the most extraordinary masterpiece ever constructed by nobody.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Every great masterpiece is a purification of the world.
quotes.author: Andre Malraux

quotes.quote: Man is a masterpiece of creation, if only because no amount of determinism can prevent him from believing that he acts as a free being.
quotes.author: Georg C. Lichtenberg

quotes.quote: Masterpieces are no more than the shipwrecked flotsam of great minds.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: The great and glorious masterpiece of humanity is to know how to live with a purpose.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: Make your lives a masterpiece, you only get one canvas.
quotes.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

quotes.quote: Our life is our masterpiece, it's up to us on how we paint our story. It's up to us how we see the substances we have. At the end of the day, all our accumulated stuff will be presented as our greatest piece of work.
quotes.author: Nathaniel E. Quimada

quotes.quote: A masterpiece is something said once and for all, stated, finished, so that it's there complete in the mind, if only at the back.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: The female body is a masterpiece. Everyone likes to look at the female body, especially in dynamic, athletic sport.
quotes.author: Natalie Cook

quotes.quote: Respect the masterpiece. It is true reverence to man. There is no quality so great, none so much needed now.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.quote: The secret to a masterpiece is 10 percent inspiration and 90 percent perspiration.
quotes.author: Mario Vargas Llosa

quotes.quote: The art of achievement is the art of making life - your life - a masterpiece.
quotes.author: Wilferd Peterson

quotes.quote: Life is like a painting; make yours a masterpiece.
quotes.author: Vikrmn

quotes.quote: When love and skill work together, expect a masterpiece.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: A masterpiece doesn't push you around. It lets you make up your own mind about what it means - and change it as often as you like.
quotes.author: Terry Teachout

quotes.quote: A masterpiece of fiction is an original world and as such is not likely to fit the world of the reader.
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.quote: The Universe is a masterpiece of abundance.
quotes.author: Rhonda Byrne

quotes.quote: You have to color outside the lines once in a while if you want to make your life a masterpiece.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Of all those arts in which the wise excel, Nature's chief masterpiece is writing well.
quotes.author: Andre Breton

quotes.quote: Art begins with resistance - at the point where resistance is overcome. No human masterpiece has ever been created without great labor.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: It is easy to take a photograph, but it is harder to make a masterpiece in photography than in any other art medium.
quotes.author: Ansel Adams

quotes.quote: All the masterpieces of art contain both light and shadow. A happy life is not one filled with only sunshine, but one which uses both light and shadow to produce beauty.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Make your life a masterpiece; imagine no limitations on what you can be, have or do.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: A book is never a masterpiece it becomes one. Genius is the talent of a dead man.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: The true function of a writer is to produce a masterpiece and no other task is of any consequence.
quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

quotes.quote: Ah, mastery... what a profoundly satisfying feeling when one finally gets on top of a new set of skills... and then sees the light under the new door those skills can open, even as another door is closing.
quotes.author: Gail Sheehy

quotes.quote: Mastery is not a question of genetics of luck, but of following your natural inclinations and the deep desires that stirs you from within.
quotes.author: Robert Greene

quotes.quote: You become a master in what you repeatedly do in consistency. Mastery is not born; it is acquired. It is not blood-linked; it is skill-learnt!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: To arrive at a place called Mastery, you must commit to daily and rigorous practice. Enjoy practising your craft for its own sake without turning your attention to your ultimate destination. Understand, once and for all, that the journey is as important as the destination.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: Mastery is not a function of I.Q. or natural talent or wealthy parents who can send you to the best school, but rather the result of going through a learning process, fueled by the desire to grow and the persistence to push past any obstacles.
quotes.author: Robert Greene

quotes.quote: People with a high level of personal mastery are able to consistently realize the results that matter most deeply to them-in effect, they approach their life as an artist would approach a work of art. The do that by becoming committed to their own lifelong learning.
quotes.author: Peter Senge

quotes.quote: Only one who devotes himself to a cause with his whole strength and soul can be a true master. For this reason mastery demands all of a person.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: We fail to realize that mastery is not about perfection. It’s about a process, a journey. The master is the one who stays on the path day after day, year after year. The master is the one who is willing to try, and fail, and try again, for as long as he or she lives.
quotes.author: George Leonard

quotes.quote: Perhaps the best you can hope for on the master’s journey, whether your art be management or marriage, badminton or ballet—is to cultivate the mind and heart from the beginning and at every stage along the way. For the master, surrender means there are no experts. There are only learners.
quotes.author: George Leonard

quotes.quote: To become a master at any skill, it takes the total effort of your: heart, mind, and soul working together in tandem.
quotes.author: Maurice Young

quotes.quote: You must immerse yourself in your work. You have to fall in love with your work … You must dedicate your life to mastering your skill. That’s the secret of success.
quotes.author: Chef Jiro

quotes.quote: A step towards what you fear is a mile towards mastering it.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: When what we have mastered becomes mundane, we feel pain. The antidote is pursuit.
quotes.author: Kelsey Ramsden

quotes.quote: The Advanced Level is Mastery of the Basics.
quotes.author: Ray Mancini

quotes.quote: Champions realise that defeat - and learning from it even more than from winning - is part of the path to mastery.
quotes.author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quotes.quote: If people knew how hard I had to work to gain my mastery, it would not seem so wonderful at all.
quotes.author: Michelangelo Buonarroti

quotes.quote: In order to keep himself at the top of his condition, to obtain complete mastery of all his powers and possibilities, a man must be good to himself mentally; he must think well of himself.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: Creativity follows mastery, so mastery of skills is the first priority for young talent.
quotes.author: Benjamin Bloom

quotes.quote: Technical skill is mastery of complexity, while creativity is mastery of simplicity.
quotes.author: Christopher Zeeman

quotes.quote: Self-Mastery is the characteristic column post of Intellectuality.
quotes.author: Stargee Noel-Bois

quotes.quote: Mastery... is to work toward simplicity; replace complex technology with knowledge, hard work, and skill.
quotes.author: Yvon Chouinard

quotes.quote: Mastery in work and in life is about committing yourself to being excellent in everything you do, no matter how small and no matter if no one is watching. Do you practice excellence in your most private moments?
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: Self-discipline begins with the mastery of your thoughts. If you don't control what you think, you can't control what you do. Simply, self-discipline enables you to think first and act afterward.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: We generally follow what others have done, performing the accepted exercises for these skills. This is the path of amateurs. To attain mastery, you must adopt what we shall call Resistance Practice. The principle is simple – you go in the opposite direction of all of your natural tendencies when it comes to practice.
quotes.author: Robert Greene

quotes.quote: If you intend to take the journey of mastery, the best thing you can do is to arrange for first-rate instruction.
quotes.author: George Leonard

quotes.quote: What we call 'mastery' can be defined as that mysterious process through which what is at first difficult or even impossible becomes easy and pleasurable through diligent, patient, long-term practice.
quotes.author: George Leonard

quotes.quote: Master yourself and you master your environment! Such is the nature of wisdom.
quotes.author: Nicole Williams

quotes.quote: Order and simplification are the first steps towards mastery of a subject
quotes.author: Thomas Mann

quotes.quote: The fearful seek to serve themselves by mastering the world, while the fearless seek to serve the world by mastering themselves.
quotes.author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quotes.quote: Mastery is great, but even that is not enough. You have to be able to change course without a bead of sweat, or remorse.
quotes.author: Tom Peters

quotes.quote: When the thought and the feeling match each other, that becomes the wisdom.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: When what we say doesn't match how we act, we are lying to ourselves.
quotes.author: Cortney S. Warren

quotes.quote: Don't downgrade your dream to match your reality. Upgrade your faith to match your destiny.
quotes.author: DeVon Franklin

quotes.quote: Discipline imposed from the outside eventually defeats when it is not matched by desire from within.
quotes.author: Dawson Trotman

quotes.quote: Offer a vibration that matches your desire rather than offering a vibration that keeps matching what-is.
quotes.author: Esther Hicks
