quotes.quote: We shall match your capacity to inflict suffering with our capacity to endure suffering. Do to us what you will and we shall continue to love you.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Everthing is energy and that is all there is to it. Match the frequency of the reality you want and you cannot help but get that reality. It can be no other way. This is not philosophy. This is Physics.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: A strong man doesn't have to be dominant toward a woman. He doesn't match his strength against a woman weak with love for him. He matches it against the world.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Life is so constructed, that the event does not, cannot, will not, match the expectation.
quotes.author: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.quote: Make sure that the benefits gained match or excel the efforts made.
quotes.author: Steven Redhead

quotes.quote: Tricks and trust cannot match each other since one has no time to build certitude, and trust while playing the tricks.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: We must promote solid traits such as work ethics, a dignified lifestyle, matching actions to rhetoric, performance rather than grandstanding.
quotes.author: Gloria Macapagal Arroyo

quotes.quote: Great love isn't two people finding the perfect match in one another. Great love is two people making the choice to be a match.
quotes.author: Lysa TerKeurst

quotes.quote: The goal of life is to make your heartbeat match the beat of the universe, to match your nature with nature.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Pearls of wisdom need matching hearrings.
quotes.author: Figuratio

quotes.quote: One of the most important tricks for maximizing your productivity involves matching your mental state to the task.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: When a match has equal partners then I fear not.
quotes.author: Aechylus

quotes.quote: Mere experience, if it is not matched by deep concentration, does not translate into excellence.
quotes.author: Matthew Syed

quotes.quote: Our similarities bring us to a common ground; Our differences allow us to be fascinated by each other.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: Similarity in character not personality means only compatibility between two individuals.
quotes.author: Anuj Somany

quotes.quote: The courage to speak must be matched by the wisdom to listen.
quotes.author: Charles E. McKenzie

quotes.quote: A gentleman would be ashamed should his deeds not match his words.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: In matching your wits against yourself you take on the shrewdest and wiliest antagonist you can have, and consequently a victorious outcome in this duel of wits brings a great feeling of triumph.
quotes.author: Dorothea Brande

quotes.quote: All of us failed to match our dreams of perfection. So I rate us on the basis of our splendid failure to do the impossible.
quotes.author: William Faulkner

quotes.quote: The mind is no match with the heart in persuasion constitutionality is no match with compassion.
quotes.author: Everett Dirksen

quotes.quote: Imitate until you emulate; match and surpass those who launched you. It's the highest form of thankfulness.
quotes.author: Mark Victor Hansen

quotes.quote: Competition is what keeps me playing the psychological warfare of matching skill against skill and wit against wit.
quotes.author: Lou Brock

quotes.quote: Nature doesn't see things through the prism of good or bad. It rewards efficiency. That is the simplicity of evolution, matching design to environment.
quotes.author: Blake Crouch

quotes.quote: Many people who hold giver values in life choose matching as their primary reciprocity style at work, seeking an even balance of give and take.
quotes.author: Adam Grant

quotes.quote: You need not to find somebody with matching wavelengths, the Universe is there to conspire that to happen.
quotes.author: Shreya Gupta

quotes.quote: Seeking happiness in material things is a sure way of being unhappy.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: Renounce all those material things that you gained by exploiting other human beings.
quotes.author: Tracy Chapman

quotes.quote: If money and material things become the center of our lives, they seize us and make us slaves.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: You can't substitute material things for love or for gentleness or for tenderness or for a sense of comradeship
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: The love for material things grows like a fungus in the soul and destroys the loveliness of the human heart utterly.
quotes.author: Caryll Houselander

quotes.quote: Solicitude for material things distracts the soul and divides it. The devil seizes the divided soul and drags it to hell.
quotes.author: Anthony

quotes.quote: If pursuing material things becomes your only goal, you will fail in so many ways. Besides, in time all material things go away.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Those too impressed with material things cannot hold their place n the world of culture; they are relegated to inferiority and ultimate death.
quotes.author: Alexander Crummell

quotes.quote: I am convinced that material things can contribute a lot to making one's life pleasant, but, basically, if you do not have very good friends and relatives who matter to you, life will be really empty and sad and material things cease to be important.
quotes.author: David Rockefeller

quotes.quote: We too often let the material things serve as indicators that we're doing well, even though something inside us tells us that were not doing our best. That we are avoiding that which is hard, but also necessary. That we are shrinking from rather than rising to the challenges of the age.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Any so-called material thing that you want is merely a symbol: you want it not for itself, but because it will content your spirit for the moment.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: An object in possession seldom retains the same charm that it had in pursuit.
quotes.author: Pliny The Younger

quotes.quote: The power of material things, to bestow happiness, to bring joy into the life is tremendously exaggerated. But The right mental attitude for example gratitude that things are not worse, the trained mind the right habits of thought - lifeskills, will bring to us the best there is in the universe.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: If we could put material things into their proper place, and use them without being attached to them, how much freer we would be. Then we wouldn't burden ourselves with things we don't need. If we could only realize that we are all cells in the same body of humanity - then we would think of having enough for all, not too much for some and too little for others.
quotes.author: Peace Pilgrim

quotes.quote: We know that material things don't offer contentment, but we still buy more-more of the props and gadgets our culture tells us we must have in order to be happy and "happening." Our addiction to consumption distracts us from seeing that we are disconnected from ourselves, from our truth and from one another. Any euphoria we gain from our material gains is fleeting at best.
quotes.author: Susan L. Taylor

quotes.quote: A piece of material has a life. You must never upset it if you want the material to speak.
quotes.author: Hubert de Givenchy

quotes.quote: Possession of material riches, without inner peace, is like dying of thirst while bathing in a lake. If material poverty is to be avoided, spiritual poverty is to be abhorred. For it is spiritual poverty, not material lack, that lies at the core of all human suffering.
quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.quote: The older you get and the wealthier you get, the more complicated life becomes. That's why I have as few material assets as possible. Every material thing you have is more hassle.
quotes.author: Peter Hargreaves

quotes.quote: Piling up material goods cannot fill the emptiness of lives which have no confidence or purpose.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: You lose so many material possessions being on the road. You can't get too attached to stuff and you have to remember that people must never become possessions. People are spheres intersecting. You have to make sure that one sphere doesn't ever take over the other. Individuality is absolutely the most important thing
quotes.author: Brian Molko

quotes.quote: None of those material possessions do anything to make your life any better.... I know a lot of people who have a lot of everything, and they're absolutely the most miserable people in the world. So it won't do anything for you unless you're a happy person and can have peace with yourself.
quotes.author: Lenny Kravitz

quotes.quote: Our material possessions, like our joys, are enhanced in value by being shared. Hoarded and unimproved property can only afford satisfaction to a miser.
quotes.author: George D. Prentice

quotes.quote: Inordinate desire for material possessions can become an obsession that consumes our thoughts, drains our resources, and leads to unhappiness.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.quote: There may be community of material possessions, but there can never be community of love or esteem.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: You cannot enrich yourself with material possessions. However, you can enrich yourself by giving yourself away with love, service, kindness, compassion, and courage.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: No level of pleasure from any material possession compares to the feeling of unconditional happiness.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: When you define yourself with your material possessions, you would likely attract those who would do anything humanly possible to come into your life to take advantage of you.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: Material things don't matter.
quotes.author: John Catsimatidis

quotes.quote: It's nice to have material things but they're very superficial aren't they?
quotes.author: Mark Addy

quotes.quote: There's nothing wrong with material things as long as you don't lie, cheat and steal.
quotes.author: Bikram Choudhury

quotes.quote: Materialistic things bring forth some pleasurable moments, but never a sample of happiness.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: The prospect of being immortal doesn't excite me, but the prospect of being a materialistic idol for four years does appeal.
quotes.author: Marc Bolan

quotes.quote: If I'm a lush at anything, it's food and drink. I'm not materialistic in any way, but I value food.
quotes.author: Hugh Jackman

quotes.quote: As human beings, we're very materialistic and have all this stuff furs and cars and diamonds and money.
quotes.author: Smokey Robinson

quotes.quote: I'm not materialistic. I believe in presents from the heart, like a drawing that a child does.
quotes.author: Victoria Beckham

quotes.quote: Anything you cannot relinquish when it has outlived its usefulness possesses you, and in this materialistic age a great many of us are possessed by our possessions.
quotes.author: Mildred Lisette Norman

quotes.quote: We are too involved in materialistic things, and they don't satisfy us. The loving relationships we have, the universe around us, we take these things for granted.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: The very poor are strictly materialistic. It takes money to be a mystic.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: A materialistic world will not be won to Christ by a materialistic church.
quotes.author: David Platt

quotes.quote: The fact remains that the materialistic view is a truncated view of reality.
quotes.author: Stephen C. Meyer

quotes.quote: The entire money structure and materialistic society is a false society.
quotes.author: Jacque Fresco

quotes.quote: If you are really a product of a materialistic universe, how is it that you don't feel at home there?
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: A materialistic person is ruthless with other people but kind to himself. A spiritual person is ruthless with himself but kind to everybody else.
quotes.author: Jaggi Vasudev

quotes.quote: Today, society is sacrificing love, values and dharma in its pursuit of materialistic gains.
quotes.author: Mata Amritanandamayi

quotes.quote: The materialistic point of view in psychology can claim, at best, only the value of an heuristic hypothesis.
quotes.author: Wilhelm Wundt

quotes.quote: The adornment of the body is a human need. I don't see anything superficial about it unless your life becomes very materialistic.
quotes.author: David LaChapelle

quotes.quote: If materialistic knowledge is power, it is not wisdom. It is but a blind force.
quotes.author: Mary Baker Eddy

quotes.quote: Part of our problem with debt is that we have confused needs with wants. Yesterday's luxuries are today's necessities.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: It is not wrong to want to work and earn a decent living: in fact, God has given work to us. But this legitimate desire can very easily cross the line into greed— especially in our materialistic society.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: For many people, money is an index of how successful one is, and so, they fear competition and attach themselves to their shadows. Such a path drives one towards materialism rather than spiritualism.
quotes.author: Robin Sacredfire

quotes.quote: Yes, of course, this age is materialistic, but the only way to counteract it is to create spiritual things. Don't worry about materialism too much. Create and stir other people to create.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: The essence of life today is not having— it is having to have.
quotes.author: David Hansen

quotes.quote: Why are we so blind? That which we improve, we have; that which we hoard is not for ourselves.
quotes.author: Dorothee Deluzy

quotes.quote: The luxuries of the few were becoming the necessities of the many.
quotes.author: Flora Thompson

quotes.quote: False values begin with the worship of things.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.quote: If you think of yourself as the woman in the Cartier watch and the Hermes scarf, a house fire will destroy not only your possessions but yourself.
quotes.author: Linda Henley

quotes.quote: A commercial society urges its citizens to be responsible for things, but not for people. It is the unquestioned assumption of a mercantile culture that things need and deserve attention, but that people can take care of themselves.
quotes.author: Margaret Halsey

quotes.quote: There is nowhere to go / Corrupted ethics by the major brands / Image is power / Substance of person / No longer matters in this world/
quotes.author: Alan Izod

quotes.quote: I'm done chasing diamonds rollies or cars / Materialistic aims will have me behind bars / The love of money the root to all evil / Could eat from the tree.
quotes.author: Divita Bonheur

quotes.quote: Our materialistic desires make us all think that we need / A lot more than our families giving the food they hunt, they feed.
quotes.author: Anna Rita Lopes

quotes.quote: Pregnancy seemed like a tremendous abdication of control. Something growing inside you which would eventually usurp your life.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: Giving birth should be your greatest achievement not your greatest fear.
quotes.author: Jane Weideman

quotes.quote: In pregnancy, there are two bodies, one inside the other. Two people live under one skin. When so much of life is dedicated to maintaining our integrity as distinct beings, this bodily tandem is an uncanny fact.
quotes.author: Joan Raphael-Leff

quotes.quote: Whether your pregnancy was meticulously planned, medically coaxed, or happened by surprise, one thing is certain â€“ your life will never be the same.
quotes.author: Catherine Jones

quotes.quote: Maternity is a glorious thing, since all mankind has been conceived, born, and nourished of women. All human laws should encourage the multiplication of families.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: Being pregnant means every day is another day closer to meeting the other love of my life.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: There is a sanctity involved with bringing a child into this world, it is better than bombing one out of it.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: The moment a child is born, the mother is also born. She never existed before. The woman existed, but the mother, never. A mother is something absolutely new.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: Being pregnant is a pretty tough gig. You're trying to grow a whole other person, you're tired, your feet hurt, and you're a little scared about the big changes you know are coming.
quotes.author: Jennifer McGuire

quotes.quote: A mother s joy begins when new life is stirring inside when a tiny heartbeat is heard for the very first time and a playful kick reminds her that she is never alone.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Expecting a baby is just the beginning of expecting some of life's most precious moments.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Life is always a rich and steady time when you are waiting for something to happen or to hatch.
quotes.author: E.B. White

quotes.quote: Pregnancy is a kind of miracle. Especially so in that it proves that a man and woman can conspire to force God to create a new soul.
quotes.author: Robert Anton Wilson

quotes.quote: Pregnancy is a process that invites you to surrender to the unseen force behind all life.
quotes.author: Judy Ford

quotes.quote: Birth is about making mothers... strong, competent, capable mothers who trust themselves and know their inner strength.
quotes.author: Barbara Katz Rothman

quotes.quote: Being pregnant was a lot like being a child again. There was always someone telling you what to do.
quotes.author: Emily Oster

quotes.quote: The life of a mother is the life of a child: you are two blossoms on a single branch.
quotes.author: Karen Maezen Miller

quotes.quote: Maternity is a matter of fact, paternity is a matter of opinion.
quotes.author: PROVERBS

quotes.quote: To be pregnant is to be vitally alive, thoroughly woman, and distressingly inhabited. Soul and spirit are stretched along with body making pregnancy a time of transition, growth, and profound beginnings.
quotes.author: Anne Christian Buchanan

quotes.quote: Being pregnant is all about being fully alive, it is about being a complete woman, and it is a period of growing, transition, and of new beginnings in the journey of life.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If pregnancy were a book they would cut out the last two chapters.
quotes.author: Nora Ephron

quotes.quote: There is no way out of the experience except through it, because it is not really your experience at all but the baby's. Your body is the child's instrument of birth.
quotes.author: Penelope Leach

quotes.quote: Pregnancy seems designed to prepare you for life as a mother. You start making sacrifices nine months before the child is born, so by the time they put in an appearance you are used to giving things up for them.
quotes.author: Brett Kiellerop

quotes.quote: Pregnancy can be a time when you take tremendous pleasure in eating, not only because you may enjoy food more but also because you know that it is nourishing both you and your baby.
quotes.author: Martha Rose Shulman

quotes.quote: Giving birth and being born brings us into the essence of creation, where the human spirit is courageous and bold and the body, a miracle of wisdom.
quotes.author: HARRIETTE HARTIGAN

quotes.quote: Part of being a parent is rolling with the punches, so consider an unexpected pregnancy the universe's way of helping you to learn to do that.
quotes.author: Heather Wittenberg

quotes.quote: Being pregnant is an occupational hazard of being a wife.
quotes.author: Queen Victoria

quotes.quote: Maternity is on the face of it an unsociable experience. The selfishness that a woman has learned to stifle or to dissemble where she alone is concerned, blooms freely and unashamed on behalf of her offspring.
quotes.author: Emily James Smith Putnam

quotes.quote: Truthfully, being pregnant is changing me as a person. Each day is part of this amazing journey that has completely shifted the focus of my life and made me reevaluate my personal and professional goals.
quotes.author: Holly Madison

quotes.quote: The most important thing she'd learned over the years was that there was no way to be a perfect mother and a million ways to be a good one.
quotes.author: Jill Churchill

quotes.quote: Math is like going to the gym for your brain. It sharpens your mind.
quotes.author: Danica Mckellar

quotes.quote: Pure mathematics is, in its way, the poetry of logical ideas.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Math is sometimes called the science of patterns.
quotes.author: Ronald Graham

quotes.quote: Mathematics is a place where you can do things which you can't do in the real world.
quotes.author: Marcus Du Sautoy

quotes.quote: But mathematics is the sister, as well as the servant, of the arts and is touched with the same madness and genius.
quotes.author: Harold Marston Morse

quotes.quote: Mathematics expresses values that reflect the cosmos, including orderliness, balance, harmony, logic, and abstract beauty.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Mathematics is the most beautiful and most powerful creation of the human spirit.
quotes.author: Stefan Banach

quotes.quote: The essence of mathematics lies in its freedom.
quotes.author: Georg Ferdinand Ludwig Philipp Cantor

quotes.quote: Mathematics may be defined as the subject in which we never know what we are talking about, nor whether what we are saying is true.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: As far as the laws of mathematics refer to reality, they are not certain; as far as they are certain, they do not refer to reality.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Mathematics takes us into the region of absolute necessity, to which not only the actual word, but every possible word, must conform.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Do not imagine that mathematics is hard and crabbed, and repulsive to common sense. It is merely the etherealization of common sense.
quotes.author: William Thomson

quotes.quote: Mathematics is a game played according to certain simple rules with meaningless marks on paper.
quotes.author: David Hilbert

quotes.quote: Mathematics is written for mathematicians.
quotes.author: Nicolaus Copernicus

quotes.quote: Mathematics is the music of reason.
quotes.author: James Joseph Sylvester

quotes.quote: Mathematics allows for no hypocrisy and no vagueness.
quotes.author: Stendhal

quotes.quote: The only way to learn mathematics is to do mathematics.
quotes.author: Paul Halmos

quotes.quote: In mathematics you don't understand things. You just get used to them.
quotes.author: Johann Von Neumann

quotes.quote: The mathematics is not there till we put it there.
quotes.author: Sir Arthur Eddington

quotes.quote: Mathematics, rightly viewed, possesses not only truth, but supreme beauty - a beauty cold and austere, like that of sculpture.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: You can not apply mathematics as long as words still becloud reality.
quotes.author: Hermann Weyl

quotes.quote: The art of doing mathematics consists in finding that special case which contains all the germs of generality.
quotes.author: David Hilbert

quotes.quote: The power of mathematics is often to change one thing into another, to change geometry into language.
quotes.author: Marcus Du Sautoy

quotes.quote: Mathematics knows no races or geographic boundaries; for mathematics, the cultural world is one country.
quotes.author: David Hilbert

quotes.quote: Math is the great equalizer. If you can do the numbers, the boys have to respect you.
quotes.author: Audrey Maclean

quotes.quote: The study of mathematics, like the Nile, begins in minuteness but ends in magnificence.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: In mathematics the art of proposing a question must be held of higher value than solving it.
quotes.author: Georg Ferdinand Ludwig Philipp Cantor

quotes.quote: Mathematics is like childhood diseases. The younger you get it, the better.
quotes.author: Arnold Sommerfeld

quotes.quote: Mathematics is the key and door to the sciences.
quotes.author: Galileo Galilei

quotes.quote: The study of mathematics is, if an unprofitable, a perfectly harmless and innocent occupation.
quotes.author: G. H. Hardy

quotes.quote: Mathematicians enjoy thinking about the simplest possible things, and the simplest possible things are imaginary.
quotes.author: Paul Lockhart

quotes.quote: The mathematician requires tact and good taste at every step of his work, and he has to learn to trust to his own instinct to distinguish between what is really worthy of his efforts and what is not.
quotes.author: James Whitbread Lee Glaisher

quotes.quote: The mathematician's patterns, like the painter's or the poet's must be beautiful; the ideas, like the colours or the words must fit together in a harmonious way. Beauty is the first test: there is no permanent place in the world for ugly mathematics.
quotes.author: G. H. Hardy

quotes.quote: A mathematician tells you that the wall of warped space prevents the Moon from flying out of its orbit yet can't tell you why an astronaut can go back and forth across that same space.
quotes.author: Bill Gaede

quotes.quote: Mathematicians may flatter themselves that they possess new ideas which mere human language is as yet unable to express.
quotes.author: James Clerk Maxwell

quotes.quote: Mathematicians boast of their exacting achievements, but in reality they are absorbed in mental acrobatics and contribute nothing to society.
quotes.author: Ogyu Sorai

quotes.quote: A mathematician thinks that two points are enough to define a straight line, while a physicist wants more data.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A mathematician is a device for turning coffee into theorems.
quotes.author: Paul Erdos

quotes.quote: A mathematician's reputation rests on the number of bad proofs he has given.
quotes.author: Abram Samoilovitch Besicovitch

quotes.quote: Mathematicians do not study objects, but relations between objects.
quotes.author: Henri Poincare

quotes.quote: A mathematician makes plans to travel backwards in time through a wormhole to a parallel universe when he can't even make it to Mars with the fastest rocket on hand today.
quotes.author: Bill Gaede

quotes.quote: Mathematicians come to the solution of a problem by the simple arrangement of the data, and reducing the reasoning to such simple operations, to judgments so brief, that they never lose sight of the evidence that serves as their guide.
quotes.author: Antoine Lavoisier

quotes.quote: A man is like a fraction whose numerator is what he is and whose denominator is what he thinks of himself. The larger the denominator, the smaller the fraction.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: A mathematician is an individual who proves his beliefs with equations.
quotes.author: Bill Gaede

quotes.quote: It becomes the urgent duty of mathematicians, therefore, to meditate about the essence of mathematics, its motivations and goals and the ideas that must bind divergent interests together.
quotes.author: Richard Courant

quotes.quote: It is up to mathematicians to look for truth; philosophers must be content with the probable. The concern of mathematicians is to seek the truth; philosophers must be happy with the probable.
quotes.author: Giambattista Vico

quotes.quote: The mathematician's best work is art, a high perfect art, as daring as the most secret dreams of imagination, clear and limpid. Mathematical genius and artistic genius touch one another.
quotes.author: Gosta Mittag-Leffler

quotes.quote: All mathematicians share a sense of amazement over the infinite depth and the mysterious beauty and usefulness of mathematics.
quotes.author: Martin Gardner

quotes.quote: Mathematicians care no more for logic than logicians for mathematics.
quotes.author: Augustus De Morgan

quotes.quote: Mathematicians themselves set up standards of generality and elegance in their exposition which are a bar to understand.
quotes.author: Kenneth E. Boulding

quotes.quote: If anything runs deeper than a mathematician's love of variables, it's a scientist's love of constants.
quotes.author: Sam Kean

quotes.quote: Mathematicians create by acts of insights and intuition. Logic then sanctions the conquests of intuition.
quotes.author: Morris Kline

quotes.quote: A mathematician is a person who can find analogies between theorems; a better mathematician is one who can see analogies between proofs and the best mathematician can notice analogies between theories.
quotes.author: Stefan Banach

quotes.quote: Mathematicians have tried in vain to this day to discover some order in the sequence of prime numbers, and we have reason to believe that it is a mystery into which the human mind will never penetrate.
quotes.author: Leonhard Euler

quotes.quote: The life of a mathematician is dominated by an insatiable curiosity, a desire bordering on passion to solve the problems he is studying.
quotes.author: Jean Dieudonne

quotes.quote: Mathematicians are like managers they want improvement without change.
quotes.author: Edsger Dijkstra

quotes.quote: The mathematician uses an indirect definition of congruence, making use of the fact that the axiom of parallels together with an additional condition can replace the definition of congruence.
quotes.author: Hans Reichenbach

quotes.quote: Only professional mathematicians learn anything from proofs. Other people learn from explanations.
quotes.author: Ralph Boas

quotes.quote: The pure mathematician, like the musician, is a free creator of his world of ordered beauty.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Pure mathematician just love to try unsolved problems they love a challenge.
quotes.author: Andrew Wiles

quotes.quote: Mathematics as an expression of the human mind reflects the active will, the contemplative reason, and the desire for aesthetic perfection. Its basic elements are logic and intuition, analysis and construction, generality and individuality.
quotes.author: Richard Courant

quotes.quote: Pure mathematics is on the whole distinctly more useful than applied. For what is useful above all is technique, and mathematical technique is taught mainly through pure mathematics.
quotes.author: G. H. Hardy

quotes.quote: Mathematics is as much an aspect of culture as it is a collection of algorithms.
quotes.author: Carl Boyer

quotes.quote: Mathematics is a game played according to certain simple rules with meaningless marks on paper.
quotes.author: David Hilbert

quotes.quote: You can not apply mathematics as long as words still becloud reality.
quotes.author: Hermann Weyl

quotes.quote: Mathematics is the tool specially suited for dealing with abstract concepts of any kind and there is no limit to its power in this field.
quotes.author: P. Dirac.

quotes.quote: The power of mathematics is often to change one thing into another, to change geometry into language.
quotes.author: Marcus Du Sautoy

quotes.quote: Mathematics is the gate and key to science.
quotes.author: Roger Bacon

quotes.quote: God used beautiful mathematics in creating the world.
quotes.author: Paul Dirac

quotes.quote: Mathematics is a game played according to certain rules with meaningless marks on paper.
quotes.author: David Hilbert

quotes.quote: Mathematics is written for mathematicians.
quotes.author: Nicolaus Copernicus

quotes.quote: The science of pure mathematics, in its modern developments, may claim to be the most original creation of the human spirit.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: The most painful thing about mathematics is how far away you are from being able to use it after you have learned it.
quotes.author: James Newman

quotes.quote: Mathematics is concerned only with the enumeration and comparison of relations.
quotes.author: Carl Friedrich Gauss

quotes.quote: Mathematics cannot handle physical quantities like density that literally go to infinity.
quotes.author: Gregory Benford

quotes.quote: The art of doing mathematics consists in finding that special case which contains all the germs of generality.
quotes.author: David Hilbert

quotes.quote: Mathematics allows for no hypocrisy and no vagueness.
quotes.author: Stendhal

quotes.quote: Mathematics is as old as Man.
quotes.author: Stefan Banach

quotes.quote: Thus, in a sense, mathematics has been most advanced by those who distinguished themselves by intuition rather than by rigorous proofs.
quotes.author: Felix Klein

quotes.quote: What is best in mathematics deserves not merely to be learned as a task but to be assimilated as a part of daily thought, and brought again and again before the mind with ever-renewed encouragement.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Mathematics, rightly viewed, possesses not only truth, but supreme beauty.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: For the things of this world cannot be made known without a knowledge of mathematics.
quotes.author: Roger Bacon

quotes.quote: You do not study mathematics because it helps you build a bridge. You study mathematics because it is the poetry of the universe. Its beauty transcends mere things.
quotes.author: Johnathan David Farley

quotes.quote: Mathematics may be defined as the subject in which we never know what we are talking about, nor whether what we are saying is true.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Mathematics is a place where you can do things which you can't do in the real world.
quotes.author: Marcus Du Sautoy

quotes.quote: Without mathematics, there's nothing you can do. Everything around you is mathematics. Everything around you is numbers.
quotes.author: Shakuntala Devi

quotes.quote: Mathematics takes us into the region of absolute necessity, to which not only the actual word, but every possible word, must conform.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Mathematics has beauty and romance. It's not a boring place to be, the mathematical world. It's an extraordinary place; it's worth spending time there.
quotes.author: Marcus Du Sautoy

quotes.quote: Logic and mathematics are nothing but specialised linguistic structures.
quotes.author: Jean Piaget

quotes.quote: One of the most amazing things about mathematics is the people who do math aren't usually interested in application, because mathematics itself is truly a beautiful art form. It's structures and patterns, and that's what we love, and that's what we get off on.
quotes.author: Danica Mckellar

quotes.quote: Man, born of woman, has found it a hard thing to forgive her for giving him birth. The patriarchal protest against the ancient matriarch has borne strange fruit through the years.
quotes.author: Lillian Smith

quotes.quote: Motherhood has a very humanizing effect. Everything gets reduced to essentials.
quotes.author: Meryl Streep

quotes.quote: Strong women, when respected, make the whole society stronger. One must be careful with such rapid changes, though, and make an effort to preserve, at the same time, the positive traditions of Indian culture.
quotes.author: Chitra Banerjee Divakaruni

quotes.quote: The most-honored ancestors of your matriarch besmirched the season of the orange blossom.
quotes.author: Nick Bakay

quotes.quote: What is called matriarchy is simply moral anarchy, in which the mother alone remains fixed because all the fathers are fugitive and irresponsible.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Matriarchy is a time-honored staple for any writer looking to invent an exotic society.
quotes.author: Marie Brennan

quotes.quote: Our matriarchs had an interesting advantage over today's western women. Matriarchs didn't begin their marriage with love. Instead, they were taught how to love. They entered marriage with an earnest determination to grow a love that would sustain their marriage for a life time.
quotes.author: Michael Ben Zehabe

quotes.quote: The grandmother is the matriarch, and by the end she helps reunite the estranged family.
quotes.author: Steve Schirripa

quotes.quote: A strong woman is the lifeline of her family. She carries within her the power to endure pain and the courage to sacrifice. She has the power to create and nurture life. She is indeed the epitome of love and sacrifice.
quotes.author: Aarti Khurana

quotes.quote: A grandmother is a remarkable woman. She's a wonderful combination of warmth and kindness, laughter and love. She overlooks our faults, encourages our dreams, and praises our every success.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A little more matriarchy is what the world needs, and I know it. Period. Paragraph.
quotes.author: Dorothy Thompson

quotes.quote: Nobody can do for little children what grandparents do. Grandparents sort of sprinkle stardust over the lives of little children.
quotes.author: Alex Haley

quotes.quote: Grace was in all her steps, heaven in her eye, in every gesture dignity and love.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: Now, as always, the most automated appliance in a household is the mother.
quotes.author: Beverley Jones

quotes.quote: Motherhood is priced of God, at price no man may dare to lessen or misunderstand.
quotes.author: Helen Hunt Jackson

quotes.quote: Women who miscalculate are called mothers.
quotes.author: Abigail Van Buren

quotes.quote: While the matriarch operates on the basis of knowledge, the rest of the herd operates on the basis of trust.
quotes.author: Frans De Waal

quotes.quote: Dirt is matter in the wrong place.
quotes.author: Henry John Temple

quotes.quote: All that matters is love and work.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: Truth is a matter of the imagination.
quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.quote: Matter is plastic in the face of Mind.
quotes.author: Philip K. Dick

quotes.quote: What matters is how well we have loved.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Strength is a matter of the made-up mind.
quotes.author: John Beecher

quotes.quote: It matters not how long we live but how.
quotes.author: Philip James Bailey

quotes.quote: Knowledge counts but common sense matters.
quotes.author: LouAnne Johnson

quotes.quote: What matters is how many times you get up.
quotes.author: Daniel James Brown

quotes.quote: The things that matter most are not things.
quotes.author: Art Buchwald

quotes.quote: Be true to what matters most to your heart.
quotes.author: Cheryl Richardson

quotes.quote: What matters is that you never stop trying.
quotes.author: Marc Parent

quotes.quote: If nothing matters, there's nothing to save.
quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.quote: What matters is who we are, not who we beat.
quotes.author: Tom Shadyac

quotes.quote: What matters is giving over to what you love.
quotes.author: Sue Monk Kidd

quotes.quote: How you think matters. How you act matters more.
quotes.author: James Woosley

quotes.quote: Matter is spirit reduced to point of visibility.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Friends and family matter most during hard times.
quotes.author: Liz Miller

quotes.quote: What we know matters but who we are matters more.
quotes.author: Brene Brown

quotes.quote: A matter that becomes clear ceases to concern us.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Matter is spirit moving slowly enough to be seen.
quotes.author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quotes.quote: How hard you work matters more than how much you make.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.quote: Think most of what matters. Think less of what doesn't.
quotes.author: Eric Samuel Timm

quotes.quote: Dreams Matter because they push you.
quotes.author: Jelena Jankovic

quotes.quote: Everything matters. Time is precious.
quotes.author: Jessica Hagedorn

quotes.quote: What matters is the imaginative truth.
quotes.author: Edna O'Brien

quotes.quote: Life is a matter of really tough choices.
quotes.author: Joe Biden

quotes.quote: Concentrate on the things that matter to you.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Edwards

quotes.quote: What matters the most is what you do for free.
quotes.author: John Gorka

quotes.quote: Everything matters, but nothing matters very much.
quotes.author: Kathleen Winsor

quotes.quote: Maturity is that time when the mirrors in our mind turn to windows and instead of seeing the reflection of ourselves we see others.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Maturity is achieved when a person accepts life as full of tension.
quotes.author: Joshua Loth Liebman

quotes.quote: Maturity is a high price to pay for growing up.
quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

quotes.quote: Maturity is achieved when a person postpones immediate pleasures for long-term values.
quotes.author: Joshua Loth Liebman

quotes.quote: Maturity is the ability to think, speak and act your feelings within the bounds of dignity. The measure of your maturity is how spiritual you become during the midst of your frustrations.
quotes.author: Samuel Ullman

quotes.quote: Maturity is knowing when to be immature.
quotes.author: Randall Hall

quotes.quote: Maturity is the ability to reap without apology and not complain when things don't go well.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Maturity begins to grow when you can sense your concern for others outweighing your concern for yourself.
quotes.author: John MacNaughton

quotes.quote: Maturity is the capacity to endure uncertainty.
quotes.author: John Huston Finley

quotes.quote: Maturity: Be able to stick with a job until it is finished. Be able to bear an injustice without having to get even. Be able to carry money without spending it. Do your duty without being supervised.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: Maturity includes the recognition that no one is going to see anything in us that we don't see in ourselves. Stop waiting for a producer. Produce yourself.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: To make mistakes is human; to stumble is commonplace; to be able to laugh at yourself is maturity.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: I believe the sign of maturity is accepting deferred gratification.
quotes.author: Peggy Cahn

quotes.quote: Maturity consists in no longer being taken in by oneself.
quotes.author: Kajetan Von Schlaggenberg

quotes.quote: Maturity starts with the willingness to give oneself.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Elliot

quotes.quote: I guess real maturity, which most of us never achieve, is when you realize that you're not the center of the universe.
quotes.author: Katherine Paterson

quotes.quote: Age is just a number. Maturity is a choice.
quotes.author: Harry Styles

quotes.quote: Maturity is not when we start speaking big things. It is when we start understanding small things..
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A person's maturity consists in having found again the seriousness one had as a child, at play.
quotes.author: Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Age is no guarantee of maturity.
quotes.author: Lawana Blackwell

quotes.quote: Maturity comes not with age but with the acceptance of responsibility. You are only young once but immaturity can last a lifetime!
quotes.author: Edwin Louis Cole

quotes.quote: Maturity is often more absurd than youth and very frequently is most unjust to youth.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: Maturity, one discovers, has everything to do with the acceptance of not knowing.
quotes.author: Mark Z. Danielewski

quotes.quote: Maturity is when your world opens up and you realize that you are not the center of it.
quotes.author: M.J. Croan

quotes.quote: Youth ends when egotism does; maturity begins when one lives for others.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.quote: Maturity is the moment one regains one's innocence.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: Maturity is so often considered to be synonymous with 'adult. But I truly feel that maturity may be defined by the ability to be both an adult and a child.
quotes.author: Gina Marinello

quotes.quote: Maturity is only a short break in adolescence.
quotes.author: Jules Feiffer

quotes.quote: Youth condemns; maturity condones.
quotes.author: Amy Lowell

quotes.quote: Age' is the acceptance of a term of years. But maturity is the glory of years.
quotes.author: Martha Graham

quotes.quote: History will dictate what my legacy is. And 'maverick' is fine, because I am.
quotes.author: Al Davis

quotes.quote: Maverick is a word which appeals to me more than misfit. Maverick is active, misfit is passive.
quotes.author: Alan Rickman

quotes.quote: There is a madness in me that does not follow society
quotes.author: Avijeet Das

quotes.quote: I may be a maverick, but it doesn't mean I like playing tricks.
quotes.author: Chen Guangbiao

quotes.quote: I always wanted to be an independent maverick, writing plays and putting them on myself.
quotes.author: Christian McKay

quotes.quote: There is a piece of me that likes to fondly imagine my maverick and rebellious nature. But, more accurately, I like to have a nice and cosy institution that I can rub up against a little bit.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: Computer programming has always been a self-taught, maverick occupation.
quotes.author: Ellen Ullman

quotes.quote: Be individual, break free from the flock to avoid the predictable midsummer haircut.
quotes.author: Fennel Hudson

quotes.quote: Taking risks, breaking the rules, and being a maverick have always been important but today they are more crucial than ever.
quotes.author: Gary Hamel

quotes.quote: Heart is what drives us and determines our fate. That is what I need for my characters in my books: a passionate heart. I need mavericks, dissidents, adventurers, outsiders and rebels, who ask questions, bend the rules and take risks.
quotes.author: Isabel Allende

quotes.quote: Anyone who strays too far from the majority view or the conventional wisdom is bound to be labeled "arrogant," "a maverick," "a Wildman," "weird," or even "crazy."
quotes.author: John Eliot

quotes.quote: The whole world loves a maverick and the whole world wants the maverick to achieve something nobler than simple rebellion.
quotes.author: Kevin Patterson

quotes.quote: The kind of people I look for to fill top management spots are the eager beavers, the mavericks. These are the guys who try to do more than they're expected to do - they always reach.
quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

quotes.quote: I'm a maverick.
quotes.author: Logan Paul

quotes.quote: Yes, he would be gone, but she knew now what it meant to love. She might not know what it meant to be loved, but loving was almost as good.
quotes.author: Lora Leigh

quotes.quote: When I got to the Mavericks people were all giving me advice - change this, change that - and one thing that I didn't do was fire anybody.
quotes.author: Mark Cuban

quotes.quote: Weeds are stubborn. Weeds are independent. Weeds aren't tolerated.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: I would summarise my politics very simply as the maverick left and proud.
quotes.author: Mary Beard

quotes.quote: You don't have to be a creative maverick to have a troubled mind. You just have to be human. There is no 'us' and 'them.' No one is one hundred per cent healthy, physically or mentally.
quotes.author: Matt Haig

quotes.quote: Innovation is deviance which means that the rebellious personality is a natural resource for practical creativity. As an innovator, you need to reject the old to establish a new, better, status quo. And one of the most powerful sources of newness is the rebel or maverick, mind.
quotes.author: Max McKeown

quotes.quote: The films that I really enjoy now are films that are made by, for wont of a better word, mavericks.
quotes.author: Peter Mullan

quotes.quote: I'm a maverick. I've always been a maverick.
quotes.author: Sonny Bono

quotes.quote: Someone once described me as a maverick and that's what I would say. I'm a maverick not by choice but by conviction.
quotes.author: Van Morrison

quotes.quote: My main motivation is not to get bored. I'm just hoping I get a vaguely maverick reputation.
quotes.author: Vikram Seth

quotes.quote: How you gather, manage and use intel in life determines whether you win or lose. That's the # 1 rule for the mavericks in business.
quotes.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

quotes.quote: Lots of people go mad in January. Not as many as in May, of course. Nor June. But January is your third most common month for madness.
quotes.author: Karen Joy Fowler

quotes.quote: Make hay in May for you may never know what June is coming with and you may never know what July will present! When you see May, make hay!
quotes.author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quotes.quote: Ah, in those earliest days of love how naturally the kisses spring into life! So closely, in their profusion, do they crowd together that lovers would find it as hard to count the kisses exchanged in an hour as to count the flowers in a meadow in May.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: I'm only wishing to go a-fishing;For this the month of May was made.
quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

quotes.quote: You are as welcome as the flowers in May.
quotes.author: Charles Macklin

quotes.quote: Tis a month before the month of May, And the spring comes slowly up this way.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: In the marvellous month of May when all the buds were bursting, then in my heart did love arise. In the marvellous month of May when all the birds were singing, then did I reveal to her my yearning and longing.
quotes.author: Heinrich Heine

quotes.quote: May, more than any other month of the year, wants us to feel most alive.
quotes.author: Fennel Hudson

quotes.quote: Another May new buds and flowers shall bring: Ah! why has happiness no second Spring?
quotes.author: Charlotte Smith

quotes.quote: Let all thy joys be as the month of May, And all thy days be as a marriage day.
quotes.author: Francis Quarles

quotes.quote: The month of May was come, when every lusty heart beginneth to blossom, and to bring forth fruit.
quotes.author: Thomas Malory

quotes.quote: The world's favorite season is the spring. All things seem possible in May.
quotes.author: Edwin Way Teale

quotes.quote:
I thought that spring must last forevermore;
For I was young and loved, and it was May.
quotes.author: Vera Brittain

quotes.quote: A great difference between May and Day is the M and D! Be a good Managing Director of your life each day in May.
quotes.author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quotes.quote: As full of spirit as the month of May, and as gorgeous as the sun in Midsummer.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: May: the lilacs are in bloom. Forget yourself.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: The month of May is the pleasant time; its face is beautiful; the blackbird sings his full song, the living wood is his holding, the cuckoos are singing and ever singing; there is a welcome before the brightness of the summer.
quotes.author: Lady Gregory

quotes.quote: And after winter folweth grene May.
quotes.author: Geoffrey Chaucer

quotes.quote: I curled closer to May, comforted by her warmth.
quotes.author: Kiera Cass

quotes.quote: Beneath the apple blossoms/ I go a wintry way, / For love that smiled in April / Is false to me in May.
quotes.author: Sara Teasdale

quotes.quote: May and June. Soft syllables, gentle names for the two best months in the garden year: cool, misty mornings gently burned away with a warming spring sun, followed by breezy afternoons and chilly nights. The discussion of philosophy is over; it's time for work to begin.
quotes.author: Peter Loewer

quotes.quote:
When the sun is out and the wind is still,
You're one month on in the middle of May.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: The month of May was come, when every lusty heart beginneth to blossom, and to bring forth fruit; for like as herbs and trees bring forth fruit and flourish in May, in likewise every lusty heart that is in any manner a lover, springeth and flourisheth in lusty deeds. For it giveth unto all lovers courage, that lusty month of May.
quotes.author: Sir Thomas Malory

quotes.quote: What is so sweet and dear / As a prosperous morn in May, / The confident prime of the day
quotes.author: William Watson

quotes.quote: Sweet May hath come to love us, / Flowers, trees, their blossoms don; / And through the blue heavens above us / The very clouds move on.
quotes.author: Heinrich Heine

quotes.quote: I sing of brooks, of blossoms, birds, and bowers: / Of April, May, or June, and July flowers. / I sing of Maypoles, Hock-carts, wassails, wakes, / Of bridegrooms, brides, and of the bridal cakes.
quotes.author: Robert Herrick

quotes.quote: May! Queen of blossoms, / And fulfilling flowers, / With what pretty music / Shall we charm the hours?
quotes.author: Lord Edward Thurlow

quotes.quote:
Winds of May, that dance on the sea, / Dancing a ring-around in glee / From furrow to furrow, while overhead
The foam flies up to be garlanded.
quotes.author: James Joyce

quotes.quote: In the marvelous month of May / when all the birds were singing, / then did I reveal to her / my yearning and longing.
quotes.author: Henirich Heine

quotes.quote: It's May, the lusty month of May / That darling month when everyone throws self-control away.
quotes.author: Alan Jay Lerner

quotes.quote: A man's dreams are a maze even he cannot know.
quotes.author: Robert Jordan

quotes.quote: Civilization is a network and a maze of precedences and custom.
quotes.author: Robert E. Howard

quotes.quote: Life is like a maze in which you try to avoid the exit.
quotes.author: Roger Von Oech

quotes.quote: The future is an ever-shifting maze of possibilities until it becomes the present.
quotes.author: Terry Brooks

quotes.quote: There's your labyrinth of suffering. We are all going. Find your way out of that maze.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: Those who search for truth are too conscious of the maze to be hard on others.
quotes.author: E. M. Forster

quotes.quote: Theirs is an endless road, a hopeless maze, who seek for goods before they seek for God.
quotes.author: Bernard of Clairvaux

quotes.quote: Life is a maze in which we take the wrong turning before we have learned to walk.
quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

quotes.quote: To walk safely through the maze of human life, one needs the light of wisdom and the guidance of virtue.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: There is no route out of the maze. The maze shifts as you move through it, because it is alive.
quotes.author: Philip K. Dick

quotes.quote: Running through the maze of life, you come across profound ambiguities and complexities. Yet the essence of living a meaningful life remains simple- following your heart and pursuing your life purpose.
quotes.author: Roopleen

quotes.quote: If you go the way of your thoughts you will be carried away by them and you will find yourself in an endless maze.
quotes.author: Ramana Maharshi

quotes.quote: Do you know my friend that each one of us is a dark mystery, a maze of conflicting passions and desire and aptitudes?
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: Most of us make unconscious choices in the words that we use; we sleep-walk through the maze of possibilities available to us.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Breathless and unharmed, we emerge from the mazes of metaphysics and psychology where man and the soul are playing hide-and-seek.
quotes.author: Ameen Rihani

quotes.quote: The difficulty in dealing with a maze or labyrinth lies not so much in navigating the convolutions to find the exit but in not entering the damn thing in the first place. Or, at least not yet again. As a creature of free will, do not be tempted into futility.
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: He lost himself in a maze of thoughts that were rendered vague by his lack of words to express them. Frowning, he tried again.
quotes.author: William Golding

quotes.quote: I always find myself gravitating to the analogy of a maze. Think of film noir and if you picture the story as a maze, you don't want to be hanging above the maze watching the characters make the wrong choices because it's frustrating. You actually want to be in the maze with them, making the turns at their side, that keeps it more exciting... I quite like to be in that maze.
quotes.author: Christopher Nolan

quotes.quote: Yet, in the maddening maze of things, And tossed by storm and flood, To one fixed trust my spirit clings; I know that God is good!
quotes.author: John Greenleaf Whittier

quotes.quote: Even with multiple instruction books, maneuvering the maze of the tax code is costly and time-consuming.
quotes.author: Mike Crapo

quotes.quote: It's a lot easier to complete a maze if you start at the end.
quotes.author: Dale Watson

quotes.quote: At some point we all look up and realize we are lost in a maze.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: Some are bewildered in the maze of schools, And some made coxcombs nature meant but fools.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: A rat in a maze is free to go anywhere, as long as it stays inside the maze.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: I was in a maze. No matter which way I turned, it was the wrong way.
quotes.author: Umberto Eco

quotes.quote: The place I live in is a kind of maze and I keep seeking the exit or the home.
quotes.author: Anne Sexton

quotes.quote: What we all dread most is a maze with no centre.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Being nice to those who treat you badly isn't being fake. Your spiritual maturity has risen above the desire for vengeance.
quotes.author: Michael Binot

quotes.quote: Be kind to unkind people; they need it the most!
quotes.author: Buddhism

quotes.quote: One does evil enough when one does nothing good.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: You do not wake up one morning a bad person. It happens by a thousand tiny surrenders of self-respect to self-interest.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Throughout life people will make you mad, disrespect you and treat you bad. Let God deal with the things they do, cause hate in your heart will consume you too.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.quote: How people treat you is their karma; how you react is yours.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: The less you respond to rude, critical, argumentative people...the more peaceful your life will become.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Don't let negative and toxic people rent space in your head. Raise the rent and kick them out!
quotes.author: Robert Tew

quotes.quote: Treat them with the contempt that they deserve. Being confrontational and responding to the abuse is not conducive to a peaceful, stress-free life. Be conveniently deaf, blind and dumb. It is so much more effective when yours is not the expected reaction.
quotes.author: Margaret Young

quotes.quote: It takes very little to govern good people. Very little. And bad people cant be governed at all. Or if they could I never heard of it.
quotes.author: Cormac Mccarthy

quotes.quote: Those who pray for your downfall are concentrating negative thoughts towards you, without taking cognisance of the slippery ground in which they are standing, which could lead to their downfall.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: The moment you feel you have to prove your worth to someone is the moment to absolutely and utterly walk away.
quotes.author: Alysia Harris

quotes.quote: People who are mean or unkind or rigid - think about it - cannot laugh at themselves.
quotes.author: Eileen Brennan

quotes.quote: Since the nature of people is bad, to become corrected they must be taught by teachers and to be orderly they must acquire ritual and moral principles.
quotes.author: Xun Zi

quotes.quote: Associate yourself with people of good quality, for it is better to be alone than in bad company.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.quote: Mean people don't bother me a bit. Mean people who disguise themselves as nice people bother me a whole lot.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The world is not fair, and often fools, cowards, liars and the selfish hide in high places.
quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.quote: But I say to you, Love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you
quotes.author: Matthew 5:44

quotes.quote: Always ignore hateful attitude and rude behavior of the people. They are powerless without your response.
quotes.author: Bushra Zarrar Rana

quotes.quote: Never respond to rudeness. When people are rude to you, they reveal who they are, not who you are. Don't take it personally be silent.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Mean people are no fun.
quotes.author: Thom Filicia

quotes.quote: The measure of a man's real character is what he would do if he knew he never would be found out.
quotes.author: Thomas Babington Macaulay

quotes.quote: If you treat people right they will treat you right -- ninety percent of the time.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Liars are always most disposed to swear.
quotes.author: Vittorio Alfieri

quotes.quote: Do not eat the bread of a man who is stingy; do not desire his delicacies, for he is like one who is inwardly calculating. 'Eat and drink' he says to you, but his heart is not with you. You will vomit up the morsels that you have eaten, and waste your complements.
quotes.author: Proverbs 23:6-8

quotes.quote: What goes around comes around, and if you fight fire with fire, you are going to create more fire. The question is do you want to be right, or do you want what you want. What people says and do is their Karma, how you respond is yours.
quotes.author: Sarah Rigotti

quotes.quote: Try to ignore and walk away. After a while, it gets easier and they will also see that you are not responding to their ways, so will leave you alone..
quotes.author: Eiko Mendoza

quotes.quote: If people say something rude or off-color, you have to take it with a grain of salt, because they don't know you.
quotes.author: Chris Daughtry

quotes.quote: A person who is nice to you, but rude to the waiter, is not a nice person.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: Before you diagnose yourself with depression or low self esteem, first make sure that you are not, in fact, just surrounded by assholes.
quotes.author: William Gibson

quotes.quote: There's only one corner of the universe you can be certain of improving, and that's your own self.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Life's burdens are lighter when I laugh at myself.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence then, is not an act, but a habit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: In the end, it's not going to matter how many breaths you took, but how many moments took your breath away.
quotes.author: Shing Xiong

quotes.quote: The great man is he who does not lose his child's heart.
quotes.author: Mencius

quotes.quote: Dream as if you'll live forever, live as if you'll die today.
quotes.author: James Dean

quotes.quote: Don't be seduced into thinking that that which does not make profit is without value.
quotes.author: Arthur Miller

quotes.quote: The optimist sees the rose and not its thorns; the pessimist stares at the thorns, oblivious to the rose.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: The thinking that got us to where we are is not the thinking that will get us to where we want to be.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Better to do something imperfectly than to do nothing flawlessly.
quotes.author: Robert Schuller

quotes.quote: Tell me and I will forget. Show me and I will remember. Involve me and I will understand.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Promise me you'll always remember: You're braver than you believe, and stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
quotes.author: A.A Milne

quotes.quote: Work like you don't need the money, love like you've never been hurt and dance like no one is watching
quotes.author: Randall G Leighton

quotes.quote: And in the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Blessed is he who expects nothing, for he shall never be disappointed.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: An eye for eye only ends up making the whole world blind.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Life can only be understood backwards; but it must be lived forwards.
quotes.author: Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Courage doesn't always roar. Sometimes courage is the quiet voice at the end of the day saying, â€œI will try again tomorrow.
quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.quote: Nobody can go back and start a new beginning, but anyone can start today and make a new ending.
quotes.author: Maria Robinson

quotes.quote: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: I walk slowly, but I never walk backward.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid your life will end; be afraid that it will never begin.
quotes.author: Grace Hansen

quotes.quote: A tree is known by its fruit; a man by his deeds. A good deed is never lost; he who sows courtesy reaps friendship, and he who plants kindness gathers love.
quotes.author: St. Basil

quotes.quote: If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Where there is love there is life.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: You are not a product of your circumstances but a product of your decisions
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a hard battle.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: One can forget the meaninglessness of his own existence by occupying himself with scientific experiments of dubious import. Countless scientists and scholars spend their lives in the search of truths that are irrelevant to them.
quotes.author: John Silber

quotes.quote: We desperately want to believe in something. To simply live out our lives believing in nothing is to live as if this thing we call life is filled with nothing but nothing.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: Life is meaningless unless you bring meaning to it. It is up to us to create our own existence. Unless you do something, unless you make something it's as though you aren't there.
quotes.author: Alan Alda

quotes.quote: Life is so meaningless without trouble.
quotes.author: M.F. Moonzajer

quotes.quote: If there's no game, isn't winning a pretty meaningless concept?
quotes.author: Lois McMaster Bujold

quotes.quote: Maybe life isn't meaninglessâ€¦ maybe just your life is meaningless.
quotes.author: Donald Miller

quotes.quote: We live in a world where words are as meaningless as a snowflake in a blizzard.
quotes.author: Hiba Fatima Ahmad

quotes.quote: The future of civilisation depends on our overcoming the meaninglessness and hopelessness that characterizes the thoughts of men today.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: If you write a line of zeroes, itÂ´s still nothing.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: A thoroughly honest man is a rare jewel in the shallow stream of meaningless pebbles.
quotes.author: Kristian Goldmund Aumann

quotes.quote: Man cannot stand a meaninless life.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: A life without love, no matter how many other things we have, is an empty meaningless one.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: There is a connection between heaven and earth. Finding that connection gives meaning to everything, including death. Missing it makes everything meaningless, including life.
quotes.author: John H. Groberg

quotes.quote: The vitality that can stand the abyss of meaninglessness is aware of a hidden meaning within the destruction of meaning.
quotes.author: Paul Tillich

quotes.quote: The world seems so meaningless when I am engulfed in the bliss of love and you tracing the evolution of the restless soul of eternal belonging on my face.
quotes.author: Annie Ali

quotes.quote: You will never win an unfair competition since the reward is meaningless.
quotes.author: Cass van Krah

quotes.quote: Consider the possibility that many of the things you hear and say are utter nonsense and meaningless repetitions of noise.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: Man is a useless passion. It is meaningless that we live and it is meaningless that we die.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: The man who regards his own life and that of his fellow creatures as meaningless, is not merely unfortunate, but almost disqualified for life.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Half of what I say is meaningless; but I say it so that the other half may reach you.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: The trouble with reason is that it becomes meaningless at the exact point where it refuses to act.
quotes.author: Bernard DeVoto

quotes.quote: Nothing: a landscape, a glass of wine, a little loveless love, and the vague sadness caused by our understanding nothing and having lost the little we're given.
quotes.author: Álvaro de Campos

quotes.quote: When you realize that life is meaningless, the world does not seem so cruel any more and you can cope with it.
quotes.author: Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: Until we see love as the meaning of life, life seems to have no meaning at all. The sense of meaninglessness produces chaos, and the chaos produces fear. There is only one way out of this, and that is to see every moment and every situation as an invitation to love.
quotes.author: Marriane Williamson

quotes.quote: Without purpose and meaning in our lives, we banish ourselves to wander this plane of existence with self-destructive tendencies until the bell tolls and our breath capsizes in our lungs, snatching our chance to redeem ourselves forever.
quotes.author: A.J. Darkholme

quotes.quote: The grand thing about the human mind is that it can turn its own tables and see meaninglessness as ultimate meaning.
quotes.author: John Cage

quotes.quote: So many people walk around with a meaningless life. They seem half-asleep, even when they're busy doing things they think are important. This is because they're chasing the wrong things.
quotes.author: Morrie Schwartz

quotes.quote: Meaninglessness does not come from being weary of pain. Meaninglessness comes from being weary of pleasure.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Thoughts about the meaningless of life is the only form of leisure available to a person.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: The very meaninglessness of life forces man to create his own meaning.
quotes.author: Stanley Kubrick

quotes.quote: Sometimes it takes a wrong turn to get you to the right place.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: I am not a day dreamer, I am a believer, that after every painful love I have gone through, it is just an experience to crack open the deepest parts of my core and allow to me to delve into a passion so rare, that I will find a love that was almost, never meant to be.
quotes.author: Nikki Rowe

quotes.quote: He stirred my soul in the most subtle way and the story between us wrote itself.
quotes.author: Nikki Rowe

quotes.quote: Our eyes met and our souls caught on fire.
quotes.author: Nikki Rowe

quotes.quote: Do not come into agreement with fear. Activate your faith, live in victory, speak over your life and expect great things to come your way.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: Oh it was meant to be. It just wasn't meant to last.
quotes.author: Kate McGahan

quotes.quote: So many people bump into our lives for a second and it changes us forever, but they never know it. And while that's funny and strange and a little sad, it's also just life. And the truth of the matter is, it was never really about them anyway. It was always about us and what we were meant to learn from them. It was always about us and who we were meant to become as a result of having encountered them.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: When two people are meant to be together, they will be together. It's fate.
quotes.author: Sara Gruen

quotes.quote: If they were meant to be together they would find a way to do it.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Some things were never meant to be recycled.
quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quotes.quote: We're social animals; we're meant to be together, but we were never necessarily meant to be together without being together. That was never the plan, I don't think.
quotes.author: Goldie Hawn

quotes.quote: If two people are meant to be together, nothing can keep them apart.
quotes.author: Sarah

quotes.quote: Sometimes I think things happen for a reason... And I think if we're meant to run into each other again, fate will make it happen.
quotes.author: Lauren Blakely

quotes.quote: I know that people change. I thought... I thought we're going to change together. I thought that's what it meant to be in love.
quotes.author: Rainbow Rowell

quotes.quote: Life is funny...we never know what's in store for us and time brings on what is meant to be.
quotes.author: April Mae Monterrosa

quotes.quote: You may not be where you want to be. But that is where you are meant to be. The only reason why you are here.
quotes.author: Suyasha Subedi

quotes.quote: We can't go back to who we once were. We can only go on and become the person we were meant to be.
quotes.author: Anthony T.Hincks

quotes.quote: Why does anyone love someone? Some things are just meant to be.
quotes.author: Melanie A. Smith

quotes.quote: Everything lost is meant to be found. Don't worry.
quotes.author: Dean Georgaris

quotes.quote: Sometimes nothing is the best something. If a thing is meant to be sometimes it's best to just let it happen, rather than try to force it.
quotes.author: David Greenwalt

quotes.quote: This is where we're meant to be. I knew we were meant to be together from the first moment that we met.
quotes.author: Doug Barber

quotes.quote: I don't know what's meant to be. Vincent, I care about you so deeply. But a part of me is unhappy. And we both know why.
quotes.author: Ron Koslow

quotes.quote: I was wrong about you. I think you're a wonderful man. I wish it could've been different between us. I guess it just wasn't meant to be. Sorry.
quotes.author: James Orr

quotes.quote: I pretty much lost everything. And then you show up, and somehow we find you just in time to save her. Maybe it was meant to be.
quotes.author: Neil Druckmann

quotes.quote: Let the past die. Kill it if you have to. It's the only way to become who you were meant to be.
quotes.author: Rian Johnson

quotes.quote: It wasn't meant to be. There's nothing to be scared of, it's just a storm.
quotes.author: Don Mancini

quotes.quote: Caroline... you and I are meant to be together. People will tell you nothing matters, the whole world's about to end soon anyway. Those people are looking at life the wrong way. I mean, things don't need to last forever to be perfect.
quotes.author: Michael Goldbach

quotes.quote: I don't understand. We're a team. We're meant to be together. We're destined to do...
quotes.author: Ali Adler

quotes.quote: Listen these were meant to be a very special gift for someone. Well, if we're meant to meet again, we'll meet again. it's just not the right time now.
quotes.author: Marc Klein

quotes.quote: If we were meant to be together, we would be together. I just wanted you to be happy. That's all. You did everything. You accepted me for who I am, and not for what you wanted me to be.
quotes.author: Abby Kohn

quotes.quote: The smell of roasting meat together with that of burning fruit wood and dried herbs, as voluptuous as incense in a church, is enough to turn anyone into a budding gastronome
quotes.author: Claudia Roden

quotes.quote: The way you cut your meat reflects the way you live.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Beware of meat twice boiled, and an old foe reconciled.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: I don't eat red meat, but sometimes a man needs a steak.
quotes.author: Gwyneth Paltrow

quotes.quote: Flesh-meats will depreciate the blood. Cook meat with spices, and eat it with rich cakes and pies, and you have a bad quality of blood.
quotes.author: Ellen G. White

quotes.quote: Understand, when you eat meat, that something did die. You have an obligation to value it - not just the sirloin but also all those wonderful tough little bits.
quotes.author: Anthony Bourdain

quotes.quote: Meat reared on land matures relatively quickly, and it takes only a few pounds of plants to produce a pound of meat.
quotes.author: Sylvia Earle

quotes.quote: Meat is a mighty contributor to climate change and other environmental problems. The amount of meat we're eating is one of the leading causes of climate change. It's as important as the kind of car you drive - whether you eat meat a lot or how much meat you eat.
quotes.author: Michael Pollan

quotes.quote: I can hardly eat meat because it has to look like something what it was not when it was alive.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.quote: Cutting meat out of your diet is the best thing you can do for animals and your own health.
quotes.author: Joan Jett

quotes.quote: When it comes to meat, change is almost always cast as an absolute. You are a vegetarian or you are not.
quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.quote: The shape of the meat and the taste of it starting from the top down is a part of me. All of my feelings are coming from inside of the meat down to when I put the salt onto the meat.
quotes.author: Salt Bae

quotes.quote: You can be addicted to meat, as far as I'm concerned. Why else would I eat six cheeseburgers a day?
quotes.author: John Daly

quotes.quote: When you cook, you take a life. When you eat fish, or meat, you take a life. And you must be very respectful of the ingredients and that is very important.
quotes.author: Joel Robuchon

quotes.quote: Eating meat is not your personal decision, any more than, you know, whether somebody beats their child is their personal decision.
quotes.author: Bruce Friedrich

quotes.quote: Red meat is not bad for you. Now blue-green meat, that’s bad for you!
quotes.author: Tommy Smothers

quotes.quote: The eating of meat extinguishes the seed of Great Kindness.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: It's harder to eat meat when you know the animal's name...I have found.
quotes.author: Jon Stewart

quotes.quote: Meat is a tremendous environmental challenge. It contributes enormous amounts of greenhouse gas, especially beef eating.
quotes.author: Michael Pollan

quotes.quote: If I do eat meat, it's got to be ethical. I want to know that it lived a great life before it was killed humanely.
quotes.author: Ricky Gervais

quotes.quote: What is meat for one is not for another--no accounting for fancy.
quotes.author: Abigail Adams

quotes.quote: The meat of the buffalo tastes the same on both sides of the border.
quotes.author: Sitting Bull

quotes.quote: Meat eaten without either mirth or music is ill of digestion.
quotes.author: Walter Scott

quotes.quote: One must cook a piece of meat a thousand times before one begins to truly understand it.
quotes.author: Andre Soltner
