quotes.quote: They claim red meat is bad for you. But I never saw a sick-looking tiger.
quotes.author: Chi Chi Rodriguez

quotes.quote: Meat is an inefficient way to eat. An acre of land can yield 20,000 pounds of potatoes, but that same acre would only graze enough cows to get 165 pounds of meat.
quotes.author: Alexandra Paul

quotes.quote: Not eating meat is a decision, eating meat is an instinct.
quotes.author: Denis Leary

quotes.quote: Meat eating and a compassionate religion do not go hand in hand.
quotes.author: Bodo Balsys

quotes.quote: If I had to narrow my choice of meats down to one for the rest of my life, I am quite certain that meat would be pork.
quotes.author: James Beard

quotes.quote: Meat is a status dish in which the sizzle counts for more than the nutritional worth.
quotes.author: Magnus Pyke

quotes.quote: I think all auto mechanics go to the same school— Shaft U.
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: It is about your having genuine acceptance, even though you are a college professor, of your son's decision to become an auto mechanic—no ifs, ands, or buts.
quotes.author: Josh Bartok

quotes.quote: Writing, Madam, is a mechanic part of wit. A gentleman should never go beyond a song or a billet.
quotes.author: George Etherege

quotes.quote: When you are having a bad time, examine the badness, observe it mindfully, study the phenomenon and learn the mechanics.
quotes.author: Bhante Henepola Gunaratana

quotes.quote: God determines how fast you're going to run; I can help you with the mechanics.
quotes.author: Bill Bowerman

quotes.quote: For me, running is a lifestyle and an art. I'm more interested in the magic of it than the mechanics.
quotes.author: Lorraine

quotes.quote: Did you hear about the automobile mechanic who bought a hospital and he's making a fortune? If you bring in your wife for an operation, they give you a loaner.
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: It isn't easy being an automobile mechanic. Let's face, it how would you like to stand in the middle of a garage knowing that every car that comes through that door is defective?
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: Let's face it, to you it may be your motor that's knocking. To a mechanic, it's opportunity.
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: Actually, they don't call them mechanics anymore. Automotive Diagnosticians! They've got the white gown; the three buttons on the shoulder; 'Don't touch me— I'm sterile!'
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: These fellas have so much authority; so much poise; so much dignity— it makes you almost proud to have their fingerprints on your seat covers!
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: Mechanics is the paradise of the mathematical sciences because by means of it, one comes to the fruits of mathematics.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: It is questionable if all the mechanical inventions yet may have lightened the days toil of any human being.
quotes.author: John Stuart Mill

quotes.quote: A lawyer without history or literature is a mechanic, a mere working mason; if he possesses some knowledge of these, he may venture to call himself an architect.
quotes.author: Walter Scott

quotes.quote: You have to look for teachers. If you want to be a mechanic, go hang out with mechanics.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: With my own home, I feel like I'm the mechanic who drives a crappy car. I never have time to work on my own home.
quotes.author: Jonathan Scott

quotes.quote: You missed it when you pay more attention to the damaged car in the mechanic shop than the sick human being in the hospital.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: A speaker is like a lousy auto mechanic: Everytime he fixes something in the language, he screws up something else.
quotes.author: Joseph H. Greene

quotes.quote: A man too busy to take care of his health is like a mechanic too busy to take care of his tools.
quotes.author: Spanish Proverb

quotes.quote: Mechanic slaves with greasy aprons, rules, and hammers.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The expectations of life depend upon diligence; the mechanic that would perfect his work must first sharpen his tools.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: A male gynecologist is like an auto mechanic who has never owned a car.
quotes.author: Carrie Snow

quotes.quote: Within every desire is the mechanics of its fulfillment.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: The media's the most powerful entity on earth. They have the power to make the innocent guilty and to make the guilty innocent, and that's power. Because they control the minds of the masses.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: Whoever controls the media, controls the mind.
quotes.author: Jim Morrison

quotes.quote: The media is the right arm of anarchy.
quotes.author: Dan Brown

quotes.quote: The media transforms the great silence of things into its opposite. Formerly constituting a secret, the real now talks constantly. News reports, information, statistics, and surveys are everywhere.
quotes.author: Michel de Certeau

quotes.quote: Media, the plural of mediocrity.
quotes.author: Jimmy Breslin

quotes.quote: People in the mass media tend more and more every day to look and act like elected and appointed officials.
quotes.author: L. Neil Smith

quotes.quote: The people will believe what the media tells them they believe.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: What the mass media offers is not popular art, but entertainment which is intended to be consumed like food, forgotten, and replaced by a new dish.
quotes.author: W. H. Auden

quotes.quote: Whoever controls the media, the images, controls the culture.
quotes.author: Allen Ginsberg

quotes.quote: All of us who professionally use the mass media are the shapers of society. We can vulgerize that society. We can brutalize it. Or we can help lift it onto a higher level.
quotes.author: William Bernbach

quotes.quote: All media exist to invest our lives with artificial perceptions and arbitrary values.
quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.quote: The media's power is frail. Without the people's support, it can be shut off with the ease of turning a light switch.
quotes.author: Corazon Aquino

quotes.quote: It takes discipline not to let social media steal your time.
quotes.author: Alexis Ohanian

quotes.quote: We need a free media, not just freedom of speech.
quotes.author: Tom Scholz

quotes.quote: One of the most powerful defences the media can offer for controversial actions is, of course, public interest.
quotes.author: Rowan Williams

quotes.quote:
The media represents world that is more real than reality that we can experience. People lose the ability to distinguish between reality and fantasy. They also begin to engage with the fantasy without realizing what it really is.
They seek happiness and fulfilment through the simulacra of reality, e.g. media and avoid the contact/interaction with the real world.
quotes.author: Jean Baudrillard

quotes.quote: Journalism will kill you, but it will keep you alive while you’re at it.
quotes.author: Horace Greeley

quotes.quote: Don’t hate the media, become the media.
quotes.author: Jello Biafra

quotes.quote: Mediation on the Holy Scriptures, awakens our mind on Christ Jesus.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Daily mediate and affirm the Scriptures; your mind and soul will be filled with pure thoughts.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Meditation is offering your genuine presence to yourself in every moment.
quotes.author: Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: Meditation provides a way of learning how to let go. As we sit, the self we've been trying to construct and make into a nice, neat package continues to unravel.
quotes.author: John Welwood

quotes.quote: Meditation is the signpost directing the steps to the main highway of realization.
quotes.author: Guy Bogart

quotes.quote: Mediation on the Scriptures will renew your mind.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: The mediation of internal conflict can be linkages with other problems.
quotes.author: Howard Raiffa

quotes.quote: The spirit of meditation is the combating of self-willed thinking-it is a combat against the weight of one's feelings.
quotes.author: Hakuin Ekaku

quotes.quote: Mediation on the scriptures transforms our lives.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Meditation is to the mind what exercise is to the body it warms and invigorates.
quotes.author: John Thornton

quotes.quote: Make your life a prayer. Live your mediation.
quotes.author: Reba Riley

quotes.quote: Meditation is the discovery that the point of life is always arrived at in the immediate moment.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: Peer mediation is a chance for students to work with other students to help them resolve problems, arguments, disagreements without having to get the teacher or the administration involved.
quotes.author: Janet Reno

quotes.quote: Meditation allows us to directly participate in our lives instead of living life as an afterthought.
quotes.author: Stephen Levine

quotes.quote: Daily mediation on the Holy Scriptures is a spiritual act.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Meditation means dissolving the invisible walls that unawareness has built.
quotes.author: Sadhguru

quotes.quote: Any action done with awareness is meditation. Meditation means to be fully aware of our actions, thoughts, feelings and emotions. Another name of meditation is passive awareness.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: What mediation is designed for is to resolve disputes on the value on a claim, not whether there is a claim.
quotes.author: David Wheeler

quotes.quote: Daily mediation is a healthy spiritual exercise.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Practice mediation and concentration exercises, and begin to think more about regaining your sensitivity by avoiding draining situations. Not because of fear but because of intelligence.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Meditation must be continuous. The current of meditation must be present in all your activities.
quotes.author: Annamalai Swami

quotes.quote: Mediation on word of God leads to renewal of mind; rekindle of spirit and revival of soul.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Mediation is one of the most effective tools of non-violence. It can turn parties away from conflict, towards compromise.
quotes.author: Miroslav Lajcak

quotes.quote: Mediation and reconciliation work is about a profound quest for justice and social transformation. But at the same time, they are about service, solidarity, about exploring and rediscovering the human spirit that has been lost or shattered through human conflict, cruelty, ignorance and greed.
quotes.author: Hizkias Assefa

quotes.quote: Meditation is the secret of all growth in spiritual life and knowledge.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: I went to medical school because I wanted to ask the big questions. Do we have a soul? Does God exist? What happens after death?
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Qualities you need to get through medical school and residency: Discipline. Patience. Perseverance. A willingness to forgo sleep. A penchant for sadomasochism. Ability to weather crises of faith and self-confidence. Accept exhaustion as fact of life. Addiction to caffeine a definite plus. Unfailing optimism that the end is in sight.
quotes.author: Khaled Hosseini

quotes.quote: You don't train someone for all of those years of medical school and residency, particularly people who want to help others optimize their physical and psychological health, and then have them run a claims-processing operation for insurance companies.
quotes.author: Malcolm Gladwell

quotes.quote: You can't get through medical school if you don't have a strong will and a strong constitution.
quotes.author: Ken Jeong

quotes.quote: One goes through school, college, medical school and one's internship learning little or nothing about goodness but a good deal about success.
quotes.author: Ashley Montagu

quotes.quote: All of the details that most of us memorize in medical school - you don't have to learn those things. They're going to be in your computer.
quotes.author: Leroy Hood

quotes.quote: You can't go to medical school and come out and be like, 'I'm going to be a dog catcher.' That would be so pointless.
quotes.author: Mike Birbiglia

quotes.quote: I was always taught at medical school that you should never do a test unless you could do something with the result.
quotes.author: Mark Walport

quotes.quote: The world doesn't need more smart doctors, it needs more warm and wise doctors. Be the wisdom yourself - be the warmth yourself, and be the doctor that the doctors have forgotten to be, for it is time to save medicine, to save humanity.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: Being a doctor, is not simply about having an understanding of anatomy and sickness, rather it is about having an understanding of true wellness and more importantly, it is about understanding the intensity of the concern of the patient’s next of kin.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: The midpoint in medicine between excessive emotional involvement with patients and a complete lack of empathy is not a simple one to locate.
quotes.author: Christine Montross

quotes.quote: It must be frustrating to survive the gauntlet that is our western medical schooling system only to one day come to the realization that you have been taught only to manage illness and disease instead of curing it.
quotes.author: Gary Hopkins

quotes.quote: Why is it, that from the moment you enter medical school to the moment you retire, that the only disorder you will ever diagnosis with a physics book - is obesity? This is biology folks, it's endocrinology, it's physiology - physics has nothing to do with it. The law of thermodynamics is always true, [but] the energy balance equation is irrelevant...
quotes.author: Gary Taubes

quotes.quote: Nobody just leaves medical school, especially given it's fiercely competitive to get in. But I had a sister who was a doctor, another who was a pharmacist, a brother who was an engineer. So my parents already had sensible children who would be able to make an actual living, and I think they felt comfortable sacrificing their one strange child.
quotes.author: Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie

quotes.quote: Medical school education and post graduate education emphasize thoroughness.
quotes.author: Ezekiel Emanuel

quotes.quote: Finish last in your league and they call you idiot. Finish last in medical school and they call you doctor.
quotes.author: Abe Lemons

quotes.quote: I think it's a very valuable thing for a doctor to learn how to do research, to learn how to approach research, something there isn't time to teach them in medical school. They don't really learn how to approach a problem, and yet diagnosis is a problem; and I think that year spent in research is extremely valuable to them.
quotes.author: Gertrude B. Elion

quotes.quote: Modern medicine is not scientific, it is full of prejudice, illogic and susceptible to advertising. Doctors are not taught to reason, they are programmed to believe in whatever their medical schools teach them and the leading doctors tell them.
quotes.author: Abram Hoffer

quotes.quote: I learned about a lot of things in medical school, but mortality wasn't one of them.
quotes.author: Atul Gawande

quotes.quote: Certainly when I got to medical school, I had role models of the kind of physicians I wanted to be. I had an uncle who, looking back, was probably not the most-educated physician around, but he carried it off so well.
quotes.author: Abraham Verghese

quotes.quote: On a medical school professor noted for slowly, carefully interviewing the patient: He taught the love of truth.
quotes.author: David McCullough

quotes.quote: I wish medical schools helped us to analyze our healthy and unhealthy reasons for becoming doctors.
quotes.author: Bernie Siegel

quotes.quote: When I went to the University, the medical school was the only place where one could hope to find the means to study life, its nature, its origins, and its ills.
quotes.author: Albert Claude

quotes.quote: They don't like thinking in medical school. They memorize - that's all they want you to do. You must not think.
quotes.author: John Backus

quotes.quote: We have the sense that medical students come to medicine with a great capacity to understand the suffering of patients. And then by the end of the third year they completely lose that ability, partly because we teach them the specialized language of medicine.
quotes.author: Abraham Verghese

quotes.quote: The motivations of a scientist are always mixed and complex... every medical student has the desire to do good in the world. Making a small contribution to that effort is really in a sense the last significant thing that I want to do with my life.
quotes.author: Gustav Nossal

quotes.quote: Our students, from the first year of medical school, look for ways in which they can help provide community service, so many of them are already working at homeless shelters or clinics for the disadvantaged. This just brings it closer.
quotes.author: Gregg Takayama

quotes.quote: I began the study of medicine, impelled by a desire for knowledge of facts and of man. The resolution to do disciplined work tied me to both laboratory and clinic for a long time to come.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Medical education goal is to transform the student from practitioner to healer.
quotes.author: Alber Elbaz

quotes.quote: He who studies medicine without books sails an uncharted sea, but he who studies medicine without patients does not go to sea at all.
quotes.author: Denis Diderot

quotes.quote: Always laugh when you can, it is cheap medicine.
quotes.author: George Gordon Byron

quotes.quote: The art of medicine consists of amusing the patient while nature cures the disease.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: A medicine cat has no time for doubt. Put your energy into today and stop worrying about the past.
quotes.author: Erin Hunter

quotes.quote: When you got a condition, it's bad to forget your medicine.
quotes.author: Frank Miller

quotes.quote: Modern allopathic medicine is the only major science stuck in the pre-Einstein era.
quotes.author: Charlotte Gerson

quotes.quote: Medicine is a golden goose that has to be killed because every time the goose lays a golden egg, someone gets sick or dead.
quotes.author: Richard Diaz

quotes.quote: Think of exercise as medicine and take your daily prescription.
quotes.author: Steven Magee

quotes.quote: Medicine is as close to love as it is to science, and its relationships matter even at the edge of life itself.
quotes.author: Rachel Naomi Remen

quotes.quote: Medicine is not a book but mind, not a business but life.
quotes.author: Farid F. Ibrahim

quotes.quote: Medicine is a science of uncertainty and an art of probability.
quotes.author: William Osler

quotes.quote: There is no medicine like hope, no incentive so great, and no tonic so powerful as expectation of something tomorrow.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: The person who takes medicine must recover twice, once from the disease and once from the medicine.
quotes.author: William Osler

quotes.quote: To array a man's will against his sickness is the supreme art of medicine.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: The best medicine I know for rheumatism is to thank the Lord that it ain't gout.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Medicine heals doubts as well as diseases.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: What medicines do not heal, the lance will; what the lance does not heal, fire will.
quotes.author: Hippocrates

quotes.quote: Medicine is a collection of uncertain prescriptions, the results of which, taken collectively, are more fatal than useful to mankind.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: If popular medicine gave the people wisdom as well as knowledge, it would be the best protection for scientific and well-trained physicians.
quotes.author: Rudolf Virchow

quotes.quote: There is no medicine to cure hatred.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: Medicine is only palliative. For behind disease lies the cause and this cause NO DRUG can reach.
quotes.author: Silas Weir Mitchell

quotes.quote: Medicine also disregards national boundaries.
quotes.author: Irving Langmuir

quotes.quote: The medicine of the future will be music and sound.
quotes.author: Edgar Cayce

quotes.quote: Future medicine will be the medicine of frequencies.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Medicine has its limitations, Life Force has none.
quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.quote: Preventive medicine isn't part of a physician's everyday routine, which is spent dispensing drugs and performing surgery.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: A real medicine can only exist when it penetrates into a knowledge which embraces the human being in respect to body, soul and spirit.
quotes.author: Rudolf Steiner

quotes.quote: Medicine heals diseases of the body, wisdom frees the soul from passions.
quotes.author: Democritus

quotes.quote: The greatest medicine of all is teaching people how not to need it
quotes.author: Hippocrates

quotes.quote: Scientific medicine is one of the greatest triumphs of humankind.
quotes.author: Raymond Tallis

quotes.quote: Healing through the mind can work harmoniously with medicine.
quotes.author: Rhonda Byrne

quotes.quote: We owe to the Middle Ages the two worst inventions of humanity, romantic love and gunpowder.
quotes.author: Andre Maurois

quotes.quote: Your chances of dying a violent death are 1/500th of what they used to be during medieval times.
quotes.author: Peter Diamandis

quotes.quote: Nothing is sweeter than love, nothing higher, nothing stronger, nothing larger, nothing more joyful, nothing fuller, and nothing better in heaven or on earth.
quotes.author: Thomas a Kempis

quotes.quote: Thank goodness we don't live in medieval times, when people fought wars over ideas.
quotes.author: Wojciech Jaruzelski

quotes.quote: To the medieval mind the possibility of doubt did not exist.
quotes.author: William Manchester

quotes.quote: Set out on pilgrimage and triumph gloriously over the infidels in the East.
quotes.author: Orderic Vitalis

quotes.quote: The world is divided into men who have wit and no religion and men who have religion and no wit.
quotes.author: Avicenna

quotes.quote: As the medieval mind blamed God for human suffering, so the modern mind blames 'the system' for the industrial blight and plague of technology
quotes.author: Jennifer Stone

quotes.quote: Medievalism, with its saints and martyrs, its love of self-torture, its wild passion for wounding itself, its gashing with knives, and its whipping with rods - Medievalism is real Christianity, and the medieval Christ is the real Christ.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Letters are signs of things, symbols of words, whose power is so great that without a voice they speak to us the words of the absent; for they introduce words by the eye, not by the ear.
quotes.author: Isidore of Seville

quotes.quote: Do there exist many worlds, or is there but a single world? This is one of the most noble and exalted questions in the study of Nature.
quotes.author: Albertus Magnus

quotes.quote: In the absence of evidence, superstition. It's a Middle Ages thing. That's my theory anyway.
quotes.author: Tucker Carlson

quotes.quote: We are living in modern times throughout the world and yet are dominated by medieval minds.
quotes.author: Eqbal Ahmad

quotes.quote: In the Middle Ages, cathedrals and convents burned like tinder; imagining a medieval story without a fire is like imagining a World War II movie in the Pacific without a fighter plane shot down in flames.
quotes.author: Umberto Eco

quotes.quote: No more things should be presumed to exist than are absolutely necessary.
quotes.author: William of Ockham

quotes.quote: Most of the tools from medieval times were extensions of the physical self. Tools are now extensions of the mental self.
quotes.author: Lotoya Peterson

quotes.quote: Medieval and ancient sensibility now dominates our time as acoustic and multisensory awareness displaces the merely visual.
quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.quote: Nothing is unobtainable to the sword.
quotes.author: Lord Dunsany

quotes.quote: The medievalist has the capacity, and the desire, to harmonize. He believes the planets sing in harmony; why cannot technology also sing?
quotes.author: Douglas Wilson

quotes.quote: In the middle ages people were tourists because of their religion, whereas now they are tourists because tourism is their religion.
quotes.author: Robert Runcie

quotes.quote: The Study of philosophy is not that we may know what men have thought, but what the truth of things is.
quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.quote: There are some examples of medieval kings who were terrible human beings but were nevertheless good kings.
quotes.author: George R. R. Martin

quotes.quote: In medieval times, if someone displayed the symptoms we now identify as boredom, that person was thought to be committing something called acedia, a dangerous form of spiritual alienation a devaluing of the world and its creator.
quotes.author: Richard Louv

quotes.quote: We can appreciate but not really understand the medieval town. We cannot comprehend its compactness, the contiguity of all its buildings as a single uninterrupted whole.
quotes.author: Arthur Erickson

quotes.quote: Medieval learning was really advanced.
quotes.author: Terry Jones

quotes.quote: Nothing good ever comes of violence.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: Medieval justice was a quaint thing.
quotes.author: Frederick Pollock

quotes.quote: The medieval hall house was very primitive when it became the characteristic form of dwelling of the landowner of the Middle Ages.
quotes.author: Stephen Gardiner

quotes.quote: If there be some harder, better way to salvation than to follow that which we believe to be good, then are we all damned.
quotes.author: Lord Dunsany

quotes.quote: When the words come, they are merely empty shells without the music. They live as they are sung, for the words are the body and the music the spirit.
quotes.author: Hildegard von Bingen

quotes.quote: A mediocre idea that generates enthusiasm will go further than a great idea that inspires no one.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.quote: It's a sign of mediocrity when you demonstrate gratitude with moderation.
quotes.author: Roberto Benigni

quotes.quote: I'd made it back to the land of the living. No matter how boring or mediocre a world it might be, this was it.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: To those whose talents are above mediocrity, the highest subjects may be announced. To those who are below mediocrity, the highest subjects may not be announced.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Everything I've ever done was out of fear of being mediocre.
quotes.author: Chet Atkins

quotes.quote: You know you've reached a new plateau of group mediocrity when even a Canadian is alarmed by your lack of individuality.
quotes.author: Sarah Vowell

quotes.quote: Mediocrity is excellent to the eyes of mediocre people.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: I try to keep an open mind but I'm so tired of the mediocrity.
quotes.author: Clea Duvall

quotes.quote: Only mediocrity can be trusted to be always at its best.
quotes.author: Max Beerbohm

quotes.quote: People who are unable to motivate themselves must be content with mediocrity, no matter how impressive their other talents.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.quote: Mediocrity is now, as formerly, dangerous, commonly fatal, to the poet; but among even the successful writers of prose, those who rise sensibly above it are the very rarest exceptions.
quotes.author: William E. Gladstone

quotes.quote: The price of excellence is discipline. The cost of mediocrity is disappointment.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: Only the mediocre are always at their best.
quotes.author: Jean Giraudoux

quotes.quote: Creative people are often found either disagreeable or intimidating by mediocrities.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: It takes more energy to maintain mediocrity than it takes to pursue excellence.
quotes.author: Matthew Kelly

quotes.quote: Women want mediocre men, and men are working to be as mediocre as possible.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: Mediocrity doesn't mean average intelligence, it means an average intelligence that resents and envies its betters.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: It is a wretched taste to be gratified with mediocrity when the excellent lies before us.
quotes.author: Isaac D'Israeli

quotes.quote: Great artists are people who find the way to be themselves in their art. Any sort of pretension induces mediocrity in art and life alike.
quotes.author: Margot Fonteyn

quotes.quote: Excellence is a better teacher than mediocrity. The lessons of the ordinary are everywhere. Truly profound and original insights are to be found only in studying the exemplary.
quotes.author: Warren G. Bennis

quotes.quote: Some people are born mediocre, some people achieve mediocrity, and some people have mediocrity thrust upon them.
quotes.author: Joseph Heller

quotes.quote: To a hungry person, every bitter food is sweet. When the preferable is not available, the available becomes preferable!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: It is cruel to discover one's mediocrity only when it is too late. It does not improve the temper.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: There's a lot of mediocrity being celebrated, and a lot of wonderful stuff being ignored or discouraged.
quotes.author: Sean Penn

quotes.quote: Mediocrity will never do. You are capable of something better.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: There is always a heavy demand for fresh mediocrity. In every generation the least cultivated taste has the largest appetite.
quotes.author: Paul Gauguin

quotes.quote: Perseverance - a lowly virtue whereby mediocrity achieves an inglorious success.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: In the republic of mediocrity, genius is dangerous.
quotes.author: Robert G. Ingersoll

quotes.quote: Mediocrity knows nothing higher than itself, but talent instantly recognizes genius.
quotes.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: Nothing is as approved as mediocrity, the majority has established it and it fixes it fangs on whatever gets beyond it either way.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Meditation can help us embrace our worries, our fear, our anger; and that is very healing. We let our own natural capacity of healing do the work.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: Dedicating some time to meditation is a meaningful expression of caring for yourself that can help you move through the mire of feeling unworthy of recovery. As your mind grows quieter and more spacious, you can begin to see self-defeating thought patterns for what they are, and open up to other, more positive options.
quotes.author: Sharon Salzberg

quotes.quote: Meditation is the soul's perspective glass.
quotes.author: Owen Feltham

quotes.quote: Meditation is a way for nourishing and blossoming the divinity within you.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: You should sit in meditation for twenty minutes a day, unless you are too busy. Then you should sit for an hour.
quotes.author: Zen Proverb

quotes.quote: Meditation is not a means to an end. It is both the means and the end.
quotes.author: Jiddhu Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: Meditation allows us to directly participate in our lives instead of living life as an afterthought.
quotes.author: Stephen Levine

quotes.quote: Generally we waste our lives, distracted from our true selves, in endless activity. Meditation is the way to bring us back to ourselves, where we can really experience and taste our full being.
quotes.author: Sogyal Rinpoche

quotes.quote: The whole of meditation practice can be essentialized into these 3 crucial points: Bring your mind home. Release. And relax!
quotes.author: Sogyal Rinpoche

quotes.quote: Meditation is the discovery that the point of life is always arrived at in the immediate moment.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: Meditation is the dissolution of thoughts in Eternal awareness or Pure consciousness without objectification, knowing without thinking, merging finitude in infinity.
quotes.author: Swami Sivananda

quotes.quote: Meditation brings wisdom; lack of mediation leaves ignorance. Know well what leads you forward and what hold you back, and choose the path that leads to wisdom.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Meditation here may think down hours to moments. Here the heart may give a useful lesson to the head and learning wiser grow without his books.
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.quote: A good meditation, even when it is interrupted by occasional nodding, is much more beneficial than many outward religious exercises.
quotes.author: Johannes Tauler

quotes.quote: One hour's meditation on the work of the Creator is better than seventy years of prayer.
quotes.author: Muhammad

quotes.quote: Meditation is the tongue of the soul and the language of our spirit.
quotes.author: Jeremy Taylor

quotes.quote: When you meditate, the silence of the senses illumines the presence of God within.
quotes.author: Gurumayi Chidvilasananda

quotes.quote: Meditation is the soul's perspective glass.
quotes.author: Owen Feltham

quotes.quote: Through meditation and by giving full attention to one thing at a time, we can learn to direct attention where we choose.
quotes.author: Eknath Easwaran

quotes.quote: When meditation is mastered, the mind is unwavering like the flame of a lamp in a windless place.
quotes.author: Bhagavad Gita

quotes.quote: Meditation gives us peace of mind without a tranquilizer. And unlike a tranquilizer, the peace of mind that we get from meditation does not fade away. It lasts for good in some corner of the inmost recesses of our aspiring heart.
quotes.author: Sri Chinmoy

quotes.quote: Meditation is a death - death of all that you are now. Of course there will be a resurrection, but that will be a totally new, fresh original being which you are not even aware is hidden in you.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: In meditation, once you are gone in, you are gone in. Then, even when you resurrect you are a totally different person. The old personality is nowhere to be found. You have to start your life again from abc. You have to learn everything with fresh eyes, with a totally new heart. That's why meditation creates fear.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: Meditation is enough. Everything else follows on its own.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: Meditation is to the mind what exercise is to the body, it warms and invigorates.
quotes.author: John Thornton

quotes.quote: Meditation is the womb of our actions; action the midwife of our meditations.
quotes.author: Arthur Warwick

quotes.quote: Meditation is not the menu; it's the meal.
quotes.author: Victor Davich

quotes.quote: Meditation is not a way of making your mind quiet. It is a way of entering into the quiet that is already there buried under the 50,000 thoughts the average person thinks every day.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Meditate, Visualize and Create your own reality and the universe will simply reflect back to you.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: Meditation practice isn't about trying to throw ourselves away and become something better, it's about befriending who we are.
quotes.author: Ani Pema Chodron

quotes.quote: Meekness is not weakness, but spiritual strength harnessed for service.
quotes.author: Joe Cothen

quotes.quote: Meekness is the mask of malice.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.quote: The meek shall inherit the earth. The rest of us are going to the stars.
quotes.author: Peter H. Diamandis

quotes.quote: Meekness, the subtraction of self, reduces the multiplication of words.
quotes.author: Neal A. Maxwell

quotes.quote: TheÂ meekÂ are those who quietly submit themselves to God, to His Word and to His rod, who follow His directions, and comply with His designs, and are gentle toward all men.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.quote: Meekness is not a soft, yielding, natural disposition, nor a prudent bridling of a passionate nature; but it is humility applied to the world, not taking offense at the offenses of the world.
quotes.author: George A. Edgar

quotes.quote: Meekness implies a spirit of gratitude as opposed to an attitude of self-sufficiency, an acknowledgement of a greater power beyond oneself, a recognition of God, and an acceptance of his commandments.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: It's going to be fun to watch and see how long the meek can keep the earth after they inherit it.Â
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.quote: Blessed are theÂ meek: For they shall inherit the earth.
quotes.author: Bible

quotes.quote: MeeknessÂ is one of the brightest graces which can adorn the Christian character.
quotes.author: J. C. Ryle

quotes.quote: Let theÂ meekÂ have the kingdom of heaven. The strong shall rule on earth.
quotes.author: Jenny Trout

quotes.quote: MeekÂ young men grow up in libraries.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: To beÂ meekÂ and humble means to have a service attitude towards God, the Vaisnavas, and all living beings. Unless we have that, our chanting will have minimal effect and many births may pass before we finally come to the conclusion.
quotes.author: Radhanath Swami

quotes.quote: TheÂ meekÂ shall inherit the Earth, but not its mineral rights.
quotes.author: J. Paul Getty

quotes.quote: Meanwhile, theÂ meekÂ are a long time inheriting the earth.
quotes.author: Bob Edwards

quotes.quote: MeeknessÂ is power under control.
quotes.author: Warren W. Wiersbe

quotes.quote: Those who have triedÂ meeknessÂ know the importance of being important.
quotes.author: George Ade

quotes.quote: The highest degree ofÂ meekness consists in seeing, serving, honoring, and treating amiably, on occasion, those who are not to our taste, and who show themselves unfriendly, ungrateful, and troublesome to us.
quotes.author: Saint Francis De Sales

quotes.quote: Meekness is the mark of a man who has been mastered by God.
quotes.author: Geoffrey B. Wilson

quotes.quote: The meek shall inherit the earth, but they'll never increase market share.
quotes.author: William G. McGowan

quotes.quote: Meekness: uncommon patience in planning a revenge that is worth while.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: AÂ meekÂ spirit gives no trouble willingly to any: A quiet spirit bears all wrongs without being troubled.
quotes.author: John Wesley

quotes.quote: Pity the meek, for they shall inherit the earth.
quotes.author: Don Marquis

quotes.quote: MeeknessÂ is the grace which, from beneath God's footstool, lifts up a candid and confiding eye, accepting God's smile of Fatherly affection, and adoring those perfections which it cannot comprehend.
quotes.author: James Hamilton

quotes.quote: The anger of a meek man is like fire struck out of steel, hard to be got out, and when got out, soon gone. The meek enjoy almost a perpetual Sabbath.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.quote: Meekness is calm confidence, settled assurance, and rest of the soul. It is the tranquil stillness of a soul that is at rest in Christ. It is the place of peace.Â Meekness springs from a heart of humility, radiating the fragrance of Christ.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.quote: Even the blind andÂ meekÂ and voiceless have gods.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: TheÂ meekÂ man will attain a place of soul rest. As he walks on inÂ meekness he will be happy to let God defend him. The old struggle to defend himself is over. He has found the peace whichÂ meekness brings.
quotes.author: A.W. Tozer

quotes.quote: MeekÂ young men grow up in colleges and believe it is their duty to accept the views which books have given, and grow up slaves.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Even as we seek to beÂ meekÂ and to avoid contention, we must not compromise or dilute our commitment to the truths we understand.
quotes.author: Dallin H. Oaks

quotes.quote: The meetings can be a lot of fun or they can be frustrating.
quotes.author: Bob Weir

quotes.quote: The world is run by those willing to sit until the end of meetings.
quotes.author: Hugh Park

quotes.quote: Meetings don't have to be endless to be eternal.
quotes.author: James E. Faust

quotes.quote: There is a way of meeting error while on the road of truth.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Meetings move at the speed of the slowest mind in the room.
quotes.author: Dale Dauton

quotes.quote: Meetings are a symptom of bad organization. The fewer meetings the better.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Meeting expectations is good. Exceeding expectations is better.
quotes.author: Ron Kaufman

quotes.quote: The longer the meeting, the less is accomplished.
quotes.author: Tim Cook

quotes.quote: Luck is a matter of preparation meeting opportunity.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: Everyone you will ever meet knows something you don't.
quotes.author: Bill Nye

quotes.quote: Making a strong first impression is as important as ever, especially when meeting face-to-face.
quotes.author: Joseph Abboud

quotes.quote: Meetings are at the heart of an effective organization, and each meeting is an opportunity to clarify issues, set new directions, sharpen focus, create alignment, and move objectives forward
quotes.author: Paul Axtell

quotes.quote: Life is a series of meetings and separations.
quotes.author: Santosh Kalwar

quotes.quote: The meeting of two personalities is like the contact of two chemical substances: if there is any reaction, both are transformed.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: In meetings philosophy might work, on the field practicality works.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Meetings at work present great opportunities to showcase your talent. Do not let them go to waste.
quotes.author: Abhishek Ratna

quotes.quote: You have a meeting to make a decision, not to decide on the question.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Meeting the deadlines is not good enough, beating the deadlines is my expectation.
quotes.author: Dhirubhai Ambani

quotes.quote: The meeting of two eternities, the past and future is precisely the present moment.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Meetings that do not come off keep a character of their own. They stay as they were projected.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bowen

quotes.quote: Meeting people in a genuine way and feeling like there is a vital and meaningful connection going on makes me come alive.
quotes.author: Sharon Salzberg

quotes.quote: A meeting is an event where minutes are taken and hours wasted.
quotes.author: James T. Kirk

quotes.quote: Meetings are indispensable when you don't want to do anything.
quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quotes.quote: A meeting is a collective tacit confession of participants' unwillingness to work.
quotes.author: Pawan Mishra

quotes.quote: Meeting new people is just remembering faces of God we've forgotten.
quotes.author: Harry Whitewolf

quotes.quote: A meeting consists of a group of people who have little to say - until after the meeting.
quotes.author: P.K. Shaw

quotes.quote: Meeting important emotional needs creates the feeling of love, but thoughtfulness keeps it alive.
quotes.author: Willard F. Harley

quotes.quote: People who enjoy meetings should not be in charge of anything.
quotes.author: Thomas Sowell

quotes.quote: Meeting specifications is not enough.
quotes.author: W. Edwards Deming

quotes.quote: Each meeting occurs at the precise moment for which it was meant. Usually, when it will have the greatest impact on our lives.
quotes.author: Nadia Scrieva

quotes.quote: Knowledge of the soul would unfailingly make us melancholy if the pleasures of expression did not keep us alert and of good cheer.
quotes.author: Thomas E. Mann

quotes.quote: My melancholy is the most faithful mistress I have known; what wonder, then, that I love her in return.
quotes.author: Søren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Melancholy and sadness are the start of doubt, doubt is the beginning of despair; despair is the cruel beginning of the differing degrees of wickedness.
quotes.author: Comte de Lautreamont

quotes.quote: Melancholy is a sensual pleasure that is deliberately provoked. How many people shut themselves away to make themselves sadder, or to weep beside a stream, or choose a sentimental book! We are constantly building and unbuilding ourselves.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.quote: The melancholy days are come, the saddest of the year, Of wailing winds, and naked woods and meadows brown and sear.
quotes.author: William C. Bryant

quotes.quote: Only tears can hear the sound of pain when warm blood reddens discolored stain.
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: It is Melancholy that causes those delightful tears to flow, and produces that melting disposition of the heart which is felt in the enjoyment of a pure pleasure, in the possession of a sweet and certain joy.
quotes.author: Jeanne-Marie Roland

quotes.quote: It is a melancholy truth that even great men have their poor relations.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: There is no coming to consciousness without pain.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Depression is melancholy minus its charms the animation, the fits.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.quote: Melancholy is not one of my emotions. Quite seriously, I don't do melancholy. It's a miserable way to be.
quotes.author: Walter Mischel

quotes.quote: Melancholy: an appetite no misery satisfies.
quotes.author: Emil M. Cioran

quotes.quote: I felt that I breathed an atmosphere of sorrow.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: A tendancy to melancholy let it be observed, is a misfortune, not a fault.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: It is a very melancholy reflection that men are usually so weak that it is absolutely necessary for them to know sorrow and pain to be in their right senses.
quotes.author: Richard Steele

quotes.quote: Melancholy is the pleasure of being sad.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Melancholy is the happiness of being sad.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Melancholy is sadness that has taken on lightness.
quotes.author: Italo Calvino

quotes.quote: No one explains this to you, he thought. That there are so many things without solution.
quotes.author: Jesse Ball

quotes.quote: The soul would have no rainbow had the eyes no tears.
quotes.author: John Vance Cheney

quotes.quote: Melancholy characterizes those with a superb sense of the sublime.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: Melancholy is an escape not from reality, but unreality of the world.
quotes.author: Raheel Farooq

quotes.quote: There is a melancholy that stems from greatness.
quotes.author: Nicolas Chamfort

quotes.quote: Melancholy were the sounds on a winter's night.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: Melancholy is not, as you conceive, indisposition Of body, but the mind's disease.
quotes.author: John Ford

quotes.quote: When sadness knows the reason of tears, heart prepares to carry the ache for years.
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: Melancholy is kind of sweet sometimes, I think. It's not a negative thing. It's not a mean thing. It's just something that happens in life, like autumn.
quotes.author: Bill Murray

quotes.quote: It is not all bad, this getting old, ripening. After the fruit has got its growth it should juice up and mellow. God forbid I should live long enough to ferment and rot and fall to the ground in a squash.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: As I got older, I guess I became more mellow and more forgiving and more loving.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: I'm mellower now, I'm over 50. But I don't think I'm too mellow. I'm still angry at a lot of things.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: Sweet is the memory of distant friends! Like the mellow rays of the departing sun, it falls tenderly, yet sadly, on the heart.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: People say that when you get to a certain age that you start to mellow. I have no idea what these people are talking about.
quotes.author: Rita Moreno

quotes.quote: When I'm done with something, I'm done. I don't go back and listen to and pine for my old albums, or the Lollapalooza days, or 'Psalm 69' selling millions of records. Maybe I'm really just getting old and mellow.
quotes.author: Al Jourgensen

quotes.quote: I've been in a couple of weddings where the coolest people that were the most day before so mellow and then the day of the wedding freaking out.
quotes.author: Matthew McConaughey

quotes.quote: Great literature should do some good to the reader: must quicken his perception though dull, and sharpen his discrimination though blunt, and mellow the rawness of his personal opinions.
quotes.author: A. E. Housman

quotes.quote: Hence, rude Winter! crabbed old fellow / Never merry, never mellow / Well-a-day! in rain and snow / What will keep one’s heart aglow?
quotes.author: Alfred Domett

quotes.quote: What will kill this dull old fellow? / Ale that ’s bright, and wine that ’s mellow!
quotes.author: Alfred Domett

quotes.quote: When she rises in the morning / I linger to watch her / She spreads the bath-cloth underneath the window / And the sunbeams catch her / Glistening white on the shoulders / While down her sides the mellow
quotes.author: David Herbert Lawrence

quotes.quote: In the window full of sunlight / Concentrates her golden shadow / Fold on fold, until it glows as / Mellow as the glory roses.
quotes.author: David Herbert Lawrence

quotes.quote: You know, I don't think I could take a mellow evening because I - I don't respond well to mellow. You know what I mean? I have a tendency to - if I get too mellow, I - I ripen and then rot, you know.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Nothing like a safe to give a wine just the right mellowness.
quotes.author: Hannibal Coons

quotes.quote: If it's yellow, let it mellow, if it's brown, let's flush it down, people!
quotes.author: Chris Thompson

quotes.quote: In all thy humors whether grave or mellow / Thour't such a touchy, testy, pleasant fellow / Hast so much wit & mirth & spleen about thee / There is no living with thee / nor without thee.
quotes.author: Addison

quotes.quote: Beautiful is old age-beautiful as the slow-dropping mellow autumn of a rich glorious summer.
quotes.author: J.A. Froude

quotes.quote: Oh! none are so absorb'd, as not to feel / Sweet thoughts like music coming o'er the mind / When prayer, the purest incense of a soul / Hath risen to the throne of heaven, the heart Is mellow'd, and the shadows that becloud / Our state of darken'd being, glide away.
quotes.author: Robert Montgomery

quotes.quote: Though haply mellow'd by correcting time / I thank thee, Heaven! that the bereaving world / Hath not diminish'd the subliming hopes / Of youth, in manhood's more imposing cares.
quotes.author: Robert Montgomery

quotes.quote: Like fine tea, a teacher-pupil relationship needs time to steep and mellow to become full-bodied.
quotes.author: Robert D. Ramsey

quotes.quote: With eyes up-raised, as one inspired, Pale Melancholy sate retired, And from her wild sequestered seat, In notes by distance made more sweet, Poured thro' the mellow horn her pensive soul.
quotes.author: The Passions

quotes.quote: Through it all, I do stay pretty much a laid-back person in this game called life.
quotes.author: Heather Maria Ramirez

quotes.quote: New Zealanders are so laid back, A New Zealander in a frenzy is an American in a coma.
quotes.author: Geoff Tibballs

quotes.quote: I would like to work in environments that are warm and inviting and Laid back. I work best in environments where my stress levels aren't high.
quotes.author: William I. Sauser

quotes.quote: There would be a good work relationship between co workers and a laid back style office and humor.
quotes.author: William I. Sauser

quotes.quote: Laid back personalities are hard to engage as it appears that nothing stimulates them.
quotes.author: Atalanta Beaumont

quotes.quote: It's the same old feeling I get when you're stealing / Back into my bed again / With the curtains closed and the window froze / By the rhythm of the rain / Ooo you make me mellow, oh you make me mellow
quotes.author: Bernie Taupin

quotes.quote: Born high forever to fly / Wind velocity nil / Wanna high forever to fly / If you want your cup our fill / They call me mellow yellow / (Quite rightly)
quotes.author: Donovan Leitch

quotes.quote: Mellow love I want it / Don't want no zero chick / No zero chick to love me / Don't want cosmetic stick / Just want someone to hug me
quotes.author: Shuggie Otis

quotes.quote: In a mellow tone / Feeling fancy free / And I'm not alone / I've got company
quotes.author: Duke Ellington

quotes.quote: The heart of the melody can never be put down on paper.
quotes.author: Pablo Casals

quotes.quote: Just the words and melody - that's what moves your emotions.
quotes.author: Kris Kristofferson

quotes.quote: Great melody over great riffs is, to me, the secret of it all.
quotes.author: Steven Tyler

quotes.quote: What else is the power of melody but the power of feeling? Music is the language of feeling; melody is audible feeling - feeling communicating itself.
quotes.author: Ludwig Andreas Feuerbach

quotes.quote: Music has a poetry of its own, and that poetry is called melody.
quotes.author: Joshua Logan

quotes.quote: It is the melody which is the charm of music, and it is that which is most difficult to produce. The invention of a fine melody is a work of genius.
quotes.author: Joseph Haydn

quotes.quote: Melody has a certain way that it projects back to you. It triggers certain nerves in your body and certain instincts that normally wouldn't be triggered by a normal voice.
quotes.author: Akon

quotes.quote: Melody is the single most important thing to any song, period. I don't care what anybody says, it trumps everything. Not because that's my opinion but because I think it's actually indisputable fact. The human brain retains melody easier than it retains words. It's that simple.
quotes.author: Ryan Tedder

quotes.quote: There's a melody in everything. And once you find the melody, then you connect immediately with the heart. Because sometimes English or Spanish, Swahili or any language gets in the way. But nothing penetrates the heart faster than the melody.
quotes.author: Carlos Santana

quotes.quote: Emotions of any kind can be evoked by melody and rhythm; therefore music has the power to form character.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Melody is a form of remembrance. It must have a quality of inevitability in our ears.
quotes.author: Gian Carlo Menotti

quotes.quote: A melody without the right rhythm hardly exists.
quotes.author: Rokia Traore

quotes.quote: The point about melody and beat and lyric is that they exist to engage you in a very particular way. They want to occupy your attention.
quotes.author: Brian Eno

quotes.quote: Melody is the essence of music.
quotes.author: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

quotes.quote: Good melody is never out of fashion.
quotes.author: Robert Bridges

quotes.quote: It's the melody within the heart that helps us to endure.
quotes.author: John McLeod

quotes.quote: A letter depends on how you read it, a melody on how you sing it.
quotes.author: Isaac Leib Peretz

quotes.quote: When the melody plays, footsteps move, heart sings and spirit begin to dance.
quotes.author: Shah Asad Rizvi

quotes.quote: The principle of the endless melody is the perpetual becoming of a music that never had any reason for starting, any more than it has any reason for ending.
quotes.author: Igor Stravinsky

quotes.quote: The genius of a folk melody or story is not the feeling that it's original but quite the opposite - the feeling that it has existed all along.
quotes.author: Susan Orlean

quotes.quote: When the melody touches your heart emotionally and the words hit your brain intellectually, more than likely you'll find you'll have an excellent song to sing.
quotes.author: Yip Harburg

quotes.quote: A great melodic line is like a person's soul, and coming up with an original melody, it can be like you are illustrating the soul.
quotes.author: Ludovico Einaudi

quotes.quote: It's a combination of melody and lyrics, not one without the other. It's a confluence of these different elements that makes something powerful.
quotes.author: Michael Bolton

quotes.quote: Heard melodies are sweet, but those unheard are sweeter.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: The end of a melody is not its goal: but nonetheless, had the melody not reached its end it would not have reached its goal either. A parable.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: You hear the beginning of a melody, you should kind of know it's going to lead down this path. It should start feeling like a friend, like familiar.
quotes.author: Danny Elfman

quotes.quote: Rhythm and melody enter into the soul of the well-instructed youth and produce there a certain mental harmony hardly obtainable in any other way. ... thus music, too, is concerned with the principles of love in their application to harmony and rhythm.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: The melody is the most important thing that must stay in the minds of the people who listen to you. No matter how many notes you play, you can't let them forget what the song is.
quotes.author: George Benson

quotes.quote: The melody of a religious feeling is the music of life itself. To those who do not hear it I could not explain what it sounds like ... If the spark isn't smoldering somewhere inside one, no efforts can ever bring it into existence. Water cannot catch fire.
quotes.author: Svetlana Alliluyeva

quotes.quote: There's nothing prettier in the world than a melody. I can get lost in a song with a melody.
quotes.author: George Jones

quotes.quote: One of the biggest mistakes that people make when they think about memes is they try to extend on the analogy with genes. That's not how it works. It works by realizing the concept of a replicator.
quotes.author: Susan Blackmore

quotes.quote: The meme for blind faith secures its own perpetuation by the simple unconscious expedient of discouraging rational inquiry.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: Any time you try to create an Internet meme, automatic fail. That's like the worst thing you can do.Â
quotes.author: John Hodgman

quotes.quote: The haven all memes depend on reaching is the human mind, but a human mind is itself an artifact created when memes restructure a human brain in order to make it a better habitat for memes.
quotes.author: Daniel C. Dennett

quotes.quote: Not even the most heavily-armed police state can exert brute force to all of its citizens all of the time. Meme management is so much subtler; the rose-tinted refraction of perceived reality, the contagious fear of threatening alternatives.
quotes.author: Peter Watts

quotes.quote: The interesting question would be whether there's a Darwinian process, a kind of selection process whereby some memes are more likely to spread than others, because people like them, because they're popular, because they're catchy or whatever it might be.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: Creativity needs time to harness before it goes out, and because that's difficult, memes have become the creative language.
quotes.author: M.I.A

quotes.quote: When we think of memetic culture, it is the sausage factory of the old days.Â
quotes.author: Christopher Poole

quotes.quote: You can make an idea spread for good but you can also make an idea spread for bad and the power to make an idea spread, memetics, you know which now people talk about memes.
quotes.author: Jay Roach

quotes.quote: People naturally want to retweet and engage on super funny videos and memes.Â
quotes.author: Jake Paul

quotes.quote: A meme (rhymes with dream) is a unit of information (a catchphrase, a concept, a tune, a notion of fashion, philosophy or politics) that leaps from brain to brain. Memes compete with one another for replication, and are passed down through a population much the same way genes pass through a species.
quotes.author: Kalle Lasn

quotes.quote: As for memes, the word â€˜meme' is a cliche, which is to say it's already a meme. We all hear it all the time, and maybe we even have started to use it in ordinary speech. The man who invented it was Richard Dawkins, who was, not coincidentally, an evolutionary biologist. And he invented it as an analog for the gene.
quotes.author: James Gleick

quotes.quote: Specific units - such as memes are intended to represent have meaning when there is essential discontinuity between categories. Such convenient discontinuities are found in atoms, elementary particles, genes, and DNA.
quotes.author: Luigi Luca Cavalli-Sforza

quotes.quote: Certainly almost everything we do and think is colored in some way by memes, but it is important to realize that not everything we experience is a meme. If I walk down the street and see a tree, the basic perception that's going on is not memetic
quotes.author: Susan Blackmore

quotes.quote: Words are memes that can be pronounced.
quotes.author: Daniel C. Dennett

quotes.quote: Minds are in limited supply, and each mind has a limited capacity for memes, and hence there is considerable competition among memes for entry in as many minds as possible.
quotes.author: Daniel C. Dennett

quotes.quote: In neither his definition nor the examples illustrating what memes are does Dawkins mention anything that would distinguish memes from concepts.
quotes.author: Ernst Mayr

quotes.quote: An Internet meme is a hijacking of the original idea. Instead of mutating by random change and spreading by a form of Darwinian selection, Internet memes are altered deliberately by human creativity. There is no attempt at accuracy of copying, as with genes - and as with memes in their original version
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: Memorable occasions should be brief, and so should be the expressions of appreciation.
quotes.author: Simon Kuznets

quotes.quote: You have to really be courageous about your instincts and your ideas. Otherwise you'll just knuckle under, and things that might have been memorable will be lost.
quotes.author: Francis Ford Coppola

quotes.quote: One cannot make a memorable catch without reaching out to catch the ball.
quotes.author: Jeffrey G. Duarte

quotes.quote: Some memories are unforgettable, remaining ever vivid and heartwarming!
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.quote:
Nobody remembers the moment of birth. Nobody remembers
the moment of death. So between both, you better do memorable things.
quotes.author: A.J. Beirens

quotes.quote: People will walk in and walk out of your life, but the one whose footstep made a long lasting impression is the one you should never allow to walk out.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey

quotes.quote: The most memorable people in your life will be the ones who loved you when you weren't very lovable.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If you want to live a memorable life, you have to be the kind of person who remembers to remember.
quotes.author: Joshua Foer

quotes.quote: The brightest memory fades faster than the dullest ink.
quotes.author: Claudia Rankine

quotes.quote: Remember this although timing in life is everything, memorable moments in history don't just happen! Do something, stay positive!
quotes.author: Amy Dumas

quotes.quote: The value of things is not the time they last, but the intensity with which they occur. That is why there are unforgettable moments and unique people!
quotes.author: Fernando Pessoa

quotes.quote: Every memorable act in the history of the world is a triumph of enthusiasm. Nothing great was ever achieved without it because it gives any challenge or any occupation, no mater how frightening or difficult, a new meaning. Without enthusiasm you are doomed to a life of mediocrity but with it you can accomplish miracles.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: Only powerfully conceived images have the ability to penetrate the memory, to stay there, in short to become unforgettable.
quotes.author: Brassai

quotes.quote: We wrapped our dreams in words and patterned the words so that they would live forever, unforgettable.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: Greatness is a journey that begins with the impossible and turns in to the unforgettable.
quotes.author: Miguel Torres

quotes.quote: The unimaginable always becomes the unforgettable.
quotes.author: Geoffrey Beene

quotes.quote: What makes things memorable is that they are meaningful, significant, colorful.
quotes.author: Joshua Foer

quotes.quote: It's important to be willing to make mistakes. The worst thing that can happen is you become memorable.
quotes.author: Sara Blakely

quotes.quote: Originality is the key to being memorable.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: What makes your brand stick and tick is your ability to make it memorable.
quotes.author: Bernard Kelvin Clive

quotes.quote: Being different and thinking different makes a person unforgettable. History does not remember the forgettable.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: It's one of those unforgettable moments that happen as a child, when you discover that all along the world has been betraying you.
quotes.author: Nicole Krauss

quotes.quote: It is not so much consequence what you say, as how you say it. Memorable sentences are memorable, on account of some single irradiating word.
quotes.author: Alexander Smith

quotes.quote: When the past is forgotten, the present is unforgettable.
quotes.author: Martin Amis

quotes.quote: Being memorable equals getting picked.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Pfeffer

quotes.quote: Be memorable. Say something unforgettable. Be silent
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: If you want to create a memorable company, you have to fill your company with memorable people.
quotes.author: Bill Taylor

quotes.quote: The most memorable is always the current one. The rest just merge into a sea of blondes.
quotes.author: Rod Stewart

quotes.quote: To spare oneself from grief at all cost can be achieved only at the price of total detachment, which excludes the ability to experience happiness.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: The grave is but a covered bridge, leading from light to light, through a brief darkness.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Everything that has a beginning has an ending. Make your peace with that and all will be well.
quotes.author: Jack Kornfield

quotes.quote: In the night of death, hope sees a star, and listening love can hear the rustle of a wing.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.quote: Memorials become relics if they do not stir our modern conscience.
quotes.author: Henry Waxman

quotes.quote: Cover them over with beautiful flowers, Deck them with garlands, those brothers of ours, Lying so silent by night and by day.
quotes.author: Will Carleton

quotes.quote: Grieve not, nor speak of me with tears, but laugh and talk of me as if I were beside you. I Loved You soâ€”â€˜twas heaven here with you.
quotes.author: Isla Paschal Richardson

quotes.quote: There are no goodbyes. Where ever you'll be, you'll be in my heart.
quotes.author: Ghandi

quotes.quote: There are no good-byes, where ever you'll be, you'll be in my heart.
quotes.author: Ghandi

quotes.quote: Death is not the end Death can never be the end. Death is the road. Life is the traveller. The Soul is the Guide our mind thinks of death. Our heart thinks of life our soul thinks of Immortality.
quotes.author: Sri Chinmoy

quotes.quote: We must embrace pain and burn it as fuel for our journey.
quotes.author: Kenji Miyazawa

quotes.quote: Life is eternal, and love is immortal, and death is only a horizon; and a horizon is nothing save the limit of our sight.
quotes.author: Rossiter W. Raymond

quotes.quote: When you are sorrowful look again in your heart, and you shall see that in truth you are weeping for that which has been your delight.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Our cheer goes back to them, the valiant dead! Laurels and roses on their graves to-day, lilies and laurels over them we lay, and violets o'er each unforgotten head.
quotes.author: Richard Hovey

quotes.quote: Death is not extinguishing the light; it is only putting out the lamp because the dawn has come.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: There is a sacredness in tears. They are not the mark of weakness, but of power. They speak more eloquently than ten thousand tongues. They are messengers of overwhelming grief...and unspeakable love.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: You can clutch the past so tightly to your chest that it leaves your arms too full to embrace the present.
quotes.author: Jan Glidwell

quotes.quote: They are dead; but they live in each Patriot's breast, And their names are engraven on honor's bright crest.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Although no sculptured marble should rise to their memory, nor engraved stone bear record of their deeds, yet will their remembrance be as lasting as the land they honored.
quotes.author: Daniel Webster

quotes.quote: We only part to meet again. Change, as ye list, ye winds; my heart shall be the faithful compass that still points to thee.
quotes.author: John Gay

quotes.quote: Distance is not the thing that makes us suffer, it's missing someone that's always in your mind that really makes you suffer.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: When he shall die, Take him and cut him out in little stars, And he will make the face of heaven so fine that all the world will be in love with night, And pay no worship to the garish sun.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Better to die fighting for freedom than be a prisoner all the days of your life.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: He who has gone, so we but cherish his memory, abides with us, more potent, nay, more present than the living man.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: We who are left, how shall we look again happily on the sun or feel the rain without remembering how they who went ungrudgingly and spent their lives for us loved, too, the sun and rain?
quotes.author: Wilfrid Wilson Gibson

quotes.quote: Death leaves a heartache no one can heal, love leaves a memory no one can steal.
quotes.author: Richard Puz

quotes.quote: And can it be that in a world so full and busy the loss of one creature makes a void so wide and deep that nothing but the width and depth of eternity can fill it up!
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Your silent tents of green we deck with fragrant flowers; yours has the suffering been, the memory shall be ours.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: The risk of love is loss, and the price of loss is grief -- But the pain of grief is only a shadow when compared with the pain of never risking love.
quotes.author: Hilary Stanton Zunin

quotes.quote: While we are mourning the loss of our friend, others are rejoicing to meet him behind the veil.
quotes.author: J Taylor

quotes.quote: The memorial itself has been an afterthought. It's astounding to me that the only thing they have up there after four years are a couple of posters.
quotes.author: Bill Doyle

quotes.quote: Memorials become relics if they do not stir our modern conscience.
quotes.author: Henry Waxman

quotes.quote: It's a sad fact that some people are only remembered once they're dead.
quotes.author: BatWhaleDragon

quotes.quote: Grief and tragedy and hatred are only for a time. Goodness, remembrance and love have no end, and the Lord of life holds all who die and all who mourn.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.quote: The only real treasure is in your head. Memories are better than diamonds and nobody can steal them from you
quotes.author: Rodman Philbrick

quotes.quote: Memorial Day isn't just about honoring veterans, its honoring those who lost their lives. Veterans had the fortune of coming home. For us, that's a reminder of when we come home we still have a responsibility to serve. It's a continuation of service that honors our country and those who fell defending it.
quotes.author: Pete Hegseth

quotes.quote: The grief they have experienced has made them more empathetic to the grief of others.
quotes.author: Bill Doyle

quotes.quote: Do you not know that a man is not dead while his name is still spoken?
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: People are like stained-glass windows. They sparkle and shine when the sun is out, but when the darkness sets in; their true beauty is revealed only if their light is from within.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Kubler Ross

quotes.quote: Because one dead leaves every material back, even the body, but what is taken is the soul with memories.
quotes.author: Riku H. Petro

quotes.quote: People leave strange little memories of themselves behind when they die.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: Ceremonies are important. But our gratitude has to be more than visits to the troops, and once a year Memorial Day ceremonies. We honor the dead best by treating the living well.
quotes.author: Jennifer Granholm

quotes.quote: Death leaves a heartache no one can heal, love leaves a memory no one can steal.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Our legacy is really the lives we touch, the inspiration we give, altering someone's plan - if even for a moment and getting them to think, cry, laugh, argue. More than anything, we are remembered for our smiles; the ones we share with our closest and dearest, and the ones we bestow on a total stranger, who needed it right then, and God put you there to deliver.
quotes.author: Carrie Hamilton

quotes.quote: The best memorial for a mighty man is to gain honor ere death.
quotes.author: Decimius Magnus Ausonius

quotes.quote: When someone you love becomes a memory, the memory becomes a treasure.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Memory is a way of holding onto the things you love, the thing you are, the things you never want to lose.
quotes.author: Kevin Arnold

quotes.quote: Memories are like stones, time and distance erode them like acid.
quotes.author: Ugo Betti

quotes.quote: Our memories are independent of our wills. It is not so easy to forget.
quotes.author: Richard B. Sheridan

quotes.quote: A remembrance can mean nothing to the one remembered; it can only remind the ones left behind how little they did while you were still alive.
quotes.author: Sandra Bernhard

quotes.quote: Those whom we have loved never really leave us. They live on forever in our hearts, and cast their radiant light onto our every shadow.
quotes.author: Sylvana Rossetti

quotes.quote: Memories are like a box full of chocolates, you can't have them all at once.
quotes.author: Sarvani Rajdeep

quotes.quote: The grave is but a covered bridge, leading from light to light, through a brief darkness.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: To live in hearts we leave behind is not to die.
quotes.author: Clyde Campbell

quotes.quote: No one ever really dies as long as they took the time to leave us with fond memories.
quotes.author: Chris Sorensen

quotes.quote: One lives in the hope of becoming a memory.
quotes.author: Antonio Porchia

quotes.quote: 'Tis better to have loved and lost / Than to never have loved at all.
quotes.author: Tennyson

quotes.quote: He smiled into the face of Fate and mocked it as he passed. / No, death to him was not defeat, but victory sublime / The grave promoted him to be a hero for all time.
quotes.author: Gen. Patton

quotes.quote: The foolish fear death as the greatest of evils, the wise desire it as a rest after labors and the end of ills.
quotes.author: St. Ambrose

quotes.quote: Death has nothing terrible which life has not made so. A faithful Christian life in this world is the best preparation for the next.
quotes.author: Tyron Edwards

quotes.quote: Memories are like a garden. Regularly tend the pleasant blossoms and remove the invasive weeds.
quotes.author: Linda Fifer Ralphs

quotes.quote: Memories are the key not to the past, but to the future.
quotes.author: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.quote: Memories, all those little experiences make up the fabric of our lives and on balance, I wouldn't want to erase any of them, tempting though it may be.
quotes.author: Ben Affleck

quotes.quote: Leftovers in their less visible form are called memories. Stored in the refrigerator of the mind and the cupboard of the heart.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Memories are dangerous things. You turn them over and over, until you know every touch and corner, but still you'll find an edge to cut you.
quotes.author: Mark Lawrence

quotes.quote: Be careful who you make memories with. Those things can last a lifetime.
quotes.author: Ugo Eze

quotes.quote: Memories, the one thing that can never be taken away from us. Make lots of them!
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Creating memories is a priceless gift. Memories will last a lifetime; things only a short-period of time.
quotes.author: Alyice Edrich

quotes.quote: Memories are the treasures that we keep locked deep within thestorehouse of our souls, to keep our hearts warm when we are lonely.
quotes.author: Becky Aligada

quotes.quote: Our memories are the only paradise from which we can never beexpelled.
quotes.author: Jean Paul Richter

quotes.quote: Memories are contrary things; if you quit chasing them and turn yourback, they often return on their own.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Everybody needs his memories.They keep the wolf of insignificance from the door.
quotes.author: Saul Bellow

quotes.quote: Memories are what warm you up from the inside. But they're also what tear you apart.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: I have memories - but only a fool stores his past in the future.
quotes.author: David Gerrold

quotes.quote: The beautiful thing about memories is that they are yours; whether they are good, bad, or indifferent. They belong to you, and no matter where you are now.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: Memories are bullets. Some whiz by and only spook you. Others tear you open and leave you in pieces.
quotes.author: Richard Kadrey

quotes.quote: Memories are like moonbeams, we do with them what we will.
quotes.author: Kevin Spacey

quotes.quote: To have memories of those you have loved and lost is perhaps harder than to have no memories.
quotes.author: Hugh Jackman

quotes.quote: In my life I find that memories of the spirit linger and sweeten long after memories of the brain have faded.
quotes.author: Harry Connick Jr.

quotes.quote: Our memories give us voice and bear witness to history, so that others might learn. So they might celebrate our triumphs and be warned of our failures.
quotes.author: MOHINDER SURESH

quotes.quote: If we can't make memories, we can't heal.
quotes.author: Leonard Shelby

quotes.quote: The finest memories are those where we have helped someone without expecting anything in return.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer
