quotes.quote: When our memories outweigh our dreams, we have grown old.
quotes.author: Bill Clinton

quotes.quote: The happiest memories are of moments that ended when they should have.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Photos capture our memories in print, but our memories are always with us in our minds.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Memories, even your most precious ones, fade surprisingly quickly. But I don't go along with that. The memories I value most, I don't ever see them fading.
quotes.author: Kazuo Ishiguro

quotes.quote: Memories are like antiques, the older they are the more valuable they became.
quotes.author: Marinela Reka

quotes.quote: For some life lasts a short while, but the memories it holds last forever.
quotes.author: Laura Swenson

quotes.quote: The worst part of holding the memories is not the pain. It's the loneliness of it. Memories need to be shared.
quotes.author: Lois Lowry

quotes.quote: The worst memories stick with us, while the nice ones always seem to slip through our fingers.
quotes.author: Rachel Vincent

quotes.quote: Men rise from one ambition to another: first, they seek to secure themselves against attack, and then they attack others.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.quote: Men are like steel. When they lose their temper, they lose their worth.
quotes.author: Chuck Norris

quotes.quote: Men are born to succeed, not to fail.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Men are more easily governed through their vices than through their virtues.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Men do not quit playing because they grow old; they grow old because they quit playing.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quotes.quote: Men are only as good as their technical development allows them to be.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: By nature, men love newfangledness.
quotes.author: Geoffrey Chaucer

quotes.quote: For many men, the acquisition of wealth does not end their troubles, it only changes them.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: Men of lofty genius when they are doing the least work are most active.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Men can only be happy when they do not assume that the object of life is happiness.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: Men trust their ears less than their eyes.
quotes.author: Herodotus

quotes.quote: Men get to be a mixture of the charming mannerisms of the women they have known.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Do not trust all men, but trust men of worth; the former course is silly, the latter a mark of prudence.
quotes.author: Democritus

quotes.quote: Men must know their limitations.
quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

quotes.quote: All men who have turned out worth anything have had the chief hand in their own education.
quotes.author: Walter Scott

quotes.quote: Men are different. When they are in love they may also have other girlfriends.
quotes.author: Zhang Ziyi

quotes.quote: Men shrink less from offending one who inspires love than one who inspires fear.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.quote: When two men in business always agree, one of them is unnecessary.
quotes.author: Ezra Pound

quotes.quote: Men are often biased in their judgment on account of their sympathy and their interests.
quotes.author: George William Norris

quotes.quote: Men were made for war. Without it they wandered greyly about, getting under the feet of the women, who were trying to organize the really important things of life.
quotes.author: Alice Thomas Ellis

quotes.quote: Men are only as loyal as their options.
quotes.author: Bill Maher

quotes.quote: Men don't want anything they get too easy. But on the other hand, men lose interest quickly.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: Young men want to be faithful, and are not; old men want to be faithless, and cannot.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Men are easy to get but hard to keep.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: Men are like a deck of cards. You'll find the occasional king, but most are jacks.
quotes.author: Laura Swenson

quotes.quote: Where all men think alike, no one thinks very much.
quotes.author: Walter Lippmann

quotes.quote: Men are not against you; they are merely for themselves.
quotes.author: Gene Fowler

quotes.quote: Nearly all men can stand adversity, but if you want to test a man's character, give him power.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Men are what their mothers made them.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Men are like wine - some turn to vinegar, but the best improve with age.
quotes.author: Pope John XXIII

quotes.quote: Always bear in mind that your own resolution to succeed is more important than any other one thing.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Mental health needs a great deal of attention. It's the final taboo and it needs to be faced and dealt with.
quotes.author: Adam Ant

quotes.quote: Knowing your own darkness is the best method for dealing with the darknesses of other people.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: About a third of my cases are suffering from no clinically definable neurosis, but from the senselessness and emptiness of their lives. This can be defined as the general neurosis of our times.
quotes.author: C.G. Jung

quotes.quote: It is naively assumed that the fact that the majority of people share certain ideas and feelings proves the validity of these ideas and feelings. Nothing could be further from the truth. Consensual validation as such has no bearing on reason or mental health.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: This feeling will pass. The fear is real but the danger is not.
quotes.author: Cammie McGovern

quotes.quote: Sanity remains defined simply by the ability to cope with insane conditions.
quotes.author: Ana Castillo

quotes.quote: Nothing defines the quality of life in a community more clearly than people who regard themselves, or whom the consensus chooses to regard, as mentally unwell
quotes.author: Renata Adler

quotes.quote: Hope, hope, hope. It has to be there. Rob the person of hope, and there won't be any recovery.
quotes.author: Dan Fisher

quotes.quote: If you are physically sick, you can elicit the interest of a battery of physicians; but if you are mentally sick, you are lucky if the janitor comes around.
quotes.author: Martin H. Fischer

quotes.quote: Everyone has a moral backside, which he won't show unless he has to, keeping it covered as long as possible with the pants of respectability.
quotes.author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

quotes.quote: I may have looked happy but inside Iwas hopelessly depressed.
quotes.author: Stephen Fry

quotes.quote: I really have a secret satisfaction in being considered rather mad.
quotes.author: William Heath Robinson

quotes.quote: Having a positive mental attitude is asking how something can be done rather than saying it can't be done.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.quote: A strong positive mental attitude will create more miracles than any wonder drug.
quotes.author: Patricia Neal

quotes.quote: I told my psychiatrist that everyone hates me. He said I was being ridiculous - everyone hasn't met me yet.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: Sometimes the appropriate response to reality is to go insane.
quotes.author: Philip K. Dick

quotes.quote: I became insane with long intervals of horrible sanity .
quotes.author: Edgar Allen Poe

quotes.quote: There's lots of people in this world who spend so much time watching their health that they haven't the time to enjoy it.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: One small crack does not mean that you are broken, it means that you we're put to the test and you didn't fall apart
quotes.author: Linda Poindexter

quotes.quote: It is those of us who have been broken that become experts at mending.
quotes.author: Dr. Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: I love the person I've become, because I fought to become her
quotes.author: Kaci Diane

quotes.quote: A wise therapist taught me that anger is the emotion we snatch up to avoid less comfortable feelings - confusion, fear, sadness.
quotes.author: Jill Herzig

quotes.quote: Each time you set a healthy boundary, you say "yes" to more freedom.
quotes.author: Nancy Levin

quotes.quote: The struggle you're in today is developing the strength you need for tomorrow. Don't give up.
quotes.author: Robert Tew

quotes.quote: Talking won't change it. But sometimes it was what she wanted most, to tell someone; often, though, she just wanted to escape those horrid feelings, to escape herself, so there was no pain, no fear, no ugliness.
quotes.author: Melissa Marr

quotes.quote: What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: We cannot be more sensitive to pleasure without being more sensitive to pain.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: I think you have to try and fail, because failure gets you closer to what you're good at.
quotes.author: Louis C.K

quotes.quote: Depression is the inability to construct
quotes.author: Rollo May

quotes.quote: It is sometimes an appropriate response to reality to go insane.
quotes.author: Philip K. Dick

quotes.quote: Men were always quick to believe in the madness of women.
quotes.author: Alison Goodman

quotes.quote: We know that mental illness is not something that happens to other people. It touches us all. Why then is mental illness met with so much misunderstanding and fear?
quotes.author: Tipper Gore

quotes.quote: To ignore the evidence, and hope that it cannot be true, is more an evidence of mental illness.
quotes.author: William Blase

quotes.quote: There is in every madman a misunderstood genius whose idea, shining in his head, frightened people, and for whom delirium was the only solution to the strangulation that life had prepared for him.
quotes.author: Antonin Artaud

quotes.quote: One person's craziness is another person's reality.
quotes.author: Tim Burton

quotes.quote: I do not know a better cure for mental illness than a book.
quotes.author: Irving Stone

quotes.quote: Nothing more isolating than a mental illness.
quotes.author: Hannibal

quotes.quote: There is a pleasure in being mad, which none but madmen know.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: I do not believe that any mental illness exists other than demons, and no medication can straighten it out, other than the power of God.
quotes.author: Doyle Davidson

quotes.quote: When a man mistakes his thoughts for persons and things, this is madness.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: Mental health disorders and self hatred are so closely tied to each other because they fuel each other.
quotes.author: KirstyTV

quotes.quote: People assume you aren't sick unless they see the sickness on your skin like scars forming a map of all the ways you're hurting.
quotes.author: Emm Roy

quotes.quote: Your illness is not your identity. Your chemistry is not your character.
quotes.author: Pastor Rick Warren

quotes.quote: Mentall Illness is not contagious. You can't catch it by being kind.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: One in four people has a mental illness. You can be the one that helps.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Any breakdown is a breakthrough.
quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.quote: A sick thought can devour the body's flesh more than fever or consumption.
quotes.author: Guy De Maupassant

quotes.quote: Mental illness is so much more complicated than any pill that any mortal could invent.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Wurtzel

quotes.quote: Sometimes you climb out of bed in the morning and you think, I'm not going to make it, but you laugh inside â€” remembering all the times you've felt that way.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: Crazy isn't being broken, or swallowing a dark secret. It's you or me, amplified.
quotes.author: Winona Ryder

quotes.quote: All of us are crazy in one or another way.
quotes.author: Theodore Isaac Rubin

quotes.quote: We do not have to visit a madhouse to find disordered minds; our planet is the mental institution of the universe.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Minds that are ill at ease are agitated by both hope and fear.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: The acknowledgement of having suffered evil is the greatest step forward in mental health.
quotes.author: Stefan Molyneux

quotes.quote: Mental illness is nothing to be ashamed of, but stigma and bias shame us all.
quotes.author: William J. Clinton

quotes.quote: Mental illness is not a choice, but recovery is.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Mental illness leaves a huge legacy, not just for the person suffering it but for those around them.
quotes.author: Lysette Anthony

quotes.quote: You're only given a little spark of madness. You mustn't lose it.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: The only antidote to mental suffering is physical pain.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: Mental toughness is a state of mind - you could call it 'character in action.'
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Life has no smooth road for any of us; and in the bracing atmosphere of a high aim the very roughness stimulates the climber to steadier steps, till the legend, over steep ways to the stars, fulfills itself.
quotes.author: W. C. Doane

quotes.quote: Strength grows in the moments when you think you can't go on but you keep going anyway.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Persistence is a unique mental strength; a strength that is essential to combat the fierce power of the repeated rejections and numerous other obstacles that sit in waiting and are all part of winning in a fast-moving, ever-changing world.
quotes.author: Bob Proctor

quotes.quote: Mental toughness is to physical as four is to one.
quotes.author: Bobby Knight

quotes.quote: Mental toughness is essential to success.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Try not to become a man of success but a man of value.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Nothing can stop the man with the right mental attitude from achieving his goal; nothing on earth can help the man with the wrong mental attitude.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Mental Toughness: The ability to consistently perform toward the upper range of your talent and skill regardless of the competitive circumstances.
quotes.author: James E. Loehr

quotes.quote: Fundamentally, what everyone needs is mental strength and confidence, to manage the mind, just as we manage the outside world.
quotes.author: Mata Amritanandamayi

quotes.quote: You have to learn the opponent psychologically inside out and mental strength is one of the important makers. You're either gonna break it or make it.
quotes.author: Wladimir Klitschko

quotes.quote: Concentration and mental toughness are the margins of victory.
quotes.author: Bill Russell

quotes.quote: Make up your mind that no matter what comes your way, no matter how difficult, no matter how unfair, you will do more than simply survive. You will thrive in spite of it.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Enter every activity without giving mental recognition to the possibility of defeat. Concentrate on your strengths, instead of your weaknesses. On your powers, instead of your problems.
quotes.author: Paul J Meyer

quotes.quote: Mental strength is what separates champions from near champions.
quotes.author: Rafael

quotes.quote: Mental toughness must be developed before you start fighting because you don't want to be that guy who quits in the ring.
quotes.author: Forrest Griffin

quotes.quote: At the end of your struggles, challenges, and obstacles comes the mental strength to cross many boundaries in the future.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: Mental toughness is spartanism with qualities of sacrifice, self-denial, dedication. It is fearlessness, and it is love.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Mental Toughness is doing the right thing for the team when it's not the best thing for you.
quotes.author: Bill Belichick

quotes.quote: Mental toughness is doing whatever is necessary to get the job done including handling the demands of a tough workout, withstanding pain, or touching an opponent out at the end of a race.
quotes.author: Jennifer Eberst

quotes.quote: The strength of your mind determines the quality of your life.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: You've got to develop mental strength. And you develop mental strength with the will. The will is the mental faculty that gives you the ability to hold one idea under the screen of your mind to the exclusion of all outside distractions.
quotes.author: Bob Proctor

quotes.quote: A good 80 percent of the vault is still physical and another percentage of it, 20, 25 percent is mental. Mental is always the mental strength, the confidence building up to that contest or repetition, practice, practice, and practice.
quotes.author: Bela Karolyi

quotes.quote: Mental strength is really important because you either win or lose in your mind. And I'm not solely talking about sporting matches, boxing events - anything you do, you do it first with your mental strength. And you can actually train and develop it, and I am responsible for what I'm saying because I have experience with that.
quotes.author: Wladimir Klitschko

quotes.quote: Exercising and eating properly will build your physical and mental strength to endure the stressful situation.
quotes.author: David H. Murdock

quotes.quote: The ability to continue moving when you are feeling scared, fearful or lazy is the sign of true mental strength.
quotes.author: Matthew Donnelly

quotes.quote: He who believes is strong; he who doubts is weak. Strong convictions precede great actions.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: We love being mentally strong, but we hate situations that allow us to put our mental strength to good use.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: In order to be effective you need not only virtue but also mental strength.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: You can never be free until you develop the mental strength to stop fretting over things you cannot control.
quotes.author: Robert Ringer

quotes.quote: The most important attribute a player must have is mental toughness.
quotes.author: Mia Hamm

quotes.quote: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Willing is not enough; we must do.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Because when you're really scared to do something, do it right away.
quotes.author: Henry V. O'Neil

quotes.quote: It's never easy when you're constantly looking to become more.
quotes.author: T Jay Taylor

quotes.quote: Being tough today might cause you to be weak in the future.
quotes.author: Dan Groat

quotes.quote: The only way of finding the limits of the possible is by going beyond them into the impossible.
quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.quote: Mental toughness is essential to success.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Men's best successes come after their disappointments.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher.

quotes.quote: It takes energy, mental toughness and spiritual reinforcement to successfully deal with life's opportunities, and to reach your objectives.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, therefore, is not an act but a habit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Nothing contributes so much to tranquilize the mind as a steady purposeâ€“a point on which the soul may fix its intellectual eye.
quotes.author: Mary Shelley

quotes.quote: If you run into a wall, don't turn around and give up. Figure out how to climb it.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: Nothing great was ever achieved without enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: It was high counsel that I once heard given to a young person, 'always do what you are afraid to do.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: When you are going through hell, keep going.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: If you're looking for the easy challenge, you're not cut out for success.
quotes.author: T Jay Taylor

quotes.quote: What makes you really come together under pressure is determination and focus and toughness.
quotes.author: Debi Thomas

quotes.quote: In terms of instilling the values of mental toughness and work ethic, discipline is the gift that keeps on giving.
quotes.author: William Baldwin

quotes.quote: Mental toughness is to physical as four is to one.
quotes.author: Bobby Knight

quotes.quote: Concentration and mental toughness are the margins of victory.
quotes.author: Bill Russell

quotes.quote: It is not the mountain we conquer but ourselves.
quotes.author: Edmund Hillary

quotes.quote: You're all so busy trying to be tough that you've forgotten how to be brave.
quotes.author: K. Towne Jr.

quotes.quote: Inspiration and genius one and the same.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Life has no smooth road for any of us; and in the bracing atmosphere of a high aim the very roughness stimulates the climber to steadier steps, till the legend, over steep ways to the stars, fulfills itself.
quotes.author: W. C. Doane

quotes.quote: Mental toughness is spartanism with qualities of sacrifice, self-denial, dedication. It is fearlessness, and it is love.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Even if you're on the right track, you'll get run over if you just sit there.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Every artist was first an amateur.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: In life, toughness and roughness go together.
quotes.author: Auliq Ice

quotes.quote: Looking for sanctuary is not what it seems / A journey for all, in there distant dreams /The voice of a wise man / Singing in there hearts / Your pride is your mentor / Honor is where it all starts.
quotes.author: Sanctus Ignis

quotes.quote: Your Mentors in life are important, so choose them wisely.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: Mentors, by far, are the most important aspects of businesses.
quotes.author: Daymond John

quotes.quote: Young people will always need mentors to guide and support them.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Mentors turn into tormentors if they believe they are always right.
quotes.author: Andy Hargreaves

quotes.quote: Mentorship is key to unlocking each of our entrepreneurial spirits.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: Mentorship is critical for young people. Mentorship by others for my children is very high on my agenda.
quotes.author: Peter Woo

quotes.quote: It is important for us to see that our mentors are human and therefore fallible; it makes our own shortcomings more tenable.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: God puts mentors in your path. They may not look like you, sound like you, or be what you expect. But they always know more that you.
quotes.author: Maria Shriver

quotes.quote: I encourage all of you to seek out teachers and mentors that challenge you to think for yourself and guide you to find your own voice.
quotes.author: Renee Olstead

quotes.quote: Mentors are available at all stages of your leadership life - early, middle and late. Seek them out and listen; absorb their knowledge and use it.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Mentors provide professional networks, outlets for frustration, college and career counseling, general life advice, and most importantly, an extra voice telling a student they are smart enough and capable enough to cross the stage at graduation and land their first paycheck from a career pathway job.
quotes.author: Gerald Chertavian

quotes.quote: The best way a mentor can prepare another leader is to expose him or her to other great people.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Mentoring is a brain to pick, an ear to listen, and a push in the right direction.
quotes.author: John C. Crosby

quotes.quote: A mentor is someone who sees more talent and ability within you, than you see in yourself, and helps bring it out of you.
quotes.author: Bob Proctor

quotes.quote: Alexander the Great valued learning so highly, that he used to say he was more indebted to Aristotle for giving him knowledge than to his father Philip for life.
quotes.author: Samuel Smiles

quotes.quote: What you want in a mentor is someone who truly cares for you and who will look after your interests and not just their own. When you do come across the right person to mentor you, start by showing them that the time they spend with you is worthwhile.
quotes.author: Vivek Wadhwa

quotes.quote: The more consistent a father can be or a mentor can be in the person's life and teach them principles of real solid manhood, character, integrity and leadership, the more consistent you can be in the person's life and teach them those things at a younger age, and then the better off they'll be.
quotes.author: Allan Houston

quotes.quote: I think kids should have a mentor and a role model, but that they shouldn't take one person's opinion to be what we call final assessment or judgment about how life is supposed to be.
quotes.author: Sean Paul

quotes.quote: My mistakes have been my greatest mentors.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Remember that mentor leadership is all about serving. Jesus said, 'For even the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve others and to give his life as a ransom for many.'
quotes.author: Tony Dungy

quotes.quote: Without a mentor in life, one can easily succumb to folly. Without a mentor in life, one can easily become self-centered, capricious and arrogant.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: One who refuses to seek the advice of others will eventually be led to a path of ruin. A mentor helps you to perceive your own weaknesses and confront them with courage. The bond between mentor and protege enables us to stay true to our chosen path until the very end.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If a man is to shed the light of the sun upon other men, he must first of all have it within himself.
quotes.author: Romain Rolland

quotes.quote: Mentoring is an indispensable requirement for an artist's growth. Not only are skills and experience shared, but there is value in the essential re-examination of one's own work and techniques.
quotes.author: Jim Norman

quotes.quote: More than mere teachers, mentors are often emancipators, freeing artists from poor technique, clouded vision and personal uncertainty.
quotes.author: Paul Soderberg

quotes.quote: Do not train a child to learn by force or harshness; but direct them to it by what amuses their minds, so that you may be better able to discover with accuracy the peculiar bent of the genius of each.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: In learning you will teach, in teaching you will learn.
quotes.author: Phil Collins

quotes.quote: Sometimes you have to let a person go so they can grow. Because, over the course of their lives, it is not what you do for them, but what you have taught them to do for themselves that will make them a successful human being.
quotes.author: Marc Chernoff

quotes.quote: One of the greatest values of mentors is the ability to see ahead what others cannot see and to help them navigate a course to their destination.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Mercy, detached from Justice, grows unmerciful.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Mercy and forgiveness must be free and unmerited to the wrongdoer. If the wrongdoer has to do something to merit it, then it isn't mercy.
quotes.author: Timothy Keller

quotes.quote: It is mercy, not justice or courage or even heroism, that alone can defeat evil.
quotes.author: Peter Kreeft

quotes.quote: Mercy did not exist in the primordial life. It was misunderstood for fear, and such misunderstandings made for death.
quotes.author: Jack London

quotes.quote: The most merciful thing in the world, is the inability of the human mind to correlate all its contents.
quotes.author: H. P. Lovecraft

quotes.quote: The more merciful acts thou dost, the more mercy thou wilt receive.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.quote: Mercy but murders, pardoning those that kill.
quotes.author: Willliam Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Sweet mercy is nobility's true badge.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Consequently, most of us really exist at the mercy of other people's formulations of what's important.
quotes.author: June Jordan

quotes.quote: Sometimes due to God's mercy, the time in God's plan can be stretched or extended
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: I never ask for mercy and seek no one's sympathy.
quotes.author: Conrad Black

quotes.quote: Justice is for those who deserve it, mercy is for those who don't.
quotes.author: Woodrow Kroll

quotes.quote: I want to put myself absolutely at your mercy for good or evil without any condition, without any limit to your power.
quotes.author: Leopold Von Sacher-Masoch

quotes.quote: Who will not mercy unto others show. How can he mercy ever hope to have?
quotes.author: Edmund Spenser

quotes.quote: Mercy should make us ashamed, wrath afraid to sin.
quotes.author: William Gurnall

quotes.quote: Mercy, that is the gospel. The whole of it in one word.
quotes.author: E. H. Chapin

quotes.quote: I have always found that mercy bears richer fruits than strict justice.
quotes.author: Meir Kahan

quotes.quote: Pity would be no more, if we did not make somebody poor. And Mercy no more could be. If all were as happy as we.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Mercy allows you to continue on in sin, grace empowers you to overcome it.
quotes.author: Jacquelyn K. Heasley

quotes.quote: Where mercy is shown, mercy is given.
quotes.author: Duane "Dog" Chapman

quotes.quote: Mercy will get you killed, but sometimes it's all that makes us human.
quotes.author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quotes.quote: Unless you learn to lead, you will always be at the mercy of someone else to guide you.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Fry

quotes.quote: Whoever feels mercy for the cruel is bound to eventually be cruel to the merciful.
quotes.author: Moshe Kahlon

quotes.quote: The unmerciful man is most certainly an unblessed man. His sympathies are all dried up, he is afflicted with a chronic jaundice, and lives timidly and darkly in a little, narrow rat-hole of distrust.
quotes.author: E. H. Chapin

quotes.quote: Mercy is the stuff you give to people that don't deserve it.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: We shall show mercy, but we shall not ask for it.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Spare me through your mercy, do not punish me through your justice.
quotes.author: Anselm of Canterbury

quotes.quote: Mercy is what moves us toward God, while justice makes us tremble in his sight.
quotes.author: Pope Benedict XVI

quotes.quote: A little bit of mercy makes the world less cold and more just.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: Children are innocent and love justice, while most adults are wicked and prefer mercy.
quotes.author: G. K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: If your thighs touch, you're closer to being a mermaid.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Be a mermaid and make waves.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Rainbows and mermaids are proof that imagination and beauty go hand in hand.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: When mermaids sleep in oceans deep inside their coral caves, they lay their hweads on seaweed beds, rocked softly by the waves.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Write your secrets in the sand and trust them with a mermaid.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A mermaid has not an immortal soul, nor can she obtain one unless she wins the love of a human being. On the power of another hangs her eternal destiny.
quotes.author: Hans Christian Andersen

quotes.quote: Be a mermaid. Swim fast, wear a crown, and dream big.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Dive deep for the treasure that you seek.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: But a mermaid has no tears, and therefore she suffers so much more.
quotes.author: Hans Christian Andersen

quotes.quote: Always be yourself. Unless you can be a mermaid. Then always be a mermaid.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Mermaids don't lose sleep over the opinions of shrimp.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: She is a mermaid on dry land and the world is her ocean.
quotes.author: J. Iron

quotes.quote: She is a mermaid but approach her with caution. Her mind swims at a depth most would drown in.
quotes.author: J. Iron

quotes.quote: If you sing to the mermaids, they come when you're drowning.
quotes.author: Tori Amos

quotes.quote: Mermaid, a water woman who chooses imagination over fear.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I must be a mermaid, Rango. I have no fear of depths and a great fear of shallow living.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: I address you all tonight for who you truly are: wizards, mermaids, travelers, adventurers, and magicians. You are the true dreamers.
quotes.author: Brian Selznick

quotes.quote: Now the Sirens have a still more fatal weapon than their song, namely their silence someone might possibly have escaped from their singing but from their silence, certainly never.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: You don't know what it is to live and laugh and love and run a man through. You've never tasted salty air on your tongue or waved heartily at a mermaid.
quotes.author: Gideon Defoe

quotes.quote: It was like falling down an elevator shaft and landing in a pool full of mermaids.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.quote: The sea, once it casts its spell, holds one in its net of wonder Forever
quotes.author: Jacques Cousteau

quotes.quote: The purely Great Whose soul no siren passion could unsphere, thou nameless, now a power and mixed with fate.
quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

quotes.quote: Even when I'm dead, I'll swim through the earth, like a mermaid of the soil, just to be next to your bones.
quotes.author: Jeffrey McDaniel

quotes.quote: Like a mermaid in seaweed, she dreams awake, trembling in her soft and chilly nest.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: The difference between a Miracle and a Fact is exactly the difference between a mermaid and a seal.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: You can't cross the sea merely by standing and staring at the water.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: Because there's nothing more beautiful than the way the ocean refuses to stop kissing the shoreline, no matter how many times it's sent away.
quotes.author: Sarah Kay

quotes.quote: History is the siren song of the soul.
quotes.author: Terence McKenna

quotes.quote: She dreams of the ocean late at night and longs for the wild salt air.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The Siren waits thee, singing song for song.
quotes.author: Walter Savage Landor

quotes.quote: I will honor christmas in my heart, and try to keep it all the year.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Blessed is the season which engages the whole world in a conspiracy of love!
quotes.author: Hamilton Wright Mabie

quotes.quote: Gifts of time and love are surely the basic ingredients of a truly merry Christmas.
quotes.author: Peg Bracken

quotes.quote: The holy magic that filled that lonely stable so long ago still fills the air of Christmas today.
quotes.author: Mary Hollingsworth

quotes.quote: Bless us Lord, this Christmas, with quietness of mind; Teach us to be patient and always to be kind.
quotes.author: Helen Steiner Rice

quotes.quote:
From home to home, and heart to heart, from one place to another.
The warmth and joy of Christmas, brings us closer to each other.
quotes.author: Emily Matthews

quotes.quote: Even before Christmas has said Hello, it's saying 'Buy Buy'.
quotes.author: Robert Paul

quotes.quote: When we recall Christmas past, we usually find that the simplest thingsâ€”not the great occasionsâ€”give off the greatest glow of happiness.
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.quote:
There is a Christmas song upon the air,
There is a joy innate within the heart;
An inner sense of peace, a holy light
Illumines life and sets these days apart.
quotes.author: Edna Greene Hines

quotes.quote: Christmas is a time to open our hearts to God and his gifts. Just like the rest of the year.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote:
May the spirit of Christmas bring you peace,
The gladness of Christmas give you hope,
The warmth of Christmas grant you love.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Christmas is a necessity. There has to be at least one day of the year to remind us that we're here for something else besides ourselves.
quotes.author: Eric Sevareid

quotes.quote: Christmas is the season when you buy this year's gifts with next year's money.
quotes.author: Kurt Avish

quotes.quote: Christmas is a time when you get homesickâ€”even when you're home.
quotes.author: Carol Nelson

quotes.quote: This is Christmas: not the tinsel, not the giving and receiving, not even the carols, but the humble heart that receives anew the wondrous gift, the Christ.
quotes.author: Frank McKibben
Eva Logue

quotes.quote: Snowflakes falling from the sky, not quite enough to stay. But soon it'll be time for us to say, Merry Christmas on a marvelous day!
quotes.author: Julie Hebert

quotes.quote:
Christmas gift suggestions:
To your enemy, forgiveness.
To an opponent, tolerance.
To a friend, your heart.
To a customer, service.
To all, charity.
To every child, a good example.
To yourself, respect.
quotes.author: Oren Arnold

quotes.quote:
Good news from heaven the angels bring,
Glad tidings to the earth they sing:
To us this day a child is given,
To crown us with the joy of heaven.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: Christmas is the gentlest, loveliest festival of the revolving year - and yet, for all that, when it speaks, its voice has strong authority.
quotes.author: W.J. Cameron

quotes.quote:
The best of all gifts around any Christmas tree:
the presence of a happy family all wrapped up in each other.
quotes.author: Burton Hillis

quotes.quote: Christmas waves a magic wand over this world, and behold, everything is softer and more beautiful.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale
Sir Walter Scott

quotes.quote: Christmas is a season not only of rejoicing but of reflection.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Perhaps the best Yuletide decoration is being wreathed in smiles.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: It is Christmas in the heart that puts Christmas in the air.
quotes.author: W.T. Ellis

quotes.quote: At Christmas, all roads lead home.
quotes.author: Marjorie Holmes

quotes.quote: For centuries men have kept an appointment with Christmas. Christmas means fellowship, feasting, giving and receiving, a time of good cheer, home.
quotes.author: W.J. Ronald Tucker

quotes.quote:
I love the Christmas-tide, and yet,
I notice this, each year I live;
I always like the gifts I get,
But how I love the gifts I give!
quotes.author: Carolyn Wells

quotes.quote: He who has not Christmas in his heart will never find it under a tree.
quotes.author: Roy L. Smith

quotes.quote: The most mesmerizing of artists is always like one who was merely drawing in the sand and people came to watch.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: The enchanting, and sometimes terrifying, thing is that the world can be so many things to so many different souls. That it can be, and is, all these things at once and the same time.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: There is something fascinating about every human being. The question is how much they're willing to divulge.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Rich

quotes.quote: His captivating speech came not from his grammar or vocabulary but from the joy he took in wielding them well.
quotes.author: Robert Lane Greene

quotes.quote: Isn't it fascinating how long a few minutes seem when you are completely alone with not a familiar face in sight?
quotes.author: Kirby Larson

quotes.quote: What's more enchanting than the voices of young people, when you can't hear what they say?
quotes.author: Logan Pearsall Smith

quotes.quote: The fascinating thing about food is that if you have issues with it, you have to face it every single day.
quotes.author: Jami Attenberg

quotes.quote: It's fascinating to think that as soon as man came into existence, he started painting.
quotes.author: Pierre Soulages

quotes.quote: What's so fascinating about people is what they don't show. People are masters at it; usually actors show too much.
quotes.author: Glenn Close

quotes.quote: It's always fascinating - and sometimes a little disquieting - when two first-rate critics violently disagree.
quotes.author: Robert Gottlieb

quotes.quote: Its so fascinating to think about how each snowflake is completely individual - there are millions and millions of them, but each one is so unique.
quotes.author: Kate Bush

quotes.quote: One of the most fascinating lessons I've absorbed about life is that the struggle is good.
quotes.author: Joe Rogan

quotes.quote: There is something fascinating about science. One gets such wholesale returns of conjecture out of such a trifling investment of fact.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The most fascinating person is always the one of the most winning manners; not the one of greatest physical beauty.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: The fascinating thing about ideals is that no sooner have we gained a desired peak than we find farther and higher peaks beyond. The thrilling adventure never ends.
quotes.author: Alice Hegan Rice

quotes.quote: There is something captivating in spirit and intrepidity, to which, we often yield as to a resistless power; nor can he reasonably expect, the confidence of others who too apparently distrusts himself.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: The enchanting charms of this sublime science reveal only to those who have the courage to go deeply into it.
quotes.author: Carl Friedrich Gauss

quotes.quote: Trying to be fascinating is an asinine position to be in.
quotes.author: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.quote: It's fascinating when you're from another place, but you don't speak the language.
quotes.author: Marcus Samuelsson

quotes.quote: It's fascinating how much of our sense of attractiveness and feminine identity is bound up in our hair.
quotes.author: Natalie Dormer

quotes.quote: It is a fascinating and provocative thought that a body of water deserves to be considered as an organism in its own right.
quotes.author: Lyall Watson

quotes.quote: What becomes fascinating is the way the culture industry doesn't deny it and doesn't try to mitigate it, but tries to sell its products as a way of liberating oneself.
quotes.author: Thomas Frank

quotes.quote: And nothing can be more captivating than the waves hitting the shore.
quotes.author: Shivangi Lavaniya

quotes.quote: Life is a message scribbled in the dark.
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.quote: What message is needed when heart speaks to heart?
quotes.author: Ramana Maharshi

quotes.quote: Our eternal message of hope is that dawn will come.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: The message sent is not always the message received.
quotes.author: Virginia Satir

quotes.quote: Live the message, don't just read about it and preach.
quotes.author: Dennis M. Dupuis

quotes.quote: Messages that fail to fascinate will become irrelevant.
quotes.author: Sally Hogshead

quotes.quote: The message behind the words is the voice of the heart.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: The freedom message brings us together, it doesn't divide us.
quotes.author: Ron Paul

quotes.quote: The message coming back at all of us is: live without closure.
quotes.author: Terence McKenna

quotes.quote: Trust that your message is a unique one that people need to hear.
quotes.author: Kathryn Budig

quotes.quote: The simpler the message, the broader the meaning, in many respects.
quotes.author: Paul Rodgers

quotes.quote: When you want your message to be heard, always speak from your heart.
quotes.author: Molly Friedenfeld

quotes.quote: A blog is a message in a bottle, both in purpose and likely readership.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: If you want to burrow a message into a human mind. Work it into a story.
quotes.author: Jonathan Gottschall

quotes.quote: A difficult message to hear is an opportunity to enrich someone's life.
quotes.author: Marshall B. Rosenberg

quotes.quote: Everything you do sends a message about who you are and what you value.
quotes.author: Michael Josephson

quotes.quote: Every message, regardless of form or content, is an expression of a need.
quotes.author: Marshall B. Rosenberg

quotes.quote: Every happening, great and small, is a parable whereby God speaks to us, and the art of life is to get the message.
quotes.author: Malcolm Muggeridge

quotes.quote: Don't let the culture influence your message, let your message influence the culture.
quotes.author: Mike Huckabee

quotes.quote: The Buddhist message is a message not of the negation of life, but one of affirmation.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: A message prepared in the mind reaches a mind; a message prepared in a life reaches a life.
quotes.author: Bill Gothard

quotes.quote: Nature's message was always there and for us to see. It was written on the wings of butterflies.
quotes.author: Kjell Bloch Sandved

quotes.quote: Every message of despair is the statement of a situation from which everybody must freely try to find a way out.
quotes.author: Eugene Ionesco

quotes.quote: A record is a message, timeless.
quotes.author: Ziggy Marley

quotes.quote: The message of great art is to disturb.
quotes.author: Elayne Boosler

quotes.quote: Every happening is a lesson, a message.
quotes.author: Harbhajan Singh Yogi

quotes.quote: Send message to the future by writing it today!
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Through silence only the good messages go unheard.
quotes.author: Brian Patten

quotes.quote: Stay consistent with your message and who you are.
quotes.author: Wilmer Valderrama

quotes.quote: It's not about the language, it's about the message.
quotes.author: Goitsemang Sandra Mvula

quotes.quote: You can get totally messed up trying to please everyone with what you do, but ultimately, you have to please yourself.
quotes.author: Pierce Brosnan

quotes.quote: Some people look like they're lost causes, but they're not. Even if they're in a messed up situation, the one little thing you do to help can go a long way.
quotes.author: Lakeith Stanfield

quotes.quote: Your past doesn't define you. Only your present and your future. If your life is screwed up, stop making excuses. What are you going to do about it today?
quotes.author: Ingrid Weir

quotes.quote: At some point in time, just admit you screwed up, and take whatever steps you need to take to rectify it. Apologize for what happened, ensure to people that it won't happen again.
quotes.author: William Forsyth

quotes.quote: You say you're 'depressed', all I see is resilience. You are allowed to feel messed up and inside out. It doesn't mean you're defective, it just means you're human.
quotes.author: David Mitchell

quotes.quote: If you don’t want your life to be 'messed up', don’t fool around with those who have messed up theirs.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: When you stumble make it part of the dance. Everyone messes up. It's part of the dance of life. So the next time you stumble, smile at the crowd, kick up your heels, and dance a jig! The moment you embrace it as your own, no one will know it's not part of your dance.
quotes.author: Suzy Toronto

quotes.quote: People screw up your life, only when you give them the power to screw it.
quotes.author: Khan Rukayya

quotes.quote: If someone messes up, let it go. If they keep messing up, let them go.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Life is like a beautiful melody, only the lyrics are messed up.
quotes.author: Hans Christian Andersen

quotes.quote: Sticking to good habits can be hard work, and mistakes are part of the process. Don't declare failure simply because you messed up or because you're having trouble reaching your goals. Instead, use your mistakes as opportunities to grow stronger and become better.
quotes.author: Amy Morin

quotes.quote: Once you start messing with psychological well-being, we get more and more messed up.
quotes.author: Ziggy Marley

quotes.quote: You're responsible for yourself. You messed up your life, and it's up to you to fix it. No one else is going to do it for you, for any of you.
quotes.author: Louis Sachar

quotes.quote: Every relationship is messed up. What makes it really perfect is if you still want to be there when things suck.
quotes.author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quotes.quote: It's okay to be messed up, because there are five other dudes who are just as messed up as you.
quotes.author: Gerard Way

quotes.quote: Families are the deepest, most screwed up relationships that we have.
quotes.author: Antony Starr

quotes.quote: Screw up your courage, you screwed up everything else.
quotes.author: Donald Smith

quotes.quote: Everyone is screwed up, broken, clingy, and scared.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: Sometimes you do something, and you get screwed. Sometime it's the things you don't do, and you get screwed.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: Good people sometimes make bad decisions. They mess up, and they let others down. But that doesn't make them bad people. We all make mistakes.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: What screws us up the most in life is the picture in our head of how it's supposed to be.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: All you want is someone who'll never leave your hand, even if you are completely screwed up from top to bottom.
quotes.author: Misbah Abu Obaida Khan

quotes.quote: When chocolate tastes bitter, favorite song or music doesn't soothe, walks, runs or even meditation is exhausting, and the fluffy pillow isn't comforting enough, that is when you know your life is genuinely screwed up.
quotes.author: Frozen Eyes

quotes.quote: It may sound practically tough, but in our lives, we all screw ourselves.
quotes.author: The Nameless Artist

quotes.quote: There is a point in every young person's life when you realize that the youth that you've progressed through and graduate to some sort of adulthood is equally as messed up as where you're going.
quotes.author: Jena Malone

quotes.quote: Confidence is key. Always. Even when we might have messed up.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Tan

quotes.quote: People are messy; therefore, relationships will be messy. Don't be surprised by messiness.
quotes.author: Timothy Keller

quotes.quote: The truth is messy. It's raw and uncomfortable. You can't blame people for preferring lies.
quotes.author: Holly Black

quotes.quote: Don't call the world dirty because you forgot to clean your glasses.
quotes.author: Aaron Hill

quotes.quote: No one has a right to occupy the privileged position all the time, so it should be contested. It should always be messy in there.
quotes.author: Kerry James Marshall

quotes.quote: A messy kitchen is a sign of happiness.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Those who think profit is a dirty word should try to make one.
quotes.author: James Cook

quotes.quote: Cleaning anything involves making something else dirty, but anything can get dirty without something else getting clean.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: If it's dirty, it's not funny, but if it's funny, it's not dirty.
quotes.author: Buddy Hackett

quotes.quote: It's easy to make a mess when you're not the one who has to clean it up.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Good guys need to be a little dirty otherwise they're just boring.
quotes.author: Vincent Cassel

quotes.quote: Surely it's better to love others, however messy and imperfect the involvement, than to allow one's capacity for love to harden.
quotes.author: Karen Armstrong

quotes.quote: A problem is only a problem when viewed as a problem. All change is hard at first, messy in the middle and gorgeous at the end.
quotes.author: Robin S. Sharma

quotes.quote: Like life, revenge can be a messy business. And both would be much simpler if only our heads could figure out which way our hearts will go. But the heart has its reasons, of which reason cannot know.
quotes.author: Emily Thorne

quotes.quote: Life itself is a haphazard, untidy, messy affair.
quotes.author: Dorothy Day

quotes.quote: Messy is a word we use to explain a conflict with an expectation we had. Eliminate the expectation, and you eliminate the messy.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: The truth is messy. It's raw and uncomfortable. You can't blame people for preferring lies.
quotes.author: Holly Black

quotes.quote: There are parts of his life and personality that are extremely messy, and that's the truth.
quotes.author: Walter Isaacson

quotes.quote: It's good to leave your room super-messy when you're away. Whoever tries to break into your room will thought it has already been ransacked.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: Beginnings are always messy.
quotes.author: John Galsworthy

quotes.quote: Man is messy, but any creature that can create space vehicles can probably cope.
quotes.author: George F. Will

quotes.quote: The dirty truth is that many people find fascism to be not particularly horrible.
quotes.author: Michael Parenti

quotes.quote: What a filthy mind you have. Can't imagine why you're single with a brain as dirty as the one you've got.
quotes.author: Lauren Dane

quotes.quote: Life is so messy that the temptation to straighten it up is very strong. And the results always illusory.
quotes.author: Anna Quindlen

quotes.quote: Emotions are messy and hard to figure out.
quotes.author: Spike Jonze

quotes.quote: A messy house is a must it separates your true friends from other friends. Real friends are there to visit you not your house!
quotes.author: Jennifer Wilson

quotes.quote:
"I'll be your mess, you be mine
That was the deal that we had signed."
quotes.author: Gayle Forman

quotes.quote: Family love is messy, clinging, and of an annoying and repetitive pattern, like bad wallpaper.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: Emotion is messy, contradictory... and true.
quotes.author: Nigella Lawson

quotes.quote: Excuse the mess, but we live here.
quotes.author: Roseanne Barr

quotes.quote: Nothing is perfect. Life is messy. Relationships are complex. Outcomes are uncertain. People are irrational.
quotes.author: Hugh Mackay

quotes.quote: A blessed spirit is a mould ever more and more patient of the bright metal poured into it, a body ever more completely uncovered to the meridian blaze of the spiritual sun.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Golden fetters are no less galling to a self respecting man than iron ones. The sting lies in the fetters, not in the metal.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: This extraordinary metal, the soul of every manufacture, and the mainspring perhaps of a civilised society. Of iron.
quotes.author: Samuel Smiles

quotes.quote: The metal of economic theory is in Marx's pages immersed in such a wealth of steaming phrases as to acquire a temperature not naturally its own.
quotes.author: Joseph A. Schumpeter

quotes.quote: We are all slaves to the shining metal.
quotes.author: Douglas William Jerrold

quotes.quote: There is here a great melting pot in which we must compound a precious metal. That metal is the metal of nationality.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: Our squalid society rushed, Narcissus to a man, to gaze on its trivial image on a scrap of metal.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.quote: Heavy Metal is the most conservative of all loud music. Let's face it, not even a gym teacher could get as many people to dress alike.
quotes.author: Jello Biafra

quotes.quote: Metal is more popular than it ever has been, every expression of it.
quotes.author: Mike Scheidt

quotes.quote: Metal is the feeling of being an outsider, but still being part of something huge.
quotes.author: Brian Posehn

quotes.quote: Heavy metal is a universal energy it's the sound of a volcano. It's rock, it's earth shattering. Somewhere in our primal being we understand.
quotes.author: Billy Corgan

quotes.quote: Base metals can be transmuted into gold by stars, and by intelligent beings who understand the processes that power stars, but by nothing else in the universe.
quotes.author: David Deutsch

quotes.quote: Metal isn't necessarily aggressive. There's metal that's contemplative, there's metal that's sad, and there's metal that's exuberant. No genre is limited in what it can express.
quotes.author: John Darnielle

quotes.quote: Metallica is a very complicated, fragile thing. On the outside, it's all metal, but on the inside it's very delicate.
quotes.author: Kirk Hammett

quotes.quote: That's what metal means to me, feeling that feeling when you hear something that totally turns you on.
quotes.author: Chris Reifert

quotes.quote: Metal never goes away. It drifts in and out, but the true fans are always there for it.
quotes.author: Eddie Trunk

quotes.quote: Metal has its own code of cool, but it's not really trying to be cool. And that was very refreshing to me, that metal is very much about expressing something that seems awesome to you even if, at the time, much of the world was going to mock and reject it.
quotes.author: John Darnielle

quotes.quote: Pop music, disco music, and heavy metal music is about shutting out the tensions of life, putting it away.
quotes.author: Peter Tork

quotes.quote: Death metal uses a lot of white face paint and black hair dye to make its point. I quite enjoy this genre for its intensity, extremism and underlying irony: You have to be alive to play it and listen to it.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: If precious metals had been abundant, they would not have been precious.
quotes.author: Henry Hazlitt

quotes.quote: Any transition serious enough to alter your definition of self will require not just small adjustments in your way of living and thinking but a full-on metamorphosis.
quotes.author: Martha Beck

quotes.quote: Keep up your faith to go high and fly, even after so many pains and sorrow. You can turn from a caterpillar to a butterfly. Life gives you a second change: a call to grow.
quotes.author: Ana Claudia Antunes

quotes.quote: Everything teaches transition, transference, metamorphosis: therein is human power, in transference, not in creation; & therein is human destiny, not in longevity but in removal. We dive & reappear in new places.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Similar to a butterfly, I've gone through a metamorphosis, been released from my dark cocoon, embraced my wings, and soared!
quotes.author: Dana Arcuri

quotes.quote: Metamorphosis is the most profound of all acts.
quotes.author: Catherynne M. Valente

quotes.quote: A metamorphosis had come over us. It was something internal, an electrical pulse in the brain, some slight variation in the aortic rhythm that had forever altered our states, transformed our external structures. We were not who we had been, nor yet what we would become.
quotes.author: Cliff James

quotes.quote: I'd rather be this walking metamorphosis than having that old formed opinion about everything.
quotes.author: Raul Seixas

quotes.quote: The world of art is not a world of immortality but of metamorphosis.
quotes.author: Andre Malraux

quotes.quote: Change can be beautiful; butterflies are the greatest proof of this.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: What the philosopher is seeking is not truth, but rather the metamorphosis of the world into man.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: In the nature of things, I must soon lose sight of this sense of constant metamorphosis whose limits bound our human life.
quotes.author: Julia Ward Howe

quotes.quote: Self-realization is a strange term. You don't actually realize your self. If anything, you go away. The caterpillar enters the cocoon of meditation: A butterfly emerges, metamorphosis.
quotes.author: Frederick Lindemann

quotes.quote: It is almost banal to say so yet it needs to be stressed continually: all is creation, all is change, all is flux, all is metamorphosis.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: Nothing ever really goes away, it just changes into something else. Something beautiful.
quotes.author: Sarah Ockler

quotes.quote: People are capable of profound metamorphosis, though unfortunately they rarely avail themselves of this genius, force of habit being an even greater enemy of change than cowardice.
quotes.author: Robin Morgan

quotes.quote: Seeing is metamorphosis, not mechanism.
quotes.author: James Elkins

quotes.quote: It is only in romances that people undergo a sudden metamorphosis. In real life, even after the most terrible experiences, the main character remains exactly the same.
quotes.author: Isadora Duncan

quotes.quote: Life is a cycle, and mime is particularly suitable for showing fluidity, transformation, metamorphosis. Words can keep people apart; mime can be a bridge between them.
quotes.author: Marcel Marceau

quotes.quote: Everything is in a state of metamorphosis. Thou thyself art in everlasting change and in corruption to correspond; so is the whole universe.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: The metamorphosis of your life begins with your mental appreciation for the cocoon stage of your journey. The adversities, the struggles, the perils of life are what either destroy your motivation or encourage your transformation to become what you were truly born to be. A winner!
quotes.author: DeWayne Owens

quotes.quote: And so artistic creation is the metamorphosis of the external physical aspects of a thing into a self-sustaining spiritual reality.
quotes.author: Hans Hofmann

quotes.quote: We go through these metamorphous just like a caterpillar does before becoming a butterfly and the middle of that metamorphosis it always feels uncomfortable.
quotes.author: John Assaraf

quotes.quote: A man, who is constantly engaged in action and works hard until he has achieved his goal undergoes lots of metamorphosis and positive change which helps in his self improvement.
quotes.author: Sam Veda

quotes.quote: You can always be writer. It's not so much a metamorphosis as it is finding what you want.
quotes.author: Jason Diamond

quotes.quote: True metamorphosis doesn't come with flowcharts.
quotes.author: David Mitchell

quotes.quote: The clothes you wear are a metamorphosis. They change you from the outside in.
quotes.author: Linda Grant

quotes.quote: Sometimes to change a situation you are in requires you to take a giant leap. But, you won't be able to fly unless you are willing to transform.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: Change itself is what fascinates me. I am drawn, as a moth to the flame, by edge situations, by situations of metamorphosis.
quotes.author: Annie Proulx

quotes.quote: Human life runs its course in the metamorphosis between receiving and giving.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Metamorphosis has always been the greatest symbol of change for poets and artists. Imagine that you could be a caterpillar one moment and a butterfly the next.
quotes.author: Louie Schwartzberg

quotes.quote: The essence of metaphor is understanding and experiencing one kind of thing in terms of another.
quotes.author: George Lakoff

quotes.quote: Metaphor matters because it creates expectations.
quotes.author: James Geary

quotes.quote: God is a metaphor for that which transcends all levels of intellectual thought. It's as simple as that.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Metaphor is one of a group of problem solving medicines known as figures of speech which are normally used to treat literal thinking and other diseases.
quotes.author: Grant Morrison

quotes.quote: There are metaphors more real than the people who walk in the street.
quotes.author: Fernando Pessoa

quotes.quote: A good metaphor can make any bad idea sound good.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: Early human thought proceeded by metaphor.
quotes.author: Gerald Edelman

quotes.quote: Metaphor is awkward, but emotion, by its nature, leaves you no more scalable approach.
quotes.author: Rachel Hartman

quotes.quote: But metaphors help eliminate what separates you and me.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: Through metaphor to reconcile the people and the stones.
quotes.author: William Carlos Williams

quotes.quote: They say the eyes are the window to the soul.
quotes.author: Wendy Mass

quotes.quote: Metaphor is not, and never has been, a mere literary term. It is an event.
quotes.author: Mary Ruefle

quotes.quote: Metaphors have a way of holding the most truth in the least space.
quotes.author: Orson Scott Card

quotes.quote: Metaphor is the lifeblood of all art.
quotes.author: Twyla Tharp

quotes.quote: A single metaphor can give birth to love.
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.quote: Metaphor is pervasive in everyday life, not just in language but in thought and action. Our ordinary conceptual system, in terms of which we both think and act, is fundamentally metaphorical in nature.
quotes.author: George Lakoff

quotes.quote: Metaphor creates a new reality from which the original appears to be unreal.
quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

quotes.quote: A river of images and thoughts and feelings, dirtied and polluted so that no one could drink from it without gagging.
quotes.author: Barry Lyga

quotes.quote: Metaphor lives a secret life all around us. We utter about six metaphors a minute.
quotes.author: James Geary

quotes.quote: An epithet or metaphor drawn from nature ennobles art; an epithet or metaphor drawn from art degrades nature.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Metaphors are much more tenacious than facts.
quotes.author: Paul de Man

quotes.quote: Metaphor creates a kind of conceptual synesthesia, in which we understand one concept in the context of another.
quotes.author: James Geary

quotes.quote: Metaphors are our way of losing ourselves in semblances or treading water in a sea of seeming.
quotes.author: Roberto Bolaño

quotes.quote: The metaphor is an origin, the origin of an image which acts directly, immediately.
quotes.author: Gaston Bachelard

quotes.quote: What a different result one gets by changing the metaphor!
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Metaphor for the night sky: a trillion asterisks and no explanations.
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: Story is metaphor for life and life is lived in time.
quotes.author: Robert McKee

quotes.quote: Metaphor has traditionally been regarded as the matrix and pattern of the figures of speech.
quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.quote: Metaphor is not just the detection of patterns; it is the creation of patterns.
quotes.author: James Geary

quotes.quote: Metaphor impinges on everything, allowing us poets and non-poets alike to experience and think about the world in fluid, unusual ways.
quotes.author: James Geary

quotes.quote: You are an aperture through which the universe is looking at and exploring itself.
quotes.author: Alan W. Watts

quotes.quote: The great mystery of our metaphysical situation, that God is nearer to us than we are ourselves, is manifest in the fact that we cannot even be wholly ourselves in the sense of individuality as a unique divine thought until we are reborn in Christ.
quotes.author: Dietrich von Hildebrand

quotes.quote: If you haven't attained true clear vision, this causes you to lapse into extremes, so that you lose contact with reality.
quotes.author: Zen Master Yuanwu

quotes.quote: From a pure metaphysical perspective, there is no world outside ourselves. So, at the deepest level, the state of the planet is more a reflection of the consciousness of mankind than the consciousness of mankind is a reflection of world events.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: There is surely a piece of divinity within us, something that was before the elements and owes no homage unto the sun.
quotes.author: Sir Thomas Browne

quotes.quote: The universe will use any vehicle and any medium to communicate with us. Our job is to be alert and to listen.
quotes.author: Elaine Seiler

quotes.quote: Metaphysics is the finding of bad reasons for what we believe upon instinct, but to find these reasons is no less an instinct.
quotes.author: Francis Herbert Bradley

quotes.quote: The metaphysical image that a definite epoch forges of the world has the same structure as what the world immediately understands to be appropriate as a form of its political organization.
quotes.author: Carl Schmitt

quotes.quote: Nothing is lost, nothing is created, everything is transformed.
quotes.author: Antoine-Laurent de Lavoisier

quotes.quote: Metaphysical speculation is independent of the physical validity of the Big Bang itself and is irrelevant to our understanding of it.
quotes.author: Lawrence M. Krauss

quotes.quote: Metaphysical thinking will always no doubt be a strong element in her mentality, and it is to be hoped that she will never lose her great, her sovereign powers in that direction.
quotes.author: Sri Aurobindo

quotes.quote: Metaphysical rebellion is a claim, motivated by the concept of a complete unity, against the suffering of life and death and a protest against the human condition both for its incompleteness, thanks to death, and its wastefulness, thanks to evil.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Metaphysical fallacies contain the only clues we have to what thinking means to those who engage in it.
quotes.author: Hannah Arendt

quotes.quote: Metaphysical speculation is about as pointless as a discussion on the meaning of one's lungs. They're for breathing.
quotes.author: P. D. James

quotes.quote: In the midst of movement and chaos, keep stillness inside of you.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: A metaphysical conclusion is either a false conclusion or a concealed experimental conclusion.
quotes.author: Hermann von Helmholtz

quotes.quote: Force never moves in a straight line, but always in a curve vast as the universe, and therefore eventually returns whence it issued forth, but upon a higher arc, for the universe has progressed since it started.
quotes.author: Kabbalah

quotes.quote: The religious idea of God cannot do full duty for the metaphysical infinity.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: At any given moment, you have the power to say: This is not how the story is going to end.
quotes.author: Christine Mason Miller

quotes.quote: For the metaphysical term 'will' we may in these instances safely substitute the chemical term 'photochemical action of light.
quotes.author: Jacques Loeb

quotes.quote: Metaphysics may be, after all, only the art of being sure of something that is not so and logic only the art of going wrong with confidence.
quotes.author: Joseph Wood Krutch

quotes.quote: Metaphysics attempts to discover the ultimate nature of reality, and in this sense, the innerspace of science fiction is metaphysical fiction.
quotes.author: Kate Wilhelm

quotes.quote: The ultimate metaphysical ground is the creative advance into novelty.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: All that we see is but a dream within a dream.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: Like everything metaphysical the harmony between thought and reality is to be found in the grammar of the language.
quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.quote: In the metaphysical elements of aesthetics the various nonmoral feelings are to be made use of; in the elements of moral metaphysics the various moral feelings of men, according to the differences in sex, age, education, and government, of races and climates, are to be employed.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: Do not commit spiritual suicide through a passion for discussing metaphysical subtleties
quotes.author: Charles H. Spurgeon

quotes.quote: There will be a time when you believe everything is finished. That will be the beginning.
quotes.author: Louis L' Amour

quotes.quote: Metaphysical problems about mind versus matter arise only from epistemological confusions.
quotes.author: Raymond Smullyan

quotes.quote: We are not human beings having a spiritual experience. We are spiritual beings having a human experience.
quotes.author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quotes.quote: Metaphysics, the science which determines what can and what cannot be known of being and the laws of being.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: Metaphysics attempts to discover the ultimate nature of reality, and in this sense, the innerspace of science fiction is metaphysical fiction.
quotes.author: Kate Wilhelm

quotes.quote: Metaphysics is almost always an attempt to prove the incredible by an appeal to the unintelligible.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Metaphysics abstracts the mind from the senses, and the poetic faculty must submerge the whole mind in the senses. Metaphysics soars up to universals, and the poetic faculty must plunge deep into particulars.
quotes.author: Giambattista Vico

quotes.quote: Metaphysics must be based on what exists, for it has the task of explicating it.
quotes.author: Franz Grillparzer

quotes.quote: Metaphysics is a dark ocean without shores or lighthouse, strewn with many a philosophic wreck.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: Metaphysics is a cobweb that the mind weaves around things.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: Metaphysics is universal and is exclusively concerned with primary substance. And here we will have the science to study that which is, both in its essence and in the properties which it has.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Metaphysics, in whatever latitude the term be taken, is a science, or complement of sciences, exclusively occupied with mind.
quotes.author: Sir William Hamilton 9th Baronet

quotes.quote: Metaphysics is the attempt of the mind to rise above the mind.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Metaphysics is the finding of bad reasons for what we believe upon instinct; but to find these reasons is no less an instinct.
quotes.author: F. H. Bradley

quotes.quote: In metaphysics, the notion that earth and all that's on it is a mental construct is the product of people who spend their lives inside rooms. It is an indoor philosophy.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: Metaphysics means nothing but an unusually obstinate effort to think clearly.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: We call metaphysics the Science of Life, because to know pure metaphysics is to renew the life and make death and accident impossible.
quotes.author: Emma Curtis Hopkins

quotes.quote: It is right that we be concerned with the scientific probity of metaphysics.
quotes.author: Gabriel Marcel

quotes.quote: Metaphysics may be, after all, only the art of being sure of something that is not so and logic only the art of going wrong with confidence.
quotes.author: Joseph Wood Krutch

quotes.quote: Methamphetamine: the quintessential American drug. American housewives, heads of state, businessmen and poets alike have acquired a taste for the yellow, crystalline powder. Everyone from Hitler to President Kennedy to Elvis to Jack Kerouac indulged in one of its many forms, and its presence has been an invisible hand shaping events, preparing the ground for the strangest drug epidemic the world has ever seen.
quotes.author: Sterling Braswell

quotes.quote: Methamphetamine is a hideous drug. Meth makes a person become paranoid, violent, and aggressive - making them a serious threat to society and law enforcement. And maybe more importantly, meth users are a threat to their own children and families.
quotes.author: Dirk Kempthorne

quotes.quote: Meth is too easy to make, and unfortunately right now all the ingredients need to make this highly addictive drug are legal and readily available to those who want to cook it up and sell it to our children.
quotes.author: Michael McCaul

quotes.quote: After a few months in my parents' basement, I took an apartment near the state university, where I discovered both crystal methamphetamine and conceptual art. Either one of these things are dangerous, but in combination they have the potential to destroy entire civilizations.
quotes.author: David Sedaris

quotes.quote: Methamphetamine is so Flowers for Algernon: All that super-human cerebral ability fades to limited physical activities like stapling carpet scraps to the wall or masturbation antics worthy of The Guinness Book of World Records.
quotes.author: Clint Catalyst

quotes.quote: Meth depletes the body of calcium, the vitamin essential to maintaining healthy teeth. It also includes acidic ingredients that can damage teeth...Basically, pop the hood of your car and you can find the ingredients you need to cook meth. I’m no dentist, but I came to the conclusion that was the root of my tooth pain.
quotes.author: S.C. Sterling

quotes.quote: It’s sad that burnt marshmallows make me think of methamphetamine, when they should bring back childhood memories of s’mores.
quotes.author: Phil Volatile

quotes.quote: If the devil had invented a drug to lure gay men it would be crystal.
quotes.author: Bob Hattoy

quotes.quote: I had discovered the 'answer' to all my problems…suddenly I felt smarter, sexier, funnier, I could walk into a club cold sober, feeling awkward and alien, do a bump in the bathroom - and then spin out of the stall like wonder woman.
quotes.author: Kevin Koffler

quotes.quote: Let's say you're in a situation where crystal meth can help you. Like, I don't know, you have too many teeth.
quotes.author: Dave Attell

quotes.quote: Imagine trying to live without air. Now imagine something worse.
quotes.author: Amy Reed

quotes.quote: I'd heard a saying about meth, that it took you down one of three roads: jail, the psych ward, or death.
quotes.author: Lauren Myracle

quotes.quote: The consumer landscape...is automatically the perfect context for the production of meth...Alone, aluminum foil, camping stoves, Gatorade bottles, salsa jars, and cold tablets are just domestic objects; together, they are transformed into agents of chaos.
quotes.author: Sarah Holder

quotes.quote: It’s like God tells you that if you take another breath, your children will die. You do everything you can not to take a breath. But eventually you do. That’s what it’s like. Your brain just screams at you.
quotes.author: Erica Haas

quotes.quote: During World War II, meth played a sinister role in the Nazi war machine. The military, along with German civilians, used a commercial form of the drug...to stay awake, alert and energized...Troops called it “tank chocolate” or “pilot’s salt.”
quotes.author: Richard Gunderman

quotes.quote: Cities are the least permanent things in our civilization.
quotes.author: Reynolds Price

quotes.quote: A city takes a chance on us, the same way we took a chance on it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Convinced that the attachment of colonies to the metropolis, depends infinitely more upon moral and religious feeling, than political arrangement, or even commercial advantage, I cannot but lament that more is not done to instill it into the minds of the people.
quotes.author: John Strachan

quotes.quote: All great art is born of the metropolis.
quotes.author: Ezra Pound
