quotes.quote: The city itself swung slowly toward us silent as a dream. No sign of life but puffs of steam from skyscraper chimneys, the motion of the traffic. The mighty towers stood like tombstones in a graveyard, leaning against the sky and waiting for -- for what? Someday we'll know.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: No city should be too large for a man to walk out of in a morning.
quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

quotes.quote: All cities we have visited are precincts in this metropolis of the mind.
quotes.author: Hans-Georg Gadamer

quotes.quote: What strange phenomena we find in a great city, all we need do is stroll about with our eyes open. Life swarms with innocent monsters.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.quote: Cities aren't like people; they live on and on, even though their reason for being where they are has gone downriver and out to sea.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: Love of money is the mother-city (metropolis) of all evils.
quotes.author: Bion of Borysthenes

quotes.quote: To look at the cross-section of any plan of a big city is to look at something like the section of a fibrous tumor.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.quote: But this city is a world of its own, a country within a country. People are used to taking the old and making it news; and used, too, to taking the new and making it old. Every glass of water from its taps, it is said, has passed six times through the kidneys of another, and every scrap of its land has been trodden on, fought over, dug up and broken down for centuries.
quotes.author: Amanda Craig

quotes.quote: In this metropolis a number of lurking leeches infamously gain subsistence by practicing on the credulity of women.
quotes.author: Mary Wollstonecraft

quotes.quote: For the metropolis presents the peculiar conditions which are revealed to us as the opportunities and the stimuli for the development of both these ways of allocating roles to men.
quotes.author: Georg Simmel

quotes.quote: A great city is that which has the greatest men and women
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: The Metropolis Should have been aborted long before it became New York, London or Tokyo.
quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quotes.quote: Emigration, forced or chosen, across national frontiers or from village to metropolis, is the quintessential experience of our time.
quotes.author: John Berger

quotes.quote: Using the commons as a cesspool does not harm the general public under frontier conditions, because there is no public, the same behavior in a metropolis is unbearable.
quotes.author: Garrett Hardin

quotes.quote: METROPOLIS, n. A stronghold of provincialism.
quotes.author: Ambrosse Bierce

quotes.quote: When you operate in an overbuilt metropolis, you have to hack your way with a meat ax.
quotes.author: Robert Moses

quotes.quote: The Metropolis strives to reach a mythical point where the world is completely fabricated by man, so that it absolutely coincides with his desires.
quotes.author: Rem Koolhaas

quotes.quote: The metropolis has always been the seat of the money economy.
quotes.author: George Simmel

quotes.quote: A great city is a great solitude.
quotes.author: Hermione Gingold

quotes.quote: They lived in a great city, a metropolis of many narratives that converged briefly and then separated for ever, discovering their different dooms in that crowd of stories through which all of us, following our own destinies, had to push and shove to find our way through, or out.
quotes.author: Salman Rushdie

quotes.quote: In large commercial cities, the money power is, I fear irresistible. It is not by open corruption that it always, or even most generally, operates.
quotes.author: Roger B. Taney

quotes.quote: In an expanding universe, time is on the side of the outcast. Those who once inhabited the suburbs of human contempt find that without changing their address they eventually live in the metropolis.
quotes.author: Quentin Crisp

quotes.quote: Different cities have different vibes to them, and New York is such a huge, thriving metropolis.
quotes.author: Annie Wersching

quotes.quote: Even cities have their graves!
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: A great city is not to be confounded with a populous one.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The metropolis reveals itself as one of those great historical formations in which opposing streams which enclose life unfold, as well as join one another with equal fight.
quotes.author: Georg Simmel

quotes.quote: We get so focused on micromanaging God and His Kingdom that we forget to realize that He is more than capable of handling things on His own!
quotes.author: Bridget Willard

quotes.quote: The â€œresultâ€ of micromanagement is perhaps tangible in the short run, but more often causes damage for the long term.
quotes.author: Pearl Zhu

quotes.quote: Invariably, micromanaging results in four problems: deceit, disloyalty, conflict, and communication problems.
quotes.author: John Rosemond

quotes.quote: Micromanagement is the destroyer of momentum.
quotes.author: Miles Anthony Smith

quotes.quote: In general, looking forward is great management; looking backward is micromanagement.
quotes.author: Verne Harnish

quotes.quote: We live in a world where the laws are getting so tight that management has changed to micro-management to quantum-management to paralysis.
quotes.author: Jane Siberry

quotes.quote: Macromanage, Not Micromanage
quotes.author: Miles Anthony Smith

quotes.quote: Micromanage the process, not the people.
quotes.author: Joe Apfelbaum

quotes.quote: You can't micromanage. People who try to do that often fall on their faces. Incentivize those who work with you so you get the best work you can. Every career is a team effort, even if you're the one in front.
quotes.author: Michael Franzese

quotes.quote: A boss who micromanages is like a coach who wants to get in the game. Leaders guide and support and then sit back to cheer from the sidelines.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: The best executive is the one who has sense enough to pick good men to do what he wants done, and self-restraint enough to keep from meddling with them while they do it.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Micromanagement is an obstacle to be overcome rather than a method to command.
quotes.author: Terry Mixon

quotes.quote: Trust is a core currency of any relationship. Sometimes our need to control and micromanage everything erodes our confidence in ourselves and others. The truth: People are much more capable than we think. A hearty dose of trust is often what's needed to unlock the magic. Go ahead, have faith.
quotes.author: Kris Carr

quotes.quote: Team members need to feel trusted and valued, and micromanaging communicates the opposite. Founders who are prone to manage every detail of their businesses will ultimately kill themselves as well as lose the support of team members. Learn to delegate key tasks and give credit.
quotes.author: Martin Zwilling

quotes.quote: You do not lead by hitting people over the head -- that's assault, not leadership.
quotes.author: Dwight Eisenhower

quotes.quote: When managers overdo micromanaging of others, they probably hired the wrong people or failed to give them a clear idea of what each one is to accomplish. I prefer to train employees to be self-managers, just as in an orchestra each performer knows his or her role without being micromanaged.
quotes.author: Philip Kotler

quotes.quote: Micromanaging erodes people's confidence, making them overly dependennt on their leaders. Well-meaning leaders inadvertently sabotage their teams by rushing to the rescue and offering too much help. A leader needs to balance assistance with wu wei, backing off long enough to let people learn from their mistakes and develop competence.
quotes.author: Diane Dreher

quotes.quote: Sometimes what happens is that, when you micromanage actors and moments, it just doesn't quite live.
quotes.author: Susan Sarandon

quotes.quote: In my experience, directors who are the most comfortable with themselves and confident in their work give you and everybody on the crew the freedom and the space to create. It's the people who are more insecure who feel the need to control and micromanage.
quotes.author: Sarah Gadon

quotes.quote: Micromanagement is mismanagement. â€¦ [P]eople micromanage to assuage their anxieties about organizational performance: they feel better if they are continuously directing and controlling the actions of othersâ€”at heart, this reveals emotional insecurity on their part. It gives micromanagers the illusion of control (or usefulness). Another motive is lack of trust in the abilities of staffâ€”micromanagers do not believe that their colleagues will successfully complete a task or discharge a responsibility even when they say they will.
quotes.author: Laszlo Bock

quotes.quote: Micromanagers tell. Leaders ask.
quotes.author: Jo Miller

quotes.quote: It doesn't make sense to hire smart people and then tell them what to do. We hire smart people and they tell us what to do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Be the chief but never the lord.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Authorityâ€”when abused through micromanagement, intimidation, or verbal or nonverbal threatsâ€”makes people shut down & productivity ceases.
quotes.author: John Stoker

quotes.quote: If you allow staff to own a project, you must trust in their capacity and avoid micromanagement, ... Be there to provide support when needed, but don't force yourself into the picture.
quotes.author: Barbara Moses

quotes.quote: None of us should wait to be told what to do, or how to do it. Micromanagement kills initiative, judgment and creativity.
quotes.author: David H. Maister

quotes.quote: Micromanagement is the motivational equivalent of buying on credit. Enjoy a better product now, but pay a hefty price for it later.
quotes.author: Ron Friedman

quotes.quote: Micromanaging is ridiculous. There's always a certain amount of dynamic tension, which is good because it stimulates creative thinking. But what we want to look for (in city government) is a balance where each body or group of people is fulfilling their role.
quotes.author: Karin Uhlich

quotes.quote: The conventional definition of management is getting work done through people, but real management is developing people through work.
quotes.author: Agha Hasan Abedi

quotes.quote: Real management is developing people through work.
quotes.author: Agha Hasan Abedi

quotes.quote: The enemy of society is middle class and the enemy of life is middle age.
quotes.author: Orson Welles

quotes.quote: Probably the happiest period in life most frequently is in middle age, when the eager passions of youth are cooled, and the infirmities of age not yet begun; as we see that the shadows, which are at morning and evening so large, almost entirely disappear at midday.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Middle age is youth without levity, and age without decay.
quotes.author: Doris Day

quotes.quote: Middle Age is that perplexing time of life when we hear two voices calling us, one saying, 'Why not?' and the other, 'Why bother?
quotes.author: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.quote: One of the many things nobody ever tells you about middle age is that it's such a nice change from being young.
quotes.author: William Feather

quotes.quote: Middle age is the awkward period when Father Time starts catching up with Mother Nature.
quotes.author: Harold Coffin

quotes.quote: Middle age occurs when you are too young to take up golf and too old to rush up to the net.
quotes.author: Franklin Pierce Adams

quotes.quote: Middle age is when your broad mind and narrow waist begin to change places.
quotes.author: E. Joseph Cossman

quotes.quote: Middle age is when you've met so many people that every new person you meet reminds you of someone else.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: The perceptions of middle age have their own luminosity.
quotes.author: Gail Sheehy

quotes.quote: The really frightening thing about middle age is the knowledge that you'll grow out of it.
quotes.author: Doris Day

quotes.quote: Middle Age - later than you think and sooner than you expect.
quotes.author: Earl Wilson

quotes.quote: Middle age is the time when a man is always thinking that in a week or two he will feel as good as ever.
quotes.author: Don Marquis

quotes.quote: Middle age snuffs out more talent than even wars or sudden death does.
quotes.author: Gerald Brenan

quotes.quote: Middle age is when a guy keeps turning off lights for economical rather than romantic reasons.
quotes.author: Lillian Gordy Carter

quotes.quote: Middle age: when you begin to exchange your emotions for symptoms.
quotes.author: Irvin S. Cobb

quotes.quote: Middle age is when your age starts to show around your middle.
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.quote: Middle age is when work is a lot less fun, and fun is a lot more work.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: At middle age the soul should be opening like a rose, not closing like a cabbage.
quotes.author: John Andrew Holmes

quotes.quote: Middle age is when you're old enough to know better but still young enough to do it.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: Middle age is when it takes you all night to do once what once you used to do all night.
quotes.author: Kenny Everett

quotes.quote: Middle age is having a choice between two temptations and choosing the one that'll get you home earlier.
quotes.author: Dan Bennett

quotes.quote: Middle age snuffs out more talent than ever wars or sudden deaths do.
quotes.author: Richard Hughes

quotes.quote: Middle age is when you choose your cereal for the fibre, not the toy.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Middle age is when, whenever you go on holiday, you pack a sweater.
quotes.author: Denis Norden

quotes.quote: Adulthood is the ever-shrinking period between childhood and old age. It is the apparent aim of modern industrial societies to reduce this period to a minimum.
quotes.author: Thomas Szasz

quotes.quote: As human beings, we all mature physically from childhood to adolescence and then into adulthood, but our emotions lag behind.
quotes.author: Bernard Sumner

quotes.quote: Part of adulthood is searching for the people who understand you.
quotes.author: Hanya Yanagihara

quotes.quote: Just once, I would like there to be something special about being the kid stuck in the middle.
quotes.author: Karen Tayleur

quotes.quote: All my life I’ve lived a beautiful lie. The governor’s son with the bright future set for him. The middle child. The one who no one knew how bad he was suffering until it made the nightly news.
quotes.author: Magan Vernon

quotes.quote: I am the model middle child. I am patient and I like to take care of everyone. Being called nice is a compliment. It's not a boring way to describe me.
quotes.author: Jennifer Garner

quotes.quote: I'm a typical middle child. I'm the mediator. The one that makes everything OK, puts their own needs aside to make sure everybody's happy. It's hard to change your nature, even with years and years of therapy.
quotes.author: Jennifer Jason Leigh

quotes.quote: I was a redhead and a middle child; both can make you feel excluded. It's like fighting to be included, in the swim of things. After a while you start to develop a bit of a victim mentality, which isn't great for a happy life.
quotes.author: Shirley Manson

quotes.quote: I came from a big family, with not enough attention. It's classic. I wasn't the baby, but was second to last. It's absolutely the same story that most people have in this [film] business, they're the middle children. I've encountered some people, and it's weird to me, that they were the youngest in their family. I don't understand how that works, they got the attention.
quotes.author: Paul F. Tompkins

quotes.quote: Being the middle child, I couldn't figure out where I fit in the home. I couldn't figure out whether I was the youngest of the older three or the oldest of the younger three.
quotes.author: Tullian Tchividjian

quotes.quote: I'm a middle child, which is probably why I chose to be an actress. I needed the attention. I've got one older sister and a younger brother.
quotes.author: Nell Hudson

quotes.quote: I was more like a middle child. My youngest brother was the baby, so he got all the attention that the baby gets. And my older brothers were getting into so much trouble that I was left in the middle, doing plays. I was up to no good, but my mother didn't know it!
quotes.author: John C. Reilly

quotes.quote: I'm a middle child, and I'm pretty diplomatic: the peace-maker.
quotes.author: Carrie Coon

quotes.quote: The middle child could do the most amazing things, and nobody's ever going to notice cos the other two are just busy making so much noise.
quotes.author: Richard Herring

quotes.quote: My family is like a team within that home / But siblings compete together, isn't that so? / My mama grew up as a middle child in a middle class home
quotes.author: Benjamin David Goldberg

quotes.quote: Yeah, I got the middle child blues / I couldn't wear your platform shoes / But now it's safe to go back in the water / But I prefer Neptune's daughter
quotes.author: Andrew Scott

quotes.quote: Being a middle child can be hard. The classic 'middle child' is neglected through receiving less attention than the oldest and the youngest of a family.
quotes.author: Susannah Fullerton

quotes.quote: A middle child tends to have low self-esteem, is often lonely and can be introverted.
quotes.author: Susannah Fullerton

quotes.quote: Middle children are expected to set up to the plate when the eldest child goes off to school or in some other way drops out of the picture-and they generally serve when called, becoming what's known as 'functional firstborns'.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Kluger

quotes.quote: There can also be multiple middleborns in a family, and this position can also shift due to family circumstances.
quotes.author: Catherine Salmon Ph.D

quotes.quote: Every child born between the first and last is a middle child.
quotes.author: Catherine Salmon Ph.D

quotes.quote: The younger middle will always develop in response to the chosen direction of the older middle.
quotes.author: Catherine Salmon Ph.D

quotes.quote: If there are only three children, the first gets to be oldest and the third gets to be the baby. The middle child may be left out.
quotes.author: Joel Kotin

quotes.quote: A middle child may feel depressed, unloved, or angry. The "baby" of a family may feel either indulged or neglected.
quotes.author: Joel Kotin

quotes.quote: There is such a phenomenon called the middle child syndrome, whereby we attribute certain behaviors exhibited by the child based on birth order.
quotes.author: Tyesha Alexander

quotes.quote: The middle child may have difficulty finding his place. He might have continued to have similar experiences throughout his life.
quotes.author: Tyesha Alexander

quotes.quote: Individuals also react to being the 'baby' or last bord in the family or middle child.
quotes.author: Tyesha Alexander

quotes.quote: The middle child may not always receive the same attention and when the attention is received it is short lived due to the birth of the youngest child.
quotes.author: Tyesha Alexander

quotes.quote: The middle child has an older sibling to rely on and a younger sibling to look up to her, and the youngest gets to be the baby.
quotes.author: Meri Wallace

quotes.quote: The middle child gains from some of the positives of being both a younger and an older sibling.
quotes.author: Meri Wallace

quotes.quote: But as a middle child she faces some of her own unique challenges. She feels upset about losing her role as the baby, and often feels left out and jealous because both her older and younger siblings command so much attention.
quotes.author: Meri Wallace

quotes.quote: The middle child believed to be very ambitious and have a tendency for jealousy.
quotes.author: Chinazom B. C. Iwuaba

quotes.quote: I remember some struggles, but they were not financial, most of my struggles dealt being a middle child making her own way in the world.
quotes.author: Chef Kimberly Brock Brown CEPC CCA ACE AAC

quotes.quote: Being in the middle class is a feeling as well as an income level
quotes.author: Margaret Halsey

quotes.quote: The most perfect political community is one in which the middle class is in control, and outnumbers both of the other classes.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The middle class were invented to give the poor hope; the poor, to make the rich feel special; the rich, to humble the middle class.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: The enemy of society is middle class and the enemy of life is middle age.
quotes.author: Orson Welles

quotes.quote: Slums may well be breeding grounds of crime, but middle class suburbs are incubators of apathy and delirium.
quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

quotes.quote: From education to broadband, from building roads and bridges to supporting the military, Barack Obama is delivering for North Carolina. And he is delivering for America. A growing middle class is the foundation for a strong America.
quotes.author: Bev Perdue

quotes.quote: Unions did in fact build the middle class. And here's what that did. That built the United States of America as we know it.
quotes.author: Joe Biden

quotes.quote: America's middle class is getting hammered, and Washington is rigged to work for the big guy.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Warren

quotes.quote: In America today, a young person needs more education after high school just to have a chance to make it in the middle class. Not a guarantee, just a chance to make it.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Warren

quotes.quote: The middle class is so funny, it's the class I know best, and it's the class where you find the most pretension, so that's what makes the middle classes so funny.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: The rich are those who play to win. The middle class plays not to lose.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: This opportunity - to make it to the middle class or beyond no matter where you start out in life - it isn't bestowed on us from Washington. It comes from a vibrant free economy where people can risk their own money to open a business.
quotes.author: Marco Rubio

quotes.quote: The real people who suffer when business is leaving or not successful are the people in the middle class.
quotes.author: Mitt Romney

quotes.quote: Doing nothing while the middle class is hurting. That's not leadership. Loose regulations and lax enforcement. That's not leadership. That's abandoning our middle class.
quotes.author: Kamala Harris

quotes.quote: As the middle class is predated upon with an ever greater malicious intensity, their children stand to lose more and harder than their parents ever did.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: The vast majority of Americans, at all coordinates of the economic spectrum, consider themselves middle class; this is a deeply ingrained, distinctly American cognitive dissonance.
quotes.author: Ellen Cushing

quotes.quote: But middle-class in this country was a state of mind, as one of Kaiz’s unbearable friends had once declared. Not the filthy-rich of masala movies, not the dirt-poor of arthouse films, but everything in between. For some it was shorthand for middle-access, a separation from the corridors of power. For others it was middle-culture, a separation from the world of ideas.
quotes.author: Amrita Mahale

quotes.quote: My family is a middle-class family. When I grew up and learned how much it actually cost for us to play hockey, I could not believe that my parents let us play as long as they did.
quotes.author: J.J. Watt

quotes.quote: I am from a middle-class family, and everything I have achieved in life I have only appreciated. I have never gone overboard because I have seen the other side of life. When you have seen the other side of life, you appreciate what you have.
quotes.author: Sushmita Sen

quotes.quote: I noticed, rich people never toss away their pennies in their driveways, middle-class always chuck them there, and stray dogs lick up what little pennies they find on poverty ground.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: It's no longer an exaggeration to say that middle-class Americans are an endangered species
quotes.author: Ariannna Huffington

quotes.quote: The depth of the middle class is waning as the polarization of society is in progress
quotes.author: Katsuya Okada

quotes.quote: Planning ahead is a measure of class. The rich and even the middle class plan for future generations, but the poor can plan ahead only a few weeks or days
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: It's time for folks to stop rooting for its failure, because hard working middle-class families are rooting for its success.
quotes.author: Barrack Obama

quotes.quote: When in one area of the world the standard of living and the size of the middle class increases, it is going to have an effect elsewhere in the world as well.
quotes.author: Christine Lagarde

quotes.quote: Upper classes are a nation's past; the middle class is its future.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: The intellectual is a middle-class product; if he is not born into the class he must soon insert himself into it, in order to exist. He is the fine nervous flower of the bourgeoisie.
quotes.author: Louise Bogan

quotes.quote: There is no greater ladder into the middle class than education. - Martin O'Malley
quotes.author: Martin O'Malley

quotes.quote: A strong, educated middle class is what made America the greatest country in the world.
quotes.author: Lincoln Chafee

quotes.quote: There is plenty of ambitious competition and hypocrisy in the middle class, which makes it a rather fertile environment for a writer.
quotes.author: J.K.Rowling

quotes.quote: In middle school, bullies tortured other kids because they thought it would make people like them more.
quotes.author: Ariana Grande

quotes.quote: I've never run into a person who yearns for their middle school days.
quotes.author: Jeff Kinney

quotes.quote: Nothing could be as hard as middle school.
quotes.author: Zooey Deschanel

quotes.quote: In seventh grade, false feelings and false faces are the rule.
quotes.author: Samantha Abeel

quotes.quote: Teaching middle school is an adventure not a job.
quotes.author: Angela K. Bennett

quotes.quote: Middle school is kind of like Middle-earth.
quotes.author: Kimberly Dana

quotes.quote: Middle school, I believe, are some of the hardest years of school I have gone through and I'm hoping they will be the hardest, because I can't see how I'll get through other ones.
quotes.author: Isaiah Brathwaite

quotes.quote: Middle school has many complex tunnels, some are underground.
quotes.author: Alexandra Contreras-Montesano

quotes.quote: Middle school is exactly what it sounds like. A mixed-up mess of nothing, and yet everything at the same time.
quotes.author: Julia Remillard

quotes.quote: I was thinking that we all learn by experience, but some of us have to go to summer school.
quotes.author: Peter De Vries

quotes.quote: Middle school dances: Go in single = come out dating someone. Go in dating someone = come out single.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: There is an epidemic right now of girls dumbing themselves down... in middle school because they think it makes them attractive.
quotes.author: Danica Mckellar

quotes.quote: Once your kid reaches middle school, parents are really supposed to fade out of the social picture. Kids are supposed to make their own plans, keep up with sophisticatedly crude discussions, and be able to go out on their own without supervision.
quotes.author: Eva LaRue

quotes.quote: Where did you meet your best friend?--Middle School
quotes.author: Patrick Holden

quotes.quote: Someday I will be famous but for now I am stuck in middle school.
quotes.author: Jeff Kinney

quotes.quote: I'm having a hard time getting used to the fact that summer is over and I have to get out of bed every morning to go to school.
quotes.author: Jeff Kinney

quotes.quote: Elemetary School: 30 friends. Middle School: 20 friends. High School: 10 friends. College: 3 real friends.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: It's easier to floss with barbed wire than admit you like someone in middle school.
quotes.author: Laurie Halse Anderson

quotes.quote: My biggest problem in middle school was catty girls, cliques, and trying to figure out if I wanted to be a part of one of those, just figuring out who I was and all that.
quotes.author: Lindsey Shaw

quotes.quote: In my mind, a middle school is not much more than a glorified junior high. The only difference is that it doesn't have the ninth grade. I just can't buy into the philosophy of a middle school until I see any good justification.
quotes.author: Don Puder

quotes.quote: The road to freedom--here and everywhere on earth--begins in the classroom.
quotes.author: Hubert Humphrey

quotes.quote: Every child you pass in the hall has a story that needs to be heard. Maybe you are the one meant to hear it.
quotes.author: Bethany Hill

quotes.quote: The difference between school and life? In school, you're taught a lesson and then given a test. In life, you're given a test that teaches you a lesson.
quotes.author: Tom Bodett

quotes.quote: No matter how much youhate school, you'll always miss it when you leave.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: That proud moment when you say something funny in class, and everyone laughs at it.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: One day middle school will end and become highschool and after that it just becomes life. All those things you think are important now won't be anymore.
quotes.author: Diary of a Whimpy Kid

quotes.quote: When I was in middle school, I always did well in school, but teachers either loved me or absolutely hated me.
quotes.author: Miles Teller

quotes.quote: I want to help middle school girls stay interested in math and be good at it, and see it as friendly and accessible and not this scary thing. Everyone else in society tells them it's not for them. It's for nerdy white guys with pocket protectors.
quotes.author: Danica Mckellar

quotes.quote: In middle school, I had an '87 Regal. That was unheard of.
quotes.author: Young Jeezy

quotes.quote: I started cooking out of middle school depression.
quotes.author: Zac Posen

quotes.quote: Birthing is the most profound initiation to spirituality a woman can have.
quotes.author: Robin Lim

quotes.quote: In all cultures, the midwife's place is on the threshold of life, where intense human emotions, fear, hope, longing, triumph, and incredible physical power-enable a new human being to emerge. Her vocation is unique.
quotes.author: Sheila Kitzinger

quotes.quote: Adversity is the midwife of genius.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: A lonely autumn leaf on the road by sticking to another one becomes more resistant to harsh winds. Unity is the midwife of security!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: The expert is a midwife. The expert is not someone who has the authority to pronounce the last word on the subject.
quotes.author: Philip Kitcher

quotes.quote: Journeys are the midwives of thought. Few places are more conducive to internal conversations than moving planes, ships or trains.
quotes.author: Alain De Botton

quotes.quote: Pain is God's midwife, that helps some virtue into existence.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Prayer is the midwife of mercy, that helps to bring it forth.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.quote: Working with the dying is like being a midwife for this great rite of passage of death. Just as a midwife helps a being take their first breath, you help a being take their last breath.
quotes.author: Ram Dass

quotes.quote: The midwife considers the miracle of childbirth as normal, and leaves it alone unless there's trouble. The obstetrician normally sees childbirth as trouble; if he leaves it alone, it's a miracle.
quotes.author: Sheila Stubbs

quotes.quote: It's not just the making of babies, but the making of mothers that midwives see as the miracle of birth.
quotes.author: Barbara Katz Rothman

quotes.quote: The greatest privilege of a human life is to become a midwife to the awakening of the Soul in another person.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Grief is the midwife of your capacity to be immensely grateful for being born.
quotes.author: Stephen Jenkinson

quotes.quote: Necessity is the mother of invention, it is true -- but it's father is creativity, and knowledge is the midwife.
quotes.author: Jonathan Schattke

quotes.quote: One of the marks of a truly vigorous society is the ability to dispense with passion as a midwife of action --the ability to pass directly from thought to action.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: The listener is the midwife in the difficult birth of the word.
quotes.author: Meša Selimović

quotes.quote: The midwife knows that when there is no pain, the way for the baby cannot be opened and the mother cannot give birth. Likewise, for a new Self to be born, hardship is necessary.
quotes.author: Elif Shafak

quotes.quote: There is a certain justice in criticism. The critic is like a midwife - a tyrannical midwife.
quotes.author: Stephen Spender

quotes.quote: No times were more dangerous than when our country was born, when revolution was our midwife.
quotes.author: Daniel Inouye

quotes.quote: Meditation is the womb of our actions; action the midwife of our meditations.
quotes.author: Arthur Warwick

quotes.quote: The one seeks a midwife to deliver his thoughts, the other, someone to assist: thus a good conversation comes into being.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Whoever heard of a midwife as a literary heroine? Yet midwifery is the very stuff of drama. Every child is conceived either in love or lust, is born in pain, followed by joy or sometimes remorse. A midwife is in the thick of it, she sees it all.
quotes.author: Jennifer Worth

quotes.quote: Genetic engineering is the midwife of a brave new world of environmentally-engineered plagues totally unimaginable in the past. From an evolutionary view, these developments may be the last round.
quotes.author: Michio Kushi

quotes.quote: Force is the midwife of every old society pregnant with a new one.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: Truth is the daughter of time, and I feel no shame in being her midwife.
quotes.author: Johannes Kepler

quotes.quote: Poets are the mad midwives to reality. They see not what is, nor what can be, but what must become.
quotes.author: Dan Simmons

quotes.quote: How does your experience of one sense affect all the others? In addition to being the conduits of pleasure and pain, your senses are the midwives of intelligence.
quotes.author: Michael J. Gelb

quotes.quote: Democracy has to be born anew every generation, and education is its midwife.
quotes.author: John Dewey

quotes.quote: We are meant to midwife dreams for one another. Success occurs in clusters.
quotes.author: Julia Cameron

quotes.quote: In all cultures, the midwife's place is on the threshold of life, where intense human emotions, fear, hope, longing, triumph, and incredible physical power-enable a new human being to emerge. Her vocation is unique.
quotes.author: Shiel Kitzinger

quotes.quote: For a chronic migraine, there are no triggers, life is my trigger. For chronic migraineurs there are no cures, there are only patches that will get you through to the next bout. Have we tried, acupuncture, herbal remedies, diets, standing upside down on our heads? Yes. The answer is if we have gotten diagnosed as chronic migraines then we have tried anything, and if by chance we have been able to get up and put our mask on that day please let us wear it, under our sunglasses and large hats. It took a lot to get there, and ain’t nobody got spoons for that.
quotes.author: Emily A.

quotes.quote: And I have learned now to live with it, learned when to expect it, how to outwit it, even how to regard it, when it does come, as more friend than lodger. We have reached a certain understanding, my migraine and I.
quotes.author: Joan Didion

quotes.quote: Take a hammer and beat it on the side of your head nonstop. If you're trying to relax, if someone’s trying to talk to you, that hammer is still going off.
quotes.author: Percy Harvin

quotes.quote: I've experienced migraine attacks since childhood and know how it can often be dismissed by others, especially since migraine tends to affect women more frequently. I always thought I MUST be 'crazy' or 'dramatic' for always having a headache and other migraine symptoms, but it's time to stop minimizing and normalizing pain.
quotes.author: Whitney Cummings

quotes.quote: Chronic headaches are my fate, and I have adopted a position of philosophical resignation. I am aware that such a view is resoundingly unAmerican. Our culture does not encourage anyone to accept adversity. On the contrary, we habitually declare war on the things that afflict us, whether it's drugs, terrorism, or cancer.
quotes.author: Siri Hustvedt

quotes.quote: A crown is no cure for the headache.
quotes.author: Italian Proverb

quotes.quote: When the head aches, all the members suffer with it.
quotes.author: Roman Proverb

quotes.quote: When the head hurts, the rest of the body aches.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: What thoughts I have of you tonight, Walt Whitman, for I walked down the sidestreets under the trees with a headache self-conscious looking at the full moon.
quotes.author: Allen Ginsberg

quotes.quote: If your kids are giving you a headache, follow the directions on the aspirin bottle, especially the part that says "keep away from children.
quotes.author: Susan Savannah

quotes.quote: Being in love with yourself means never having to say you've got a headache.
quotes.author: Ellie Laine

quotes.quote: When you're lying awake with a dismal headache, and repose is taboo'd by anxiety, / I conceive you may use any language you choose to indulge in, without impropriety.
quotes.author: W.S. Gilbert

quotes.quote: There is no way that the second-most-disabling disease in the world would get this little attention if it was happening to men principally.
quotes.author: William B. Young

quotes.quote: Migraine was thought to be “more of a hysterical woman’s disease and not given the respect it really deserves.
quotes.author: Susan Broner

quotes.quote: No one living with this disease should have to suffer the pain that is migraine alone.
quotes.author: Jim Cramer

quotes.quote: My migraine attacks have taught me to be conscientious of what I feed my body, mind and soul.
quotes.author: Sherill R.

quotes.quote: I've got a migraine and the light coming through that window is not helping matters.
quotes.author: Natalie Hurst

quotes.quote: You think migraines are a sign of weakness, don't want anyone to know, right? Ibuprofen, Sergeant, won't kill you.
quotes.author: Moises Aguilar

quotes.quote: Migraine - Doctor, doctor, won't you help me please? / Migraine - Doctor, doctor, I'm down on my knees / Migraine - I feel it run from my toes to my brain / Migraine - Tried every potion, but it can't be tamed.
quotes.author: James Skelly

quotes.quote: Take away the sensation inside / Bitter sweet migraine in my head / Its like a throbbing tooth ache of the mind / I can't take this feeling anymore / Drain the pressure from the swelling / The sensations overwhelming / Give me a long kiss goodnight and everything will be alright / Tell me that I won't feel a thing / So give me Novocaine / Out of body and out of mind / Kiss the demons out of my dreams / I get the funny feeling, that's alright / Jimmy says it's better than air, / I'll tell you why.
quotes.author: Billie Joe Armstrong

quotes.quote: This is a soul under perpetual migraine attack.
quotes.author: Richard Schickel

quotes.quote: His headache was still sitting over his right eye as if it had been nailed there.
quotes.author: Ian Fleming

quotes.quote: Every single ounce of pain focused on the left part of the head. Feels like whole body except left part of head is in fucking numb state.
quotes.author: Shrestha Sapan

quotes.quote: Right there is the usefulness of migraine, there in that imposed yoga, the concentration on the pain. For when the pain recedes, ten or twelve hours later, everything goes with it, all the hidden resentments, all the vain anxieties. The migraine has acted as a circuit breaker, and the fuses have emerged intact. There is a pleasant convalescent euphoria.
quotes.author: Joan Didion

quotes.quote: When migraines briefly became a campaign issue for me, it appeared that political foes were maybe playing the gender card.
quotes.author: Michele Bachmann

quotes.quote: And then a throb hits you on the left ide of the head so hard that your head bobs to the right...There's no way that came from inside your head, you think. That's no metaphysical crisis. God just punched you in the face.
quotes.author: Andrew Levy

quotes.quote: Love is a universal migraine. A bright stain on the vision Blotting out reason.
quotes.author: Robert Graves

quotes.quote: No matter what stage of illness we are in, whether we've just been diagnosed or we have lived with chronic migraines for decades, there are adjustments we can make to increase joy in our lives and to live more fully.
quotes.author: Sarah Hackley

quotes.quote: That no one dies of migraine seems, to someone deep into an attack, an ambiguous blessing.
quotes.author: Joan Didion

quotes.quote: People who suffer from migraine with aura can sometimes experience a phenomenon called the.
quotes.author: Alice in Wonderland

quotes.quote: Milan is beautiful in fog, like a woman with a veil.
quotes.author: Ornella Vanoni

quotes.quote: Retire me to my Milan, where every third thought shall be my grave.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Milan is a true metropolis: strong and fearless but welcoming, too. Little by little, I came to realize that I could become someone here.
quotes.author: Giorgio Armani

quotes.quote: My favorite thing about Milan is that you see these guys, and it's as if a spaceship came out of the most attractive planet invented and just dropped them off all across the city.
quotes.author: Brad Goreski

quotes.quote: Milan, for me, is a city of discovery. You can find some amazing gardens behind some great houses; I also love finding beautiful galleries and incredible shops, but you have to explore. And the food is amazing.
quotes.author: Francisco Costa

quotes.quote: In Italy, I am almost seen as German for my workaholism. Also I am from Milan, the city where people work the hardest. Work, work, work - I am almost German.
quotes.author: Silvio Berlusconi

quotes.quote: Frankly, Milan kind of sucks as a restaurant city. It's so fashion-obsessed that people don't pay that much attention to the food.
quotes.author: Joe Bastianich

quotes.quote: I love Milan, and I'm not just saying that. It's a city that gives me a great sense of euphoria. I can't explain why, but I feel a special energy there.
quotes.author: Shawn Mendez

quotes.quote: In Paris, choosing a dress is a monumental decision. In Milan, it’s a kick.
quotes.author: Chris Dee

quotes.quote: In Milan, everything is regulated by money. They say 'cappuccio' in bars instead of 'cappuccino' to save a syllable.
quotes.author: Enzo Biagi

quotes.quote: What is Milan's character? Let's not be closed in by our provincialism.
quotes.author: Franca Sozzani

quotes.quote: I grew up in Milan during the golden age of designers. There was fashion all around.
quotes.author: Fabio Lanzoni

quotes.quote: Milan is marvellous, picturesque, and full of elegance.
quotes.author: Wesley Sneijder

quotes.quote: You would never see anyone go to a restaurant in Milan wearing a jumpsuit!
quotes.author: Mariacarla Boscono

quotes.quote: Designers from Milan think that 'more is more,' like Cavalli and Dolce & Gabbana.
quotes.author: Coco Rocha

quotes.quote: Milan is showing a new and different face. At Porta Nuova, too, when they started construction, everyone was up in arms, saying Milan was going to lose its character.
quotes.author: Franca Sozzani

quotes.quote: I drive around on my scooter in Milan alone - we don't have bodyguards or anything like that. I am a fashion designer, not a celebrity, and although I get stopped for autographs and the like, I don't think I am famous.
quotes.author: Steffano Gabbana

quotes.quote: A million miles from nowhere, is better than going nowhere, a million times.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: The adage is true: Walk a mile in my shoes - or drive a mile in my car. There is nothing quite like sitting in the seat yourself.
quotes.author: Bozoma Saint John

quotes.quote: Even though I write about the human race, the further away from them, the better I feel. Two miles is great; two thousand miles is beautiful.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: My grandmother started walking five miles a day when she was sixty. She's ninety-seven now, and we don't know where the hell she is.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: If I were dropped out of a plane into the ocean and told the nearest land was a thousand miles away, I'd still swim. And I'd despise the one who gave up.
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.quote: Let a man walk ten miles steadily on a hot summer's day along a dusty English road, and he will soon discover why beer was invented.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: But you can travel on for ten thousand miles, and still stay where you are.
quotes.author: Harry Chapin

quotes.quote: The difference between greater people and greatest people is the 'est' which stands for 'extra mile'. Extra steps give Extraordinary results; Extraordinary people do Extra things.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Take your million smiles through billion miles; life will never get boring for you even for a while.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Someone can be miles away, but if they're in your heart, that means they're locked in your head, too.
quotes.author: Jessie Reyez

quotes.quote: Do the difficult things while they are easy and do the great things while they are small. A journey of a thousand miles must begin with a single step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Victory is won not in miles but in inches. Win a little now, hold your ground, and later, win a little more.
quotes.author: Louis L'Amour

quotes.quote: I could walk a mile in your shoes, but I already know they're just as uncomfortable as mine. Let's walk next to each other instead.
quotes.author: Lynda Meyers

quotes.quote: I'm one of those fellows so frightened of driving that I go 80 miles an hour - and the more frightened I get, the faster I go.
quotes.author: Orson Welles

quotes.quote: Can miles truly separate you from friends... If you want to be with someone you love, aren't you already there?
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: It's hard to run a mile when you're not a miler and to kick when you've led all the way.
quotes.author: Steve Prefontaine

quotes.quote: I run four times a week. And I don't count miles - I don't do that. I don't care about that. I care about how I feel, and I run according to how I feel.
quotes.author: Ziggy Marley

quotes.quote: I'm not going to fly a million miles with somebody I don't know.
quotes.author: Adriana Lima

quotes.quote: My destination is only 50 miles away, all I have is a bike with a broken wheel.
quotes.author: Britany Lopez

quotes.quote: If you don't have the right people around you and you're moving at a million miles an hour you can lose yourself.
quotes.author: Dave Chappelle

quotes.quote: Farming looks mighty easy when your plow is a pencil and you're a thousand miles from the corn field.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: We're all humans living on this tiny little rock, floating through space at, like, thousands of miles an hour. We should all just get along.
quotes.author: Finn Balor

quotes.quote: If two people believe in the same story, they might be thousands of miles apart and total strangers, but they still have a sense they can trust each other.
quotes.author: James Altucher

quotes.quote: To me, there is no greater way to achieve clarity than to run alone, or share miles with a trusted friend.
quotes.author: Kristin Armstrong

quotes.quote: Memory is a net: one finds it full of fish when he takes it from the brook, but a dozen miles of water have run through it without sticking.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: Nobody would be killed on the roads if the speed limit were 10 miles an hour.
quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

quotes.quote: A milestone is less date and more definition.
quotes.author: Rands

quotes.quote: Life isn't a matter of milestones, but of moments.
quotes.author: Rose Kennedy

quotes.quote: Parenting is a stage of life's journey where the milestones come about every fifty feet.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: A goal is not just an object on a pitch; it is also a milestone on your journey of excellence.
quotes.author: Onyi Anyado

quotes.quote: All children accomplish milestones in their own way, in their own time.
quotes.author: Magda Gerber

quotes.quote: One of the most important milestones we'll all hit along the way is the moment when we finally own our unique point of view and realize how priceless it is.
quotes.author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quotes.quote: I think one of life's great milestones is when a person can look back and be almost as thankful for the setbacks as for the victories.
quotes.author: Bob Dole

quotes.quote: When a milestone is conquered, the subtle erosion called entitlement begins its consuming grind. The team regards its greatness as a trait and a right. Half hearted effort becomes habit and saps a champion.
quotes.author: Pat Riley

quotes.quote: Listing your personal milestones is like storing a pocketful of sunshine for a rainy day. Sometimes our best is simply not enough ... We have to do what is required.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Statutes are mere milestone, telling how far yesterday's thought had traveled; and the talk of the sidewalk today is the law of the land. With us, law in nothing unless close behind it stands a warm, living public opinion.
quotes.author: Wendell Phillips

quotes.quote: Progress is measured by milestones. What many good people lack are markers that might tell them how they are actually doing. Goals can become a ritual or a fetish, but in the right measure they can give us some much needed reference points. No wonder some seem discouraged! Minus such milestones, we often feel minus in our lives
quotes.author: Neal A. Maxwell

quotes.quote: If you have a habit of declaring milestones or changing them based on the crisis of the day, don't expect the team to remain motivated. Similarly, if the team isn't aware of the milestone and the value behind it, they are unlikely to deliver.
quotes.author: Martin Zwilling

quotes.quote: People throw stones at you and you convert them into milestones.
quotes.author: Sachin Tendulkar

quotes.quote: Remember to celebrate milestones as you prepare for the road ahead.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: When you have a life milestone happen, it's good to step back and reassess the things you thought you knew about yourself.
quotes.author: Emily Yoffe

quotes.quote: Dianetics is a milestone for man comparable to his discovery of fire and superior to his invention of the wheel and the arch.
quotes.author: L. Ron Hubbard

quotes.quote: Without a plan, even the most brilliant business can get lost. You need to have goals, create milestones and have a strategy in place to set yourself up for success.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: You need to set near-term milestones. Put the assumptions down on paper, and make it to your vision or ultimate product. Your team has to understand where they're going. Your partners need to understand where they're going.
quotes.author: Tony Fadell

quotes.quote: Every gun that is made, every warship launched, every rocket fired, signifies in the final sense a theft from those who hunger and are not fed, those who are cold and are not clothed.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: In preparing for battle I have always found that plans are useless, but planning is indispensable.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: We sleep safely at night because rough men stand ready to visit violence on those who would harm us.
quotes.author: Winston S. Churchill

quotes.quote: Battles are won by slaughter and maneuver. The greater the general, the more he contributes in maneuver, the less he demands in slaughter.
quotes.author: Winston S. Churchill

quotes.quote: It is a proud privilege to be a soldier _ a good soldier [with] discipline, self-respect, pride in his unit and his country, a high sense of duty and obligation to comrades and to his superiors, and a self confidence born of demonstrated ability.
quotes.author: George S. Patton Jr.

quotes.quote: There is only one tactical principle which is not subject to change. It is to use the means at hand to inflict the maximum amount of wound, death and destruction on the enemy in the minimum amount of time.
quotes.author: George S. Patton Jr.

quotes.quote: People sleep peaceably in their beds at night only because rough men stand ready to do violence on their behalf.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: We must never forget why we have, and why we need our military. Our armed forces exist solely to ensure our nation is safe, so that each and every one of us can sleep soundly at night, knowing we have 'guardians at the gate.'
quotes.author: Allen West

quotes.quote: I hate it when they say, 'He gave his life for his country.' Nobody gives their life for anything. We steal the lives of these kids. We take it away from them. They don't die for the honor and glory of their country. We kill them.
quotes.author: Admiral Gene LaRocque

quotes.quote: No man is fit to command another that cannot command himself.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.quote: The military might of a country represents its national strength. Only when it builds up its military might in every way can it develop into a thriving country.
quotes.author: Kim Jong-un

quotes.quote: The veterans of our military services have put their lives on the line to protect the freedoms that we enjoy. They have dedicated their lives to their country and deserve to be recognized for their commitment.
quotes.author: Judd Gregg

quotes.quote: The U.S. Military is us. There is no truer representation of a country than the people that it sends into the field to fight for it. The people who wear our uniform and carry our rifles into combat are our kids, and our job is to support them, because they're protecting us.
quotes.author: Tom Clancy

quotes.quote: After I was discharged from the military, it was difficult trying to become a civilian.
quotes.author: Chris Kyle

quotes.quote: A Purple Heart just proves that were you smart enough to think of a plan, stupid enough to try it, and lucky enough to survive.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The number of medals on an officer's breast varies in inverse proportion to the square of the distance of his duty from the front line.
quotes.author: Charles Montague

quotes.quote: Whoever said the pen is mightier than the sword obviously never encountered automatic weapons
quotes.author: General MacArthur

quotes.quote: If you can't get them to salute when they should salute and wear the clothes you tell them to wear, how are you going to get them to die for their country?
quotes.author: George Patton

quotes.quote: Why does the Air Force need expensive new bombers? Have the people we've been bombing over the years been complaining?
quotes.author: George Wallace

quotes.quote: You don't have to be straight to be in the military; you just have to be able to shoot straight.
quotes.author: Barry Goldwater

quotes.quote: I have nothing to offer but blood, toil, tears and sweat.
quotes.author: Sir Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Never forget that no military leader has ever become great without audacity. if the leader is filled with high ambition and if he pursues his aims with audacity and strength of will, he will reach them in spite of all obstacles.
quotes.author: Karl von Clausewitz

quotes.quote: I will never quit. My nation expects me to be physically harder and mentally stronger than my enemies. If knocked down i will get back up, every time. I will draw on every remaining ounce of strength to protect my enemies and to accomplish our mission. I am never out of the fight.
quotes.author: Marcus Luttrell

quotes.quote: America's finest - our men and women in uniform, are a force for good throughout the world, and that is nothing to apologize for.
quotes.author: Sarah Palin

quotes.quote: America without her Soldiers would be like God without His angels.
quotes.author: Claudia Pemberton

quotes.quote: The true soldier fights not because he hates what is in front of him, but because he loves what is behind him.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: In peace, children inter their parents; war violates the order of nature and causes parents to inter their children.
quotes.author: Herodotus

quotes.quote: A nation that continues year after year to spend more money on military defense than on programs of social uplift is approaching spiritual doom.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: The consensus seemed to be that if really large numbers of men were sent to storm the mountain, then enough might survive the rocks to take the citadel. This is essentially the basis of all military thinking.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: It is a long-cherished tradition among a certain type of military thinker that huge casualties are the main thing. If they are on the other side then this is a valuable bonus.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: Waiting for you to come back home to me is the hardest thing I've ever had to do. I love you, my soldier, my hero, my husband.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: She stood in the storm, and when the wind did not blow her way (and it surely has not), she adjusted her sails.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Edwards

quotes.quote: It's been a year and 3 months since we've kissed, and I rather have the ghost of his mouth on my lips than kiss anyone else.
quotes.author: Alishah Khan

quotes.quote: The women and families are usually left behind in their country of origin but that does not leave them behind from supporting them. They are always there to love, pray, and care for them from a distance.
quotes.author: Bryce Clive

quotes.quote: The girl he left behind is still behind him. Support our heroes!
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: No matter how far you go, no matter where you go, my heart is always with you.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Military families so much appreciate the love, support and prayers.
quotes.author: Bob McDonnell

quotes.quote: Distance between two hearts is not an obstacle, rather a beautiful reminder of just how strong true love can be.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The scary thing about distance is you don't know whether they'll miss you or forget you
quotes.author: The Notebook

quotes.quote: If you found that one person who is really worth the sacrifices, pain, and hardships then your efforts will not go to waste.
quotes.author: Anna Agoncillo

quotes.quote: Relationships are based on four principles: respect, understanding, acceptance and appreciation.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Marriage is a lot like the army, everyone complains, but you'd be surprise at the large number that re-enlist.
quotes.author: James Garner

quotes.quote: Marriage is a mosaic you build with your spouse. Millions of tiny moments that create your love story.
quotes.author: Jennifer Smith

quotes.quote: We as military spouses don't want special treatment, we want fair treatment.
quotes.author: Deanie Dempsey

quotes.quote: May be its a good idea to write something about you in my book. At least then, there will be a place where we will meet everyday and be together forever!
quotes.author: Anamika Mishra

quotes.quote: Love is the greatest gift when given. It is the highest honor when received.
quotes.author: Fawn Weaver

quotes.quote: You're too far for my hands to hold you, but too near for my heart to love you.
quotes.author: Heraline

quotes.quote: Long distance relationships through mobile communication generally becomes poor because of the weak signals and ends up due to jammed networks.
quotes.author: Amit Abraham

quotes.quote: The worst part is waiting. The best part is having someone worth waiting for.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: My heart is your home, wherever in the world you are you will always have a place to stay.
quotes.author: K.A. Hill

quotes.quote: The only real battle in life is between hanging on and letting go.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: On the battlefield, the military pledges to leave no soldier behind. As a nation, let it be our pledge that when they return home, we leave no veteran behind.
quotes.author: Dan Lipinski

quotes.quote: How lucky I am to have someone who makes saying goodbye so hard.
quotes.author: A. Milne

quotes.quote: The pain of parting is nothing to the joy of meeting again.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Life wasn’t perfect. It wasn’t meant to be. If you didn’t go through the bad times, the sad times, you wouldn’t appreciate how incredible the good times were.
quotes.author: Debbie Mason

quotes.quote: Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid or terrified because of them, for the Lord your God goes with you; he will never leave you nor forsake you.
quotes.author: Deuteronomy 31:6

quotes.quote: The hardest thing of all for a soldier is to retreat.
quotes.author: Duke of Wellington

quotes.quote: May the Lord keep watch between you and me when we are away from each other.
quotes.author: Genesis 31:49

quotes.quote: I am a Soldier, I fight where I am told, and I win where I fight.
quotes.author: George S. Patton

quotes.quote: If you want milk, don't sit on a stool in the middle of a field in the hope that a cow will back up to you.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: Drinking your milk and talking at the same time may result in your having to be patted on the back and dried for quite a long time afterwords.
quotes.author: A A Milne

quotes.quote: You can only milk a cow so long, then you're left holding the pail.
quotes.author: Hank Aaron

quotes.quote: Milk which is just about to turn is akin to that moment spent on the cusp of failure in a dulled and fettered relationship.
quotes.author: Matt Roper

quotes.quote: Sometimes a milk mustache is just a milk mustache.
quotes.author: Jesse Peyronel

quotes.quote: Cows' milk also is poor in iron, and certain forms of cows' milk cause blood and thus iron loss from the gastrointestinal tract. Iron-fortified cereal-based complementary foods â€“ infant cereals â€“ are recommended to supply the iron needs of older infants.
quotes.author: Richard Theuer

quotes.quote: Every time you have a glass of cow milk, some calf is not.
quotes.author: Gary Yourofsky

quotes.quote: Milk is the only juice in a world of cows.
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: Milk without fat is like nonalcoholic Scotch.
quotes.author: Andy Rooney

quotes.quote: Black milk of daybreak we drink it at sundown.
quotes.author: Paul Celan

quotes.quote: Milk every moment for all the pleasure you can get from it.
quotes.author: Esther Hicks

quotes.quote: The supply of the milk of human kindness was short by several gallons
quotes.author: P. G. Wodehouse

quotes.quote: The milk chocolate melts in your mouth, not in your hand.
quotes.author: Advertising Slogans

quotes.quote: Milk is for babies. When you grow up you have to drink beer.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: When the milk of human kindness turns sour, it is a singularly unpalatable draught.
quotes.author: Agnes Repplier

quotes.quote: You can milk a cow the wrong way once and still be a farmer, but vote the wrong way on a water tower and you can be in trouble.
quotes.author: John F Kennedy

quotes.quote: Milk is about helping guys feel good about their skin and relaxed about taking care of it.
quotes.author: Michael Klim

quotes.quote: The cow is of the bovine ilk; one end is moo, the other milk.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: Cheese is milk's leap towards immortality.
quotes.author: Clifton Fadiman

quotes.quote: Milk should be refrigerated even before opening.
quotes.author: Andy Kindler

quotes.quote: As the cream abandons the milk from which it took its life, and rises to the top and rides there, so men, because they are richer than those around about them, separate themselves, and all mankind below them they regard as skim milk.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Everybody can digest milk when they're little.
quotes.author: Carl Zimmer

quotes.quote: Never cry over spilt milk, because it may have been poisoned.
quotes.author: W C Fields

quotes.quote: Cows' milk protein may be the single most significant chemical carcinogen to which humans are exposed.
quotes.author: T. Colin Campbell

quotes.quote: Coconut milk is the only thing on this planet that comes identically to mother's milk.
quotes.author: Dick Gregory

quotes.quote: Our milk chocolate is very chocolaty. In fact, we don't call it milk chocolate - we call it milky chocolate.
quotes.author: Alain Ducasse

quotes.quote: Milk many cows but make your own butter.
quotes.author: Erwin W Lutzer

quotes.quote: Every time you drink a glass of milk or eat a piece of cheese, you harm a mother. Please go vegan.
quotes.author: Gary L. Francione

quotes.quote: Milk has calcium in it. This can help you grow healthy teeth and bones.
quotes.author: John Malam

quotes.quote: Milk is really a product of culture. From the moment of expression, milk enters a matrix of human contrivance. Simply defining what people believed milk to be in the past is a tricky task.
quotes.author: Deborah Valenze

quotes.quote: Milkshakes make the world seem less shitty.
quotes.author: Shaun David Hutchinson

quotes.quote: If I can't suck your milkshake through a straw, it's not a milkshake, it's a glass of ice cream.
quotes.author: Bill Maher

quotes.quote: Ed felt faint. Milk shake, as it turned out, was much less handy in your veins than, say, oxygen.
quotes.author: Francine Pascal

quotes.quote: If you have a milkshake and I have a milkshake, and I have a straw. There it is, that's the straw, you see? Now my straw reaches across the room, and starts to drink your milkshake. I drink your milkshake! I drink it up!
quotes.author: Daniel Day-Lewis

quotes.quote: There's a safety in thinking in a diner. You can have your coffee or your milkshake, and you can go off into strange dark areas, and always come back to the safety of the diner.
quotes.author: David Lynch

quotes.quote: They say some of my stars drink whiskey, but I have found that the ones who drink milkshakes don't win many ball games.
quotes.author: Casey Stengel

quotes.quote: As a child, I lived with being funnier than other boys in class. The only consolation was my parents’ empathy they encouraged constant trips to the local drugstore for chocolate milk shakes to fatten me up.
quotes.author: James D. Watson

quotes.quote: You don't need to go to heaven to find out what a milkshake is like, because we bring heaven to you in our milkshakes.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: Milkshakes are the gift from heaven that come in different flavors.
quotes.author: Anthony T.Hincks

quotes.quote: Accept what people offer. Drink their milkshakes. Take their love.
quotes.author: Wally Lamb

quotes.quote: If a man ordered a beer milk shake, he thought, he'd better do it in a town where he wasn't known.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: Our galaxy, the Milky Way, is one of 50 or 100 billion other galaxies in the universe. And with every step, every window that modern astrophysics has opened to our mind, the person who wants to feel like they're the center of everything ends up shrinking.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: As, pricked out with less and greater lights, between the poles of the universe, the Milky Way so gleameth white as to set very sages questioning.
quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

quotes.quote: I can never look now at the Milky Way without wondering from which of those banked clouds of stars the emissaries are coming. If you will pardon so commonplace a simile, we have set off the fire alarm and have nothing to do but to wait. I do not think we will have to wait for long.
quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.quote: Space is not space between the earth and the sun to one who looks down from the windows of the Milky Way.
quotes.author: Kahil Gibran

quotes.quote: The Milky Way swooped diagonally across the heavens, reminding me of my utter insignificance, and at the same time my complete interconnection with everything. I was just a tiny speck of consciousness, and yet I was consciousness itself.
quotes.author: Roz Savage

quotes.quote: I leaned back on my palms, looking at the Milky Way spilling in modest grandeur across the sky. A fountain of stars frothing over, surrounded by a mist of stardust. It looked like raw magic, like the glimmer I'd spy in a shadowy corner where the sun skimmed off invisible particles, reminding me there was a whole hidden world tucked inside this ordinary one. And it was up there every night, offering its mute beauty while we sat here with our heads down, tragically terrestrial.
quotes.author: Leah Raeder

quotes.quote: When we broke the surface again the first thing I saw was the great bold stripe of the Milky Way painted across the heavens, and it occurred to me that together the fish and the stars formed a complete system, coincident parts of some ancient and mysterious whole.
quotes.author: Ransom Riggs

quotes.quote: The Milky Way Galaxy is one of billions, perhaps hundreds of billions of galaxies notable neither in mass nor in brightness nor in how its stars are configured and arrayed. Some modern deep sky photographs show more galaxies beyond the Milky Way than stars within the Milky Way. Every one of them is an island universe containing perhaps a hundred billion suns. Such an image is a profound sermon on humility.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: In less than a hundred years, we have found a new way to think of ourselves. From sitting at the center of the universe, we now find ourselves orbiting an average-sized sun, which is just one of millions of stars in our own Milky Way galaxy.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: The Milky Way is nothing else but a mass of innumerable stars planted together in clusters.
quotes.author: Galileo Galilei

quotes.quote: If you want to see a black hole tonight, tonight just look in the direction of Sagittarius, the constellation. That's the center of the Milky Way Galaxy and there's a raging black hole at the very center of that constellation that holds the galaxy together.
quotes.author: Michio Kaku

quotes.quote: We gazed dreamily at the Milky Way and once in a while caught some shooting stars. Times like those gave me the opportunity to wonder and ask all those very basic questions. That sense of awe for the heavens started there.
quotes.author: Kalpana Chawla

quotes.quote: I cannot possibly conceive of my planet Earth as the centre of a three-tiered universe. I know rather that the sun, around which my planet Earth revolves, is a middle sized star in a galaxy called the Milky Way that has over a hundred billion other suns or stars within it.
quotes.author: John Shelby Spong

quotes.quote: In the distance, the Himalayan range flared into fluorescence, as its snowy peaks reflected the moonlight back at the velvet sky, split into half by the shimmering strip of the Milky Way.
quotes.author: Kiran Manral

quotes.quote: What was observed by us in the third place is the nature or matter of the Milky Way itself, which, with the aid of the spyglass, may be observed so well that all the disputes that for so many generations have vexed philosophers are destroyed by visible certainty, and we are liberated from wordy arguments.
quotes.author: Galileo Galilei

quotes.quote: The spiral in a snail's shell is the same mathematically as the spiral in the Milky Way galaxy, and it's also the same mathematically as the spirals in our DNA. It's the same ratio that you'll find in very basic music that transcends cultures all over the world.
quotes.author: Joseph Gordon-Levitt

quotes.quote: A still more glorious dawn awaits / not a sunrise, but a galaxy-rise / a morning filled with 400 billion suns / the rising of the milky way
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: I am undecided whether or not the Milky Way is but one of countless others all of which form an entire system. Perhaps the light from these infinitely distant galaxies is so faint that we cannot see them.
quotes.author: Johann Heinrich Lambert

quotes.quote: There is a point of view among astronomical researchers that is generally referred to as the Principle of Mediocrity. ... If the Sun and its retinue of worlds is only one system among many, then many other systems will be like ours: home to life. Indeed, to the extent that this is true, we should be prepared for the possibility that, even in the Milky Way galaxy, billions of planets may be carpeted by the dirty, nasty business known as life.
quotes.author: Seth Shostak

quotes.quote: Every time you look up at the sky, every one of those points of light is a reminder that fusion power is extractable from hydrogen and other light elements, and it is an everyday reality throughout the Milky Way Galaxy.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: We are 'nuclear waste' from the fuel that makes stars shine; indeed, each of us contains atoms whose provenance can be traced back to thousands of different stars spread through our Milky Way.
quotes.author: Martin Rees

quotes.quote: The way of fortune is like the milky way in the sky; which is a number of smaller stars, not seen asunder, but giving light together; so it is a number of little and scarce discerned virtues, or rather faculties and customs, that make men fortunate.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: To relax, I work. I am undecided whether or not the Milky Way is but one of countless others all of which form an entire system. Perhaps the light from these infinitely distant galaxies is so faint that we cannot see them.
quotes.author: Christopher Lambert

quotes.quote: We live on a hunk of rock and metal that circles a humdrum star that is one of 400 billion other stars that make up the Milky Way Galaxy which is one of billions of other galaxies which make up a universe which may be one of a very large number, perhaps an infinite number, of other universes. That is a perspective on human life and our culture that is well worth pondering.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: It shows you exactly how a star is formed; nothing else can be so pretty! A cluster of vapor, the cream of the milky way, a sort of celestial cheese, churned into light.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: The southern Milky Way is more spectacular and provides a richer treasure trove of objects than the northern Milky Way. We're now players in the world of large telescopes. We're in an age in which answering the big, fundamental questions requires access to large telescopes in good, dark skies. SALT is just such a telescope.
quotes.author: Eric Wilcots

quotes.quote: Some of the stars in this Milky Way companion have been seen with telescopes for centuries. But because the galaxy is so close, its stars are spread over a huge swath of the sky, and they always used to be lost in the sea of more numerous Milky Way stars. This galaxy is so big, we couldn't see it before.
quotes.author: Mario Juric

quotes.quote: With so much irregular structure in the outer Galaxy, it looks as though the Milky Way is still growing, by cannibalizing smaller galaxies that fall into it.
quotes.author: Mario Juric

quotes.quote: The Milky Way will collide in the future, in about 4 billion years with the galaxy Andromeda and that collision will lead to formation of a much bigger galaxy. So we have that to look forward to.
quotes.author: Pieter van Dokkum

quotes.quote: My companion and I were alone with the stars: the misty river of the Milky Way flowing across the sky, the patterns of the constellations standing out bright and clear, a blazing planet low on the horizon.
quotes.author: Rachel Carson

quotes.quote: Was it a millionaire who said, "Imagine no possessions"?
quotes.author: Elvis Costello

quotes.quote: Millionaires don't play the blame game but the gain game.
quotes.author: Dee Dee Artner

quotes.quote: I don't know much about being a millionaire, but I'll bet I'd be darling at it.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: You can't just wish to be a millionaire; you have to figure out how to earn it.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: What's the quickest way to become a millionaire? Borrow fivers off everyone you meet.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: If you want to be a Millionaire, start with a billion dollars and launch a new airline.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: Pity the poor millionaire. He'll never know the thrill of paying that final installment.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: Become a millionaire not for the million dollars, but for what it will make of you to achieve it.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Becoming a millionaire is not the end goal; your growth and development en-route is what matters.
quotes.author: Mark Victor Hansen

quotes.quote: People don't want to be millionaires - they want to experience what they believe only millions can buy.
quotes.author: Tim Ferriss

quotes.quote: It is a shame for a man to be a millionaire in possessions if he is not also a millionaire in beneficence.
quotes.author: Lyman Abbott

quotes.quote: How many millionaires do you know who have become wealthy by investing in savings accounts? I rest my case.
quotes.author: Robert G. Allen

quotes.quote: When someone becomes a millionaire, the least important thing is what they have. The most important thing is what they have become.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: To say that I'm enjoying a millionaire's lifestyle-well, I can tell you, I guess a millionaire's income doesn't go very far these days.
quotes.author: Ed Pastor

quotes.quote: I became a millionaire overnight by signing a piece of paper. I made more money in that one second than my entire family did in their lifetime.
quotes.author: Troy Polamalu

quotes.quote: There are very few self-made millionaires, if any, who have not taken risks which would make the rest of us unable to sleep at night, or keep our food down.
quotes.author: Dominic Lawson

quotes.quote: All these young millionaires were anarchists, of course: when a man possesses everything it is the supreme luxury for him to deny society: for in that way he can evade his responsibilities.
quotes.author: Romain Rolland
