quotes.quote: You develop millionaires the way you mine gold. You expect to move tons of dirt to find an ounce of gold, but you don't go into the mine looking for the dirt-you go in looking for the gold.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.quote: The millionaires are a product of natural selection ... the naturally selected agents of society for certain work. They get high wages and live in luxury, but the bargain is a good one for society.
quotes.author: William Graham Sumner

quotes.quote: Millionaires are just as patriotic as poor people. The very wealthy are just as noble and patriotic as the middle class. But nothing has been asked of them in this horrendous recession. And it's time we just ask.
quotes.author: Joe Biden

quotes.quote: A millionaires' mindset focus moves from posessions to feelings, once they become conscious and awake.
quotes.author: Tony Dovale

quotes.quote: All millionaires love a baked apple.
quotes.author: Ronald Firbank

quotes.quote: Millionaires don't judge but connect.
quotes.author: Dee Dee Artner

quotes.quote: Millionaire don't compare but prepare what they seek.
quotes.author: Dee Dee Artner

quotes.quote: Everyone's a millionaire where promises are concerned.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: The average millionaire can't tell you who got thrown off the island last night.
quotes.author: Dave Ramsey

quotes.quote: Millionaire models are rare enough; but, by Jove, model millionaires are rarer still!
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: You want to be a millionaire. But your values system says you believe in sleep more than grinding!
quotes.author: Eric Thomas

quotes.quote: Start with the end in mind. If you want to be a millionaire, talk like one, act like one, work like one.
quotes.author: Bob Proctor

quotes.quote: I shouldn't think even millionaires could eat anything nicer than new bread and real butter and honey for tea.
quotes.author: Dodie Smith

quotes.quote: Be mindful even if your mind is full.
quotes.author: James De La Vega

quotes.quote: Live the actual moment. Only this moment is life.
quotes.author: Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: Find your eternity in each moment.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The best way to capture moments is to pay attention. This is how we cultivate mindfulness. Mindfulness means being awake. It means knowing what you are doing.
quotes.author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quotes.quote: When you open your mind, you open new doors to new possibilities for yourself and new opportunities to help others.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: When you realize nothing is lacking, the whole world belongs to you.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: If you want to conquer the anxiety of life, live in the moment, live in the breath.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: Mind is a flexible mirror, adjust it, to see a better world.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: Mindfulness can be summed up in two words: pay attention. Once you notice what you're doing, you have the power to change it.
quotes.author: Michelle Burford

quotes.quote: Observe the space between your thoughts, then observe the observer.
quotes.author: Hamilton Boudreaux

quotes.quote: Let go of your mind and then be mindful. Close your ears and listen!
quotes.author: Jalaluddin Rumi

quotes.quote:
Mindfulness of oneself cultivates wisdom.
Mindfulness of others cultivates compassion.
quotes.author: Stonepeace

quotes.quote: The present moment is filled with joy and happiness. If you are attentive, you will see it.
quotes.author: Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: Don't believe everything you think. Thoughts are just that â€“ thoughts.
quotes.author: Allan Lokos

quotes.quote: Your vision will become clear only when you look into your heart. Who looks outside, dreams. Who looks inside, awakens.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Be happy in the moment, that's enough. Each moment is all we need, not more.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Whatever the present moment contains, accept it as if you had chosen it.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Treat everyone you meet as if they were you.
quotes.author: Doug Dillon

quotes.quote: Live mindful of how brief your life is.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Awareness is the greatest agent for change.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Wherever you are, be there totally.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Walk as if you are kissing the Earth with your feet.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: Emancipate yourself from mental slavery. None but ourselves can free our mind.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote:
Respond; don't react.
Listen; don't talk.
Think; don't assume.
quotes.author: Raji Lukkoor

quotes.quote: In mindfulness, acceptance always comes first, change comes after.
quotes.author: Shamash Alidina

quotes.quote: Smile, breathe, and go slowly.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: Looking at beauty in the world, is the first step of purifying the mind.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: Mindfulness is life. Whenever we don't have mindfulness, when we are heedless, it's as if we are dead.
quotes.author: Ajahn Chah

quotes.quote: Living 24 hours with mindfulness is more worthwhile than living 100 years without it.
quotes.author: The Buddha

quotes.quote: Mindfulness isn't difficult, we just need to remember to do it.
quotes.author: Sharon Salzberg

quotes.quote: Mindfulness, also called wise attention, helps us see what we're adding to our experiences, not only during meditation sessions but also elsewhere.
quotes.author: Sharon Salzberg

quotes.quote: With mindfulness, you can establish yourself in the present in order to touch the wonders of life that are available in that moment.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: We use mindfulness to observe the way we cling to pleasant experiences & push away unpleasant ones.
quotes.author: Sharon Salzberg

quotes.quote: Mindfulness is simply being aware of what is happening right now without wishing it were different; enjoying the pleasant without holding on when it changes (which it will); being with the unpleasant without fearing it will always be this way (which it won't).
quotes.author: James Baraz

quotes.quote: Mindfulness needs to not be judgmental to really be mindfulness, which means it needs a basis of loving kindness.
quotes.author: Sharon Salzberg

quotes.quote: Mindfulness is deliberately paying full attention to what is happening around you-in your body, heart and mind. Mindfulness is awareness without criticism or judgment.
quotes.author: Jan Chozen Bays

quotes.quote: Mindfulness is to pay attention in a particular way: on purpose, at the present time and without judging.
quotes.author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quotes.quote: Nowadays, mindfulness has become a catch-all word, but the general principle of trying to be more conscious and aware in our daily life is very important. Along with this, it's helpful to contemplate some of the mind training verses which are designed to take and transform all of the problems we experience.
quotes.author: Tenzin Palmo

quotes.quote: Mindfulness is to keep our consciousness alive to present reality.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: Mindfulness is a quality that's always there. It's an illusion that there's a meditation and post-meditation period, which I always find amusing, because you're either mindful or you're not.
quotes.author: Richard Gere

quotes.quote: Mindfulness helps us freeze the frame so that we can become aware of our sensations and experiences as they are, without the distorting coloration of socially conditioned responses or habitual reactions.
quotes.author: Henepola Gunaratana

quotes.quote: Mindfulness means paying attention in a particular way: on purpose, in the present moment, and non-judgmentally. This kind of attention nurtures greater awareness, clarity, and acceptance of present-moment reality.
quotes.author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quotes.quote: Mindfulness captures a quality of consciousness characterized by the clarity and vividness of present experience.
quotes.author: Brown & Ryan

quotes.quote: The whole path of mindfulness is this: Whatever you are doing, be aware of it.
quotes.author: Dipa Ma

quotes.quote: Mindfulness is about being fully awake in our lives. It is about perceiving the exquisite vividness of each moment. We also gain immediate access to our own powerful inner resources for insight, transformation, and healing,.
quotes.author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quotes.quote: Be the silent watcher of your thoughts and behavior. You are beneath the thinker. You are the stillness beneath the mental noise. You are the love and joy beneath the pain.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: The most precious gift we can offer others is our presence. When mindfulness embraces those we love, they will bloom like flowers.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: To be mindful entails examining the path we are traveling & making choices that alleviate suffering & bring happiness to ourselves & those around us.
quotes.author: Allan Lokos

quotes.quote: As long as we have practised neither concentration nor mindfulness, the ego takes itself for granted and remains its usual normal size, as big as the people around one will allow.
quotes.author: Ayya Khema

quotes.quote: Seek and see all the marvels around you. You will get tired of looking at yourself alone, and that fatigue will make you deaf and blind to everything else.
quotes.author: Don Juan

quotes.quote: Mindfulness is the miracle by which we master and restore ourselves.
quotes.author: Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: Mindfulness means moment-to-moment, non-judgmental awareness. It is cultivated by refining our capacity to pay attention, intentionally, in the present moment, and then sustaining that attention over time as best we can. In the process, we become more in touch with our life as it is unfolding.
quotes.author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quotes.quote: The best way to capture moments is to pay attention. This is how we cultivate mindfulness. Mindfulness means being awake. It means knowing what you are doing.
quotes.author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quotes.quote: Mindfulness is the aware, balanced acceptance of the present experience. It isn't more complicated than that. It is opening to or receiving the present moment, pleasant or unpleasant, just as it is, without either clinging to it or rejecting it.
quotes.author: Sylvia Boorstein

quotes.quote: Concentration and mindfulness are the internal ways in which the mind restores itself from being out of balance and lost in confusion to a condition of ease, clarity, and wisdom. No external action needs to happen.
quotes.author: Sylvia Boorstein

quotes.quote: When you realize nothing is lacking, the whole world belongs to you.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Mindfulness is like a microscope; it is neither an offensive nor defensive weapon in relation to the germs we observe through it. The function of the microscope is just to clearly present what is there.
quotes.author: Chogyam Trungpa

quotes.quote: Mindfulness has helped me succeed in almost every dimension of my life. By stopping regularly to look inward and become aware of my mental state, I stay connected to the source of my actions and thoughts and can guide them with considerably more intention.
quotes.author: Dustin Moskovitz

quotes.quote: Mindful self-compassion can be learned by anyone. It's the practice of repeatedly evoking good will toward ourselves especially when we're sufferingâ€”cultivating the same desire that all living beings have to live happily and free from suffering.
quotes.author: Christopher Germer

quotes.quote: The practice of mindfulness begins in the small, remote cave of your unconscious mind and blossoms with the sunlight of your conscious life, reaching far beyond the people and places you can see.
quotes.author: Earon Davis

quotes.quote: If I care to listen to every criticism, let alone act on them, then this shop may as well be closed for all other businesses. I have learned to do my best, and if the end result is good then I do not care for any criticism, but if the end result is not good, then even the praise of ten angels would not make the difference.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: It is every man's obligation to put back into the world at least the equivalent of what he takes out of it.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Man can hardly even recognize the devils of his own creation.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: A government, for protecting business only, is but a carcass, and soon falls by its own corruption and decay.
quotes.author: Amos Bronson Alcott

quotes.quote: You are what you think. So just think big, believe big, act big, work big, give big, forgive big, laugh big, love big and live big.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.quote: Being good in business is the most fascinating kind of art. Making money is art and working is art and good business is the best art.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.quote: You can safely assume that you've created God in your own image when it turns out that God hates all the same people you do.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: Now, occultism is not like mystic faculty, and it very seldom works in harmony either with business aptitude in the things of ordinary life or with a knowledge of the canons of evidence in its own sphere.
quotes.author: Arthur Edward Waite

quotes.quote: I don't want to be alone, I want to be left alone.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: If you would know the value of money, go and try to borrow some.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Mind your own business and don't eat junk food. Treat everyone the way you want to be treated, work hard and love what you do.
quotes.author: Besse Cooper

quotes.quote: Infuse your life with action. Don't wait for it to happen. Make it happen. Make your own future. Make your own hope. Make your own love. And whatever your beliefs, honor your Creator, not by passively waiting for grace to come down from upon high, but by doing what you can to make grace happen... yourself, right now, right down here on Earth.
quotes.author: Bradley Whitford

quotes.quote: Christ would be a national advertiser today, I am sure, as He was a great advertiser in His own day. He thought of His life as business.
quotes.author: Bruce Barton

quotes.quote: Never explain - your friends do not need it and your enemies will not believe you anyway.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: It takes as much energy to wish as it does to plan.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Those that want friends to open themselves unto are cannibals of their own hearts.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: People who say it cannot be done should not interrupt those who are doing it.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Do not wait; the time will never be 'just right.' Start where you stand, and work with whatever tools you may have at your command, and better tools will be found as you go along.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: There are three proven rules for good teeth: brush after every meal; see your dentist twice a year; and mind your own business.
quotes.author: Henry Boyd

quotes.quote: Chop your own wood and it will warm you twice.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Managing your problems can only make you good, whereas building your opportunities is the only way to become great.
quotes.author: James C. Collins

quotes.quote: Keep your breath to cool your porridge.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: The major value of reaching goals is not to acquire it, but it's the person you become while you're working to acquire it.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: To offer a man unsolicited advice is to presume that he doesn't know what to do or that he can't do it on his own.
quotes.author: John Gray

quotes.quote: No one wants advice - only corroboration.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: Every religion is true one way or another. It is true when understood metaphorically. But when it gets stuck in its own metaphors, interpreting them as facts, then you are in trouble.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Work hard for what you want because it won't come to you without a fight. You have to be strong and courageous and know that you can do anything you put your mind to. If somebody puts you down or criticizes you, just keep on believing in yourself and turn it into something positive.
quotes.author: Leah LaBelle

quotes.quote: The greatest deception men suffer is from their own opinions.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: For good ideas and true innovation, you need human interaction, conflict, argument, debate.
quotes.author: Margaret Heffernan

quotes.quote: The world can forgive practically anything except people who mind their own business.
quotes.author: Margaret Mitchell

quotes.quote: I think anything is possible if you have the mindset and the will and desire to do it and put the time in.
quotes.author: Roger Clemens

quotes.quote: Mindsets are contagious. So choose the people you populate your life with extremely well.
quotes.author: Robin S. Sharma

quotes.quote: My mindset at this stage, especially after having a daughter it's just changed my whole outlook.
quotes.author: Sonny Bill Williams

quotes.quote: As an organization changes your mindset as a leader also has to change. This becomes the lid to you organization. Whenever my organization starts to settle I believe I have to lift my lid, my capacity I have to think and act in a different way to achieve different results.
quotes.author: Craig Groeschel

quotes.quote: I think of religion as something that stains the person. It's a mindset you can never get free from, it's always in the back of your head.
quotes.author: Angel Haze

quotes.quote: You can accomplish anything you want in life, if you help enough other people get what they want.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Until your dream dominates your mindset, you'll never wake up to your greatness.
quotes.author: Robin S. Sharma

quotes.quote: A positive mindset, not a doomsday mentality, supports being exceptional.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: What makes you tough is your mindset and I believe anyone can be tough.
quotes.author: Rickson Gracie

quotes.quote: Performancism is the mindset that equates our identity and value directly with our performance and accomplishments.
quotes.author: Tullian Tchividjian

quotes.quote: Only changes in mindsets can extend the frontiers of the possible.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Risk more than others think is safe. Care more than others think is wise. Dream more than others think is practical. Expect more than others think is possible.
quotes.author: Claude T. Bissell

quotes.quote: It takes a different mindset to be successful in anything; that's why there's not a lot of super duper successful people, because it's guys I know who may be ten times more talented than me, but they don't work as hard.
quotes.author: Rico Love

quotes.quote: If you do not like anything, alter it. If you can not change it, adjust your mindset. Will not complain.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Remember that mindsets can not be changed through force and coercion. No idea can ever be forcibly thrust upon any one.
quotes.author: Pervez Musharraf

quotes.quote: To create something exceptional, your mindset must be relentlessly focused on the smallest detail.
quotes.author: Giorgio Armani

quotes.quote: You can conquer almost any fear if you will only make up your mind to do so. For remember, fear doesn't exist anywhere except in the mind.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Christians need to have a mindset of victory, because God has destined us for victory.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Happiness depends on your mindset and attitude.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Leadership is a mindset that shifts from being a victim to creating results. Any one of us can demonstrate leadership in our work and within our lives.
quotes.author: Robin S. Sharma

quotes.quote: The difference between average and good. Good and Great! Great and Phenomenal! It's their mindset!
quotes.author: Eric Thomas

quotes.quote: I think you should have a mindset of getting to the playoffs, because once you get in the playoffs, it is kind of a crapshoot.
quotes.author: Orel Hershiser

quotes.quote: Everyone is looking for the sure thing. They are looking to hedge their bet. They think the way to do that is to go with a proven quantity, a remake of something you have already seen. That is their mindset.
quotes.author: Leonard Maltin

quotes.quote: I am the master of my fate; I am the captain of my soul.
quotes.author: William Ernest Henley

quotes.quote: I have a mindset that says bipartisanship ought to consist of democrats coming to the republican point of view.
quotes.author: Richard Mourdock

quotes.quote: No matter what comes your way, shake it off and move forward. When you have a positive mindset, you can't be defeated.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Football is football and talent is talent. But the mindset of your team makes all the difference.
quotes.author: Robert Griffin III

quotes.quote: We all have possibilities we don't know about. We can do things we don't even dream we can do.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: My greatest challenge has been to change the mindset of people. Mindsets play strange tricks on us. We see things the way our minds have instructed our eyes to see.
quotes.author: Muhammad Yunus

quotes.quote: Minimalism in interior design has become a caricature. Everywhere you find shops or hotels with an ambience that makes you feel like you are in a refrigerator.
quotes.author: Andree Putman

quotes.quote: Minimalism now is a reaction to what came before. It's absolutely of its time. Music moved into the set theory thing, and moved out of it.
quotes.author: Harrison Birtwistle

quotes.quote: The point is that minimalism is a tool to help you achieve freedom. Freedom from fear, freedom from worry, freedom from overwhelm, freedom from guilt, freedom from depression, freedom from enslavement. Freedom. Real freedom.
quotes.author: Joshua Fields Millburn

quotes.quote: Minimalism is not the lack of something. It is simply the perfect amount of something.
quotes.author: Najahyia Chinchilla

quotes.quote: It was a minimalist opening offer. It was far from what anyone in our group would expect to be adequate.
quotes.author: Bill Lockyer

quotes.quote: Minimalism is the intentional promotion of the things we most value and the removal of anything that distracts us from it.
quotes.author: Joshua Becker

quotes.quote: It looks like you can write a minimalist piece without much bleeding. And you can. But not a good one.
quotes.author: David Foster

quotes.quote: Minimalism is the constant art of editing your life.
quotes.author: Danny Dover

quotes.quote: Minimalism is the pursuit of the essence of things, not the appearance.
quotes.author: Claudio Silvestrin

quotes.quote: Minimalism is about creating space to live simply and meaningfully; it's about living intentionally.
quotes.author: Laurie Buchanan

quotes.quote: One can furnish a room very luxuriously by taking out furniture rather than putting it in.
quotes.author: Francis Jourdain

quotes.quote: Minimalism is saying all by saying nothing.
quotes.author: Will Advise

quotes.quote: Minimalism means not trying to improve perfection.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: Minimalism is about creating complete harmony and not about making simple.
quotes.author: Naoto Fukasawa

quotes.quote: Edit your life frequently and ruthlessly. It's your masterpiece after all.
quotes.author: Nathan W. Morris

quotes.quote: Also minimalism is a term that all of us who share so little in common and who are lumped together as minimalists are not terribly happy with.
quotes.author: Ann Beattie

quotes.quote: Minimalism is not defined by what is not there but by the rightness of what is and the richness with which this is experienced.
quotes.author: John Pawson

quotes.quote: A minimalist does not charge you for what he did. He charges you for what he did not do.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: Except among those whose education has been in the minimalist style, it is understood that hasty moral judgments about the past are a form of injustice.
quotes.author: Jacques Barzun

quotes.quote: It is preoccupation with possession, more than anything else, that prevents men from living freely and nobly.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Raising the minimum wage a lot across the board would make a big difference. It's not the only thing, but it's an indispensable part of solving the problem.
quotes.author: Nick Hanauer

quotes.quote: Giving a minimum wage reduces inequality significantly.
quotes.author: Winnie Byanyima

quotes.quote: The only way to grow the economy in a way that benefits the bottom 90 percent is to change the structure of the economy. At the least, this requires stronger unions and a higher minimum wage.
quotes.author: Robert Reich

quotes.quote: The minimum wage can play a vital role in lifting hard-working families above the poverty line.
quotes.author: Adam Cohen

quotes.quote: The value of the minimum wage shouldn't be eroded, and it has been.
quotes.author: Robert J. Garagiola

quotes.quote: The wage earner relies upon the ventures of confident and contented capital. This failing him, his condition is without alleviation, for he can neither prey on the misfortune of others nor hoard his labor.
quotes.author: Grover Cleveland

quotes.quote: The minimum wage has not kept pace with rising costs. This legislation is overdue and will help families that are struggling in this harsh economy.
quotes.author: Jerry Brown

quotes.quote: Being unemployed - or working at minimum wage - is rough in the best of circumstances.
quotes.author: Adam Cohen

quotes.quote: For many young people, the minimum wage is a stepping stone to higher employment levels.
quotes.author: Bruce Rauner

quotes.quote: A minimum-wage law is, in reality, a law that makes it illegal for an employer to hire a person with limited skills.
quotes.author: Milton Friedman

quotes.quote: Minimum-wage laws are one of the most powerful tools in the arsenal of racists.
quotes.author: Walter E. Williams

quotes.quote: There's enormous progressive activism and, more often than not, success at the grassroots level - everything from living wage campaigns to efforts to finance our elections are having terrific success.
quotes.author: Jim Hightower

quotes.quote: Remember that the minimum wage law provides no jobs; it only outlaws them; and outlawed jobs are the inevitable result.
quotes.author: Murray Rothbard

quotes.quote: The real minimum wage is zero.
quotes.author: Thomas Sowell

quotes.quote: Increasing minimum wage doesn't build a stronger economy.
quotes.author: Karen Handel

quotes.quote: Raising the minimum wage seems to all economists to, at the very least, fail to 'raise' employment, and we'd all like to see better inclusion of low-skilled workers into good-paying jobs.
quotes.author: Edmund Phelps

quotes.quote: Pay minimum wage, you get minimum work. Nobody seems to get that.
quotes.author: Sue Grafton

quotes.quote: Raising the minimum wage is the right thing to do, but it's a popular thing to do as well.
quotes.author: Nancy Pelosi

quotes.quote: If a man or a woman puts in an honest day's work, they should to be able to earn a living wage.
quotes.author: Richard J. Codey

quotes.quote: Our attitude is that if you hire good people and pay them a fair wage, then good things will happen for the company.
quotes.author: James Sinegal

quotes.quote: No family gets rich from earning the minimum wage. In fact, the current minimum wage does not even lift a family out of poverty.
quotes.author: Jon Corzine

quotes.quote: Today a minimum wage earner has to work a day and a half just to pay for a full tank of gas. That is simply shameful.
quotes.author: Bill Pascrell

quotes.quote: The minimum wage should be a living wage.
quotes.author: Jon Ossoff

quotes.quote: Minimum wage laws make it illegal for a worker to accept a job that pays less, even if the worker needs that job.
quotes.author: Peter Schiff

quotes.quote: This is a sensible response to employer concerns that the minimum wage is starting to have a damaging impact on competitiveness.
quotes.author: Digby Jones

quotes.quote: The minimum wage was due for an increase, but it was important that we offset its cost to small businesses.
quotes.author: J. D. Hayworth

quotes.quote: The minimum wage is the black teenage unemployment act. It is the guaranteed way of holding the poor, the minorities and the disenfranchised out of the mainstream is if you price their original services too high.
quotes.author: Arthur Laffer

quotes.quote: Minimum wage laws have never worked in terms of having the middle class attain more prosperity.
quotes.author: Marco Rubio

quotes.quote: The minimum wage is mostly an entry-level wage for young people.
quotes.author: Mitch McConnell

quotes.quote: It's a mistake to think that any increase in wages is inflationary and there is substantial room for non-inflationary wage growth, particularly at the bottom end of the scale.
quotes.author: Jared Bernstein

quotes.quote: Science mines nature for truth of a different order -- it is our mightiest means of communing with reality, probing its mysteries, and gleaning from them some sense of belonging, of locating ourselves in the universe, understanding our place in it, and liberating ourselves from delusion.
quotes.author: Maria Popova

quotes.quote: There are as many forms of memory as there are ways of perceiving, and every one of them is worth mining for inspiration.
quotes.author: Twyla Tharp

quotes.quote: For many children, joy comes as the result of mining something unique and wondrous about themselves from some inner shaft.
quotes.author: Thomas J. Cottle

quotes.quote: Only by much searching and mining, are gold and diamonds obtained, and man can find every truth connected with his being, if he will dig deep into the mine of his soul.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: Mining is like a search-and-destroy mission.
quotes.author: Stewart Udall

quotes.quote: The mining industry might make wealth and power for a few men and women, but the many would always be smashed and battered beneath its giant treads.
quotes.author: Katharine Susannah Prichard

quotes.quote: Mining is a dangerous profession. There's no way to make a mine completely safe: These are the words owners have always used to excuse needless deaths and the words miners use to prepare for them.
quotes.author: Tawni O'Dell

quotes.quote: Coal mining is tough. Acting is just tedious.
quotes.author: Johnny Knoxville

quotes.quote: Art, of course, is a way of thinking, a way of mining reality.
quotes.author: John Gardner

quotes.quote: Any relation to the land, the habit of tilling it, or mining it, or even hunting on it, generates the feeling of patriotism. He who keeps shop on it, or he who merely uses it as a support to his desk and ledger, or to his manufactory, values it less.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Mining is the art of exploiting mineral deposits at a profit. An unprofitable mine is fit only for the sepulcher of a dead mule.
quotes.author: T.A. Rickard

quotes.quote: The mines of knowledge are oft laid bare through the forked hazel wand of chance.
quotes.author: Martin Farquhar Tupper

quotes.quote: Then there was the whole concept of coal mining, which is a culture unto itself, the most dangerous occupation in the world, and which draws and develops a certain kind of man
quotes.author: Martin Cruz Smith

quotes.quote: Writing is like mining for gold hidden in the hillsides of your mind.
quotes.author: David Baboulene

quotes.quote: A society must create lots of sunshine for its miners as they need the sun most! And â€˜to be remembered, to be respected' is a good sunshine; â€˜safety in the mine' is a good sunshine!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: It must not be thought that it is ever possible to reach the interior earth by any perseverance in mining: both because the exterior earth is too thick, in comparison with human strength; and especially because of the intermediate waters, which would gush forth with greater impetus, the deeper the place in which their veins were first opened; and which would drown all miners.
quotes.author: Rene Descartes

quotes.quote: What strip mining is to nature the art market has become to culture.
quotes.author: Robert Hughes

quotes.quote: Mining is a patient game and it always will be.
quotes.author: Clive Palmer

quotes.quote: Mining asteroids will ultimately benefit humanity on and off the Earth in a multitude of ways.
quotes.author: Peter Diamandis

quotes.quote: Mining is like a search-and-destroy mission.
quotes.author: Stewart Udall

quotes.quote: How like Eve's apple doth thy beauty grow, If thy sweet virtue answer not thy show!
quotes.author: Shakepeare

quotes.quote: If you have come here to help me, you are wasting out time. But if you have come because your liberation is bound up with mine, then let us work together.
quotes.author: Lilla Watson

quotes.quote: The history of underground coal mining suggests it is one of the most at risk mining sectors and arguably one of the most dangerous industries in human history.
quotes.author: Woodhead Publishing

quotes.quote: Large amounts of methane released during mining present concerns about adequate mine ventilation to ensure worker safety.
quotes.author: Woodhead Publishing

quotes.quote: There are no wastelands in our landscape quite like those we've created ourselves.
quotes.author: Joshua Zeunert

quotes.quote: In the United States a kind of gas is produced for mining and other purposes by forcing common air through benzoline.
quotes.author: Joseph Henry Collins

quotes.quote: The best kinds of timber for use in mining operations are oak, elm, larch, Norway fir or red deal.
quotes.author: Joseph Henry Collins

quotes.quote: The most common form for the 'shafts' or 'pits' of coal mines is circular, but they are occasionally made rectangular as in metal mining.
quotes.author: Joseph Henry Collins

quotes.quote: Let the efforts of us all, prove that he [Martin Luther King] was not a mere dreamer when he spoke of the beauty of genuine brotherhood and peace being more precious than diamonds or silver or gold.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: All that glisters is not gold.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Too many of us are lonely ministers practicing a lonely ministry.
quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

quotes.quote: Ministry is the least important thing. You cannot not minister if you are in communion with God and live in community.
quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

quotes.quote: I think there's more women that watch me than men, but I don't look at myself as just a minister to women. My ministry began that way, but I really feel like the Word of God is for everybody.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: Ministry is when the people who hear you, don't want more of you; they want more of Him because of what you've said. When you point them to God's fire instead of trying to get attention for yourself- that's ministry.
quotes.author: Priscilla Shirer

quotes.quote: It is one of the ironies of the ministry that the very man who works in God's name is often hardest put to find time for God. The parents of Jesus lost Him at church, and they were not the last ones to lose Him there.
quotes.author: Vans Havner

quotes.quote: The task of pastoral ministry, above all else, is to arrange contingencies for an encounter with the divine
quotes.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quotes.quote: The key to ministry in any and every context, both now and for the last two thousand years, is missionary flexibility
quotes.author: Darrin Patrick

quotes.quote: Whatever call a man may pretend to have, if he has not been called to holiness, he certainly has not been called to the ministry
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: Let every man abide in the calling wherein he is called and his work will be as sacred as the work of the ministry. It is not what a man does that determines whether his work is sacred or secular, it is why he does it.
quotes.author: A.W.Tozer

quotes.quote: Self-will can either destroy or catapult your ministry.
quotes.author: Jonathan Heimberg

quotes.quote: Throughout my ministry, I have sought to build bridges between Jews and Christians.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Initially, when I first became a Christian and got into ministry, my thought was that God existed to make my life better and to take me to Heaven. Now I realize that it is not about me at all. It is all about God and that He did this to display His plan to restore the Earth to the Garden of Eden state.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: The students in your youth ministry don't need your clever ideas and great programming skills. They need a living model- a man or woman of God who is passionate about his or her faith.
quotes.author: Doug Fields

quotes.quote: Job is what you are 'paid to do'; but ministry is what you are 'born to do'. Be aware of the diffference.
quotes.author: Ronnie (Ron) Millevo

quotes.quote: The true character of ministry is a servants heart.
quotes.author: Harold J. Warner

quotes.quote: The Christian ministry is difficult, and we must not be lazy or trite. However, we often place burdens upon ourselves and make demands upon ourselves that are not according to the will of God. The more I know God and understand His perfect work on my behalf, the more I am able to rest.
quotes.author: Paul Washer

quotes.quote: One of the hardest jobs in ministry is keeping your own relationship with God where it needs to be.
quotes.author: Harold J. Warner

quotes.quote: The Christian ministry is the worst of all trades, but the best of all professions.
quotes.author: Isaac

quotes.quote: Ministry is being one of theses sent out ones, a labourer of love
quotes.author: Heidi Baker

quotes.quote: Ministry is simply about loving the person in front of you
quotes.author: Heidi Baker

quotes.quote: I'm only here on Earth to serve God. I never had a career. I don't care about commercialism. I have a ministry and I'll fight for the ministry.
quotes.author: Larry Norman

quotes.quote: What you must do is give your life more fully to the lord. And ask Him what your part in the ministry should be.
quotes.author: Benson Andrew Idahosa

quotes.quote: The church is the only vehicle for the prophetic ministry of Christ to be carried out on earth.
quotes.author: T.L. Lowery

quotes.quote: Prayer is a 'closet' ministry; it is a ministry of the secret place, but God rewards you openly. Praying for others is a hidden treasure.
quotes.author: David O. Oyedepo

quotes.quote: A miracle is an event which creates faith. That is the purpose and nature of miracles. Frauds deceive. An event which creates faith does not deceive: therefore it is not a fraud, but a miracle.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Miracles are not contrary to nature, but only contrary to what we know about nature.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.quote: Miracles are a retelling in small letters of the very same story which is written across the whole world in letters too large for some of us to see.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: There are two ways to live: you can live as if nothing is a miracle; you can live as if everything is a miracle.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: I think miracles exist in part as gifts and in part as clues that there is something beyond the flat world we see.
quotes.author: Peggy Noonan

quotes.quote: Everything is a miracle. It is a miracle that one does not dissolve in one's bath like a lump of sugar.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: For the truly faithful, no miracle is necessary. For those who doubt, no miracle is sufficient.
quotes.author: Nancy Gibbs

quotes.quote: To me every hour of the light and dark is a miracle. Every cubic inch of space is a miracle.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: Could a greater miracle take place than for us to look through each other's eyes for an instant?
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Maybe miracles are given not to prove anything, but simply to remind us that the physical world is not so solid and real and dependable as we think.
quotes.author: Dwight Longenecker

quotes.quote: Miracles happen every day. Not just in remote country villages or at holy sites halfway across the globe, but here, in our own lives.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Some people think a miracle is only a miracle if it happens instantaneously, but miracles can grow slowly and patience and faith can compel things to happen that otherwise never would have come to pass.
quotes.author: Boyd K. Packer

quotes.quote: All is a miracle. The stupendous order of nature, the revolution of a hundred millions of worlds around a million of stars, the activity of light, the life of all animals, all are grand and perpetual miracles.
quotes.author: Francois Voltaire

quotes.quote: Miracles are proud creatures; they will not reveal themselves to those who do not Believe.
quotes.author: Yahia Lababidi

quotes.quote: Miracles happen everyday, change your perception of what a miracle is and you'll see them all around you.
quotes.author: Jon Bon Jovi

quotes.quote: Don't believe in miracles - depend on them.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: Out of difficulties grow miracles.
quotes.author: Jean De La Bruyere

quotes.quote: Where there is great love there are always miracles.
quotes.author: Willa Cather

quotes.quote: Miracles come in moments. Be ready and willing.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Impossible situations can become possible miracles.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.quote: Seeing, hearing and feeling are miracles, and each part and tag of me is a miracle.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: The miracle is this - the more we share, the more we have.
quotes.author: Leonard Nimoy

quotes.quote: We can see a thousand miracles around us every day. What is more supernatural than an egg yolk turning into a chicken?
quotes.author: S. Parkes Cadman

quotes.quote: Miracles, in the sense of phenomena we cannot explain, surround us on every hand: life itself is the miracle of miracles.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: There are no miracles for those that have no faith in them.
quotes.author: French Proverb

quotes.quote: If we could see the miracle of a single flower clearly, our whole life would change.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: The most wonderful thing about miracles is that they sometimes happen.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterson

quotes.quote: Each of my days are miracles. I won't waste my day; I won't throw away miracles.
quotes.author: Kelley Vicstrom

quotes.quote: In the realist, faith is not born from miracles, but miracles from faith.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quotes.quote: The person who does not believe in miracles surelymakes it certain that he or she will never take part in one.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Pursuit of happiness is a pursuit of mirage; you only realize its a delusion at the end of the road.
quotes.author: A.M.M Alusi

quotes.quote: When one has no real life, one lives by mirages. It's still better than nothing.
quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

quotes.quote: True love is a mirage… it does exist. We do get enamored and infatuated by it but we have to keep following it till eternity.
quotes.author: Balroop Singh

quotes.quote: Originality is the most deadly mirage in all of art. You can chase it from now until doomsday, and you'll only find yourself lost and dying of thirst.
quotes.author: Caitlín R. Kiernan

quotes.quote: Adversity is a mirage. People, situations, and relationships sometimes change for the worst but inevitably clear a path for far better replacements. The continued journey will always find bliss.
quotes.author: Carl Henegan

quotes.quote: But if you don’t take the necessary steps to make them happen, dreams are just mirages that mess with your head!
quotes.author: Chris Gardner

quotes.quote: 'Mirage' was an attempt to get back into the flow that 'Rumours' had. But we missed a vital ingredient. That was the passion.
quotes.author: Christine McVie

quotes.quote: Share your weaknesses. Share your hard moments. Share your real side. It'll either scare away every fake person in your life or it will inspire them to finally let go of that mirage called "perfection," which will open the doors to the most important relationships you'll ever be a part of.
quotes.author: Daniel Pearce

quotes.quote: If you can accept the flow of life and give in to it, you will be accepting what is real. Only when you accept what is real can you live with it in peace and happiness. The alternative is a struggle that will never end because it is a struggle with the unreal, with a mirage of life instead of life itself.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: In the end, we self-perceiving, self-inventing, locked-in mirages are little miracles of self-reference.
quotes.author: Douglas Hofstadter

quotes.quote: A journey, towards a mirage, never ends.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: It is the city of mirrors, the city of mirages, at once solid and liquid, at once air and stone.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: Everything is an illusion; that is the whole thing about it - illusion, immitation, a mirage. It makes me too sad. Its having like a good dream, you know you are going to wake up.
quotes.author: Francesca Lia Block

quotes.quote: Many is the mirage I chased. Always I was overreaching myself. The oftener I touched reality, the harder I bounced back to the world of illusion, which is the name for everyday life.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: I consider music like a mirage in the desert. You're obsessed with the ideal piece of music, and the more you think you're getting closer, it's not there.
quotes.author: Jean-Michel Jarre

quotes.quote: Power is a bloody mirage. The closer you seem to get the further away it is.
quotes.author: Joe Abercrombie Heroes

quotes.quote: She thirsted for love, but found only a mirage. Some hearts are a desert you can die wandering in.
quotes.author: John Mark Green

quotes.quote: God is a creed outworn, Ill-wrought from a mirage fair, And life is an image pale That faces a sunless morn.
quotes.author: Kenneth Rand

quotes.quote: Today is all we have, tomorrow is a mirage that may never become reality.
quotes.author: Louis L'Amour

quotes.quote: To lose something is an illusion because everything we own is just a mirage! And you, you cannot lose something which is not yours!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: The beauty myth moves for men as a mirage; its power lies in its ever-receding nature. When the gap is closed, the lover embraces only his own disillusion.
quotes.author: Naomi Wolf

quotes.quote: In the mirage of mirror Difficult it is to distinguish between truth and fake Remove that layer of lens on your eyes And the fake shall rattle like a snake.
quotes.author: Neelam Saxena Chandra

quotes.quote: Mirages are things that aren't really there that you can see very clearly." "How do you see something that isn't there?"... "sometimes it's much simpler than seeing things that are.
quotes.author: Norton Juster

quotes.quote: The spectacle is at the same time the mirage of self in the mirror of things.
quotes.author: Paul Ricoeur

quotes.quote: The perfect journey is never finished, the goal is always just across the next river, round the shoulder of the next mountain. There is always one more track to follow, one more mirage to explore.
quotes.author: Rosita Forbes

quotes.quote: Enjoy the journey, because the destination is a mirage.
quotes.author: Steven Furtick

quotes.quote: Your writer, your scientist, your chief official, all have lost the power to revive the early illusion concerning fame and high place. Their beauty and delight is like the mirage in the heavens, only plain to the eye outside; within is nothing.
quotes.author: Theodore Dreiser

quotes.quote: The political mirage of something for nothing, from leaders who 'care,' has ruined many a nation.
quotes.author: Thomas Sowell

quotes.quote: Our knowledge is a receding mirage in an expanding desert of ignorance.
quotes.author: Will Durant

quotes.quote: The traveler walks through many mirages before he finds water.
quotes.author: Yasmin Mogahed

quotes.quote: The inventor of the mirror poisoned the human heart.
quotes.author: Fernando Pessoa

quotes.quote: The girl in the mirror wasn't who I wanted to be and her life wasn't the one I wanted to have.
quotes.author: Francesca Lia Block

quotes.quote: I know that mirrors give us a false sense of confidence. I continued. The reflection that we see everyday has nothing to do with how others see us. The glass lies.
quotes.author: Rasmenia Massoud

quotes.quote: Mirror should think longer before they reflect.
quotes.author: Jean Cocteau

quotes.quote: Mirrors don't lie. They only show a part of truth. A broken mirror can enlarge a face up to a dimension of a small planet. A problem of reflection? A point of view.
quotes.author: Lara Biyuts

quotes.quote: We look into mirrors but we only see the effects of our times on us - not our effects on others.
quotes.author: Pearl Bailey

quotes.quote: Everybody else needs mirrors to remind themselves who they are. You're no different.
quotes.author: Jonathan Nolan

quotes.quote: The mirror reflects all objects without being sullied.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: I used to look in the mirror and feel shame, I look in the mirror now and I absolutely love myself.
quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

quotes.quote: Look in the mirror, stare back at yourself and if you can't honestly say that you're perfect, then you have a right to judge the person standing beside you.
quotes.author: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.quote: The world is a great mirror. It reflects back to you what you are.
quotes.author: Thomas Dreier

quotes.quote: Whatever may be their use in civilized societies, mirrors are essential to all violent and heroic action.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: I leaned over the sink, closer to my reflection, and stare at myself hard. I don't know what I see. I don't even know what I want to see.
quotes.author: Nina LaCour

quotes.quote: Never look down on yourself when the whole world turn against you, just look in the mirror then you'll find out that you're not alone. That person you see in the mirror is your reflection, it shows that even if everybody ignore you it will always stick around with you.
quotes.author: Usman Ismaheel

quotes.quote: You mirror what the world mirrors to you.
quotes.author: Jennifer Lopez

quotes.quote: Mirrors are ice which do not melt: what melts are those who admire themselves in them.
quotes.author: Paul Morand

quotes.quote: When I look in the mirror, I never see a handsome chap or the person people think I am.
quotes.author: Luke Goss

quotes.quote: I used to live in a room full of mirrors; all I could see was me. I take my spirit and I crash my mirrors, now the whole world is here for me to see.
quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

quotes.quote: You can't see the world through a mirror.
quotes.author: Avril Lavigne

quotes.quote: Look in the mirror. The face that pins you with its double gaze reveals a chastening secret.
quotes.author: Diane Ackerman

quotes.quote: If art reflects life, it does so with special mirrors.
quotes.author: Bertolt Brecht

quotes.quote: I love mirrors. They let one pass through the surface of things.
quotes.author: Claude Chabrol

quotes.quote: The mirror is a powerful tool because it forces you to deal with yourself on a deeper level. Conceptually, paintings are like mirrors. They're an expression from the artist: 'This is how I view the world - I'm presenting it to you.
quotes.author: Mickalene Thomas

quotes.quote: I love looking in the mirror and feeling good about what I see.
quotes.author: Heather Morris

quotes.quote: Smile in the mirror. Do that every morning and you'll start to see a big difference in your life.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: Every man carries with him through life a mirror, as unique and impossible to get rid of as his shadow.
quotes.author: W.H. Auden

quotes.quote: Nobody really knows what they look like. The mirror shows you only what you want to see.
quotes.author: Terry Wogan

quotes.quote: I am locked into the mirror and there is no door out.
quotes.author: Laurie Halse Anderson

quotes.quote: Look in a mirror and one thing's sure; what we see is not who we are.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: The mirror is my best friend, because when I cry it never laughs.
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.quote: If you ever meet someone who cannot understand why solitary confinement is considered punishment, you have met a misanthrope.
quotes.author: Florence King

quotes.quote: You always feel like you are the only one in the world, like everyone else is crazy for each other, but it's not true. Generally, people don't like each other very much. And that goes for friends, too.
quotes.author: Miranda July

quotes.quote: People with antisocial personality disorders aren't automatically bad, they simply approach the world with a more ruthless set of lenses. The lack of empathy or very weak empathy and the ability to read other people's weak spots can be a flammable combination when you get in the way of something they want. But they aren't a different species. They're a part of our spectrum.
quotes.author: Eden Robinson

quotes.quote: The more you learn about the dignity of the gorilla, the more you want to avoid people.
quotes.author: Dian Fossey

quotes.quote: Let the misanthrope shun men and abjure; the most are rather lovable than hateful.
quotes.author: Tupper

quotes.quote: Misanthropy is the outcome of a misunderstood and tormented genius.
quotes.author: Kevin Schaller

quotes.quote: The misanthrope, as an essentially solitary man, is not a man at all he must be a beast or a god.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Ineradicable misanthropy we stick to nothing instinct of self preservation spreading venereal disease.
quotes.author: Sodom

quotes.quote: Avoiding humanity and humans, just work on yourself be a recluse for a while and see your mind getting much divine.
quotes.author: Mayur Tandon

quotes.quote: Sometimes those who don't socialize much aren't actually anti-social, they just have no tolerance for drama and fake people.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A man may make a misanthrope of himself, but he is never one by nature.
quotes.author: Lucy Larcom

quotes.quote: Misanthropy is a suit of armor lined with thorns.
quotes.author: Marie Ebner-Eschenbach

quotes.quote: Nobody adopts antisocial behaviour unless they fear that they will fail if they remain on the social side of life.
quotes.author: Alfred Adler

quotes.quote: Sensuality reconciles us with the human race. The misanthropy of the old is due in large part to the fading of the magic glow of desire.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: Being anti-social can also mean that you're aware of how annoying it is to be social.
quotes.author: Dov Davidoff

quotes.quote: In affability there is no hatred of men, but for that very reason there is all too much contempt for men.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Humans are naturally social; civilization causes us to be antisocial.
quotes.author: Kirk D. Sinclair

quotes.quote: If we define a misanthrope as someone who does not suffer fools and likes to see fools suffer, we have described a person with something to look forward to.
quotes.author: Florence King

quotes.quote: Let the misanthrope shun men and abjure; the most are rather lovable than
quotes.author: Martin Farquhar Tupper

quotes.quote: Unsociable humors are contracted in solitude, which will, in the end, not fail of corrupting the understanding as well as the manners, and of utterly disqualifying a man for the satisfactions and duties of life. Men must be taken as they are, and we neither make them or ourselves better by flying from or quarreling with them.
quotes.author: Edmond Burke

quotes.quote: Real misanthropes are not found in solitude, but in the world; since it is experience of life, and not philosophy, which produces real hatred of mankind.
quotes.author: Giacomo Leopardi

quotes.quote: Anti-social behavior is a trait of intelligence in a world full of conformists.
quotes.author: Nikola Tesla

quotes.quote: Anti-social behaviour still blights lives, wrecks communities and provides a pathway to criminality.
quotes.author: Theresa May

quotes.quote: Nobody enjoys the company of others as intensely as someone who usually avoids the company of others.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: Sometimes with the most intense pain a paralysis of sensibility occurs. The soul disintegrates hence the deadly frost the free power of the mind the shattering, ceaseless wit of this kind of despair. There is no inclination for anything any more the person is alone, like a baleful power as he has no connection with the rest of the world he consumes himself gradually and in accordance with his own principle he is misanthropic and misotheos.
quotes.author: Novalis

quotes.quote: A fine line separates the weary recluse from the fearful hermit. Finer still is the line between hermit and bitter misanthrope.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: Misanthropes have some admirable if paradoxical virtues. It is no exaggeration to say that we are among the nicest people you are likely to meet. Because good manners build sturdy walls, our distaste for intimacy makes us exceedingly cordial. Ships that pass in the night. As long as you remain a stranger we will be your friend forever.
quotes.author: Florence King

quotes.quote: Knowledge subverts love: in proportion as we penetrate our secrets, we come to loathe our kind, precisely because they resemble us.
quotes.author: Emil M. Cioran

quotes.quote: You always feel like you are the only one in the world, like everyone else is crazy for each other, but it's not true. Generally, people don't like each other very much. And that goes for friends, too.
quotes.author: Miranda July

quotes.quote: Whoever is not a misanthrope at forty can never have loved mankind.
quotes.author: Nicolas Chamfort

quotes.quote: The one thing in me more powerful than a general misanthropy is an inescapable compassion for individuals.
quotes.author: Jasper Sole

quotes.quote: The misanthrope, as an essentially solitary man, is not a man at all: he must be a beast or a god.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Most people are full of themselves and speak only the obnoxiously superficial, in other words they're annoying as hell
quotes.author: Novala Takemoto

quotes.quote: Sensuality reconciles us with the human race. The misanthropy of the old is due in large part to the fading of the magic glow of desire.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: Real misanthropes are not found in solitude, but in the world; since it is experience of life, and not philosophy, which produces real hatred of mankind.
quotes.author: Giacomo Leopardi

quotes.quote: The power of accurate observation is commonly called cynicism by those who have not got it.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Regardless of its causes, thoughtlessly blaming the present is a weakness which, even if it is never outlawed, ought to be resisted. Though commonly flaunted as a sign of sophistication, it can be an opportunity for one-upmanship and an excuse for misanthropy, especially against the young.
quotes.author: Steven Pinker

quotes.quote: Nobody enjoys the company of others as intensely as someone who usually avoids the company of others.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: In affability there is no hatred of men, but for that very reason there is all too much contempt for men.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: If we define a misanthrope as 'someone who does not suffer fools and likes to see fools suffer,' we have described a person with something to look forward to.
quotes.author: Florence King

quotes.quote: The multiplication of our kind borders on the obscene; the duty to love them, on the preposterous.
quotes.author: Emile M Cioran

quotes.quote: Animal lovers often tend to be misanthropes or loners, and so they transfer their affection to the creature in their control.
quotes.author: Paul Theroux

quotes.quote: A man may make a misanthrope of himself, but he is never one by nature.
quotes.author: Lucy Larcom

quotes.quote: Misanthropes have some admirable if paradoxical virtues. It is no exaggeration to say that we are among the nicest people you are likely to meet. Because good manners build sturdy walls, our distaste for intimacy makes us exceedingly cordial "ships that pass in the night." As long as you remain a stranger we will be your friend forever.
quotes.author: Florence King

quotes.quote: A fine line separates the weary recluse from the fearful hermit. Finer still is the line between hermit and bitter misanthrope.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: If you ever meet someone who cannot understand why solitary confinement is considered punishment, you have met a misanthrope.
quotes.author: Florence King

quotes.quote: A hermitage in the forest is the refuge of the narrow-minded misanthrope; a hammock on the ocean is the asylum for the generous distressed.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: A poet or philosopher should have no fault to find with his age if it only permits him to do his work undisturbed in his own corner; nor with his fate if the corner granted him allows of his following his vocation without having to think about other people.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: The opinions of the misanthropical rest upon this very partial basis, that they adopt the bad faith of a few as evidence of the worthlessness of all.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.quote: Let the misanthrope shun men and abjure; the most are rather lovable than hateful.
quotes.author: Martin Farquhar Tupper

quotes.quote: Misanthropy is a suit of armor lined with thorns.
quotes.author: Marie Ebner-Eschenbach

quotes.quote: The personality susceptible to the dream of limitless freedom is a personality also prone, should the dream ever sour, to misanthropy and rage.
quotes.author: Jonathan Franzen

quotes.quote: A savage review is much more entertaining for the reader than an admiring one; the little misanthrope in each of us relishes the rubbishing of someone else.
quotes.author: Arthur Smith

quotes.quote: Genius may have its limitations, but stupidity is not thus handicapped.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Misanthropy don't pay - there ain't no man living whose hate the world cares one cuss for.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Landscape painting is the obvious resource of misanthropy.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: Stay low, stay quiet, keep it simple, don't expect too much, enjoy what you have.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: MuchÂ mischiefÂ is done in the world with very little interest or design.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: It is always esteemed the greatestÂ mischiefÂ a man can do to those whom he loves, to raise men's expectations of them too high by undue and impertinent commendations.
quotes.author: Thomas Sprat

quotes.quote: He who has a mind to doÂ mischiefÂ will always find a pretense.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: The most balefulÂ mischiefs may be expected from the unmanly conduct of not daring to face truth because it is unpleasing.
quotes.author: Thomas Malthus

quotes.quote: TheÂ mischiefs of anarchy have been equaled by theÂ mischiefs of government.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: To mourn aÂ mischiefÂ that is past and gone Is the next way to draw newÂ mischiefÂ on.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: TheÂ mischiefÂ of children is seldom actuated by malice; that of grown-up people always is.
quotes.author: Antoine Rivarol

quotes.quote: No greaterÂ mischiefÂ could be wrought than love united to a jealous thought.
quotes.author: Robert Greene

quotes.quote: MischiefÂ springs from the power which the moneyed interest derives from a paper currency which they are able to control, from the multitude of corporations with exclusive privileges which are employed altogether for their benefit.
quotes.author: Andrew Jackson

quotes.quote: Between frivolity and intentional mischief there is little difference, none in the results.Â
quotes.author: Ilka Chase

quotes.quote: The greater part of all theÂ mischiefÂ in the world arises from the fact that men do not sufficiently understand their own aims.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: In every deed ofÂ mischiefÂ he had a heart to resolve, a head to contrive, and a hand to execute.
quotes.author: Edward Gibbon

quotes.quote: GreaterÂ mischiefÂ happens often from folly, meanness, and vanity than from the greater sins of avarice and ambition.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: The opportunity for doingÂ mischiefÂ is found a hundred times a day, and of doing good once in a year.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: MischiefÂ and malice grow on the same branch of the tree of evil.
quotes.author: Aaron Hill

quotes.quote: Turn away fromÂ mischief. Again and again, turn away. Before sorrow befalls you.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: GreatÂ mischiefÂ comes from attempts to steady other people's altars.
quotes.author: Mary Baker Eddy

quotes.quote: TheÂ mischiefÂ of flattery is, not that it persuades any man that he is what he is not, but that it suppresses the influence of honest ambition, by raising an opinion that honour may be gained without the toil of merit.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: It is a general rule of Judgment, that aÂ mischiefÂ should rather be admitted than an inconvenience.
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.quote: It is a world ofÂ mischiefÂ that may be done by a single example of avarice or luxury. One voluptuous palate makes many more.
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: Sometimes you lose a battle. ButÂ mischiefÂ always wins the war.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: A very great part of theÂ mischiefs that vex the world arises from words.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: It has been said that idleness is the parent of mischief, which is very true; but mischief itself is merely an attempt to escape from the dreary vacuum of idleness.
quotes.author: George Borrow

quotes.quote: When theÂ mischiefÂ is done the door is shut.
quotes.author: Juvenal

quotes.quote: Between what is said and not meant, and what is meant and not said, most of love is lost.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: So the whole war is because we can't talk to each other.
quotes.author: Orson Scott Card

quotes.quote: Well, it's really no use our talking in the way we have been doing if the words we use mean something different to each of us...and nothing.
quotes.author: Malcolm Bradbury

quotes.quote: Remember that misuse of language can lead to miscommunication, and that miscommunication leads to everything that has ever happened in the whole of the world
quotes.author: Joseph Fink

quotes.quote: He seemed to think we were on the same page. I wasn’t even sure we were reading the same book.
quotes.author: Jodie Andrefski

quotes.quote: Often in close relationships, the subject being discussed is not the subject at all.
quotes.author: Sharon Salzberg

quotes.quote: The only thing for sure we know about communication is that we tend to get it wrong.
quotes.author: Michael Ray Smith

quotes.quote: The single biggest problem in communication is the illusion that it has taken place.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Avoid miscommunication. The price you pay for it is horrendous.
quotes.author: Shiv Khera

quotes.quote: The overall purpose of human communication is - or should be - reconciliation. It should ultimately serve to lower or remove the walls of misunderstanding which unduly separate us human beings, one from another.
quotes.author: M. Scott Peck

quotes.quote: And I got - I got - I got to thinkin' about - about miscommunication. Like, how - isn't that the root of it? Conflict. War - does - doesn't it all come down to - to language? Right? The - the words we say and the words we hear, which aren't always the same thing.
quotes.author: Noah Hawley

quotes.quote: So whatever is on your mind, know you can always say it / Miscommunication, we don't know what we're saying, no / Miscommunication
quotes.author: Richard Jackson-Grose

quotes.quote: We seem to have a knack for miscommunication / It stabbed us in the back this time / Is this the end of the line / 'cause that'd be a crime
quotes.author: Chambers

quotes.quote: There's a voice that sounds too loud / It bangs on endlessly / want to live in another world with no frustrations / And miscommunication
quotes.author: Chambers

quotes.quote: We fall to miscommunication / in that moment I might die / I'll let you go if you really mean it
quotes.author: Andrew James Perdomo

quotes.quote: Miscommunications / Can't ever have no good relations / Do I haunt your mind, am I a waste of time? / Guess I'll just carry on as a ghost
quotes.author: Ant Saunders

quotes.quote: Misinterpretations / We're having differing vibrations / I apologize for all my great white lies
quotes.author: Ant Saunders

quotes.quote: But I'm getting so tired of people always crossing my wires / Life's just far too short for miscommunication.
quotes.author: Luke Pritchard

quotes.quote: It's funny how money change a situation / Miscommunication leads to complication / My emancipation don't fit your equation
quotes.author: Skip Scarborough

quotes.quote: Oh, a simple complication / Miscommunications lead to fall out / So many things that I wish you knew / So many walls up I can't break through
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: So this is where the story ends / A conversation on I-M / Well I'm done, were texting / Sorry for the miscommunication
quotes.author: Nicholas Jonas

quotes.quote: Over a miscommunication that probably could be fixed with a 5 minute conversation, I'm still praying
quotes.author: Sean Anderson

quotes.quote: Try and understand me if I stumble now and then / Some miscommunication stood between both you and I / You made your decision, here's hoping it's the right one
quotes.author: Bob Mould

quotes.quote: Nothing I can dictate / Where did we go wrong? / We need medication for / This miscommunication
quotes.author: Deon Rexroat

quotes.quote: Why don't you invite them up? / I got a word or two to tell them / It's about the situation / A terrible miscommunication
quotes.author: Aaron Freeman

quotes.quote: Try to get my thoughts together / I think of a time when things were better / This miscommunication is breaking me down
quotes.author: Ness

quotes.quote: Before you speak (before you speak) / Think about what you're trying to say (think about what you're trying to say) / Who else is there to blame for miscommunication?
quotes.author: Thomas James Gabel

quotes.quote: Do the same even though I had a meaner start / Still a league apart, guess I got a cleaner heart / Miscommunication tore my team apart
quotes.author: Abdul Rasheed Bella

quotes.quote: Miscommunication means to complication and / Here we are staring at each other at strangers, sleeping in the same bed / 'Cause it's like, you were never taught how to use your words like that / You were never taught how to say loving things and caring things.
quotes.author: David Algernon Bayley

quotes.quote: Seems like there's a miscommunication / About the way we're all supposed to be / Children of the sun come down and help us to see / That we're all together on a journey sharing universal destinies / Open up your soul and let it run wild and free
quotes.author: Eve Nelson

quotes.quote: The misconception which has haunted philosophic literature throughout the centuries is the notion of 'independent existence.' There is no such mode of existence; every entity is to be understood in terms of the way it is interwoven with the rest of the universe.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: There's a common misconception that wealth is a fixed pie, and that therefore for one person to have a lot of wealth requires somebody else to have less (the narrative often goes that wealthy people stole their wealth from poor and middle class people) ... [but] wealth can grow, so that even if someone's percentage of the pie remains the same, they will benefit from that individual slice getting bigger.
quotes.author: Ian Tartt

quotes.quote: Criticism is a misconception: we must read not to understand others but to understand ourselves.
quotes.author: Emil Cioran

quotes.quote: THE MISCONCEPTION: You are a rational, logical being who sees the world as it really is. THE TRUTH: You are as deluded as the rest of us, but that's OK, it keeps you sane.
quotes.author: David McRaney

quotes.quote: There's that popular misconception of man as something between a brute and an angel. Actually man is in transit between brute and God.
quotes.author: Norman Mailer

quotes.quote: It is a misconception to think that during evolution humans sacrificed physical skill in exchange for intelligence: wielding one's body is a mental activity.
quotes.author: Ted Chiang

quotes.quote: Every misconception is a poison: there are no harmless misconceptions.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: It became a lucrative misconception, that movement in any direction is progression.
quotes.author: Canibus

quotes.quote: There is no offense by which we are excited to a livelier or more just indignation, than by the misinterpretation of our own motives.
quotes.author: F. Wayland

quotes.quote: There seems to be a great misunderstanding on the part of a great many people to the effect that when you cease to believe you may cease to behave.
quotes.author: Louis Kronenberger

quotes.quote: Aristotle maintained that women have fewer teeth than men although he was twice married, it never occured to him to verify this statement by examining his wives' mouths.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Misconceptions are like cockroaches: you have no idea where they came from, but they're everywhereâ€”often where you don't expect themâ€”and they're impervious to nuclear weapons.
quotes.author: Alex Reinhart

quotes.quote: The notion of implied meaning is the root of misunderstanding.
quotes.author: Eric Parslow

quotes.quote: Stupidity is a talent for misconception.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: The final portrait is often furthest from the truth.
quotes.author: Dave Cullen

quotes.quote: Nothing is more dangerous for a new truth than an old misconception.
quotes.author: Goethe

quotes.quote: Why is it that there is this misconception that dark equals good. That only applies to chocolate.
quotes.author: Rhys Bowen

quotes.quote: The miracle of your mind isn't that you can see the world as it is. It's that you can see the world as it isn't.
quotes.author: Kathryn Schulz

quotes.quote: The misconception that a victory can be worth its price, has in the nuclear age become a total illusion.
quotes.author: Alva Myrdal

quotes.quote: Only misconceptions need to be supported by elaborate arguments. Truth can always stand alone.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Misunderstanding is generally simpler than true understanding, and hence has more potential for popularity.
quotes.author: Raheel Farooq

quotes.quote: The biggest misconception about work is that you need to spend the majority of your time doing it.
quotes.author: Tim Ferriss

quotes.quote: Facts are stubborn things, but statistics are pliable.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The delusions of self-love cannot be prevented, but intellectual misconceptions as to the means of achieving success may be corrected.
quotes.author: George Henry Lewes

quotes.quote: A man's free will cannot cure him even of the toothache, or a sore finger; and yet he madly thinks it is in its power to cure his soul.
quotes.author: Augustus Toplady

quotes.quote: The trouble with the world is not that people know too little; it's that they know so many things that just aren't so.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: In a society that judges self-worth on productivity, it's no wonder we fall prey to the misconception that the more we do, the more we're worth.
quotes.author: Ellen Stern

quotes.quote: Any man who knows all the answers most likely misunderstood the questions.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: To feed the hungry, to clothe the naked, to visit the ill in the hospitalâ€”these are acts of mercy, but there is one charitable deed which cannot be compared to them: to free your brother from misconception.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Where misunderstanding serves others as an advantage, one is helpless to make oneself understood.
quotes.author: Lionel Trilling

quotes.quote: Happy people find a way to live with their problems, and miserable people let their problems stop them from living.
quotes.author: Sonya Parker

quotes.quote: Miserable people focus on the things they hate about their life. Happy people focus on the things they love about their life.
quotes.author: Sonya Parker

quotes.quote: The secret of being miserable is to have the leisure to bother about whether you are happy or not. The cure is occupation.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: A man's as miserable as he thinks he is.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: There is no more miserable human being than one in whom nothing is habitual but indecision
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: We generally fancy ourselves more miserable than we are, for want of taking a true estimate of things; wherefore we fly into transports without reason, and judge of the happiness or calamity of human life, by false lights.
quotes.author: Wellins Calcott

quotes.quote: There is always more misery among the lower classes than there is humanity in the higher.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: It is seldom that the miserable can help regarding their misery as a wrong inflicted by those who are less miserable.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: The truly miserable have a timbre in their voices strong enough to erase smiles from the faces and souls of the contented.
quotes.author: Jerome

quotes.quote: Oftentimes, when people are miserable, they will want to make other people miserable, too. But it never helps.
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket

quotes.quote: The miserable have no other medicine, but only hope.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: I've learned from experience that the greater part of our happiness or misery depends on our disposition and not on our circumstances.
quotes.author: Martha Washington

quotes.quote: I stumbled out into the courtyard to try to flee my misery, but of course we can never flee the misery that is within us.
quotes.author: Arthur Golden
