quotes.quote: It appeared like their pain and suffering were combined feelings. But, feelings never did kill anyone. It was running away from feelings that lead to the absolute death of any relationship.
quotes.author: A.A. Gupte

quotes.quote: When someone makes you the happiest person and the saddest person at the same time, that's when it's real. That's when it's worth something.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Feelings are like chemicals, the more you analyze them the worse they smell
quotes.author: Charles Kingsley

quotes.quote: There comes a time you feel so alone no matter how much company you have.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If a person always leaves you with mixed feelings, uncertainty and an unsettled mind, you don't need to place your energy there.
quotes.author: Reyna Biddy

quotes.quote: It's a complicated world. People have a hard time finding each other & even when they do, they're scared to take the risk.
quotes.author: Rina Smiley

quotes.quote: A person is born with feelings of envy and hate. If he gives way to them, they will lead him to violence and crime, and any sense of loyalty and good faith will be abandoned.
quotes.author: Xun Zi

quotes.quote: An expectation was there, mixed in with so many other emotions, excitement, resignation, hesitation, confusion, fear that would well up then wither on the vine. You're optimistic one moment, only to be racked the next by the certainty that it will all fall to pieces. And in the end it does.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: Mixed feelings, like mixed drinks, are a confusion to the soul.
quotes.author: George Carman

quotes.quote: Your emotions are very unstable and should never be the foundation for direction in your life.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: Feelings are much like waves, we can't stop them from coming but we can choose which one to surf.
quotes.author: Jonatan Martensson

quotes.quote: Passion is the mob of the man, that commits a riot upon his reason.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.quote: Religion is the idol of the mob; it adores everything it does not understand.
quotes.author: Frederick The Great

quotes.quote: There is no necessity to separate the monarch from the mob; all authority is equally bad.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The mob is the mother of tyrants.
quotes.author: Diogenes

quotes.quote: One of the chief characteristics of a mob is its quickness. It is sudden. It pounces.
quotes.author: Teju Cole

quotes.quote: Every man has a mob self and an individual self, in varying proportions.
quotes.author: D.H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: It is an easy and a vulgar thing to please the mob, and not a very arduous task to astonish them; but essentially to benefit and to improve them, is a work fraught with difficulty, and teeming with danger.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: When one with honeyed words but evil mind persuades the mob, great woes befall the state.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: The mob rushes in where individuals fear to tread.
quotes.author: B.F. Skinner

quotes.quote: A democracy is nothing more than mob rule, where fifty-one percent of the people may take away the rights of the other forty-nine.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: A mob's a monster; heads enough but no brains
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Mobs are soulless things that feed on fear and momentum and prejudice.
quotes.author: Pierce Brown

quotes.quote: The nose of a mob is its imagination. By this, at any time, it can be quietly led.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: The mob has nothing to lose, everything to gain.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: The mob has no ruler more potent than superstition.
quotes.author: Quintus Curtius Rufus

quotes.quote: The mob will now and then see things in a right light.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: The mob is man voluntarily descending to the nature of the beast.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: For the mob is always impressed by appearances and by results, and the world is composed of the mob.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.quote: The mob gets out of hand, runs wild, worse than raging fire, while the man who stands apart is called a coward.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: The mob shouts with one big mouth and eats with a thousand little ones.
quotes.author: Stanisław Jerzy Lec

quotes.quote: I have encountered riotous mobs and have been hung in effigy, but my motto is: Men's rights are nothing more. Women's rights are nothing less.
quotes.author: Susan B. Anthony

quotes.quote: Markets as well as mobs respond to human emotions; markets as well as mobs can be inflamed to their own destruction.
quotes.author: Owen D. Young

quotes.quote: Mobs in their emotions are much like children, subject to the same tantrums and fits of fury.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: A mob is the scum that rises up most when the nation boils.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: Cultivate solitude and quiet and a few sincere friends, rather than mob merriment, noise and thousands of nodding acquaintances.
quotes.author: William Powell

quotes.quote: It is proof of a bad cause when it is applauded by the mob.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: A great nation is any mob of people which produces at least one honest man a century.
quotes.author: Henry Louis Mencken

quotes.quote: Get together a hundred or two men, however sensible they may be, and you are very likely to have a mob
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: A disorderly mob is no more an army than a heap of building materials is a house.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Humanity to me is not a mob. A mob is a degeneration of humanity. A mob is humanity going the wrong way.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.quote: Mocking precedes learning the hard way.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: MockingÂ a woman is like drinking too much wine. It may be fun for a short time, but the hangover is hell.
quotes.author: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.quote: When you laugh, be sure to laugh at what people do and not at what people are.
quotes.author: Oscar Auliq-Ice

quotes.quote: Arrogant men with knowledge make more noise from their mouth than making a sense from their mind.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: There is no faster way of destroying a man, orÂ mockingÂ his ideas, than making him fashionable.
quotes.author: Paul Theroux

quotes.quote: Isn't it the sweetest mockery to mock our enemies?
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: We mock that which we don't understand, and then we get to experience it ourselves.
quotes.author: Sarah Gerdes

quotes.quote: Mock the devil, and he will flee from thee.
quotes.author: Edward de Bono

quotes.quote: We ape, we mimic, we mock. We act.
quotes.author: Laurence Olivier

quotes.quote: No great movement designed to change the world can bear to be laughed at or belittled. Mockery is a rust that corrodes all it touches.
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.quote: Even a dog mocks a lion when the lion is inside a cage.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: To mock something is pure ignorance. Intelligent people even open themselves to things that they don't understand. [â€¦] When an ignorant praises something, it won't probably be something profound. Surely it can't be the Principle that guides us.
quotes.author: Alfonso Colodrón

quotes.quote: To mock at a soul in pain is a dreadful thing.
quotes.author: Monica Lewinsky

quotes.quote: It sometimes makes people feel better about themselves, you know, to put other people down, or make fun of them, or maybe make mockery of their work and that doesn't make me feel good at all.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.quote: Mind not the mocking and keep on walking.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: Always do your best in whatever you do; set goals and seek challenges.
quotes.author: Charles F. Bolden

quotes.quote: Modeling is really silent acting.
quotes.author: Arizona Muse

quotes.quote: Modeling is a lonely business.
quotes.author: Kim Alexis

quotes.quote: When you're acting your a person. When you're modeling you're a hanger.
quotes.author: Analeigh Tipton

quotes.quote: Modeling is a tough job, your co workers are your rivals, it really puts a damper on your perspective of other girls.
quotes.author: Adriana Lima

quotes.quote: Modeling is a great beginning, but it's also a kind of trap if you have any ambition or a mind that needs to be stimulated.
quotes.author: Maud Adams

quotes.quote: A model should be as simple as it can be but no simpler.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Modeling is an incredible job for a girl if she approaches it with her head on her shoulders. You travel, you speak to people, and it opens your mind to different things.
quotes.author: Anja Rubik

quotes.quote: The secret to modeling is not being perfect. What one needs is a face that people can identify in a second. You have to be given what's needed by nature, and what's needed is to bring something new.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.quote: A smart model is a good model.
quotes.author: Tyra Banks

quotes.quote: Modeling is not just beauty and smile, it takes boldness and style.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: No one trusts a model except the man who wrote it; everyone trusts an observation, except the man who made it.
quotes.author: Harlow Shapley

quotes.quote: If you can't find a good role model, be one.
quotes.author: Gale Anne Hurd

quotes.quote: Modeling is a profession where your worth is tied up with looks.
quotes.author: Christy Turlington

quotes.quote: Modeling teaches you to be completely concious of the camera. Acting is being totally unconcious of it.
quotes.author: Phoebe Cates

quotes.quote: This modeling thing, it's pretty easy, but actually it's also really tough.
quotes.author: Cara Delivingne

quotes.quote: Modeling is the world that feel most welcome in.
quotes.author: Brooke Shields

quotes.quote: Modeling is not something you excel because you are clever but is based on physical appearance, but then you have to a businesswoman, like, to keep your longevity.
quotes.author: Gelila Bekele

quotes.quote: You need beauty to be a model but not to be a role model.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Everyone in society should be a role model, not only for their own self-respect, but for respect from others.
quotes.author: Barry Bonds

quotes.quote: A model is an actor without a voice.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: A role model is a person whose roles can be modelled. If the roles you conceive and give birth to today cannot be adopted by anyone in your absence, you are no good model.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Model the qualities that you want your children to show to each other.
quotes.author: Elizabeth George

quotes.quote: Be the role model you needed when you were younger.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The spirit of moderation should also be the spirit of the lawgiver.
quotes.author: Charles de Montesquieu

quotes.quote: Moderation is the key of lasting enjoyment.
quotes.author: Hosea Ballou

quotes.quote: Moderation has been called a virtue to limit the ambition of great men, and to console undistinguished people for their want of fortune and their lack of merit.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Practice moderation in all things except love.
quotes.author: Gary Zukav

quotes.quote: Moderation consists in being moved as angels are moved.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: Moderation: a median with no means, praised by those with no misfortunes, practiced by those with no merits.
quotes.author: Bauvard

quotes.quote: Moderation is a wiser policy than zealotry.
quotes.author: Christopher Paolini

quotes.quote: In moderating, not in satisfying desires, lies peace.
quotes.author: Reginald Heber

quotes.quote: Moderation is a fatal thing. Nothing succeeds like excess.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Moderation is the inseparable companion of wisdom, but with it genius has not even a nodding acquaintance.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: One can with but moderate possessions do what one ought.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Moderation is an ostentatious proof of our strength of character.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Only actions give life strength; only moderation gives it charm.
quotes.author: Jean Paul

quotes.quote: Moderation is the feebleness and sloth of the soul, whereas ambition is the warmth and activity of it.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Moderation in all things.
quotes.author: Terence

quotes.quote: If moderation is a fault, then indifference is a crime.
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

quotes.quote: Everything in moderation, and there's a perfect balance in this life if we can find it.
quotes.author: Ryan Robbins

quotes.quote: Out of moderation a pure happiness springs.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Everything in moderation, and there's a perfect balance in this life if we can find it.
quotes.author: Ryan Robbins

quotes.quote: Never go to excess, but let moderation be your guide.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: Moderation is the secret of survival.
quotes.author: Manly Hall

quotes.quote: Only actions give life its strength, as only moderation gives it its charm.
quotes.author: Jean Paul Richter

quotes.quote: Moderation is the center wherein all philosophies, both human and divine, meet.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Moderation is a beautiful thing when extremes, although they exist, are the exception and not the rule.
quotes.author: Kelly Borsheim

quotes.quote: Throw moderation to the winds, and the greatest pleasures bring the greatest pains.
quotes.author: Democritus

quotes.quote: The boundary of man is moderation. When once we pass that pale our guardian angel quits his charge of us.
quotes.author: Owen Feltham

quotes.quote: Be moderate in order to taste the joys of life in abundance.
quotes.author: Epicurus

quotes.quote: Moderation is the silken string running through the pearl-chain of all virtues.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Moderation in temper is always a virtue; but moderation in principle is always a vice.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: Moderation is actually the flip side of dieting, that is, imposed deprivation.
quotes.author: Victoria Moran

quotes.quote: The modern period adds social ethics to religions agenda, for we now realize that social structures are not like laws of nature. They are human creations, so we are responsible for them.
quotes.author: Huston Smith

quotes.quote: In modern business it is not the crook who is to be feared most, it is the honest man who doesn't know what he is doing.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: Modernization means Westernization.
quotes.author: Camille Paglia

quotes.quote: Rather than trying to reinvent the wheel, build on to that which is already excellent.
quotes.author: Auliq Ice

quotes.quote: In the modern world, if you want to travel off the beaten path, stay off the beaten media path.
quotes.author: Khang Kijarro Nguyen

quotes.quote: Modernization, socialization, and progression doesn't alter nor permit discarding the morals and the laws one should abide themselves too.
quotes.author: Avra Amar Filion

quotes.quote: Being human in our modern civilization is being forced into a boxing ring with Nature. And we're bloodied every time.
quotes.author: M. Robin D'Antan

quotes.quote: To be healthy in modern society, you must adopt the behaviors of an astronaut!
quotes.author: Steven Magee

quotes.quote: As countries grapple with modernization, people who are left behind tend to hold firmer and firmer to their view of the evil of modernity.
quotes.author: Richard Holbrooke

quotes.quote: To expect the unexpected shows a thoroughly modern intellect.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The secret to living contently and sanely in this modern world is to find the beautiful in the ugly, but don't get confused which is which.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: In modern life nothing produces such an effect as a good platitude. It makes the whole world kin.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Compulsive modernization is the insatiable desire to change and grow.
quotes.author: Samuel Wilson

quotes.quote: Nations rise and fall, flourish and decay, by what they believe in and by what their culture stands for.
quotes.author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

quotes.quote: The difficulty for most of us in the modern world is that the old-fashioned idea of God has become incredible or implausible.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: The difference between technology and slavery is that slaves are fully aware that they are not free.
quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.quote: In this modern world it is easy to be complex but difficult to be simple. At least try to keep your mind simple.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Modern consumer life is a form of extreme passive violence against all people.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: We must take steps to prevent further nuclear weapons development or modernization.
quotes.author: Daisaku Ikeda

quotes.quote: The modern human lives in a cesspool of man-made electromagnetic radiation.
quotes.author: Steven Magee

quotes.quote: The modern conservative is engaged in one of man's oldest exercises in moral philosophy; that is, the search for a superior moral justification for selfishness.
quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quotes.quote: Modern life is a centrifuge; it throws people in every direction.
quotes.author: Paul Murray

quotes.quote: You are born modern, you do not become so.
quotes.author: Jean Baudrillard

quotes.quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Have we not come to such an impasse in the modern world that we must love our enemies - or else? The chain reaction of evil - hate begetting hate, wars producing more wars - must be broken, or else we shall be plunged into the dark abyss of annihilation.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: Our modern society is engaged in polishing and decorating the cage in which man is kept imprisoned.
quotes.author: Swami Nirmalananda

quotes.quote: We are a culture that relies on technology over community, a society in which spoken and written words are cheap, easy to come by, and excessive. Our culture says anything goes; fear of God is almost unheard of. We are slow to listen, quick to speak, and quick to become angry.
quotes.author: Francis Chan

quotes.quote: The fundamental cause of the trouble is that in the modern world the stupid are cocksure while the intelligent are full of doubt.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Modern art has to be what is called ‘intense.’ it is not easy to define being intense; but, roughly speaking, it means saying only one thing at a time, and saying it wrong.
quotes.author: G.K.Chesterton

quotes.quote: To say the word Romanticism is to say modern art - that is, intimacy, spirituality, color, aspiration towards the infinite, expressed by every means available to the arts.
quotes.author: Charles Boudelaire

quotes.quote: Modern art is a disaster area. Never in the field of human history has so much been used by so many to say so little.
quotes.author: Banksy

quotes.quote: Another unsettling element in modern art is that common symptom of immaturity, the dread of doing what has been done before.
quotes.author: Edith Wharton

quotes.quote: Skill without imagination is craftsmanship and gives us many useful objects such as wickerwork picnic baskets. Imagination without skill gives us modern art.
quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

quotes.quote: Modern art is what happens when painters stop looking at girls and persuade themselves that they have a better idea.
quotes.author: John Ciardi

quotes.quote: The history of modern art is also the history of the progressive loss of art's audience. Art has increasingly become the concern of the artist and the bafflement of the public.
quotes.author: Paul Gauguin

quotes.quote: The best one can say of modern creative art is that it is just a little less vulgar than reality
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The abstractness of modern art has to do with how much an enlightened mind rejects of the contemporary social order.
quotes.author: Robert Motherwell

quotes.quote: The truly modern artist is aware of abstraction in an emotion of beauty
quotes.author: Piet Mondrian

quotes.quote: The modern artist... is working and expressing an inner world - in other words - expressing the energy, the motion, and other inner forces
quotes.author: Jackson Pollock

quotes.quote: In general, modern art... has been inspired by a natural desire to chart the uncharted
quotes.author: Herbert Read

quotes.quote: It is not hard to understand modern art. If it hangs on a wall it's a painting, and if you can walk around it it's a sculpture
quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

quotes.quote: The public history of modern art is the story of conventional people not knowing what they are dealing with
quotes.author: Golda Meir

quotes.quote: In its most limited sense, modern, art would seem to concern itself only with the technical innovations of the period.
quotes.author: Edward Hopper

quotes.quote: The notion that the public accepts or rejects anything in modern art is merely romantic fiction. The game is completed and the trophies distributed long before the public knows what has happened.
quotes.author: Tom Wolfe

quotes.quote: Most painting in the European tradition was painting the mask. Modern art rejected all that. Our subject matter was the person behind the mask.
quotes.author: Robert Motherwell

quotes.quote: Even in modern art, artists have used methods based on calculation, inasmuch as these elements, alongside those of a more personal and emotional nature, give balance and harmony to any work of art.
quotes.author: Max Bill

quotes.quote: Make it new is the message not just of modern art but of modern consumerism, of which modern art is largely a mirror image.
quotes.author: Christopher Lasch

quotes.quote: You can understand nothing about art, particularly modern art, if you do not understand that imagination is a value in itself.
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.quote: I have trouble with modern art. But in general, all art forms fascinate me - art is the way human beings express what we can't say in words.
quotes.author: Andrea Bocelli

quotes.quote: As the spiral of modern art history continues to wind down, we can see the increasing demand for tradition in the visual arts
quotes.author: Igor Babailov

quotes.quote: Don't bother about being modern. Unfortunately it is the one thing that, whatever you do, you cannot avoid.
quotes.author: Salvador Dali

quotes.quote: Perpetual modernism is the measure of merit in every work of art.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Modern paintings often seem to have been made quickly, by comparison with the paintings of earlier centuries, and that seems to give us the license to look at them quickly - to consume them and move on.
quotes.author: James Elkins

quotes.quote: Modernism in architecture went hand in hand with socialist and fascist projects to rid old Europe of its hierarchical past
quotes.author: Roger Scruton

quotes.quote: Modernism is the protein of our cultural imagination.
quotes.author: Robert Hughes

quotes.quote: A lot of modernism does seem to come out of a fear of being thought an ordinary storyteller. So they tell it backwards and they tell it in the present tense and they cut loose the pages and shuffle them around - all that kind of stuff.
quotes.author: Philip Pullman

quotes.quote: The modern mind is in complete disarray. Knowledge has stretched itself to the point where neither the world nor our intelligence can find any foot-hold. It is a fact that we are suffering from nihilism.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Modernism has a reputation for being a forbidding phenomenon: its visual arts disconcertingly non-representational, its literary efforts devoid of the consolations of plot and character - even its films, it's argued, fall well short of that true desideratum: entertainment.
quotes.author: Will Self

quotes.quote: Post-modernism is modernism with the optimism taken out.
quotes.author: Robert Hewison

quotes.quote: Modernism may be seen as an attempt to reconstruct the world in the absence of God.
quotes.author: Bryan Appleyard

quotes.quote: Modernism is about space. Postmodernism is about communication. You should do what turns you on.
quotes.author: Robert Venturi

quotes.quote: Modernism in other arts brought extreme difficulty. In poetry, the characteristic difficulty imported under the name of modernism was obscurity. But obscurity could just as easily be a quality of metrical as of free verse.
quotes.author: James Fenton

quotes.quote: Modernism is typically defined as the condition that begins when people realize God is truly dead, and we are therefore on our own.
quotes.author: Phillip E. Johnson

quotes.quote: In modern life nothing produces such an effect as a good platitude. It makes the whole world kin.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Modernism was influenced by what they call a primativist ethic.
quotes.author: Theaster Gates

quotes.quote: Modernism, rebelling against the ornament of the 19th century, limited the vocabulary of the designer. Modernism emphasized straight lines, eliminating the expressive S curve. This made it harder to communicate emotions through design.
quotes.author: Eva Zeisel

quotes.quote: Modernism released us from the constraints of everything that had gone before with a euphoric sense of freedom.
quotes.author: Arthur Erickson

quotes.quote: Modernity exists in the form of a desire to wipe out whatever came earlier, in the hope of reaching at least a point that could be called a true present, a point of origin that marks a new departure.
quotes.author: Paul de Man

quotes.quote: Modernism', as a label, has currency in the arts, architecture, planning, landscape, politics, theology, cultural history and elsewhere.
quotes.author: Tom Turne

quotes.quote: A modest little person, with much to be modest about.
quotes.author: Winston S. Churchill

quotes.quote: To be humble to superiors is duty, to equals courtesy, to inferiors nobleness.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Modesty is the color of virtue.
quotes.author: Diogenes

quotes.quote: Let us be absolutely clear about one thing: we must not confuse humility with false modesty or servility.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: It is amazing what you can accomplish if you do not care who gets the credit.
quotes.author: Harry Truman

quotes.quote: Modesty, if you consider it, is the most unforgivable sort of falsehood: it's a lie that does damage to no one but yourself.
quotes.author: Meredith Duran

quotes.quote: It's not much of a tail, but I'm sort of attached to it.
quotes.author: A.A. Milne

quotes.quote: The man who is ostentatious of his modesty is twin to the statue that wears a fig-leaf.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: False modesty can be worse than arrogance.
quotes.author: David Mitchell

quotes.quote: Unaffected modesty is the sweetest charm of female excellence, the richest gem in the diadem of her honor.
quotes.author: Noah Webster

quotes.quote: The thunder of false modesty was deafening.
quotes.author: Sebastian Faulks

quotes.quote: Modesty is the conscience of the body.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: No modest man ever did or ever will make a fortune.
quotes.author: Mary Wortley Montagu

quotes.quote: We wound our modesty and make foul the clearness of our deservings, when of ourselves we publish them.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The delicate balance between modesty and conceit is popularity.
quotes.author: Max Beerbohm

quotes.quote: Modesty is invisibility. Never forget it. To be seen to be seen is to be penetrated. What you must be girls, is impenetrable.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: You do not become smarter by blowing your own horn. You become smarter by being humble.
quotes.author: Dr T.P.Chia

quotes.quote: Modesty is the lowest of the virtues, and is a real confession of the deficiency it indicates. He who undervalues himself is justly undervalued by others.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: A just and reasonable modesty does not only recommend eloquence, but sets off every great talent which a man can be possessed of.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: When you know who you are, you won't have false modesty.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: I have often wished I had time to cultivate modesty. But I am too busy thinking about myself.
quotes.author: Edith Sitwell

quotes.quote: Modesty should be typical of the success of a champion.
quotes.author: Major Taylor

quotes.quote: In life humility is not a handicap, arrogance is not a strength.
quotes.author: Dr T.P.Chia

quotes.quote: Modesty is a quality in a lover more praised by the women than liked.
quotes.author: Richard Brinsley Sheridan

quotes.quote: Having a low opinion of yourself is not modesty. It's self-destruction. Holding your uniqueness in high regard is not egotism. It's a necessary precondition to happiness and success.
quotes.author: Bobbe Sommer

quotes.quote: Modesty is a vastly overrated virtue.
quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quotes.quote: Modesty is the delicate form of hypocrisy.
quotes.author: Remy de Gourmont

quotes.quote: Usually the modest person passes for someone reserved, the silent for a sullen person.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Modesty is not only an ornament, but also a guard to virtue.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: He who speaks without modesty will find it difficult to make his words good.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Being a mother is an attitude, not a biological relation.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Everybody wants to save the Earth; nobody wants to help Mom do the dishes.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: If evolution really works, how come mothers only have two hands?
quotes.author: Milton Berle

quotes.quote: Motherhood has a very humanizing effect. Everything gets reduced to essentials.
quotes.author: Meryl Streep

quotes.quote: An ounce of mother is worth a pound of clergy.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: If you have a mom, there is nowhere you are likely to go where a prayer has not already been.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: My mom is a lifelong smile in my heart, her voice a comfort to my soul, her hugs my ladder to the stars.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: A mother's arms are made of tenderness and children sleep soundly in them.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: The love of a mother is the veil of a softer light between the heart and the heavenly Father.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: Working moms, stay at home moms, they're both extremely hard jobs.
quotes.author: Hilary Rosen

quotes.quote: Motherhood - no matter if you're a working mom or stay at home mom - is really tough sometimes. It can really leave us each day with a sense of wondering if we're doing it right. You know, it's a long term investment. You don't see big returns in the short term. Raising a child can easily pull you into being hyper-focused on the tough everyday moments of life.
quotes.author: Lysa Terkeurst

quotes.quote: Some are kissing mothers and some are scolding mothers, but it is love just the same, and most mothers kiss and scold together.
quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.quote: I think in a lot of ways unconditional love is a myth. My mom's the only reason I know it's a real thing.
quotes.author: Conor Oberst

quotes.quote: The heart of a mother is a deep abyss at the bottom of which you will always find forgiveness.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: All mothers are powered by love, fueled by caffeine, and sustained by wine. Take away any one of this is and it's a whole different ballgame. You may want to steer clear of the mom in question.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A mom's hug lasts long after she lets go.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: You don't have to deserve your mother's love. You have to deserve your father's.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: You're always going to wonder if you're doing things wrong, but that's what it means to be a mom, to care so much about someone else that you just want to be as perfect as possible.
quotes.author: Naya Rivera

quotes.quote: It is not until you become a mother that your judgment slowly turns to compassion and understanding.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Mom â€” the person most likely to write an autobiography and never mention herself.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: God could not be everywhere, and therefore he made mothers.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: The moment a child is born, the mother is also born. She never existed before. The woman existed, but the mother, never. A mother is something absolutely new.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: Feeling fat lasts nine months but the joy of becoming a mom lasts forever.
quotes.author: Nikki Dalton

quotes.quote: The natural state of motherhood is unselfishness. When you become a mother, you are no longer the center of your own universe. You relinquish that position to your children.
quotes.author: Jessica Lange

quotes.quote: I appreciate the chance to visit my mom on Mother's Day -- it's like taking a refresher course in guilt.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: The art of motherhood involves much silent, unobtrusive self-denial, an hourly devotion which finds no detail too minute.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: Youth fades, love droops, the leaves of friendship fall; A mother's secret hope outlives them all.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes Sr.

quotes.quote: Every mother is like Moses. She does not enter the promised land. She prepares a world she will not see.
quotes.author: Pope Paul VI

quotes.quote: When you are a mother, you are never really alone in your thoughts. A mother always has to think twice, once for herself and once for her child.
quotes.author: Sophia Loren

quotes.quote: Mama was my greatest teacher, a teacher of compassion, love and fearlessness. If love is sweet as a flower, then my mother is that sweet flower of love.
quotes.author: Stevie Wonder

quotes.quote: One of the greatest titles in the world is parent, and one of the biggest blessings in the world is to have parents to call mom and dad.
quotes.author: Jim Demint

quotes.quote: No one was more important than my mom and dad. I know they are watching from a place up in heaven here today to make sure all their kids are doing good.
quotes.author: Eddie Murray

quotes.quote: When mom and dad went to war, the only prisoners they took were the children.
quotes.author: Pat Conroy

quotes.quote: You don't have to be famous. You just have to make your mother and father proud of you.
quotes.author: Meryl Streep

quotes.quote: Parents don't make mistakes because they don't care, but because they care so deeply.
quotes.author: T. Berry Brazelton

quotes.quote: Your captain is your mother and father. He will tell you when to eat and when to sleep. Listen to him. Make happy. And we will all see the land we are going to.
quotes.author: Mau Piailug

quotes.quote: Parents often talk about the younger generation as if they didn't have anything to do with it.
quotes.author: Haim Ginott

quotes.quote: My mom and dad gave their kids the greatest gift of all - the gift of unconditional love. They cared deeply about who we would be, and much less about what we would do.
quotes.author: Mitt Romney

quotes.quote: Fathers and mothers have lost the idea that the highest aspiration they might have for their children is for them to be wise... specialized competence and success are all that they can imagine.
quotes.author: Allan Bloom

quotes.quote: It is time for parents to teach young people early on that in diversity there is beauty and there is strength.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Parents are the ultimate role models for children. Every word, movement and action has an effect. No other person or outside force has a greater influence on a child than the parent.
quotes.author: Bob Keeshan

quotes.quote: My mother protected me from the world and my father threatened me with it.
quotes.author: Quentin Crisp

quotes.quote: Parents can only give good advice or put them on the right paths, but the final forming of a person's character lies in their own hands.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: Parents are traffic signs that are always in our blind spots.
quotes.author: Jeremy P. Johnson

quotes.quote: Parents, they're strict on you when you're little, and you don't understand why. But as you get older, you understand and you appreciate it.
quotes.author: Grant Hill

quotes.quote: The most important thing that parents can teach their children is how to get along without them.
quotes.author: Frank A. Clark

quotes.quote: Parents are the last people on earth who ought to have children.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: To be a good father and mother requires that the parents defer many of their own needs and desires in favor of the needs of their children. As a consequence of this sacrifice, conscientious parents develop a nobility of character and learn to put into practice the selfless truths taught by the Savior Himself.
quotes.author: James E. Faust

quotes.quote: Parents are people who yell and they yell and they yell and they yell. And you already have the point... and they're still yelling.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: Parents were invented to make children happy by giving them something to ignore.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: Parents forgive their children least readily for the faults they themselves instilled in them.
quotes.author: Marie Ebner-Eschenbach

quotes.quote: Parents are like shuttles on a loom. They join the threads of the past with threads of the future and leave their own bright patterns as they go.
quotes.author: Fred Rogers

quotes.quote: Parents can plant magic in a child's mind through certain words spoken with some thrilling quality of voice, some uplift of the heart and spirit.
quotes.author: Robert Macneil

quotes.quote: Parents are sometimes a bit of a disappointment to their children. They don't fulfill the promise of their early years.
quotes.author: Anthony Powell

quotes.quote: Parents can really help, but they can also really hinder the development of their youngsters.
quotes.author: Mike Krzyzewski

quotes.quote: To all those mothers and fathers who are struggling with teen-agers, I say, just be patient: even though it looks like you can't do anything right for a number of years, parents become popular again when kids reach 20.
quotes.author: Marian Wright Edelman

quotes.quote: My mom's a Catholic, and my dad's a Jew, and they didn't want anything to do with anything.
quotes.author: Isabelle Huppert

quotes.quote: My mom is a very warm, typical sort of Jewish-mother type. And my dad has a somewhat, um, different personality.
quotes.author: Peter Orszag

quotes.quote: The only thing I have to go by is what my mother and father told me, how I was brought up.
quotes.author: Madeleine Albright

quotes.quote: Both my mother and father were very supportive of any career move any of us wanted to make.
quotes.author: James Gandolfini

quotes.quote: I've always believed in savoring the moments. In the end, they are the only things we'll have.
quotes.author: Anna Godbersen

quotes.quote: Nothing is permanently perfect. But there are perfect moments and the will to choose what will bring about more perfect moments.
quotes.author: Mary Balogh

quotes.quote: Guard well your spare moments. They are like uncut diamonds. Discard them and their value will never be known. Improve them and they will become the brightest gems in a useful life.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Use your precious moments to live life fully every single second of every single day.
quotes.author: Marcia Wieder

quotes.quote: Every moment is the paradox of now or never.
quotes.author: Simon Van Booy

quotes.quote: At the end, one didn't remember life as a whole but as just a string of moments.
quotes.author: David Levien

quotes.quote: I want to take all our best moments, put them in a jar, and take them out like cookies and savor each one of them forever.
quotes.author: Crystal Woods

quotes.quote: Life is a succession of moments, to live each one is to succeed.
quotes.author: Corita Kent

quotes.quote: The moments we have behind us, you won't be able to see again. We're only responsible for what we live in right now.
quotes.author: Flavor Flav

quotes.quote: Don't wait for the perfect moment, take the moment and make it perfect.
quotes.author: Zoey Sayward

quotes.quote: Sometimes the moments that challenge us the most, define us.
quotes.author: Deena Kastor

quotes.quote: Realize deeply that the present moment is all you have.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Some moments are nice, some are nicer, some are even worth writing about.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: The bittersweet side of appreciating life's most precious moments is the unbearable awareness that those moments are passing.
quotes.author: Marc Parent

quotes.quote: We make patterns, we share moments.
quotes.author: Jenny Downham

quotes.quote: There are no ordinary moments.
quotes.author: Dan Millman

quotes.quote: The butterfly counts not months but moments, and has time enough.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: We never remember days, only moments.
quotes.author: Cesare Pavese

quotes.quote: Great moments are born from great oppurtunities.
quotes.author: Herb Brooks

quotes.quote: I guess they're called moments because they don't last very long.
quotes.author: Sarra Manning

quotes.quote: To encounter great moments, you must mostly be in motion!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat

quotes.quote: The best moments are the unplanned ones that just happen but make your day perfect.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Sometimes at the best moments a single word or a look is enough.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: Simple moments are sometimes the best moments.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Happy moments, PRAISE God.Difficult moments, SEEK God. Quiet moments, WORSHIP God. Painful moments, TRUST God. Every moment, THANK God.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: A good life is a collection of happy moments.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Allow yourself to enjoy each moment in your life.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Life isn't a matter of milestones, but of moments.
quotes.author: Rose Kennedy

quotes.quote: You can't let one bad moment spoil a bunch of good ones.
quotes.author: Dale Earnhardt

quotes.quote: Every moment is a golden one for those who have the vision to recognize it as such.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: The one great element in continuing the success of an offensive is maintaining the momentum.
quotes.author: George C. Marshall

quotes.quote: Forward momentum only worked as a strategy if one had correctly identified which way was forward.
quotes.author: Lois McMaster Bujold

quotes.quote: Momentum was momentum, whether you found it in music or on the street or in the beat of your own heart.
quotes.author: Michael Connelly

quotes.quote: Sometimes it's very difficult to keep momentum when it's you that you are following.
quotes.author: Andrew Lloyd Webber

quotes.quote: Build confidence and momentum with each good decision you make from here on out and choose to be inspired.
quotes.author: Joe Rogan

quotes.quote: The momentum of time is always going forward. You cannot repeat what has been done before. You can't go back.
quotes.author: Annie Lennox

quotes.quote: When you find yourself in the thickness of pursuing a goal or dream, stop only to rest. Momentum builds success.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: There appears to be momentum towards more and more misunderstandings between religions, a degradation of relations.
quotes.author: Aga Khan IV

quotes.quote: The words carry their own momentum. A confession in motion tends to stay in motion. Newton's first law of jealousy.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: When we move in a direction that touches our heart, we add to the momentum of deeper purpose that makes us feel more alive.
quotes.author: Joanna Macy and Chris Johnstone

quotes.quote: Prose should have a flow, the forward momentum of a certain energized weight; it should feel like a voice tumbling in your ear.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: The stream of thinking has enormous momentum that can easily drag you along with it. Every thought pretends that it matters so much.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: The most important thing you can do to achieve your goals is to make sure that as soon as you set them you immediately begin to create momentum.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: The momentum now is inevitable. Now it's about each of us individually arranging the furniture of our own mind to deal with what has become inevitable.
quotes.author: Terence McKenna

quotes.quote: When you're that successful, things have a momentum, and at a certain point you can't really tell whether you have created the momentum or it's creating you.
quotes.author: Annie Lennox

quotes.quote: Momentum is your next day's pitcher.
quotes.author: Jim Leyland

quotes.quote: One play can change your momentum forever.
quotes.author: Sherman Alexie

quotes.quote: Never surrender to the momentum of mediocrity.
quotes.author: Marlon Brando

quotes.quote: The momentum of the mind can be vexingly, involuntarily capricious.
quotes.author: Gregory Maguire

quotes.quote: For any movement to gain momentum, it must start with a small action.
quotes.author: Adam Braun

quotes.quote: He who is doing his true will is assisted by the momentum of the universe.
quotes.author: Peter J. Carroll

quotes.quote: Like all books that have that kind of momentum, it starts from word of mouth.
quotes.author: Nick Hornby

quotes.quote: One positive step can put an end to negative momentum. Now is when you can take it.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.quote: Keep moving ahead because action creates momentum, which in turn creates unanticipated opportunities.
quotes.author: Nick Vujicic

quotes.quote: Momentum and growth are the lifeblood of startups. This is probably in the top three secrets of executing well.
quotes.author: Sam Altman

quotes.quote: In a good meeting there is a momentum that comes from the spontaneous exchange of fresh ideas and produces extraordinary results. That momentum depends on the freedom permitted the participants.
quotes.author: Harold Geneen

quotes.quote: Momentum solves 80% of your problems.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Sometimes thinking too much can destroy your momentum.
quotes.author: Tom Watson

quotes.quote: Momentum is whatever your attitude determines it to be.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: Momentum is only as good as tomorrow's starting pitcher.
quotes.author: Earl Weaver

quotes.quote: The worst that can happen underÂ monarchyÂ is rule by a single imbecile, but democracy often means the rule by an assembly of three or four hundred imbeciles.
quotes.author: Robert Anton Wilson

quotes.quote: AÂ monarchyÂ is the mostÂ expensiveÂ of allformsÂ of government, theÂ regalÂ staterequiringÂ aÂ costlyÂ parade, and he whodependsÂ on his ownÂ powerÂ to rule, must strengthenÂ thatÂ powerÂ byÂ bribingÂ theÂ activeandÂ enterprisingÂ whom heÂ cannotÂ intimidate.
quotes.author: James Fenimore Cooper

quotes.quote: The progress from an absolute to a limitedÂ monarchy, from a limitedÂ monarchyÂ to a democracy, is a progress toward a true respect for the individual.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: MonarchyÂ degenerates into tyranny, aristocracy into oligarchy, and democracy into savage violence and chaos.
quotes.author: Polybius

quotes.quote: The monarchy is a political referee, not a political player, and there is a lot of sense in choosing the referee by a different principle from the players. It lessens the danger that the referee might try to start playing.
quotes.author: Conrad Russell

quotes.quote: TheÂ monarchyÂ is a part of the state. It exists to serve the people.
quotes.author: Heather Brooke

quotes.quote: IfÂ monarchyÂ is corrupting - and it is - wait till you see what overt empire does to us.
quotes.author: Daniel Ellsberg

quotes.quote: TheÂ monarchyÂ is finished. It was finished a while ago, but they're still making the corpses dance.
quotes.author: Sue Townsend

quotes.quote: An absoluteÂ monarchyÂ is one in which the sovereign does as he pleases so long as he pleases the assassins.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: MonarchyÂ hardens into despotism. Aristocracy contracts into oligarchy. Democracy expands into the supremacy of numbers.
quotes.author: Lord Acton

quotes.quote: AÂ monarchyÂ conducted with infinite wisdom and infinite benevolence is the most perfect of all possible governments.
quotes.author: Ezra Stiles

quotes.quote: AÂ monarchyÂ is like a man-of-war--bad shots between wind and water hurt it exceedingly; there is danger of capsizing. But democracy is a raft. You cannot easily overturn it. It is a wet place, but it is a pretty safe one.
quotes.author: Joseph Cook

quotes.quote: TheÂ monarchyÂ is a labor intensive industry.
quotes.author: Harold Wilson

quotes.quote: One advantage of aÂ monarchyÂ is that aÂ monarchyÂ does not suffer the effects of having great clots of white Christians moping around simply because they aren't the king or queen.
quotes.author: Calvin Trillin

quotes.quote: InÂ monarchyÂ the crime of treason may admit of being pardoned or lightly punished, but the man who dares rebel against the laws of a republic ought to suffer death.
quotes.author: Samuel Adams

quotes.quote: The state ofÂ monarchyÂ is the supremest thing upon earth: for kings are not only God's Lieutenants upon earth, and sit upon God's throne, but even by God himself they are called Gods.
quotes.author: King James I

quotes.quote: A dyingÂ monarchyÂ is always one that has too much power, not too little; a dying religion always interferes more than it ought, not less.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: The best reason whyÂ MonarchyÂ is a strong government is, that it is an intelligible government. The mass of mankind understand it, and they hardly anywhere in the world understand any other.
quotes.author: Walter Bagehot

quotes.quote: TheÂ monarchyÂ unites us; the republic would divide us.
quotes.author: Francesco Crispi

quotes.quote: How can aÂ monarchyÂ be a suitable thing, which allows a man to do as he pleases with none to hold him to account. And even if you were to take the best man on earth, and put him into aÂ monarchy, you put outside him the thoughts that usually guide him.
quotes.author: Herodotus

quotes.quote: For everyÂ monarchyÂ overthrown the sky becomes less brilliant, because it loses a star. A republic is ugliness set free.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: The trappings of aÂ monarchyÂ would set up an ordinary commonwealth.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: AÂ monarchyÂ is a merchantman which sails well, but will sometimes strike on a rock, and go to the bottom, whilst a republic is a raft which will never sink, but then your feet are always in the water.
quotes.author: Fisher Ames

quotes.quote: The right kind ofÂ monarchyÂ is one where everybody goes about with the permanent conviction that the king can do no wrong.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: It takes twice as long for me to not get anything done on Monday as it does the rest of the week.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: The only good thing about seeing my coworkers on Monday is they're the only people I don't have to apologize to for my weekend behavior.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: Monday is great if I can spend it in bed. I'm a man of simple pleasures, really.
quotes.author: Arthur Darvill

quotes.quote: On Monday mornings, I am dedicated to the proposition that all men are created jerks.
quotes.author: H. Allen Smith

quotes.quote: Just once, I would like to wake up, turn on the news, and hear... 'Monday has been canceled, go back to sleep.'
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: If only one of the presidential candidates would have the incentive to "make Mondays part of the weekend" into his platform. I think he would get a lot of votes.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: Hey I know it's Monday but it's also a new day, a new week, and in that lies a new opportunity for something special to happen.
quotes.author: Michael Ely

quotes.quote: Dear Monday, thanks for having the word "mon" in you. That's French for "mine," in case you weren't aware, Monday, but it makes me think of you more as "my day," and frankly, that sounds like a much more promising start to the week.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: Monday is like a math problem. Add the irritation, subtract the sleep, multiply the problems, divide the happiness.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: If you start the week with a positive attitude on Monday, it'll be a lot easier to fight off negativity the rest of the week.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: For me, Monday represents a fresh start to the week. It is the day where the slate from the previous week is wiped clean. It is a day of new beginnings.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: Mondays are the potholes in the road of life.
quotes.author: Tom Wilson

quotes.quote: Mondays are mundane, like Tuesdays minus 24 hours.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: There are no miracles on Mondays.
quotes.author: Amy Neftzger

quotes.quote: Mondays are the start of the work week which offer new beginnings 52 times a year!
quotes.author: David Dweck

quotes.quote: Sometimes it pays to stay in bed in Monday, rather than spending the rest of the week debugging Monday's code.
quotes.author: Dan Salomon

quotes.quote: I must break the routines and become a person who becomes productive every Monday. I must break the mindset of unhappiness and turn myself into a happy magnet for Mondays.
quotes.author: Leggy Saul

quotes.quote: Mondays are a lot like getting fat. They make you feel sad, sometimes angry and there is not much scope for liking either fat or Mondays for any reason.
quotes.author: Gary Moll

quotes.quote: Monday is just a reminder that the weekend has past and there are only a few more days before another weekend gets here.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: If each day was a gift, I would like to know where to return Monday.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: Monday is a fresh start. It's never too late to dig in and begin a new journey of success.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: Candy is nature's way of making up for Mondays.
quotes.author: Rebecca Gober

quotes.quote: Monday is a great for becoming too busy to die.
quotes.author: Roy Station

quotes.quote: Step aside Monday, this is a job for coffee.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: It's awful knowing that one seventh of our life will be wasted on Mondays.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: Monday. It's still Monday. But it can't be Monday.
quotes.author: Jessica Brody

quotes.quote: The only good Monday is a Monday in bed.
quotes.author: Lee Horton

quotes.quote: To meet on Monday morning. They should be, after Sunday's rest.
quotes.author: Clarence Michael James Stanislaus Dennis

quotes.quote:
Monday, Monday, so good to me. Monday mornin', it was all I hoped it would be.
But Monday mornin', Monday mornin' couldn't guarantee that Monday evenin' you would still be here with me.
quotes.author: The Mamas & the Papas

quotes.quote: Monday, Monday, can't trust that day. Monday, Monday, sometimes it just turns out that way. Oh Monday mornin' you gave me no warnin' of what was to be. Oh Monday, Monday, how could you leave and not take me.
quotes.author: The Mamas & the Papas

quotes.quote: Money has never made man happy, nor will it, there is nothing in its nature to produce happiness. The more of it one has the more one wants.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: When I was young I thought that money was the most important thing in life; now that I am old I know that it is.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Money cannot buy peace of mind. It cannot heal ruptured relationships, or build meaning into a life that has none.
quotes.author: Richard M. DeVos

quotes.quote: Money is only a tool. It will take you wherever you wish, but it will not replace you as the driver.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: Too many people spend money they haven't earned, to buy things they don't want, to impress people that they don't like.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Don't think money does everything or you are going to end up doing everything for money.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: I made my money the old-fashioned way. I was very nice to a wealthy relative right before he died.
quotes.author: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.quote: When it is a question of money, everybody is of the same religion.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Money poisons you when you've got it, and starves you when you haven't.
quotes.author: D.H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: We teach children to save their money. As an attempt to counteract thoughtless and selfish expenditure, that has value. But it is not positive; it does not lead the child into the safe and useful avenues of self-expression or self-expenditure. To teach a child to invest and use is better than to teach him to save.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Money won't create success, the freedom to make it will.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandella

quotes.quote: The lack of money is the root of all evil.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A wise man should have money in his head, but not in his heart.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: If you want to know what God thinks of money, just look at the people he gave it to.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: You can be young without money, but you can't be old without it.
quotes.author: Tennesse Williams

quotes.quote: Many people take no care of their money till they come nearly to the end of it, and others do just the same with their time.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: It's good to have money and the things that money can buy, but it's good, too, to check up once in a while and make sure that you haven't lost the things that money can't buy.
quotes.author: George Lorimer

quotes.quote: If money is your hope for independence you will never have it. The only real security that a man will have in this world is a reserve of knowledge, experience, and ability.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Money can't buy friends, but you can get a better class of enemy.
quotes.author: Spike Milligan

quotes.quote: Money was never a big motivation for me, except as a way to keep score. The real excitement is playing the game.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: You can only become truly accomplished at something you love. Don't make money your goal. Instead, pursue the things you love doing, and then do them so well that people can't take their eyes off you.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Money is power, freedom, a cushion, the root of all evil, the sum of blessings.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter about money; having it, not having it. Or having clothes, or not having them. You're still left alone with yourself in the end.
quotes.author: Billy Idol

quotes.quote: The safe way to double your money is to fold it over once and put it in your pocket.
quotes.author: Frank Hubbard

quotes.quote: They who are of the opinion that Money will do everything, may very well be suspected to do everything for Money.
quotes.author: George Savile

quotes.quote: When I have money, I get rid of it quickly, lest it find a way into my heart.
quotes.author: John Wesley

quotes.quote: Waste your money and you're only out of money, but waste your time and you've lost a part of your life.
quotes.author: Michael Leboeuf

quotes.quote: Money is like love; it kills slowly and painfully the one who withholds it, and enlivens the other who turns it on his fellow man.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: When a fellow says it ain't the money but the principle of the thing, it's the money.
quotes.author: Artemus Ward

quotes.quote: Money is good for nothing unless you know the value of it by experience.
quotes.author: P.T. Barnum

quotes.quote: By trying often the monkey learns to jump from the tree.
quotes.author: African Proverb

quotes.quote: The higher a monkey climbs, the more you see of its behind.
quotes.author: Joseph Sidwell

quotes.quote: Space. It seems to go on and on forever. Then you get to the end, and a monkey starts throwing barrels at you.
quotes.author: Phillip Fry

quotes.quote: The responses of the baby monkey are very similar to those of a human baby.
quotes.author: Harry Harlow

quotes.quote: Democracy is the art of running the circus from the monkey cage.
quotes.author: H.L. Mencken

quotes.quote: An American monkey, after getting drunk on brandy, would never touch it again, and thus is much wiser than most men.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: I am not nearly so interested in what monkey man was derived from as I am in what kind of monkey he is to become.
quotes.author: Loren Eiseley

quotes.quote: I learned the way a monkey learns by watching its parents.
quotes.author: Prince Charles

quotes.quote: Keep your sense of humor. As General Joe Stillwell said, "The higher a monkey climbs, the more you see of his behind.
quotes.author: Donald Rumsfeld

quotes.quote: The surest way to make a monkey of a man is to quote him.
quotes.author: Robert Benchley

quotes.quote: The most accomplished monkey cannot draw a monkey, this only man can do; just as it is also only man who regards his ability to do this as a distinct merit.
quotes.author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

quotes.quote: If monkey became a man, then a man can become a hero.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Never hold discussions with the monkey when the organ grinder is in the room.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The problem is to keep the monkey mind from running off into all kinds of thoughts.
quotes.author: Lee Kuan Yew

quotes.quote: Monkeys are superior to men in this: when a monkey looks into a mirror, he sees a monkey.
quotes.author: Malcolm De Chazal

quotes.quote: A determined soul will do more with a rusty monkey wrench than a loafer will accomplish with all the tools in a machine shop.
quotes.author: Robert Hughes

quotes.quote: The quizzical expression of the monkey at the zoo comes from his wondering whether he is his brother's keeper, or his keeper's brother.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Instead of holding on to the Biblical view that we are made in the image of God, we come to realize that we are made in the image of the monkey.
quotes.author: Lin Yutang

quotes.quote: Of course there is a monkey. There is always a monkey.
quotes.author: Doug Dorst

quotes.quote: Comedians are the monkeys of acting. When you go to the zoo, everybody loves the monkey exhibit.
quotes.author: Tracy Morgan

quotes.quote: The only reason why God created man is because he was disappointed with the monkey.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The monkey is an organized sarcasm upon the human race.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: If you ever start taking things too seriously, just remember that we are talking monkeys on an organic spaceship flying through the universe.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I confess freely to you I could never look long upon a monkey, without very mortifying reflections.
quotes.author: Sir William Congreve

quotes.quote: The mind is a monkey, hopping around from thought to thought, image to image. Rarely do more than a few seconds go by in which the mind can remain single-pointed, empty.
quotes.author: Dani Shapiro

quotes.quote: We've all heard that a million monkeys banging on a million typewriters will eventually reproduce the entire works of Shakespeare. Now, thanks to the Internet, we know this is not true.
quotes.author: Robert Wilensky

quotes.quote: You never monkey with the truth.
quotes.author: Ben Bradlee

quotes.quote: Distraction is the main problem for us all what the Buddha called the monkey mind. We need to tame this monkey mind.
quotes.author: Tenzin Palmo

quotes.quote: Monkey, an arboreal animal which makes itself at home in genealogical trees.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Year by year, the monkey's mask reveals the monkey.
quotes.author: Matsuo Basho

quotes.quote: Monogamy is a possibility and a necessity. Kids have got to have something they can rely on. You have got to have something you rely on.
quotes.author: Bob Hoskins

quotes.quote: Promiscuity is like never reading past the first page. Monogamy is like reading the same book over and over.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: The concept of monogamy is an inheritance of a medieval time, when family would carry the tradition of the name and certain privileges. It's a way of organizing society, perhaps.
quotes.author: Gael Garcia Bernal

quotes.quote: Marriage requires a special talent like acting. Monogamy requires genius.
quotes.author: Warren Beatty

quotes.quote: We just can't shake monogamy. It definitely demands a kind of rigor and discipline and selflessness. But it's also fun.
quotes.author: Claire Danes

quotes.quote: Long term heterosexual monogamy is still the dominant model: men and women still want to pair for a long period of time.
quotes.author: Monique Roffey

quotes.quote: Monogamy is faith in the faithless.
quotes.author: Virginia Alison

quotes.quote: Human nature is such that monogamy is a really hard thing to achieve.
quotes.author: Sienna Miller

quotes.quote: Hard work is damn near as overrated as monogamy.
quotes.author: Huey Long

quotes.quote: Monogamy is not a choice, it is a responsibility of a genuine human.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: Monogamy is desirable for many reasons especially in creating a stable emotionally connected home for children. But judging from centuries of human behavior it is also a very difficult standard to meet.
quotes.author: Mary Gaitskill

quotes.quote: Strong relationships are not rocked by a truth that is grounded by resolute monogamy.
quotes.author: J.R. Ward

quotes.quote: Monogamy is like good crystal beautiful but once you get it, all it takes is one chip and it's never the same again.
quotes.author: Fred Barton

quotes.quote: Bigamy is having one wife too many. Monogamy is the same.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: In our monogamous part of the world, to marry means to halve one's rights and double one's duties.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: Marriage requires a special talent, like acting. Monogamy requires genius.
quotes.author: Warren Beatty

quotes.quote: Culture preaches monogamy while nature repeats it over and over again.
quotes.author: Anthony Marais

quotes.quote: Monogamy is a way of getting the versions of ourselves down to the minimum.
quotes.author: Adam Phillips

quotes.quote: Some women's love of being loved is insatiable; and so, often, is their love of loving; and in the last case they may find that they can't give it continuously to the chamber-officer appointed by the bishop's license to receive it.
quotes.author: Thomas Hardy

quotes.quote: Every one belongs to every one else.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: Monogamous romantic commitment, like infallible lifelong attraction to only men or only women, is surely a minority tendency expediently elevated to a general social principle.
quotes.author: Hannah Black

quotes.quote: Monogamy is like croquet: you get the hang of it, eventually, but it's never fun to play.
quotes.author: W. Nogueira Cury

quotes.quote: Monogamy is the true path to happiness.
quotes.author: Wilt Chamberlain

quotes.quote: Monogamy is god's way of making death seem like a more reasonable option.
quotes.author: Dov Davidoff

quotes.quote: Monogamy is ideal as a standard, but if you look around you, it's not the end result.
quotes.author: Justen Michael

quotes.quote: If you're looking for monogamy, you'd better marry a swan.
quotes.author: Nora Ephron

quotes.quote: A monogamous marriage and family is what some women want but not all of us. We are mostly doing serial monogamy anyway.
quotes.author: Betty Dodson

quotes.quote: Almost everywhere people marry, monogamy is the official norm and infidelity the clandestine one.
quotes.author: Esther Perel

quotes.quote: Monogamy is contrary to nature but necessary for the greater social good.
quotes.author: Rita Mae Brown

quotes.quote: Breaking up monotony is key to life and it doesn't matter whether I'm stacking shelves or writing songs, if I was doing the same thing every day I just couldn't take it.
quotes.author: Doc Brown

quotes.quote: MonotonyÂ reveals our limitations.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Beware of monotony; it's the mother of all the deadly sins.
quotes.author: Edith Wharton

quotes.quote: In the monotony of everyday existence grief comes as a holiday, and a fire is an entertainment. A scratch embellishes an empty face.
quotes.author: Maxim Gorky

quotes.quote: It is equality ofÂ monotonyÂ which makes the strength of the British Isles.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Monotony is the only reward of the cautious.
quotes.author: A. Somebody

quotes.quote: The monotony of provincial life attracts the attention of people to the kitchen. You do not dine as luxuriously in the provinces as in Paris, but you dine better, because the dishes serve you are the result of mediation and study.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: If you're constantly moving, you can get in a monotony that's just as equally boring as sitting still for a long period of time.
quotes.author: Amy Seimetz

quotes.quote: When all is said and done, monotony may after all be the best condition for creation.
quotes.author: Margaret Sackville

quotes.quote: Monotony is not to be worshipped as a virtue; nor the marriage bed treated as a coffin for security rather than a couch from which to rise refreshed.
quotes.author: Freya Stark

quotes.quote: The cramped monotony of my existence grinds me away by the grain.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: The cramped monotony of my existence grinds me away by the grain.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: ButÂ monotonyÂ doesn't make for painlessness.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: When all is said and done,Â monotonyÂ may after all be the best condition for creation.
quotes.author: Margaret Sackville

quotes.quote: Repetition not for monotony but the ecstasy it induces.
quotes.author: Martha Graham

quotes.quote: MonotonyÂ kills the heart. Ironically,Â monotonyÂ is what keeps the heart working.
quotes.author: Soumeet Lanka

quotes.quote: MonotonyÂ is the law of nature. Look at the monotonous manner in which the sun rises. TheÂ monotonyÂ of necessary occupation is exhilarating and life giving.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The monotony and solitude of a quiet life stimulates the creative mind.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The secret of happiness is to find a congenial monotony.
quotes.author: V. S. Pritchett

quotes.quote: MonotonyÂ collapses time. Novelty unfolds it.
quotes.author: Joshua Foer

quotes.quote: People, chained by monotony, afraid to think, clinging to certainties... they live like ants.
quotes.author: Bela Lugosi

quotes.quote: I am not greedy of money myself, but the monotony of always screwing and paring is more tiresome than the monotony of riches.
quotes.author: Annie French Hector

quotes.quote: Altough we all realize that monotony is boring, almost every form of industrial work- banking, accounting, mass-producing, service- is monotonous, and most people are paid for simply putting up with monotony
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: The monotony of a long heroic poem may often be pleasantly relieved by judicious interruptions in the perfect successions of rhymes, just as the metre may sometimes be adorned with occasional triplets and Alexandrines.
quotes.author: H. P. Lovecraft

quotes.quote: MonotonyÂ has nothing to do with a place;Â monotony, either in its sensation or its infliction, is simply the quality of a person. There are no dreary sights; there are only dreary sight seers.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: MonotonyÂ and repetition are characteristic of many parts of life, but these do not become sources of conscious discomfort until novelty and entertainment are built up as positive experiences.
quotes.author: Mary Catherine Bateson

quotes.quote: Certainly, nothing can be more simple than monotony.
quotes.author: Joshua Reynolds

quotes.quote: The real world is where the monsters are.
quotes.author: Rick Riordan

quotes.quote: It's the monsters that don't wear costumes that scare me the most at Halloween.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: No one's the monster in their own story. Monsters are just a matter of perspective.
quotes.author: C.A. Fletcher

quotes.quote: Monsters are real, and ghosts are real too. They live inside us, and sometimes, they win.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Monsters will always exist. There's one inside each of us. But an angel lives there, too. There is no more important agenda than figuring out how to slay one and nurture the other.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Novogratz

quotes.quote: Everyone has monsters and demons within themselves. They're metaphors for the human condition.
quotes.author: Mark Pellegrino

quotes.quote: Adversity makes men, and prosperity makes monsters.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Monsters are the patron saints of imperfection.
quotes.author: Guillermo Del Toro

quotes.quote: The ego is a fascinating monster.
quotes.author: Alanis Morissette

quotes.quote: The scariest monsters are the ones that lurk within our souls.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: Not all the monsters have fangs.
quotes.author: J. A. London

quotes.quote: Monsters aren't as scary if you start shining lights on them.
quotes.author: Wyatt Cenac

quotes.quote: Everyone carries around his own monsters.
quotes.author: Richard Pyor

quotes.quote: In all known time there has never been a greater monster or miracle than the human being.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: Ignorance is the womb of monsters.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: The dream of reason produces monsters.
quotes.author: Francisco Goya

quotes.quote: The monsters of our childhood do not fade away, neither are they ever wholly monstrous.
quotes.author: John Le Carre

quotes.quote: Fantasy abandoned by reason produces impossible monsters
quotes.author: Francisco Goya

quotes.quote: Your memory is a monster; you forget - it doesn't. It simply files things away. It keeps things for you, or hides things from you - and summons them to your recall with a will of its own. You think you have a memory; but it has you!
quotes.author: John Irving

quotes.quote: Whoever fights monsters should see to it that in the process he does not become a monster. And if you gaze long enough into an abyss, the abyss will gaze back into you.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Monsters exist, but they are too few in number to be truly dangerous. More dangerous are the common men, the functionaries ready to believe and to act without asking questions.
quotes.author: Primo Levi

quotes.quote: Monsters die out when the collective imagination no longer needs them.
quotes.author: Glen Duncan

quotes.quote: We make our own monsters, then fear them for what they show us about ourselves.
quotes.author: MIKE CAREY

quotes.quote: Where there is a monster, there is a miracle.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: Calling someone a monster does not make him more guilty; it makes him less so by classing him with beasts and devils.
quotes.author: Mary Mccarthy

quotes.quote: A human being does not turn another human being over to the monsters. Not for any reason.
quotes.author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quotes.quote: The thing to decide is what kind of monster to be. The kind who builds towns or the kind who breaks them.
quotes.author: Catherynne M. Valente

quotes.quote: The monsters are in your own head
quotes.author: Paula Cole

quotes.quote: Monsters don't get happy endings.
quotes.author: Paula Stokes

quotes.quote: March is the month God created to show people who don't drink what a hangover is like.
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.quote: It is the month of June, The month of leaves and roses, When pleasant sights salute the eyes And pleasant scents the noses.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Parker Willis

quotes.quote: February is the uncertain month, neither black nor white but all shades between by turns. Nothing is sure.
quotes.author: Gladys Hasty Carroll

quotes.quote: Months are different in college, especially freshman year. Too much happens. Every freshman month equals six regular months, they're like dog months.
quotes.author: Rainbow Rowell

quotes.quote: What of October, that ambiguous month, the month of tension, the unendurable month?
quotes.author: Doris Lessing

quotes.quote: Four months is a lot of living with that little life in you-thinking about it, eating right for it, nurturing it and all of a sudden, it dies.
quotes.author: Christie Brinkley

quotes.quote: Tis a month before the month of May, And the spring comes slowly up this way.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: August is a month when if it is hot weather it is really very hot.
quotes.author: Gertrude Stein

quotes.quote: You ought to know that October is the first Spring month.
quotes.author: Karel Capek

quotes.quote: November is the most disagreeable month in the whole year.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: October was always the least dependable of months, full of ghosts and shadows.
quotes.author: Joy Fielding

quotes.quote: You never realize how short a month is until you have to pay alimony.
quotes.author: John Barrymore

quotes.quote: Once a month, try something you don't think you'd be good at. You can find such happy surprises.
quotes.author: Dianna Agron

quotes.quote: December is the toughest month of the year. Others are July, January, September, April, November, May, March, June, October, August, and February.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: If months were marked by colors, November in New England would be colored gray.
quotes.author: Madeleine M. Kunin

quotes.quote: All the months are crude experiments.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: April, the angel of the months, the young love of the year.
quotes.author: Vita Sackville-West
