quotes.quote: Six months go by very quickly when you're a genius.
quotes.author: Robert Plant

quotes.quote: A month of days, a year of months, 20 years of months in the treadmill, is the life that slays everything worthy of the name of life.
quotes.author: Roy Bedichek

quotes.quote: If January is the month of change, February is the month of lasting change. January is for dreamers, February is for doers.
quotes.author: Marc Parent

quotes.quote: A couple of months in the laboratory can frequently save a couple of hours in the library.
quotes.author: Frank Westheimer

quotes.quote: Every month, it is woman's fate to face the abyss of time and being, the abyss which is herself.
quotes.author: Camille Paglia

quotes.quote: April is the cruelest month, breeding lilacs out of the dead land, mixing memory and desire, stirring dull roots with spring rain.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: January, month of empty pockets! let us endure this evil month, anxious as a theatrical producer's forehead.
quotes.author: Sidonie Gabrielle Colette

quotes.quote: As full of spirit as the month of May, and as gorgeous as the sun in Midsummer.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Once a month, some women act like men act all the time.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Three months is a lifetime in politics.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: January is the month for dreaming.
quotes.author: Jean Hersey

quotes.quote: September, it was the most beautiful of words, he’d always felt, evoking orange-flowers, swallows, and regret.
quotes.author: Alexander Theroux

quotes.quote: October is a symphony of permanence and change.
quotes.author: Bonaro W. Overstreet

quotes.quote: It is certainly true that ‘actions speak louder than words,’ but words become as monuments to thoughts.
quotes.author: Anton Szandor LaVey

quotes.quote: Ancient monuments are full of wisdom, for they have been filled with what they have seen and heard for hundreds of years!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Make your monuments [worthy] of the god, This keeps alive their maker’s name,..
quotes.author: Miriam Lichtheim

quotes.quote:
Endow your monuments according to your wealth.
Even one day gives to eternity,
An hour contributes to the future,
God recognizes him who works for him.
quotes.author: Miriam Lichtheim

quotes.quote: Monuments are the grappling-irons that bind one generation to another.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: Live a life as a monument to your soul.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: Take the stones people throw at you, and use them to build a monument
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: The monument of a great man is not of granite or marble or bronze. It consists of his goodness, his deeds, his love and his compassion.
quotes.author: Alfred Armand Montapert

quotes.quote: Genius only leaves behind it the monuments of its strength.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: Monuments are for the living, not the dead.
quotes.author: Frank Wedekind

quotes.quote: MONUMENT, n. A structure intended to commemorate something which either needs no commemoration or cannot be commemorated.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: People are quick to make monuments of anything they live long enough to control.
quotes.author: Hilton Als

quotes.quote: At any moment, man must decide, for better or for worse, what will be the monument of his existence.
quotes.author: Viktor E. Frankl

quotes.quote: The child as a monument to the passion of two people; the will to oneness in two.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: The great monuments are raised up like dams, pitting the logic of majesty and authority against all the shady elements: it is in the form of cathedrals and palaces that Church and State speak and impose silence on the multitudes.
quotes.author: Georges Bataille

quotes.quote: What you leave behind is not what is engraved in stone monuments, but what is woven into the lives of others.
quotes.author: Pericles

quotes.quote: There is nothing in this world as invisible as a monument
quotes.author: Robert Musil

quotes.quote: Monuments, like men, submit to fate.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: Monuments obtain their full worth through their complete use.
quotes.author: Evangelos Venizelos

quotes.quote: Even as water carves monuments of stone, so do our thoughts shape our character.
quotes.author: Hugh B. Brown

quotes.quote: Monuments may be builded to express the affection or pride of friends, or to display their wealth, but they are only valuable for the characters which they perpetuate.
quotes.author: James A. Garfield

quotes.quote: Those only deserve a monument who do not need one; that is, who have raised themselves a monument in the minds and memories of men.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: The stones that critics hurl with harsh intent, a man may use to build his monument.
quotes.author: Arthur Guiterman

quotes.quote: The sight of such a monument is like continual and stationary music, which one hears for one's good as one approaches it.
quotes.author: Madame De Stael

quotes.quote: If you're fighting moodiness and depression you don't want to hang around a bunch of other moody and depressed people.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: You try to be moody when you're young and it had a good ring to it.
quotes.author: Jim Capaldi

quotes.quote: A woman is a woman; Sometimes she's moody, emotional, clingy but she is still to be loved. Deal with it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The person who really loves you sees what a mess you can be, how moody you can get, how hard you are to handle but still wants you in his/her life.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: People ask me why it's so hard to trust people, and I ask them why is it so hard to keep a promise.
quotes.author: Amy Rees Anderson

quotes.quote: My sadness is beautiful. It infuses everything I do. It is at the core of my identity and always has been, just as happiness is in some people. I refuse to be told that it's a flaw. I will not mute it with medications for the sake of society. I will hold it close to me and celebrate it rightfully while the rest of the world fails to see it for what it is and it will be their loss.
quotes.author: Ashly Lorenzana

quotes.quote: Animals don't lie. Animals don't criticize. If animals have moody days, they handle them better than humans do.
quotes.author: Betty White

quotes.quote: Boring damned people. All over the Earth. Propagating more boring damned people. What a horror show. The Earth is swarmed with them.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: And they said females were the moody ones. Yeah, right. No one did moods like Alpha male werewolves.
quotes.author: Dianna Hardy

quotes.quote: It touched me to be trusted with something terrible.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Kostov

quotes.quote: We march up, moody or good tempered soldiers we reach the zone where the front begins and become on the instant human animals.
quotes.author: Erich Maria Remarque

quotes.quote: I'm really an inner spirit that only makes itself known through the music. A lot of people think I'm an introvert, or quiet and moody. I've even heard some people say that there's a certain mystery or darkness about me. I'm not that way. I'm just really into what I do.
quotes.author: Faith Evans

quotes.quote: There is always one too many around me, thus thinks the hermit. Always one times one eventually that makes two. I and me are always too deep in conversation.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: I enjoy talking to you. Your mind appeals to me.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: The ocean was one of the greatest things he had ever seen in his life bigger and deeper than anything he had imagined. It changed its color and shape and expression according to time and place and weather. It aroused a deep sadness in his heart, and at the same time it brought his heart peace and comfort.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: Play to your strengths. "I haven't got any," said Harry, before he could stop himself. "Excuse me," growled Moody, "you've got strengths if I say you've got them. Think now. What are you best at?
quotes.author: J. K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Holmes has become the dark side of the moon for me. He is moody and solitary and underneath I am really sociable and gregarious. It has all got too dangerous.
quotes.author: Jeremy Brett

quotes.quote: And people are moody, dude. You gotta get used to living with people.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: Caroline was always moody and miserable, but I liked it. I liked feeling as if she had chosen me as the only person in the world not to hate, and so we spent all this time together just ragging on everyone, you know?
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: A man holding a woman made of bad moods in his arms.
quotes.author: Laura Kasischke

quotes.quote: She fell into the moody, miserable state of mind which often comes when strong wills have to yield to the inevitable.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: I wouldn't live with me, believe me. I'm moody.
quotes.author: Mario Cantone

quotes.quote: Sanity and happiness are an impossible combination.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: It's better to sail with a moody good captain than a laughing bad one.
quotes.author: Moby

quotes.quote: They say it is better to be poor and happy than rich and miserable, but how about a compromise like moderately rich and just moody?
quotes.author: Princess Diana

quotes.quote: You can't take back texts. If you come off all moody and melancholy in a text, it just sits there in your phone, reminding you of what a drag you are.
quotes.author: Rainbow Rowell

quotes.quote: A moody child and wildly wise pursued the game with joyful eyes. Which chose, like meteors, their way, and rived the dark with private ray.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Rain fell on the roofs of the just and the unjust, the saints and the sinners, those who knew peace and those in torment, and tomorrow began at a dark hour.
quotes.author: Robert McCammon

quotes.quote: When we come to the fish market we bring an attitude. We can bring a moody attitude and have a depressing day. We can bring a grouchy attitude and irritate our coworkers and customers. Or we can bring a sunny, playful, cheerful attitude and have a great day.
quotes.author: Stephen C. Lundin

quotes.quote: And moody madness laughing wild Amid severest woe.
quotes.author: Thomas Gray

quotes.quote: Human's moral compass doesn't work yet in worlds where the instinct navigates life.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Sometimes, in order to follow our moral compass and/or our hearts, we have to make unpopular decisions or stand up for what we believe in.
quotes.author: Tabatha Coffey

quotes.quote: The more cashless our society becomes, the more our moral compass slips.
quotes.author: Dan Ariely

quotes.quote: Supporting the truth, even when it is unpopular, shows the capacity for honesty and integrity.
quotes.author: Steve Brunkhorst

quotes.quote: If you have a moral compass, and you stay with it, people will always gravitate towards you.
quotes.author: Carol Alt

quotes.quote: Much of the world's moral compass is broken. The moral north reads south and the moral south reads north.
quotes.author: Dennis Prager

quotes.quote: There's harmony and inner peace to be found in following a moral compass that points in the same direction regardless of fashion or trend.
quotes.author: Ted Koppel

quotes.quote: In the worst of times the best among us never lose their moral compass, and that is how they emerge relatively unscathed.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: The men can have a moral compass that is just unshakeable, they can have ethics that run to the core.
quotes.author: Lupe Fiasco

quotes.quote: Without a moral compass the human mind will justify anything.
quotes.author: Mehrnaz Bassari

quotes.quote: If you have integrity, nothing else matters. If you don’t have integrity, nothing else matters.
quotes.author: Alan K. Simpson

quotes.quote: With integrity, you have nothing to fear, since you have nothing to hide. With integrity, you will do the right thing, so you will have no guilt.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: The integrity of men is to be measured by their conduct, not by their professions.
quotes.author: Junius

quotes.quote: Real integrity is doing the right thing, knowing that nobody’s going to know whether you did it or not.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Have the courage to say no. Have the courage to face the truth. Do the right thing because it is right. These are the magic keys to living your life with integrity.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.quote: Integrity is your destiny-it is the light that guides your way.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Integrity is doing the right thing, even when no one is watching.
quotes.author: C.S Lewis

quotes.quote: Subtlety may deceive you; integrity never will.
quotes.author: Oliver Cromwell

quotes.quote: Moral authority comes from following universal and timeless principles like honesty, integrity, treating people with respect.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: You have to follow your moral compass: it's a good guide of telling you what is right and wrong.
quotes.author: Cailee Spaeny

quotes.quote: The right moral compass is trying hard to think about what customers want.
quotes.author: Sundar Pichai

quotes.quote: A sense of shame is not a bad moral compass.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: Morality makes you a better human being, and everything is better when you live your life morally.
quotes.author: Dr. T. P Chia

quotes.quote: The good man is the man who, no matter how morally unworthy he has been, is moving to become better.
quotes.author: John Dewey

quotes.quote: There is no higher value in our society than integrity.
quotes.author: Arlen Specter

quotes.quote: Integrity without knowledge is weak and useless, and knowledge without integrity is dangerous and dreadful.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Image is what people think we are; integrity is what we really are.
quotes.author: John C Maxwell

quotes.quote: Nothing is at last sacred but the integrity of your own mind.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: A life lived with integrity – even if it lacks the trappings of fame and fortune is a shining star in whose light others may follow in the years to come.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: The very idea that we get a moral compass from religion is horrible. Not only should we not get our moral compass from religion, as a matter of fact we don't.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: It's just a morale thing. The other names have been kicking around so long. It's much more about trying to keep focused and keep some excitement around where they are going.
quotes.author: Michael Cherry

quotes.quote: Morale is a state of mind. It is steadfastness and courage and hope.
quotes.author: George C. Marshall

quotes.quote: Morale and attitude are fundamentals to success.
quotes.author: Bud Wilkinson

quotes.quote: Morale and attitude are the fundamental ingredients to success.
quotes.author: Bud Wilkinson

quotes.quote: Morale is when your hands and feet keep on working when your head says it can't be done.
quotes.author: Benjamin Morrell

quotes.quote: Keep your morale high, in spite of setbacks. At the end you are bound to succeed.
quotes.author: Dhirubhai Ambani

quotes.quote: Projecting a persuasive image of a desirable and practical future is extremely important to high morale, to dynamism, to consensus, and in general to help the wheels of society turn smoothly.
quotes.author: Herman Kahn

quotes.quote: Watching something grow is good for morale. It helps us believe in life.
quotes.author: Myron Kaufmann

quotes.quote: Morale is faith in the man at the top.
quotes.author: Albert S. Johnstone

quotes.quote: These rules may seem simple enough, but it will require great morale and physical courage to adhere to them. But if carried out in the strict sense of the word it will surely lead to a greater success than could otherwise be attained.
quotes.author: Major Taylor

quotes.quote: Morale is not a single instinct. It has many ingredients. A sense of personal responsibility, the natural courage of an individual, the amount of his acquired self-discipline and above all his interest in others these together make up the spirit of morale.
quotes.author: Phyllis Bottome

quotes.quote: Morale is the greatest single factor in successful wars.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: Orderly discipline and morale within an army was the responsibility of the Division Commander.
quotes.author: Iwane Matsui

quotes.quote: Morale is boosted to high highs by accomplishment. In fact, it can be demonstrated that production is the basis of morale.
quotes.author: L. Ron Hubbard

quotes.quote: Morale still seems reasonably high and, while the desertion rate has risen, it is still limited to those who can walk.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Morale is good; troops are confident; leaders are capable.
quotes.author: John Abizaid

quotes.quote: The best morale exist when you never hear the word mentioned. When you hear a lot of talk about it, it's usually lousy.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: Morale and attitude are the fundamentals to success.
quotes.author: Bud Wilkinson

quotes.quote: A military coup needs a sacrifice and courage that you cant find in an army without morale.
quotes.author: Jalal Talabani

quotes.quote: If you are confident you have done everything possible to prepare yourself, then there is nothing to fear.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: Having your work honored nationally is a great morale booster.
quotes.author: Ellen Gilchrist

quotes.quote: Morale in an organization does not mean that a people get along together; the test is performance not conformance.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Morale is self-esteem in action
quotes.author: Avery Weisman

quotes.quote: Morality is the basis of things and truth is the substance of all morality.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Morality knows nothing of geographical boundaries, or distinctions of race.
quotes.author: Herbert Spencer

quotes.quote: Moral courage is higher and a rarer virtue than physical courage.
quotes.author: William Slim

quotes.quote: Moral excellence comes about as a result of habit. We become just by doing just acts, temperate by doing temperate acts, brave by doing brave acts.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Unless we discover actual truth, morality is up for grabs.
quotes.author: Pamela Christian

quotes.quote: Wrong is wrong even if everyone is doing it. Right is right even if no one is doing it.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The purpose of morality is to teach you, not to suffer and die, but to enjoy yourself and live.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: Whenever you are to do a thing, though it can never be known but to yourself, ask yourself how you would act were all the world looking at you, and act accordingly.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Morality is a burglar's tool whose merit lies in never being left behind at the scene of the crime.
quotes.author: Karl Kraus

quotes.quote: Every young man would do well to remember that all successful business stands on the foundation of morality.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Do not depend upon the morality of a person until you have seen him behave while in anger.
quotes.author: Umar

quotes.quote: Children often have a much stronger concept of morality than adults.
quotes.author: Nina Bawden

quotes.quote: The test of morality of a society is what it does with it's children.
quotes.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quotes.quote: Morality is the thing upon which your friends smile, and immorality is the thing upon which they frown.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Morality is the herd-instinct in the individual.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Morality is of the highest importance - but for us, not for God.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Morality is only moral when it is voluntary.
quotes.author: Lincoln Steffens

quotes.quote: Do not do an immoral thing for moral reasons.
quotes.author: Thomas Hardy

quotes.quote: Morality, like art, means drawing a line someplace.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The quality of moral behavior varies in inverse ratio to the number of human beings involved.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: The higher the buildings, the lower the morals.The higher the buildings, the lower the morals.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Morality is simply the attitude we adopt towards people whom we personally dislike.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Morality comes with the sad wisdom of age, when the sense of curiosity has withered.
quotes.author: Graham Greene

quotes.quote: A man that has lost moral sense is like a man in battle with both of his legs shot off: he has nothing to stand on.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Even if everyone else is not doing good. I alone will. Even if everyone else is doing wrong, I alone will not.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Always do what is right. It will gratify half of mankind and astound the other.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: There are no easy answers, but there are simple answers. We must have the courage to do what we know is morally right.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: Morality is truth in full bloom.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: The best way to teach morality is to make it a habit with children.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: It's easy enough to preach morality on a full belly.
quotes.author: Erwin Sylvanus

quotes.quote: To have more than you've got, become more than you are.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: The more one does the more one can do.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.quote: Less is only more where more is no good.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.quote: We are more than the parts that form us.
quotes.author: Patrick Rothfuss

quotes.quote: Do more than dream. Work.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: Be more than you seem to be.
quotes.author: Frederick The Great

quotes.quote: To see more is to become more.
quotes.author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quotes.quote: If you want to earn more, learn more.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Create more value than you capture.
quotes.author: Tim O'Reilly

quotes.quote: There is more to life than surviving.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: You are more powerful than you think.
quotes.author: Tim Cook

quotes.quote: To have more, you've got to become more.
quotes.author: John Earl Shoaff

quotes.quote: More is learned in pain than in pleasure.
quotes.author: Marshall Sylver

quotes.quote: The more you look, the more you will see.
quotes.author: Roger Tory Peterson

quotes.quote: The more you know the less you understand.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: The more a man knows, the more he forgives.
quotes.author: Catherine the Great

quotes.quote: More always means worse.
quotes.author: Kingsley Amis

quotes.quote: Life is more valuable than money.
quotes.author: Diane Kruger

quotes.quote: Listen more often than you speak.
quotes.author: Howard Baker

quotes.quote: Be more grateful, and less worried.
quotes.author: Hal Elrod

quotes.quote: Trust yourself, you know more than you think you do.
quotes.author: Benjamin Spock

quotes.quote: Always give more than what's expected.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: The more one judges, the less one loves.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: Remember that the more you know, the less you fear.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quotes.quote: The more you dream the more you achieve.
quotes.author: Michael Phelps

quotes.quote: The more you think, the more time you have.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: The more you care, the stronger you can be.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: The more we learn, the more questions arise.
quotes.author: Jonathan Balcombe

quotes.quote: Mormons know that its not enough to practise your religion - you also have to spread your religion.
quotes.author: Jonah Peretti

quotes.quote: I’m new here. And if you haven’t deducted from my impeccable fashion sense, I think it’s safe to say that I’m…' he leans forward and cups his hand to his mouth in secrecy. 'Mormon.'
quotes.author: Colleen Hoover

quotes.quote: We should gather all the good and true principles in the world and treasure them up, or we shall not come out true Mormons.
quotes.author: Joseph Smith

quotes.quote: As women of covenant our goal is to go forward and develop strong testimonies and nurturing and caring hearts that will prepare us for our roles as mothers in eternity. With that end in mind, I determined to go on happily, to become 'anxiously engaged in a good cause' (D&C 58:27), and to believe that the rest would take care of itself.
quotes.author: Kristen McMain Oaks

quotes.quote: God’s grace will cover us like a cloak-enough to provide for survival but too thin to keep out all the cold.
quotes.author: Neal A. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Speaking to God feels like instinct, like it's wired into me. I can't imagine what I'd do if I left. It's like standing in an open field and trying to point to the four walls. There's just no framework to my life without the church.
quotes.author: Christina Lauren

quotes.quote: It is one of the great ironies of Mormon history that Smith, who set the polygamous movement in motion, never experienced it in practical terms. He was content to marry the teenage women who lived in his home and then let them depart when Emma objected. And he was content to let his polyandrous wives live with their first husbands, so he never bore the responsibility of providing for them, financially or emotionally, on a day-to-day basis.
quotes.author: Todd M. Compton

quotes.quote: We can choose to be like the Mormon pioneers, who maintained a spirit of gratitude during their slow and painful trek toward the Great Salt Lake, even singing and dancing and glorying in the goodness of God.
quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quotes.quote: The Mormons make the marriage ring, like the ring of Saturn, fluid, not solid, and keep it in its place by numerous satellites.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: A Mormon knows that the promises of God are true, and He said that all will be tried; realizing these things the Latter-day Saints will acknowledge their Maker not only in blessings but also in tribulations.
quotes.author: Heber J. Grant

quotes.quote: Mormons are an extraordinarily educated and professional population. They have all these virtues: They work hard, don't skip school, have no scandals. Consequently, you find them in a lot of consequential places.
quotes.author: Rodney Stark

quotes.quote: Mormons... are so strong, they can handle wealth, they are confident. I think it is because they are not bogged down by rules for equality, but have a firmly defined system of relative status and responsible command.
quotes.author: Mary Douglas

quotes.quote: In Mormon society and culture, highest values are placed on hard work, thrift, clean living, obedience to the elders and, above all, on the importance of the family.
quotes.author: Shana Alexander

quotes.quote: Being a Mormon is not a part-time religion. It is your life. You eat, sleep, and breathe Mormonism.
quotes.author: Dan Reynolds

quotes.quote: I experience Mormondom to be a warm and beautiful and well-appointed home in which you suddenly find you're in a Patriarchy Funhouse that features crazy, rippling distortion mirrors built to magnify maleness and diminish femaleness.
quotes.author: Carol Lynn Pearson

quotes.quote: If you're serious about sanctification, you can expect to experience heart-wrenching moments that try your faith, your endurance, and your patience.
quotes.author: Sheri Dew

quotes.quote: When our lives are congruent with the Lord’s will, we are empowered spiritually. Remember what Joseph Smith was taught in Liberty Jail? If we let ‘virtue garnish [our] thoughts unceasingly; then shall [our] confidence wax strong in the presence of God’ (D&C 121:45).
quotes.author: Gerald N. Lund

quotes.quote: You can only come to the morning through the shadows.
quotes.author: J. R. R. Toklien

quotes.quote: The morning was full of sunlight and hope.
quotes.author: Kate Chopin

quotes.quote: Who will tell whether one happy moment of love or the joy of breathing or walking on a bright morning and smelling the fresh air, is not worth all the suffering and effort which life implies.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: A morning is a wonderful blessing, either cloudy or sunny. It stands for hope, giving us another start of what we call Life. Good morning & have a nice day.
quotes.author: Ikram Uzzal

quotes.quote: Life begins each morning.
quotes.author: Joel Olsteen

quotes.quote: The silence in the morning holds lots of expectations and is more hopeful than the silence at night.
quotes.author: Victoria Durnak

quotes.quote: Waking up this morning, I smile. Twenty-four brand new hours are before me. I vow to live fully in each moment.
quotes.author: ThÃ­ch Nháº¥t Háº¡nh

quotes.quote: What a benediction is this fragrance of the early morning! The vernal grass fills the whole atmosphere as with a shower of sweetness.
quotes.author: Sarah Smiley

quotes.quote: When you have to get into the character each morning, give it your voice, your face, it was torture.
quotes.author: Victoria Abril

quotes.quote: I arise in the morning torn between a desire to improve the world and a desire to enjoy the world. This makes it hard to plan the day.
quotes.author: E. B. White

quotes.quote: So fine was the morning except for a streak of wind here and there that the sea and sky looked all one fabric, as if sails were stuck high up in the sky, or the clouds had dropped down into the sea.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: Up at dawn, the dewy freshness of the hour, the morning rapture of the birds, the daily miracle of sunrise, set her heart in tune, and gave her nature's most healing balm.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: The moment when you first wake up in the morning is the most wonderful of the twenty-four hours. No matter how weary or dreary you may feel, you possess the certainty that, during the day that lies before you, absolutely anything may happen. And the fact that it practically always doesn't, matters not a jot. The possibility is always there.
quotes.author: Monica Baldwin

quotes.quote: I hope you wake up feeling exeptional. You are important, needed, and unique.
quotes.author: Mama Zara

quotes.quote: Everyday, think as you wake up, today I am fortunate to be alive, I have a precious human life, I am not going to waste it. I am going to use all my energies to develop my self, to expand my heart out to others.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Morning is an important time of day, because how you spend your morning can often tell you what kind of day you are going to have.
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket

quotes.quote: It is in the early morning hour that the unseen is seen, and that the far-off beauty and glory, vanquishing all their vagueness, move down upon us till they stand clear as crystal close over against the soul.
quotes.author: Sarah Smiley

quotes.quote: In the morning, before I leave the house, I say five things I love about myself, like â€˜You have really pretty eyes.' That way I can go out into the world with that little bit of extra confidence.
quotes.author: Jennifer Love Hewitt

quotes.quote: Through the blackest night, morning gently tiptoes, feeling its way to dawn.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Every day I feel is a blessing from God. And I consider it a new beginning. Yeah, everything is beautiful.
quotes.author: Prince

quotes.quote: I have always been delighted at the prospect of a new day, a fresh try, one more start, with perhaps a bit of magic waiting somewhere behind the morning.
quotes.author: J. B. Priestley

quotes.quote: Morning without you is a dwindled dawn.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: I can see the orange haze on the horizon as the morning exhales a yawn, and seems to be ready to rise.
quotes.author: Jeb Dickerson

quotes.quote: These morning practices are what fuel me; keeping my routine is not about willpower.
quotes.author: Jenny Blake

quotes.quote: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Morning is when the wick is lit. A flame ignited, the day delighted with heat and light, we start the fight for something more than before.
quotes.author: Jeb Dickerson

quotes.quote: There is something magical about the early morning. It's a time when the world belongs to only those few who are awake. And we walk around like kings while others remain unseen in their beds.
quotes.author: Shawn Blanc

quotes.quote: Eating right and taking the time to slow down and plan in the morning is crucial to a productive day.
quotes.author: David Moore

quotes.quote: Beauty, sweet love, is like the morning dew, whose short refresh upon tender green, cheers for a time, but till the sun doth show and straight is gone, as it had never been.
quotes.author: Samuel Daniel

quotes.quote: When I'm tempted to skip my morning routine or another form of self-care, I remind myself that I can better serve the people I love and the projects I care about when I start with me.
quotes.author: Courtney Carver

quotes.quote: Morocco is such a beautiful place. It's incredibly beautiful. And also it is captivating place because for a writer, you feel that you make impact. I mean, when I write something in the press, the day after in the fish market, people will be discussing it.
quotes.author: Fatema Mernissi

quotes.quote: Morocco as it is is a very fine place spoiled by civilization.
quotes.author: Richard Harding Davis

quotes.quote: To visit Morocco is still like turning the pages of some illuminated Persian manuscript all embroidered with bright shapes and subtle lines.
quotes.author: Edith Wharton

quotes.quote: I love Morocco - it's a real challenge to all five senses. You think you know something, and you don't. It's wonderful. It keeps you on your toes that way.
quotes.author: Amy Ryan

quotes.quote: The days of predatory poets in search of literary inspiration and young flesh are probably over for good. Hippies can just as easily get their bong rips in Portland or Peoria. But the good stuff, the real good stuff, the sounds and smells and the look of Tangier, what you see and hear when you look out the window and take it all in, that's here to stay.
quotes.author: Anthony Bourdain

quotes.quote: In Morocco, before you even get to the matter of the sale, you have to coax the owner to sell.
quotes.author: Tahir Shah

quotes.quote: In Morocco, there is an insistence on authority. Children are not encouraged to speak up in front of their parents. My parents were not like this. I was the kind of girl who could tell her father, 'No, what you are saying is totally untrue, and I don't agree with you.
quotes.author: Leila Slimani

quotes.quote: My hope is that countries like Morocco will have investment to create work, so people don't have to leave.
quotes.author: Tahar Ben Jelloun

quotes.quote: I loved filming in Morocco; it was amazing. I'd never been anywhere like that. The culture was phenomenal. I was so blown away by the spirit of that country.
quotes.author: Tatiana Maslany

quotes.quote: As you wake up to sort of Morocco coming to life, and you drive a two hour journey through the desert as the sun is rising over the sand dunes... I saw landscapes and visual stuff that I'll never forget. It was special.
quotes.author: Jim Sturgess

quotes.quote: Morocco is the greatest. I should be getting money from the Moroccans because I'm just telling everyone that it's a wonderful place to go.
quotes.author: Bill Murray

quotes.quote: All Moroccans are justifiably proud of the development of democratic institutions in Morocco.
quotes.author: Donald Evans

quotes.quote: Coming from Morocco was just different, man. It's a third-world country, and you are trying to make it happen. That's all it is. I didn't have any problem hooking up with the black kids because I'm from North Africa. And as far as Latinos, we are all the same.
quotes.author: French Montana

quotes.quote: Going to Morocco was massive; that's where I really found music which had the African syncopation and swing mixed with Arabic strains, and together they had this transporting, bittersweet quality.
quotes.author: Justin Adams

quotes.quote: In Morocco, for a woman to earn her own living is the essential concern.
quotes.author: Fatema Mernissi

quotes.quote: The power of the word in Morocco belonged to men and to the authorities. No one asked the point of view of poor people or women.
quotes.author: Tahar Ben Jelloun

quotes.quote: The woman with dark hair, wide hips, and a few extra pounds has always been the essence of beauty in Morocco.
quotes.author: Fatema Mernissi

quotes.quote: If you travel in countries like Morocco, and I say that because I have just come from Morocco, if people are shouting at each other in an argument, violence is not going to follow. That would be just so far removed.
quotes.author: John Gimlett

quotes.quote: On some great and glorious day the plain folks of the land will reach their heart's desire at last, and the White House will be adorned by a downright moron.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: If you're listening to a rock star in order to get your information on who to vote for, you're a bigger moron than they are.
quotes.author: Alice Cooper

quotes.quote: You don't have to be a genius when you're surrounded by morons.
quotes.author: Josh Lieb

quotes.quote: There are four kinds of people in this world. Cretins, fools, morons, and lunatics.
quotes.author: Umberto Eco

quotes.quote: You're not a moron. You're only a case of arrested development.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Nature abhors a moron.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Every person, genius or moron, has a right to reproduce himself.
quotes.author: Lee Kuan Yew

quotes.quote: By definition, risk takers often fail. So do morons. In practice it's difficult to sort them out.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: A genius is a genius, regardless of the number of morons who belong to the same race and a moron is a moron, regardless of the number of geniuses who share his racial origin.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: There are nice things in the world and I mean nice things. We're all such morons to get so sidetracked.
quotes.author: J. D. Salinger

quotes.quote: Every week Republicans are excited about a new candidate because the one they liked last week turned out to be a moron.
quotes.author: Andy Borowitz

quotes.quote: Our failure to segregate morons who are increasing and multiplying demonstrates our foolhardy and extravagant sentimentalism.
quotes.author: Margaret Sanger

quotes.quote: The central belief of every moron is that he is the victim of a mysterious conspiracy against his common rights and true deserts.
quotes.author: H.L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Any moron with a pack of matches can start a fire. Raining down sulfur takes a huge level of endurance. Mass genocide is the most exhausting activity one can engage in, next to soccer.
quotes.author: Matt Damon

quotes.quote: Give me a smart idiot over a stupid genius any day.
quotes.author: Samuel Goldwyn

quotes.quote: All that self-expression has just created a generation of morons, hooked on an endless appetite for rubbish.
quotes.author: Vivienne Westwood

quotes.quote: Every great thinker is someone else's moron.
quotes.author: Umberto Eco

quotes.quote: The computer, being a mechanical moron, can handle only quantifiable data.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: One never quite allows for the moron in our midst.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: Through lack of education, we're not teaching kids to read and write. So there is the danger that you raise up a generation of morons.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: When you cut pieces out of the truth to avoid looking like a fool you end up looking like a moron instead.
quotes.author: Robin Hobb

quotes.quote: All morons hate it when you call them a moron.
quotes.author: J. D. Salinger

quotes.quote: Anyone who thinks they're important is usually just a pompous moron who can't deal with his or her own pathetic insignificance and the fact that what they do is meaningless and inconsequential.
quotes.author: William Thomas

quotes.quote: Idiots are not responsible for what they do. The real guilt falls on rational people who sit on their hands while the morons run wild. You can opt out if you want to. Play it safe. But if you do, don't complain when the roof comes down.
quotes.author: Jack Mcdevitt

quotes.quote: The world is made up for the most part of morons and natural tyrants, sure of themselves, strong in their own opinions, never doubting anything.
quotes.author: Clarence Darrow

quotes.quote: Only some ghastly dehumanised moron would want to get rid of the Routemaster.
quotes.author: Ken Livingstone

quotes.quote: There is something miraculous in the way the years wash away your evidence, first you, then your friends and family, then the descendants who remember your face, until you aren't even a memory, you're only carbon, no greater than your atoms, and time will divide them as well.
quotes.author: Anthony Marra

quotes.quote: The things that frighten us most are those that remind us of our fragile existence.
quotes.author: Sumiko Saulson

quotes.quote: Death is never an ending, death is a change; Death is beautiful, for death is strange; Death is one dream out of another flowing.
quotes.author: Conrad Aiken

quotes.quote: Humans, if nothing else, have the good sense to die.
quotes.author: Markus Zusak

quotes.quote: All of us are creatures of a day; the rememberer and the remembered alike. All is ephemeralâ€”both memory and the object of memory. The time is at hand when you will have forgotten everything; and the time is at hand when all will have forgotten you. Always reflect that soon you will be no one, and nowhere.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: In that place things begin to wear away even as they are built; the living die a little more each day. The sun is too far away; light slides endlessly into night; fire and love consume themselves; the heart tries to warm itself with ashes.
quotes.author: Patricia A. Mckillip

quotes.quote: Ignorance of mortality is a comfort.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: There are some fights none of us can win.
quotes.author: Amy Rae Durreson

quotes.quote: That flesh is but the glass, which holds the dust that measures all our time; which also shall be crumbled into dust.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: The world is so exquisite, with so much love and moral depth, that there is no reason to deceive ourselves with pretty stories for which there's little good evidence. Far better, it seems to me, in our vulnerability, is to look Death in the eye and to be grateful every day for the brief but magnificent opportunity that life provides.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: In the end, the body betrayed everyone.
quotes.author: Gail Tsukiyama

quotes.quote: Those who do not know how to live must make a merit of dying.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Embrace death, dance with it a while, and finally fall prey to it.
quotes.author: Darren Shan

quotes.quote: The Wine of Life keeps oozing drop by drop, the Leaves of Life keep falling one by one.
quotes.author: Edward Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: A small fact: You are going to die....does this worry you?
quotes.author: Markus Zusak

quotes.quote: All the mortal world is a lethal enemy during those hours between dawn and dusk.
quotes.author: Anne Rice

quotes.quote: Perhaps life is like an hour glass, with dear ones the sand that slips from the upper glass--the earth--into the second--eternity.
quotes.author: Margaret George

quotes.quote: The moral sense in mortals is the duty we have to pay on mortal sense of beauty.
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.quote: Yes, it will all end one day; but today is worth living.
quotes.author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe

quotes.quote: As we live our precarious lives on the brink of the void, constantly coming closer to a state of nonbeing, we are all too often aware of our fragitlity.
quotes.author: Iris Murdoch

quotes.quote: The stone has no uncertainties, no urge to communicate, and is eternally the same for thousands of years, while I am only a passing phenomenon which bursts into all kinds of emotions, like a flame that flares up quickly and then goes out.
quotes.author: C.G. Jung

quotes.quote: Mortality is one of the greatest gifts ever bestowed. After a long and fruitful life, we are able to rest.
quotes.author: Nancy Straight

quotes.quote: We will lost everything that matters, or everything that matters will lose us. It is predestined, the nature of life.
quotes.author: Steven Rowley

quotes.quote: To suspect your own mortality is to know the beginning of terror, to learn irrefutably that you are mortal is to know the end of terror.
quotes.author: Frank Herbert

quotes.quote: When mortality is the equation, we are but pawns in a game.
quotes.author: Dianna Hardy

quotes.quote: As for man, his days are numbered, whatever he might do, it is but wind.
quotes.author: Andrew R. George

quotes.quote: The end is never worth the beginning.
quotes.author: Vali Myers

quotes.quote: Death is every mortal's life to be alive!
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: Life itself is the axiom of the empty set. It begins in zero and ends in zero.
quotes.author: Hanya Yanagihara

quotes.quote: Life is a battle. It is a struggle renting us time against darkness. It's a fight it will never win. And still in fights. The Universe has no morality. It has no love, no patience. Those are the playthings of Humans... the seeds of the end are in each beginning.
quotes.author: Peter Callaway

quotes.quote: Anyone who thinks he's too small to make a difference has never been bit by a mosquito.
quotes.author: Jeannette Walls

quotes.quote: Take a lesson from the mosquito. She never waits for an opening - she makes one.
quotes.author: Kirk Kirkpatrick

quotes.quote: Mosquitoes are like family: They are annoying, but they carry your blood.
quotes.author: Rakesh Upadhyay

quotes.quote: If you stay long enough in paradise, you're bound to get bitten by mosquitos.
quotes.author: Bert McCoy

quotes.quote: A mosquito is a more rational creature than a human being because it follows its instincts. Whereas a human being gets bogged down in an endless tangle of contradictory doubts and desires.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: You do not respond to a mosquito bite with a hammer.
quotes.author: PLO Lumumba

quotes.quote: People who say that small things don't bother them have never slept in a room with a mosquito.
quotes.author: Dennis Rainey

quotes.quote: You don't hate the mosquito; you just want it out of your face.
quotes.author: Simon Cowell

quotes.quote: If you don't think a small act can make a difference, try going to sleep with a mosquito in the room.
quotes.author: Julie Foudy

quotes.quote: Mosquitoes bite you as if they are in some kind of love with you.
quotes.author: M.F. Moonzajer

quotes.quote: Anyone who thinks that they are too small to make a difference has never tried to fall asleep with a mosquito in the room.
quotes.author: Christine Todd Whitman

quotes.quote: If only mosquitoes sucked fat instead of blood.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Mosquitoes remind us that we are not as high up on the food chain as we think.
quotes.author: Tom Wilson

quotes.quote: Mosquitos ruin the safari.
quotes.author: David Allen

quotes.quote: A rolling stone gathers no moss, but it gains a certain polish.
quotes.author: Oliver Herford

quotes.quote: Moss is selected to be the emblem of maternal love, because, like that love, it glads the heart when the winter of adversity overtakes us, and when summer friends have deserted us.
quotes.author: Henrietta Dumont

quotes.quote: There is an ancient conversation going on between mosses and rocks, poetry to be sure. About light and shadow and the drift of continents. This is what has been called the "dialect of moss on stone an interface of immensity and minute ness, of past and present, softness and hardness, stillness and vibrancy, yin and yan.
quotes.author: Robin Wall Kimmerer

quotes.quote: A moss which leaves its ocean becomes pale and dries up and a man which leaves his mother country is a moss which leaves it ocean!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: The goodness of the world grew like moss in cracks, she thought. It grew, somehow, with hidden roots, nourished by something unseen.
quotes.author: K. J. Bishop

quotes.quote: Moss grows where nothing else can grow. It grows on bricks. It grows on tree bark and roofing slate. It grows in the Arctic Circle and in the balmiest tropics; it also grows on the fur of sloths, on the backs of snails, on decaying human bones. It is a resurrection engine. A single clump of mosses can lie dormant and dry for forty years at a stretch, and then vault back again into life with a mere soaking of water.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: The moss sits hedgehog-like on the stone, softly hibernating, gently green. Kelsey plucks it, surprised by the wetness that remains from the morning rain when every other thing has been dried by the sun.
quotes.author: Angela Abraham

quotes.quote: Moss is popular for her unusual beauty, but what distinguishes her is that she is accessible and down to earth. The other thing that has made her valuable is this edge of darkness feeling about her. The problem is that her image is sliding too much to the latter.
quotes.author: Rita Clifton

quotes.quote: This is the forest primeval. The murmuring pines and the hemlocks, Bearded with moss, and in garments green, indistinct in the twilight, stand like druids of eld, with voices sad and prophetic, stand like harpers hoar, with beards that rest on their bosoms. Loud from its rocky caverns, the deep-voiced neighboring ocean speaks, and in accents disconsolate answers the wail of the forest.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Moss that is concentrating on being green.
quotes.author: Jeanette Winterson

quotes.quote: Green moss shines there with ice encased; The long grass bends its spear-like form; And lovely is the silvery scene When faint the sun-beams smile.
quotes.author: Robert Southey

quotes.quote: Lying on a soft bed of moss viewing the cobalt blue sky painted with thick impastoed layers of clouds framed sumptuously with swaying trees and dancing leaves is the best way to view nature's museum.
quotes.author: Khang Kijarro Nguyen

quotes.quote: The skin of moss holds the footprints of star-footed birds.
quotes.author: Nancy Willard

quotes.quote: Moss is inconceivably strong. Moss eats stone; scarcely anything, in return, eats moss. Moss dines upon boulders, slowly but devastatingly, in a meal that lasts for centuries. Given enough time, a colony of moss can turn a cliff into gravel, and turn that gravel into topsoil.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: There was a mist of moss to ride through and a storm of glass.
quotes.author: James Thurber

quotes.quote: There are moths outside, ready to die for a light they crave but which is denied to them, shielded from them. Sometimes, in the midst of all I have been given, I watch the moths in us all. Everybody has a light which they think they cannot live without.
quotes.author: Alma Alexander

quotes.quote: A moth is a mysterious thing. You can clip its wings but you'll never discover its secret.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: The moth prefers the moon and detests the sun, while the butterfly loves the sun and hides from the moon. Every living creature responds to light. But depending on the amount of light you have inside, determines which lamp in the sky your heart will swoon.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: And I shall seek you endlessly, for I am a moth, and you’re my flame, Knowing that I’ll burn at your touch I return, for you’re a fire; untamed
quotes.author: Zubair Ahsan

quotes.quote: The Moth don't care when he sees The Flame. He might get burned, but he's in the game. And once he's in, he can't go back, he'll Beat his wings 'til he burns them black... No, The Moth don't care when he sees The Flame. . . The Moth don't care if The Flame is real, 'Cause Flame and Moth got a sweetheart deal. And nothing fuels a good flirtation, Like Need and Anger and Desperation... No, The Moth don't care if The Flame is real...
quotes.author: Aimee Mann

quotes.quote: It felt as though I had been holding on to Sally all these years, by the tips of my fingers. Just holding on. She was like a moth, fragile and fleeting. One rough breath, one lurch, one tiny movement of your hand and she'd fly away from you.
quotes.author: Belinda Jeffrey

quotes.quote: Between our birth and death we may touch understanding, As a moth brushes a window with its wing
quotes.author: Christopher Fry

quotes.quote: Announcing your death should be like announcing that you are a lunar moth: It must be done quietly or it will not be believed.
quotes.author: Daniel Handler

quotes.quote: Be the flame, not the moth.
quotes.author: Giacomo Casanova

quotes.quote: Words betrayed her: beautiful butterflies in her mind; dead moths when she opened her mouth for their release into the world.
quotes.author: Glen Duncan

quotes.quote: Moth: I gave you my life. Flame: I allowed you to kiss me.
quotes.author: Hazrat Inayat Khan

quotes.quote: I’ve always preferred moths to butterflies. They aren’t flashy or cocky; they mind their own business and just try to blend in with their surroundings and live their lives. They don’t want to be seen, and that’s something I can relate to.
quotes.author: Kayla Krantz

quotes.quote: How little he knew about the rules of this world which he had crashed against so casually, like a moth bumping against a light!
quotes.author: L.P. Hartley

quotes.quote: I have a little brown cocoon of an idea that may possibly expand into a magnificent moth of fulfilment.
quotes.author: Lucy Maud Montgomery

quotes.quote: I wish to drown in my pain, alone, just like a moth dancing to its death in the flame!
quotes.author: Nishta Kochar

quotes.quote: The desire of the moth for the star, Of the night for the morrow, The devotion to something afar From the sphere of our sorrow.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.quote: Judge the moth by the beauty of the candle.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Life is a frail moth flying, Caught in the web of the years that pass.
quotes.author: Sara Teasdale

quotes.quote: The weeping of the candle is not in mourning for the moth: the dawn is at hand, and it is thinking of its own dark night.
quotes.author: Saib Tabrizi

quotes.quote: What a moth might see from birth to death if black were white and white were black.
quotes.author: Stan Brakhage

quotes.quote: I was, a near grown man, sat in his dank, dark and rickety digs, feverishly hovering about the glare of a computer screen like a disorientated moth, one searching for a flaming light of recognition from someone/anyone!
quotes.author: Tom Conrad

quotes.quote: Being young is like being a moth, or alive I bet, possibly: I am burning, if I am learning anything these days, it is that the flames you keep touching when you're young, you keep right ahead on touching when you're older.
quotes.author: Will Walton

quotes.quote: When nature moves, butterflies take flight.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: Bee to the blossom, moth to the flame; Each to his passion; what's in a name?
quotes.author: Helen Hunt Jackson

quotes.quote: If you manifest your true self through nature and your normal surroundings, I find that the most eerie. Like when you see birds suddenly start flying in a different direction or when you see moths forming weird shapes, I think that's the weirdest way to let yourself be known.
quotes.author: Holland Roden

quotes.quote: Light attracts light. But sometimes your light attracts moths and your warmth attracts parasites. Protect your space and energy
quotes.author: Warsan Shire

quotes.quote: A mother who radiates self-love and self-acceptance actually vaccinates her daughter against low self-esteem.
quotes.author: Naomi Wolf

quotes.quote: A daughter is a mother's gender partner, her closest ally in the family confederacy, an extension of her self. And mothers are their daughters' role model, their biological and emotional road map, the arbiter of all their relationships.
quotes.author: Victoria Secunda

quotes.quote: As mothers and daughters, we are connected with one another. My mother is the bones of my spine, keeping me straight and true. She is my blood, making sure it runs rich and strong. She is the beating of my heart. I cannot now imagine a life without her.
quotes.author: Kristin Hannah

quotes.quote: Of all the haunting moments of motherhood, few rank with hearing your own words come out of your daughter's mouth.
quotes.author: Victoria Secunda

quotes.quote: The more a daughter knows the details of her mother's life—without flinching or whining—the stronger the daughter.
quotes.author: Anita Diamant

quotes.quote: Mothers of daughters are daughters of mothers and have remained so, in circles joined to circles, since time began.
quotes.author: Signe Hammer

quotes.quote: A mother's treasure is her daughter.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: We mothers are learning to mark our mothering success by our daughters' lengthening flight.
quotes.author: Letty Cottin Pogrebin

quotes.quote: A busy mother makes slothful daughters.
quotes.author: Portuguese Proverb

quotes.quote: A daughter without her mother is a woman broken. It is a loss that turns to arthritis and settles deep into her bones.
quotes.author: Kristin Hannah

quotes.quote: Mothers, look after your daughters, keep them near you, keep their confidence - that they may be true and faithful.
quotes.author: Elmina S. Taylor

quotes.quote: I am not a perfect mother and I will never be. You are not a perfect daughter and you will never be. But put us together and we will be the best mother and daughter we would ever be.
quotes.author: Zoraida Pesante

quotes.quote: Suddenly, through birthing a daughter, a woman finds herself face to face not only with an infant, a little girl, a woman-to-be, but also with her own unresolved conflicts from the past and her hopes and dreams for the future.... As though experiencing an earthquake, mothers of daughters may find their lives shifted, their deep feelings unearthed, the balance struck in all relationships once again off kilter.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Debold and Idelisse Malave

quotes.quote: A fluent tongue is the only thing a mother don't like her daughter to resemble her in.
quotes.author: Richard Brinsley Sheridan

quotes.quote: The mother is only really the mistress of her daughter upon the condition of continually representing herself to her as a model of wisdom and type of perfection.
quotes.author: Alexandre Dumas Pere

quotes.quote: Because mothers and daughters can affirm and enjoy their commonalities more readily, they are more likely to see how they might advance their individual interests in tandem, without one having to be sacrificed for the other.
quotes.author: Mary Field Belenky

quotes.quote: Unlike the mother-son relationship, a daughter's relationship with her mother is something akin to bungee diving. She can stake he r claim in the outside world in what looks like total autonomy--in some cases, even divorce her mother in a fiery exit from the family--but there is an invisible emotional cord that snaps her back. For always there is the memory of mother, whose judgments are so completely absorbed into the daughter's identity that she may wonder where Mom leaves off and she begins.
quotes.author: Victoria Secunda

quotes.quote: What do girls do who haven't any mothers to help them through their troubles
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: Mothers and daughters are closest, when daughters become mothers.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A son is a son till he takes him a wife, a daughter is a daughter all of her life.
quotes.author: Irish Saying

quotes.quote: The mother-daughter relationship is the most complex.
quotes.author: Wynonna Judd

quotes.quote: Of course mothers and daughters with strong personalities might see the world from very different points of view.
quotes.author: Katherine Howe

quotes.quote: Good daughters make good mothers.
quotes.author: Abigail G. Whittlesey

quotes.quote: As is the mother, so is her daughter.
quotes.author: Bible

quotes.quote: What the daughter does, the mother did.
quotes.author: Jewish Proverb

quotes.quote: Mothers sound so stupid when they praise their daughters to the skies.
quotes.author: Colette

quotes.quote: Like mother, like daughter.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: He that would the daughter win must with the mother first begin.
quotes.author: English Proverb

quotes.quote: When a mother quarrels with a daughter, she has a double dose of unhappiness hers from the conflict, and empathy with her daughter's from the conflict with her. Throughout her life a mother retains this special need to maintain a good relationship with her daughter.
quotes.author: Terri Apter

quotes.quote: My mother and I are like night and day.
quotes.author: Heather Vogel Frederick

quotes.quote: A man loves his sweetheart the most, his wife the best, but his mother the longest.
quotes.author: Irish Proverb

quotes.quote: There has never been, nor will there ever be, anything quite so special as the love between the mother and a son.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: There is an endearing tenderness in the love of a mother to a son that transcends all other affections of the heart.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: Happy is the son whose faith in his mother remains unchallenged.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: Every mother hopes that her daughter will marry a better man than she did, and is convinced that her son will never find a wife as good as his father did.
quotes.author: Martin Andersen Nexo

quotes.quote: For a mother the project of raising a boy is the most fulfilling project she can hope for. She can watch him, as a child, play the games she was not allowed to play; she can invest in him her ideas, aspirations, ambitions, and values -- or whatever she has left of them; she can watch her son, who came from her flesh and whose life was sustained by her work and devotion, embody her in the world. So while the project of raising a boy is fraught with ambivalence and leads inevitably to bitterness, it is the only project that allows a woman to be -- to be through her son, to live through her son.
quotes.author: Andrea Dworkin

quotes.quote: Even more than the time when she gave birth, a mother feels her greatest joy when she hears others refer to her son as a wise learned one.
quotes.author: Thiruvalluvar

quotes.quote: All women become like their mothers. That is their tragedy. No man does. That's his.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Sons are the anchors of a mother's life.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: If a man has been his mother's undisputed darling he retains throughout life the triumphant feeling, the confidence in success, which not seldom brings actual success along with it.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: Mother is her son's first god; she must teach him the most important lesson of all - how to love.
quotes.author: T. F. Hodge

quotes.quote: As the mother of a son, I do not accept that alienation from me is necessary for his discovery of himself. As a woman, I will not cooperate in demeaning womanly things so that he can be proud to be a man. I like to think the women in my son's future are counting on me.
quotes.author: Letty Cottin Pogrebin

quotes.quote: A man never sees all that his mother has been to him until it's too late to let her know that he sees it.
quotes.author: W. D. Howells

quotes.quote: A mother’s love is patient and forgiving when all others are forsaking, it never fails or falters, even though the heart is breaking
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: A mother’s love for her child is like nothing else in the world. It knows no law, no pity, it dares all things, and crushes down remorselessly all that stands in its path.
quotes.author: Helen Rice

quotes.quote: To a mother, a son is never a fully grown man; and a son is never a fully grown man until he understands and accepts this about his mother.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The father is always a Republican toward his son, and his mother's always a Democrat.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: A good son will never allow sorrow to befall her mother...and act as if he is an only child that cares...protects when no one dares...serves with his life in return...and most of all finds a wife that will love his mother too.
quotes.author: HELEN REBIBIS RAMOS

quotes.quote: Mothers are inscrutable beings to their sons, always.
quotes.author: A.E. Coppard

quotes.quote: It takes one woman twenty years to make a man of her son - and another woman twenty minutes to make a fool of him.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: That strong mother doesn't tell her cub, Son, stay weak so the wolves can get you. She says, Toughen up, this is reality we are living in.
quotes.author: Lauryn Hill

quotes.quote: But a mother-son relationship is not a coequal one, is it? He is lonely with only you just as you are lonely with only him.
quotes.author: Mary Balogh

quotes.quote: Raising boys has made me a more generous woman than I really am. Undoubtedly, there are other routes to learning the wishes and dreams of the presumably opposite sex, but I know of none more direct, or more highly motivating, than being the mother of sons.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Blakely

quotes.quote: My mother never saw the irony in calling me a son-of-a-bitch.
quotes.author: Jack Nicholson

quotes.quote: ...to many a mother's heart has come the disappointment of a loss of power, a limitation of influence when early manhood takes the boy from the home, or when even before that time, in school, or where he touches the great world and begins to be bewildered with its controversies, trade and economics and politics make their imprint even while his lips are dewy with his mother's kiss.
quotes.author: J. Ellen Foster

quotes.quote: When I was a child, my mother said to me, 'If you become a soldier, you'll be a general. If you become a monk you'll end up as the pope.' Instead I became a painter and wound up as Picasso.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: A wise son makes a glad father, But a foolish son is the grief of his mother... A wise son makes a father glad, But a foolish man despises his mother.
quotes.author: The Proverbs of Solomon:

quotes.quote: Let France have good mothers, and she will have good sons.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Mothers see the angel in us because the angel is there. If it's shown to the mother, the son has got an angel to show, hasn't he? When a son cuts somebody's throat the mother only sees it's possible for a misguided angel to act like a devil - and she's entirely right about that!
quotes.author: Booth Tarkington

quotes.quote: Having a child makes you realize the importance of life - narcissism goes out the window. Heaven on earth is looking at my little boy. The minute he was born, I knew if I never did anything other than being a mom, I'd be fine.
quotes.author: Jenny McCarthy

quotes.quote: No language can express the power and beauty and heroism of a mother's love.
quotes.author: Edwin H. Chapin

quotes.quote: A mother is always the beginning. She is how things begin.
quotes.author: Amy Tan

quotes.quote: The moment a child is born, the mother is also born. She never existed before. The woman existed, but the mother, never. A mother is something absolutely new.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: Mother love is the fuel that enables a normal human being to do the impossible.
quotes.author: Marion C. Garretty

quotes.quote: Most mothers are instinctive philosophers.
quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.quote: There is only one pretty child in the world, and every mother has it.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote:
Youth fades; love droops, the leaves of friendship fall;
A mother's secret hope outlives them all.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: A mother is one to whom you hurry when you are troubled
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: Before a day was over, Home comes the rover, For mother's kiss â€” sweeter this Than any other thing!
quotes.author: William Allingham

quotes.quote: A mother's arms are more comforting than anyone else's.
quotes.author: Princess Diana

quotes.quote: Who fed me from her gentle breast And hushed me in her arms to rest, And on my cheek sweet kisses prest? My Mother.
quotes.author: Ann Taylor

quotes.quote: Mama was my greatest teacher, a teacher of compassion, love, and fearlessness. If love is sweet as a flower, then my mother is that sweet flower of love.
quotes.author: Stevie Wonder

quotes.quote: The mother's heart is the child's schoolroom.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Only mothers can think of the future-because they give birth to it in their children.
quotes.author: Maxim Gorky

quotes.quote: A mother's love for her child is like nothing else in the world. It knows no law, no pity, it dates all things and crushes down remorselessly all that stands in its path.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: A good mother is irreplaceable.
quotes.author: Adriana Trigiani

quotes.quote: My mother is my friend who shares with me her bread. She cures all my hopelessness! Her company makes me feel secure!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Blessed is a mother that would give up part of her soul for her children's happiness.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: My mom is a lifelong smile in my heart, her voice a comfort to my soul, her hugs my ladder to the stars.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Being a full-time mother is one of the highest salaried jobsâ€¦ since the payment is pure love.
quotes.author: Mildred B. Vermont

quotes.quote: Mothers care in volumes of tears and earnestness of prayers and a depth of emotion others cannot fathom.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: Mothers are fonder than fathers of their children because they are more certain they are their own.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: I will look after you and I will look after anybody you say needs to be looked after, any way you say. I am here. I brought my whole self to you. I am your mother.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Being a mother is an attitude, not a biological relation.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: The sweetest sounds to mortals given are heard in Mother, Home, and Heaven.
quotes.author: William Goldsmith Brown

quotes.quote: The heart of a mother is a deep abyss at the bottom of which you will always find forgiveness.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: When you are a mother, you are never really alone in your thoughts. A mother always has to think twice, once for herself and once for her child.
quotes.author: Sophia Loren

quotes.quote: A man loves his sweetheart the most, his wife the best, but his mother the longest.
quotes.author: Irish Proverb

quotes.quote: Motherhood is near to divinity. It is the highest, holiest service to be assumed by mankind.
quotes.author: Howard W. Hunter

quotes.quote: Mother is the name for god on the lips and hearts of all children
quotes.author: Brandon Lee

quotes.quote: Motherhood is a great honor and privilege, yet it is also synonymous with servanthood. Every day women are called upon to selflessly meet the needs of their families. Whether they are awake at night nursing a baby, spending their time and money on less-than-grateful teenagers, or preparing meals, moms continuously put others before themselves.
quotes.author: Charles Stanley

quotes.quote: As it stands, motherhood is a sort of wilderness through which each woman hacks her way, part martyr, part pioneer; a turn of events from which some women derive feelings of heroism, while others experience a sense of exile from the world they knew.
quotes.author: Rachel Cusk

quotes.quote: That's what motherhood is: you're working; you're doing 25 different jobs, and you're not getting paid.
quotes.author: Melissa Peterman

quotes.quote: Motherhood is more than bearing children, though it is certainly that. It is the essence of who we are as women. It defines our very identity, our divine stature and nature, and the unique traits our Father gave us.
quotes.author: Sheri L. Dew

quotes.quote: Motherhood is wonderful, but it's also hard work. It's the logistics more than anything. You discover you have reserves of energy you didn't know you had.
quotes.author: Deborah Mailman

quotes.quote: The natural state of motherhood is unselfishness. When you become a mother, you are no longer the center of your own universe. You relinquish that position to your children.
quotes.author: Jessica Lange

quotes.quote: Sometimes when you pick up your child you can feel the map of your own bones beneath your hands, or smell the scent of your skin in the nape of his neck. This is the most extraordinary thing about motherhood - finding a piece of yourself separate and apart that all the same you could not live without.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: A mother knows what her child's gone through, even if she didn't see it herself.
quotes.author: Pramoedya Ananta Toer

quotes.quote: She [my mother] was the force around which our world turned. My mother was propelled through the universe by the brute force of reason. She was the judge in all our arguments. One disapproving word from her was enough to send us off to hide in a corner, where we would cry and fantasize our own martyrdom. And yet. One kiss could restore us to princedom. Without her, our lives would dissolve into chaos.
quotes.author: Nicole Krauss

quotes.quote: Motherhood is a choice you make everyday, to put someone else's happiness and well-being ahead of your own, to teach the hard lessons, to do the right thing even when you're not sure what the right thing is...and to forgive yourself, over and over again, for doing everything wrong.
quotes.author: Donna Ball

quotes.quote: The mother memories that are closest to my heart are the small gentle ones that I have carried over from the days of my childhood. They are not profound, but they have stayed with me through life, and when I am very old, they will still be near . . . Memories of mother drying my tears, reading aloud, cutting cookies and singing as she did, listening to prayers I said as I knelt with my forehead pressed against her knee, tucking me in bed and turning down the light. They have carried me through the years and given my life such a firm foundation that it does not rock beneath flood or tempest.
quotes.author: Margaret Sanger

quotes.quote: This is part of the essence of motherhood, watching your kid grow into her own person and not being able to do anything about it. Otherwise children would be nothing more than pets.
quotes.author: Heather Armstrong

quotes.quote: A mother is a person who seeing there are only four pieces of pie for five people, promptly announces she never did care for pie.
quotes.author: Tenneva Jordan

quotes.quote: The moment a child is born, the mother is also born. She never existed before. The woman existed, but the mother, never. A mother is something absolutely new._
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: She never quite leaves her children at home, even when she doesn't take them along.
quotes.author: Margaret Culkin Banning

quotes.quote: When you are a mother, you are never really alone in your thoughts. A mother always has to think twice, once for herself and once for her child._
quotes.author: Sophia Loren

quotes.quote: Motherhood has a very humanizing effect. Everything gets reduced to essentials._
quotes.author: Meryl Streep

quotes.quote: The formative period for building character for eternity is in the nursery. The mother is queen of that realm and sways a scepter more potent than that of kings or priests.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: For that's what a woman, a mother wants _ to teach her children to take an interest in life. She knows it's safer for them to be interested in other people's happiness than to believe in their own.
quotes.author: Marguerite Duras

quotes.quote: Education commences at the mother's knee, and every word spoken within hearsay of little children tends toward the formation of character.
quotes.author: Hosea Ballou

quotes.quote: Motherhood is neither a duty nor a privilege, but simply the way that humanity can satisfy the desire for physical immortality and triumph over the fear of death.
quotes.author: Rebecca West

quotes.quote: If_you are a mother then you know the feeling of true love. Once you look into the eyes of your children you feel the love that could never be shared with another.
quotes.author: Mandi Nowak

quotes.quote: The hand that rocks the cradle usually is attached to someone who isn't getting enough sleep.
quotes.author: John Fiebig

quotes.quote: But kids don't stay with you if you do it right. It's the one job where, the better you are, the more surely you won't be needed in the long run.
quotes.author: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.quote: Motherhood: The most exhausting, emotional, rewarding and life-enhancing journey a woman can take.
quotes.author: Charlotte Pearson

quotes.quote: Women do not have to sacrifice personhood if they are mothers. They do not have to sacrifice motherhood in order to be persons. Liberation was meant to expand women's opportunities, not to limit them. The self-esteem that has been found in new pursuits can also be found in mothering.
quotes.author: Elaine Heffner

quotes.quote: I looked on child rearing not only as a work of love and duty but as a profession that was fully as interesting and challenging as any honorable profession in the world and one that demanded the best I could bring to it.
quotes.author: Rose Kennedy

quotes.quote: It is not until you become a mother than your judgment slowly turns to compassion and understanding.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Though motherhood is the most important of all the professions -- requiring more knowledge than any other department in human affairs -- there was no attention given to preparation for this office.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton
