quotes.quote: Motherhood brings as much joy as ever, but it still brings boredom, exhaustion, and sorrow too. Nothing else ever will make you as happy or as sad, as proud or as tired, for nothing is quite as hard as helping a person develop his own individuality especially while you struggle to keep your own.
quotes.author: Marguerite Kelly and Elia Parsons

quotes.quote: Most mothers are instinctive philosophers.
quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.quote: Mothers are fonder than fathers of their children because they are more certain they are their own.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Mothers hold their children's hands for a short while, but their hearts forever.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The real religion of the world comes from women much more than from men ? from mothers most of all, who carry the key of our souls in their bosoms.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: M-O-T-H-E-R: "M" is for the million things she gave me, "O" means only that she's growing old, "T" is for the tears she shed to save me, "H" is for her heart of purest gold, "E" is for her eyes, with love-light shining, "R" means right, and right she'll always be, Put them all together, they spell "MOTHER," A word that means the world to me.
quotes.author: Howard Johnson

quotes.quote: Mother: the most beautiful word on the lips of mankind.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: A mother is she who can take the place of all others but whose place no one else can take.
quotes.author: Cardinal Mermillod

quotes.quote: Some mothers are kissing mothers and some are scolding mothers, but it is love just the same, and most mothers kiss and scold together.
quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.quote: Only mothers can think of the future because they give birth to it in their children.
quotes.author: Maxim Gorky

quotes.quote: There is more power in a mother's hand than in a king's scepter.
quotes.author: Billy Sunday

quotes.quote: A mother's role is God-ordained. Mothers are to conceive, bear, nourish, love, and train. They are to be helpmates and are to counsel with their husbands.
quotes.author: Ezra Taft Benson

quotes.quote: Mother that was the bank where we deposited all our hurts and worries.
quotes.author: T. DeWitt Talmage

quotes.quote: Being a full-time mother is one of the highest salaried jobs? since the payment is pure love.
quotes.author: Mildred B. Vermont

quotes.quote: A mother is she who can take the place of all others but whose place no one else can take.
quotes.author: Cardinal Mermillod

quotes.quote: Mothers are the necessity of invention.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: Mothers are the people who love us for no good reason. And those of us who are mothers know it's the most exquisite love of all.
quotes.author: Maggie Gallagher

quotes.quote: A mother's love is patient and forgiving when all others are forsaking, it never fails or falters, even though the heart is breaking.
quotes.author: Helen Steiner Rice

quotes.quote: The patience of a mother might be likened to a tube of toothpaste - it's never quite all gone.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Men are what their mothers made them.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: A mother understands what a child does not say.
quotes.author: Jewish Proverb

quotes.quote: Mothers have as powerful an influence over the welfare of future generations as all other earthly causes combined.
quotes.author: John S C Abbott

quotes.quote: Mother is the heartbeat in the home; and without her, there seems to be no heart throb.
quotes.author: Leroy Brownlow

quotes.quote: Where there is a mother in the home, matters go well.
quotes.author: Amos Bronson Alcott

quotes.quote: Mothers and their children are in a category all their own. There's no bond so strong in the entire world. No love so instantaneous and forgiving.
quotes.author: Gail Tsukiyama

quotes.quote: The love of a mother is the veil of a softer light between the heart and the heavenly Father.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: A mother is the truest friend we have, when trials heavy and sudden fall upon us; when adversity takes the place of prosperity; when friends desert us; when trouble thickens around us, still will she cling to us, and endeavor by her kind precepts and counsels to dissipate the clouds of darkness, and cause peace to return to our hearts.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: Mothers give up so much, so that their children can have so much.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Mothers are the place that we call home. On them we rest our heads and close our eyes. There's no one else who grants the same soft peace, happiness, contentment, sweet release, erasing righttime tears with lullabies, restoring the bright sun that makes us bloom.
quotes.author: Nicholas Gordon

quotes.quote: By and large, mothers and housewives are the only workers who do not have regular time off. They are the great vacationless class.
quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.quote: A mother is a person who seeing there are only four pieces of pie for five people, promptly announces she never did care for pie.
quotes.author: Tenneva Jordan

quotes.quote: I can calculate the motion of heavenly bodies, but not the madness of people.
quotes.author: Isaac Newton

quotes.quote: Everything is in motion. Everything flows. Everything is vibrating.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: When a person expends the least amount of motion on one action, that is grace
quotes.author: Anton Chekov

quotes.quote: Never confuse motion with action.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Gravity may put the planets into motion, but without the divine Power, it could never put them into such a circulating motion as they have about the Sun; and therefore, for this as well as other reasons, I am compelled to ascribe the frame of this System to an intelligent Agent.
quotes.author: Isaac Newton

quotes.quote: Our nature consists in motion; complete rest is death.
quotes.author: Blais Pascal

quotes.quote: Rest and motion, unrelieved and unchecked, are equally destructive
quotes.author: Benjamin Cardozo

quotes.quote: What you do is your history. What you set in motion is your legacy
quotes.author: Leonard Sweet

quotes.quote: A body in motion can maintain this motion only if it remains in contact with a mover.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: I guess I’m fascinated with motion because I find that whenever anything is moving, I have some feeling about it. It doesn’t matter what kind of motion it is. A motion will always evoke some kind of reaction.
quotes.author: Arthur Ganson

quotes.quote: Time is a perpetual motion, without a single moment of rest.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Everyone who's serious about what they're doing must be in constant motion forward.
quotes.author: Ed O'Brien

quotes.quote: A lot of things look cooler in slow motion. Eating isn't one of them.
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.quote: Thank you... motion sensor hand towel machine. You never work, so I just end up looking like I'm waving hello to a wall robot.
quotes.author: Jimmy Fallon

quotes.quote: I've always felt music is the only way to give an instantaneous moment the feel of slow motion. To romanticise it and glorify it and give it a soundtrack and a rhythm.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: Traveling in the company of those we love is home in motion
quotes.author: Leigh Hunt

quotes.quote: Worry is like a rocking chair; it keeps you in motion but gets you nowhere
quotes.author: Ashwin Sanghi

quotes.quote: Some desire is necessary to keep life in motion, and he whose real wants are supplied must admit those of fancy.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Poetry in motion walking by my side, her lovely locomotion keeps my eyes open wide
quotes.author: Johnny Tillotson

quotes.quote: The drive for happiness is vital; it's what keeps us in motion
quotes.author: Richard Gere

quotes.quote: A moving body whose motion was not retarded by any resisting force would continue to move to all eternity.
quotes.author: Hermann von Helmholtz

quotes.quote: Persistence is nothing more than staying in motion.
quotes.author: Ken Evoy

quotes.quote: Writing is thinking in slow motion.
quotes.author: Walter Kauffman

quotes.quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, therefore, is not an act but a habit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The best way out is always through.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking.
quotes.author: William B. Sprague

quotes.quote: Great spirits have always encountered violent opposition from mediocre minds.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Whether you think you can or think you can't, you are right.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Falling down is how we grow. Staying down is how we die.
quotes.author: Brian Vaszily

quotes.quote: It is not what we take up, but what we give up, that makes us rich.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: It takes courage to grow up and turn out to be who you really are.
quotes.author: E.E. Cummings

quotes.quote: In order to be effective truth must penetrate like an arrow -- and that is likely to hurt.
quotes.author: Wei Wu Wei

quotes.quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Life is about making an impact, not making an income.
quotes.author: Kevin Kruse

quotes.quote: Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Two roads diverged in a wood, and I took the one less traveled by, And that has made all the difference.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.
quotes.author: Florence Nightingale

quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Either I will find a way, or I will make one.
quotes.author: Philip Sidney

quotes.quote: Always be a first-rate version of yourself, instead of a second-rate version of somebody else.
quotes.author: Judy Garland

quotes.quote: Judge each day not by the harvest you reap but by the seeds you plant.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: The greatest pleasure in life is doing what people say you cannot do.
quotes.author: Walter Bagehot

quotes.quote: If you don't make mistakes, you aren't really trying.
quotes.author: Coleman Hawkins

quotes.quote: Do not go where the path may lead; go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Forget about all the reasons why something may not work. You only need to find one good reason why it will.
quotes.author: Dr. Robert Anthony

quotes.quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
quotes.author: Aristotle Onassis

quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: It is by acts and not by ideas that people live.
quotes.author: Harry Emerson Fosdick

quotes.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.quote: Explore your web â€” the needs, the beliefs, the emotions that are controlling you â€¦ so there's more of you to give â€¦ and so you can appreciate what's driving other people. It's the only way our world's going to change.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: We can't fully encompass our motivational and inspirational awareness without fully understanding our purpose in life.
quotes.author: Matthew Donnelly

quotes.quote: If you don't go after what you want, you'll never have it. If you don't ask, the answer is always no. If you don't step forward, you're always in the same place.
quotes.author: Nora Roberts

quotes.quote: You don't have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: Expect problems and eat them for breakfast.
quotes.author: Alfred A. Montapert

quotes.quote: Excellence is never an accident. It is always the result of high intention, sincere effort, and intelligent execution; it represents the wise choice of many alternatives - choice, not chance, determines your destiny.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Nothing in the world is ever completely wrong. Even a stopped clock is right twice a day.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Start by doing what's necessary; then do what's possible; and suddenly you are doing the impossible.
quotes.author: Francis of Assisi

quotes.quote: If you can't fly then run, if you can't run then walk, if you can't walk then crawl, but whatever you do you have to keep moving forward.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: All great achievements require time.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: I hope when you count the stars you begin with yourself, and may you embrace the moonlight with your dreams.
quotes.author: Dodinsky

quotes.quote: Our lives are not determined by what happens to us but by how we react to what happens, not by what life brings to us, but by the attitude we bring to life. A positive attitude causes a chain reaction of positive thoughts, events, and outcomes. It is a catalyst, a spark that creates extraordinary results.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Often, what seems an impossible climb is just a staircase without the steps drawn in.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Do the difficult things while they are easy and do the great things while they are small. A journey of a thousand miles must begin with a single step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Motivation is simple. Eliminate those who aren't motivated.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: What is the best thing about people doubting your potential? The pleasure of proving them wrong.
quotes.author: Ameya Agrawal

quotes.quote: Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.quote: Never give in -- never, never, never, never, in nothing great or small, large or petty, never give in except to convictions of honour and good sense. Never yield to force; never yield to the apparently overwhelming might of the enemy.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: No matter how many mistakes you make or how slow you progress, you are still way ahead of everyone who isn't trying.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Don't fear failureâ€¦in great attempts it is glorious even to fail.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: The ultimate inspiration is the deadline.
quotes.author: Nolan Bushnell

quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: The inner thought coming from the heart represents the real motives and desires. These are the cause of action.
quotes.author: Raymond Holliwell

quotes.quote: Nothing will ever be attempted if all possible objections must first be overcome.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world.
quotes.author: Harriet Tubman

quotes.quote: In order to succeed, your desire for success should be greater than your fear of failure.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: Everyone who achieves success in a great venture solves each problem as they came. They helped themselves and they were helped through powers known and unknown to them at the time they set out on their voyage. They keep going regardless of the obstacles they meet.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.quote: Like success, failure is many things to many people. With positive mental attitude, failure is a learning experience, a rung on the ladder, and a plateau at which to get your thoughts in order to prepare to try again.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.quote: If your actions inspire others to dream more, learn more, do more and become more, you are a leader.
quotes.author: John Quincy Adams

quotes.quote: Don't worry about being successful but work toward being significant and the success will naturally follow.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: The golden rule for every business man is this: Put yourself in your customer's place.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: I can accept failure, everyone fails at something. But I cannot accept not trying.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: We focus on how we understand their desire to be creative and to not be distracted from that.
quotes.author: Matt Urmy

quotes.quote: Business opportunities are like buses, there's always another one coming.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: What do you need to start a business? Three simple things: know your product better than anyone. Know your customer, and have a burning desire to succeed.
quotes.author: Dave Thomas

quotes.quote: Sometimes when you innovate, you make mistakes. It is best to admit them quickly and get on with improving your other innovations.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Forget past mistakes. Forget failures. Forget everything except what you're going to do now and do it.
quotes.author: William Durant

quotes.quote: You have to make sure people enjoy coming to work.
quotes.author: Ed Brown

quotes.quote: Don't limit yourself. Many people limit themselves to what they think they can do. You can go as far as your mind lets you. What you believe, remember, you can achieve.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.quote: Management is nothing more than motivating other people.
quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

quotes.quote: In every business, in every industry, management does matter.
quotes.author: Michael Eisner

quotes.quote: Change is not a threat, it's an opportunity. Survival is not the goal, transformative success is.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: A strategy is something like, an innovative new product; globalization, taking your products around the world; be the low-cost producer. A strategy is something you can touch; you can motivate people with; be number one and number two in every business. You can energize people around the message.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.quote: A business has to be involving, it has to be fun, and it has to exercise your creative instincts.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: The important thing is not being afraid to take a chance. Remember, the greatest failure is to not try. Once you find something you love to do, be the best at doing it.
quotes.author: Debbi Fields

quotes.quote: Whether you think you can, or you think you can't, you're right.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Success seems to be connected with action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit.
quotes.author: Conrad Hilton

quotes.quote: If you are moving, even fire will not hurt you. If you are standing still near the fire, even though you are not in the fire, the heat will eventually get to you.
quotes.author: Rich Dad

quotes.quote: Failure is just a resting place. It is an opportunity to begin again more intelligently.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: The entrepreneur always searches for change, responds to it, and exploits it as an opportunity.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Expect the best. Prepare for the worst. Capitalize on what comes.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Experience taught me a few things. One is to listen to your gut no matter how good something sounds on paper. The second is that you are generally better off sticking with what you know and the third is that sometimes, your best investments are the ones you don't make.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: Don't worry about people stealing your ideas. If your ideas are any good, you'll have to ram them down people's throats.
quotes.author: Howard Aiken

quotes.quote: You're only one workout away from a good mood.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: There's no secret formula. I lift heavy, work hard, and aim to be the best.
quotes.author: Ronnie Coleman

quotes.quote: So many people spend their health gaining wealth, and then have to spend their wealth to regain their health.
quotes.author: A.J. Reb Materi

quotes.quote: Lack of activity destroys the good condition of every human being, while movement and methodical physical exercise save it and preserve it.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Fitness - If it came in a bottle, everybody would have a great body.
quotes.author: Cher

quotes.quote: Today it hurts. Tomorrow it works.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When you're at the gym feeling like you'll never be one of those people who look like they've been at it their entire lives, remember that they all started somewhere.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Take care of your body, then the rest will automatically become stronger.
quotes.author: Zhuangzi

quotes.quote: Train insane or remain the same.
quotes.author: Jillian Michaels

quotes.quote: Exercise is like an addiction. Once you're in it, you feel like your body needs it.
quotes.author: Elsa Pataky

quotes.quote: I have to exercise in the morning before my brain figures out what I'm doing.
quotes.author: Marsha Doble

quotes.quote: A lack of exercise robs the body of an essential ingredient.
quotes.author: Karen Sessions

quotes.quote: It is exercise alone that supports the spirits, and keeps the mind in vigor.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: In training, you listen to your body. In competition, you tell your body to shut up.
quotes.author: Rich Froning Jr

quotes.quote: Those who do not find time for exercise will have to find time for illness.
quotes.author: Earl of Derby

quotes.quote: It's Your Workout, Your Time, Your Body, Own It.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Movement is a medicine for creating change in a person's physical, emotional, and mental states.
quotes.author: Carol Welch

quotes.quote: Any workout which does not involve a certain minimum of danger or responsibility does not improve the body - it just wears it out.
quotes.author: Norman Mailer

quotes.quote: You're not going to get the butt you want...by sitting on it.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Strong people are harder to kill than weak people and more useful in general.
quotes.author: Mark Rippetoe

quotes.quote: bear, however hard he tries, grows tubby without exercise.
quotes.author: A.A. Milne

quotes.quote: The first wealth is health.Â
quotes.author: Emerson

quotes.quote: The last three or four reps is what makes the muscle grow. This area of pain divides the champion from someone else who is not a champion.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: The hardest thing about exercise is to start doing it. Once you are doing exercise regularly, the hardest thing is to stop it.
quotes.author: Erin Gray

quotes.quote: Take care of your body with steadfast fidelity. The soul must see through these eyes alone, and if they are dim, the whole world is clouded.
quotes.author: Goethe

quotes.quote: Fitness is like marriage. You can't cheat on it and expect it to work.
quotes.author: Bonnie Pfiester

quotes.quote: When it comes to eating right and exercising, there is no â€˜I'll start tomorrow.' Tomorrow is disease.
quotes.author: V.L. Allinear

quotes.quote: No matter how slow you go, you are still lapping everybody on the couch.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: He who does not mind his belly, will hardly mind anything else.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Health and good estate of body are above all gold, and a strong body above infinite wealth.
quotes.author: Ecclesiasticus 30:15

quotes.quote: We are forever indebted to those who have given their lives that we might be free.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: On the battlefield, the military pledges to leave no soldier behind. As a nation, let it be our pledge that when they return home, we leave no veteran behind.
quotes.author: Dan Lipinski

quotes.quote: Military simulation is an important way of training people for an emergency.
quotes.author: Greg Gutfeld

quotes.quote: Military confrontation is not a suitable alternative in confronting terror and current security threats.
quotes.author: Jalal Talabani

quotes.quote: Military missions cannot be a normal tool of politics, but instead must remain the great exception.
quotes.author: Guido Westerwelle

quotes.quote: These fallen heroes represent the character of a nation who has a long history of patriotism and honor and a nation who has fought many battles to keep our country free from threats of terror.
quotes.author: Michael N. Castle

quotes.quote: War is much too serious a matter to be entrusted to the military.
quotes.author: Georges Clemenceau

quotes.quote: Moments of thinking are your military moments because they are the moments where you take the opportunity to attack and eliminate your problems!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: A man does not have himself killed for a half-pence a day or for a petty distinction. You must speak to the soul in order to electrify him.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: The harder the conflict, the more glorious the triumph.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: Military commanders do not want to be tried for war crimes, even if those crimes are committed online.
quotes.author: Evgeny Morozov

quotes.quote: When things go wrong in your command, start wading for the reason in increasing larger concentric circles around your own desk.
quotes.author: General Bruce D. Clark

quotes.quote: In a military operation, the command and control elements are a legitimate target.
quotes.author: Stephen Hadley

quotes.quote: Military power wins battles, but spiritual power wins wars.
quotes.author: George C. Marshall

quotes.quote: The true soldier fights not because he hates what is in front of him, but because he loves what is behind him.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: A true leader has the confidence to stand alone, the courage to make tough decisions, and the compassion to listen to the needs of others. He does not set out to be a leader, but becomes one by the equality of his actions and the integrity of his intent.
quotes.author: Douglas Macarthur

quotes.quote: The military wants a system that protects its policies and privileges.
quotes.author: Benazir Bhutto

quotes.quote: Our military plans should be based on the assumption of unpredictability, rather than on carefully drawn, static models of the world.
quotes.author: James Fallows

quotes.quote: The brave die never, though they sleep in dust: Their courage nerves a thousand living men.
quotes.author: Minot J. Savage

quotes.quote: These military devices, leading to victory, must not be divulged beforehand.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: A leader is the man who has the ability to get other people to do what they don't want to do, and like it.
quotes.author: Harry S. Truman

quotes.quote: Our military and the strength of our military and the strengthening of our military is a number one priority for the Trump administration.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: The soldier is the Army. No army is better than its soldiers. The Soldier is also a citizen. In fact, the highest obligation and privilege of citizenship is that of bearing arms for one's country
quotes.author: George S. Patton

quotes.quote: The good general is simply the good company commander in his post-graduate course. The idea that more godlike qualities are required of him and that he above others can achieve miracles through the working of his will is dismissed as idle superstition.
quotes.author: S.L.A. Marshall

quotes.quote: Military glory the attractive rainbow that rises in showers of blood.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Never yield to the apparently overwhelming might of the enemy.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: When a stupid man is doing something he is ashamed of, he always declares that it is his duty.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Also remember that in any man's dark hour, a pat on the back and an earnest handclasp may work a small miracle
quotes.author: S.L.A Marshall

quotes.quote: Stand your ground. Don't fire unless fired upon, but if they mean to have a war, let it begin here!
quotes.author: John Parker

quotes.quote: The object of war is not to die for your country but to make the other bastard die for his.
quotes.author: George S. Patton

quotes.quote: I don't have a runner's body, but I have a runner's heart and that is all you need.
quotes.author: Jennifer Morris

quotes.quote: Running is a road to self-awareness and reliance-you can push yourself to extremes and learn the harsh reality of your physical and mental limitations or coast quietly down a solitary path watching the earth spin beneath your feet.
quotes.author: Doris Brown Heritage

quotes.quote: Run often. Run long. But never outrun your joy of running.
quotes.author: Julie Isphording

quotes.quote: Running should be a lifelong activity. Approach it patiently and intelligently, and it will reward you for a long, long time.
quotes.author: Michael Sargent

quotes.quote: Anybody can be a runner. We were meant to move. We were meant to run. It's the easiest sport.
quotes.author: Bill Rodgers

quotes.quote: We run, not because we think it is doing us good, but because we enjoy it and cannot help ourselves.
quotes.author: Roger Bannister

quotes.quote: Running has taught me to always push forward, especially in the most difficult times.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: All you need is the courage to believe in yourself and put one foot in front of the other.
quotes.author: Kathrine Switzer

quotes.quote: Go fast enough to get there, but slow enough to see.
quotes.author: Jimmy Buffett

quotes.quote: Every day is a good day when you run.
quotes.author: Kevin Nelson

quotes.quote: The race does not always go to the swift, but to the ones who keep running.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Remember, the feeling you get from a good run is far better than the feeling you get from sitting around wishing you were running.
quotes.author: Sarah Condor

quotes.quote: Life is shortâ€¦ running makes it seem longer.
quotes.author: Baron Hansen

quotes.quote: I don't run because I love the feeling of running. I run because it makes me love the feeling of living.
quotes.author: Bonnie Pfiester

quotes.quote: Have you ever felt worse after a run?
quotes.author: George Sheehan

quotes.quote: The obsession with running is really an obsession with the potential for more and more life.
quotes.author: George Sheehan

quotes.quote: If you want to run a mile, then run a mile. If you want to experience another life, run a marathon.
quotes.author: Emil Zatopek

quotes.quote:
That's the thing about running: your greatest runs are rarely
measured by racing success. They are moments in time when running allows you to see how wonderful your life is.
quotes.author: Kara Goucher

quotes.quote: If one could run without getting tired I don't think one would often want to do anything else.
quotes.author: C.S Lewis

quotes.quote: Run in the morning â€¦ before your brain figures out what your body is doing!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Running teaches us to keep moving forward, one step at a time, especially in the most painful moments.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Running is a big question mark that's there each and every day. It asks you, â€œAre you going to be a wimp or are you going to be strong today.
quotes.author: Peter Maher

quotes.quote: Run like there's a hot guy in front of you and a creepy one behind you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: In running, it doesn't matter whether you come in first, in the middle of the pack, or last. You can say, 'I have finished.' There is a lot of satisfaction in that.
quotes.author: Fred Lebow

quotes.quote: When you have running goals you have hope and when you have hope you have everything.
quotes.author: Felicity Luckey

quotes.quote: Exerting yourself to the fullest within your individual limits: that's the essence of running, and a metaphor for life
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: Good things come slow, especially in distance running.
quotes.author: Bill Dellinger

quotes.quote: Act enthusiastic about running and you will be enthusiastic.
quotes.author: Felicity Luckey

quotes.quote: You don't stop running because you get old, you get old because you stop running.
quotes.author: Christopher McDougall

quotes.quote: You don't have to be fast. But you'd better be fearless.
quotes.author: Christopher McDougall

quotes.quote: Never say never because limits, like fears, are often just an illusion.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: Set your goals high, and don't stop till you get there.
quotes.author: Bo Jackson

quotes.quote: Run when you can, walk if you have to, crawl if you must; just never give up.
quotes.author: Dean Karnazes

quotes.quote: Don't give up at half time. Concentrate on winning the second half.
quotes.author: Bear Bryant

quotes.quote: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.quote: I hated every minute of training, but I said, 'Don't quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: You win some, you lose some, and some get rained out, but you gotta suit up for them all.
quotes.author: J. Askenberg

quotes.quote: The turning point in the process of growing up is when you discover the core of strength within you that survives all hurt.
quotes.author: Max Lerner

quotes.quote: My jump was imperfect, my run-in was too short and my hands were too far back at takeoff. When I manage to iron out these faults, I am sure I can improve.
quotes.author: Sergei Bubka

quotes.quote: Daring ideas are like chessmen moved forward; they may be beaten, but they may start a winning game.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Being defeated is often a temporary condition. Giving up is what makes it permanent.
quotes.author: Marilyn vos Savant

quotes.quote: Champions do not become champions when they win the event, but in the hours, weeks, months and years they spend preparing for it. The victorious performance itself is merely the demonstration of their championship character.
quotes.author: T. Alan Armstrong

quotes.quote: Hard work beats talent when talent fails to work hard.
quotes.author: Kevin Wayne Durant

quotes.quote: A boy comes to me with a spark of interest. I feed the spark and it becomes a flame. I feed the flame and it becomes a fire. I feed the fire and it becomes a roaring blaze.
quotes.author: Cus D'amato

quotes.quote: Anyone can support a team that is winning - it takes no courage. But to stand behind a team to defend a team when it is down and really needs you, that takes a lot of courage.
quotes.author: Bart Starr

quotes.quote: You are never really playing an opponent. You are playing yourself, your own highest standards, and when you reach your limits, that is real joy.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.quote: Never let your head hang down. Never give up and sit down and grieve. Find another way.
quotes.author: Satchel Paige

quotes.quote: Champions aren't made in the gyms. Champions are made from something they have deep inside them - a desire, a dream, a vision.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: The pitcher has got only a ball. I've got a bat. So the percentage of weapons is in my favor and I let the fellow with the ball do the fretting.
quotes.author: Hank Aaron

quotes.quote: The harder you work, the harder it is to surrender.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Competing in sports has taught me that if I'm not willing to give 120 percent, somebody else will.
quotes.author: Ron Blomberg

quotes.quote: The strength of the group is the strength of the leaders.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Ask not what your teammates can do for you. Ask what you can do for your teammates.
quotes.author: Magic Johnson

quotes.quote: If you train hard, you'll not only be hard, you'll be hard to beat.
quotes.author: Herschel Walker

quotes.quote: Victory is in having done your best. If you've done your best, you've won.
quotes.author: Bill Bowerman

quotes.quote: The key is not the will to win. Everybody has that. It is the will to prepare to win that is important.
quotes.author: Bobby Knight

quotes.quote: It does not matter how many times you get knocked down, but how many times you get up.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Show me a guy who's afraid to look bad, and I'll show you a guy you can beat every time.
quotes.author: Lou Brock

quotes.quote: Leadership, like coaching, is fighting for the hearts and souls of men and getting them to believe in you.
quotes.author: Eddie Robinson

quotes.quote: Winning is not a sometime thing; it's an all the time thing. You don't win once in a while; you don't do things right once in a while; you do them right all of the time. Winning is a habit.
quotes.author: Coach Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Real success is finding your lifework in the work that you love.
quotes.author: David McCullough

quotes.quote: Take up one idea. Make that one idea your life - think of it, dream of it, live on that idea. Let the brain, muscles, nerves, every part of your body, be full of that idea, and just leave every other idea alone. This is the way to success.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: Where there is a will, there is a way. If there is a chance in a million that you can do something, anything, to keep what you want from ending, do it. Pry the door open or, if need be, wedge your foot in that door and keep it open.
quotes.author: Pauline Kael

quotes.quote: Do the things you like to be happier, stronger & more successful. Only so is hard work replaced by dedication.
quotes.author: Rossana Condoleo

quotes.quote: The price of success is hard work, dedication to the job at hand, and the determination that whether we win or lose, we have applied the best of ourselves to the task at hand.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Do your work with your whole heart, and you will succeedâ€”there's so little competition.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: If your dream is a big dream, and if you want your life to work on the high level that you say you do, there's no way around doing the work it takes to get you there.â€
quotes.author: Joyce Chapman

quotes.quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Concentrate on your job and you will forget your other troubles.
quotes.author: William Feather

quotes.quote: To accomplish great things, we must not only act, but also dream, not only plan, but also believe.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: There is no substitute for hard work.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: The power of one, if fearless and focused, is formidable, but the power of many working together is better.
quotes.author: Gloria Macapagal Arroyo

quotes.quote: Work as though you would live forever, and live as though you would die today.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: I've learned from experience that if you work harder at it, and apply more energy and time to it, and more consistency, you get a better result. It comes from the work.
quotes.author: Louis C. K.

quotes.quote: When you fail you learn from the mistakes you made and it motivates you to work even harder.
quotes.author: Natalie Gulbis

quotes.quote: The only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: The three great essentials to achieve anything worthwhile are, first, hard work; second, stick-to-itiveness; third, common sense.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: Attempt the impossible in order to improve your work.
quotes.author: Bette Davis

quotes.quote: Those people who develop the ability to continuously acquire new and better forms of knowledge that they can apply to their work and to their lives will be the movers and shakers in our society for the indefinite future.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Start by doing what's necessary, then what's possible; and suddenly you are doing the impossible.
quotes.author: Saint Francis

quotes.quote: Let's never be afraid to get our hands dirty, because we must not miss that big opportunity for advancement because it's dressed up in hard work clothes.
quotes.author: Joe

quotes.quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Success is a function of persistence and doggedness and the willingness to work hard for twenty-two minutes to make sense of something that most people would give up on after thirty seconds.
quotes.author: Alan Schoenfeld

quotes.quote: Your ability to discipline yourself to set clear goals, and then to work toward them every day, will do more to guarantee your success than any other single factor.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Keep away from people who try to belittle your ambitions. Small people always do that, but the really great make you feel that you, too, can become great.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: No person who is enthusiastic about his work has anything to fear from life.
quotes.author: Samuel Goldwyn

quotes.quote: Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: At work don't hunt or wait for opportunities, instead let's make them ourselves and we'll be rewarded in no time. Success always finds those who help themselves.
quotes.author: Joe

quotes.quote: If you wish to achieve worthwhile things in your personal and career life, you must become a worthwhile person in your own self-development.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Work hard for what you want because it won't come to you without a fight. You have to be strong and courageous and know that you can do anything you put your mind to. If somebody puts you down or criticizes you, just keep on believing in yourself and turn it into something positive.
quotes.author: Leah LaBelle

quotes.quote: Once you've wrestled, everything else in life is easy.
quotes.author: Dan Gable

quotes.quote: The only thing that matters in wrestling are your teeth and your testicles. Anything else, keep wrestling, stop whining.
quotes.author: Gary Dierks

quotes.quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Art and nature shall always be wrestling until they eventually conquer one another so that the victory is the same stroke and line: that which is conquered, conquers at the same time.
quotes.author: Maria Sibylla Merian

quotes.quote: More enduringly than any other sport, wrestling teaches self-control and pride. Some have wrestled without great skill - none have wrestled without pride.
quotes.author: Dan Gable

quotes.quote: If Shakespeare was alive today he would be writing wrestling shows.
quotes.author: Chris Jericho

quotes.quote: Wrestling and acting couldn't be anymore different in terms of what it takes to entertain. Wrestling is explosion, acting is implosion. One really screws up the other.
quotes.author: Roddy Piper

quotes.quote: Take a strong wrestler, get them tired, and they aren't as strong. Take a quick wrestler, get them tired, and they aren't as quick. Take a technical wrestler, get them tired, and they aren't as technical. No matter what kind of wrestler, everyone is afraid of getting tired. It's those who learn to perform when they're tired that find success.
quotes.author: Jay Robinson

quotes.quote: Wrestling is realer than reality TV.
quotes.author: Diamond Dallas Page

quotes.quote: In order to become a wrestler, one should have the strength of a weight-lifter, the agility of an acrobat, the endurace of a runner and the tactical mind of a chess master.
quotes.author: Alexander Medved

quotes.quote: There are no tough guys in wrestling.
quotes.author: Randy Savage

quotes.quote: To be a great champion you must believe you are the best. If you're not, pretend you are.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: A man can be as great as he wants to be. If you believe in yourself and have the courage, the determination, the dedication, the competitive drive and if you are willing to sacrifice the little things in life and pay the price for the things that are worthwhile, it can be done.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Never wrestle with a strong man nor bring a rich man to court.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Wrestling will be around forever. It's been around thousands of years. It's going to be around till the end of time.
quotes.author: Mark Schultz

quotes.quote: Wrestling's a form of expression, and it expresses vastness.
quotes.author: John Darnielle

quotes.quote: We can wrestle sometimes and see who is OK and who is KO.
quotes.author: Natalya Vorobyova

quotes.quote: Never stop fighting till the fight is done!
quotes.author: Elliot Ness

quotes.quote: War has rules, mud wrestling has rules - politics has no rules.
quotes.author: Ross Perot

quotes.quote: Everybody's out there wrestling like a robot.
quotes.author: Hulk Hogan

quotes.quote: Wrestling is ballet with violence.
quotes.author: Jesse Ventura

quotes.quote: As a fighter, you need to constantly improve. So that's what we've been doing: constantly improving striking, grappling, wrestling - there's always different aspects to improve.
quotes.author: Alistair Overeem

quotes.quote: Anyone can wrestle until they are tired.
quotes.author: Cael Sanderson

quotes.quote: Wrestling is not an action; it is a sport.
quotes.author: Anushka Sharma

quotes.quote: Wrestling is a little like wrestling a gorilla. You don't quit when you are tired, you quit when the gorilla is tired.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: He that wrestles with us strengthens our nerves and sharpens our skill. Our antagonist is our helper.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: Wrestling teaches you nothing comes easy. Nothing in life comes easy, so you have to work at it.
quotes.author: Mike Sullivan

quotes.quote: There's no drama like wrestling.
quotes.author: Kane

quotes.quote: Wrestling needs to be about the art form again. It needs to be about painting a picture and having a really good match.
quotes.author: Terry Gene Bollea

quotes.quote: A man's motive in the small actions of daily life, like resting a moment on his pitchfork in the sun and listening intently, may be the most important thing about that man.
quotes.author: Haniel Long

quotes.quote: How to gain, how to keep, how to recover happiness is in fact for most men at all times the secret motive of all they do, and of all they are willing to endure.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: We do a lot of things for reasons besides profit motive. We want to leave the world better than we found it.
quotes.author: Tim Cook

quotes.quote: Men sometimes have strange motives for the things they do.
quotes.author: Matthew Hopkins

quotes.quote: The only motive strong enough to induce men to exercise the self control required by the religion of Jesus is love.
quotes.author: Marion G. Romney

quotes.quote: The distance is nothing when one has a motive.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: No motive is pure. No one is good or bad-but a hearty mix of both. And sometimes life actually gives to you by taking away.
quotes.author: Carrie Fisher

quotes.quote: Love provides the motive for obeying the commands of the law, but the law provides specific direction for exercising love.
quotes.author: Jerry Bridges

quotes.quote: Life always take on the character of its motive.
quotes.author: J. G. Holland

quotes.quote: The true worth of a soul is revealed as much by the motive it attributes to the actions of others as by its own deeds.
quotes.author: John Petit-Senn

quotes.quote: It's motive alone which gives character to the actions of men.
quotes.author: Jean De La Bruyere

quotes.quote: The fundamental motive of true teaching is the love that seeks and studies and performs.
quotes.author: Robert Grudin

quotes.quote: Vanity is a motive of immense potency.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: The noblest motive is the public good.
quotes.author: Virgil

quotes.quote: Our motives and thoughts ultimately influence our actions.
quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quotes.quote: The motive of fear is the be-all and end-all of religion.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Pure motives can never justify impure or violent action.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: It is motive alone that gives real value to the actions of men, and disinterestedness puts the cap to it
quotes.author: Jean De La Bruyere

quotes.quote: One of the strongest motives for wishing to work on yourself is the realization that you may die at any moment - only you must first realize this.
quotes.author: G. I. Gurdjieff

quotes.quote: A wrong motive involves defeat.
quotes.author: Mary Baker Eddy

quotes.quote: Motive is never easy. Sometimes it occurs to one only later.
quotes.author: John Hawkes

quotes.quote: In general, we do well to let an opponent's motives alone. We are seldom just to them. Our own motives on such occasions are often worse than those we assail.
quotes.author: W. E. Channing

quotes.quote: Never ascribe to an opponent motives meaner than your own.
quotes.author: John M. Barrie

quotes.quote: The motive power is the cause of all life.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Pure motives do not insure perfect results.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.quote: An action is essentially good if the motive of the agent be good, regardless of the consequences.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: The key to motivation is motive. It's the why. It's the deeper yes! burning inside that makes it easier to say no to the less important.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: To exercise some sort of control over others is the secret motive of every selfish person.
quotes.author: Wallace D. Wattles

quotes.quote: But if we never acted except when we were certain our motives were pure, we would never act at all.
quotes.author: C.J. Sansom

quotes.quote: People have motives and thoughts of which they are unaware.
quotes.author: Albert Ellis

quotes.quote: I'm a bit of a speed demon. I ride my motorbike every weekend. I've had bikes since I was a kid and my 11-year-old brother, who's like my son, has an identical motocross bike to me, except smaller. Everything I do he wants to do.
quotes.author: Kelvin Fletcher

quotes.quote: Anybody can jump a motorcycle. The trouble begins when you try to land it.
quotes.author: Evel Knievel

quotes.quote: Motor racing can never be totally safe and it never should be in my opinion.
quotes.author: Murray Walker

quotes.quote: With motocross I've found that passion becomes your identity and that identity breaks all barriers.
quotes.author: Travis Pastrana

quotes.quote: Do I race motorcycles? I do. I use the word 'race' because, I admit, what I do on a motocross bike is different than riding a Harley down the street.
quotes.author: Jeff Kent

quotes.quote: In racing, they say that your car goes where your eyes go. The driver who cannot tear his eyes away from the wall as he spins out of control will meet that wall; the driver who looks down the track as he feels his tires break free will regain control of his vehicle.
quotes.author: Garth Stein

quotes.quote: There's a lot of dangerous sports. You know, my opinion, football is the most dangerous sport there is. After that I'll give it to probably boxing. Then there's some other extreme sports out there, motocross where you're really risking your neck every time you go out there and do it.
quotes.author: Jon Jones

quotes.quote: Balance, or drivability, and the ability to accelerate while cornering are more important than maximum cornering power - every time. Until you reach teh top levels of professional motor racing you will achieve more results by optimizing the package that you have than by redesigning it.
quotes.author: Carroll Smith

quotes.quote: A motorcycle coming down from 30 feet at 70 mph gives you a terrible jolt.
quotes.author: Evel Knievel

quotes.quote: The best way to make a small fortune in racing is to start with a big one.
quotes.author: Junior Johnson

quotes.quote: Driving a motorcycle is like flying. All your senses are alive. When I ride through Beverly Hills in the early morning, and all the sprinklers have turned off, the scents that wash over me are just heavenly. Being House is like flying, too. You're free of the gravity of what people think.
quotes.author: Hugh Laurie

quotes.quote: A motorcycle is an independent thing.
quotes.author: Ryan Hurst

quotes.quote: Even in motocross, youre struggling to see people pass each other anymore. There seems to be one line in motocross.
quotes.author: Casey Stoner

quotes.quote: The older I get, the faster I was.
quotes.author: Charles Barkley

quotes.quote: Speed has never killed anyone, suddenly becoming stationaryâ€¦ that's what gets you.
quotes.author: Jeremy Clarkson

quotes.quote: I think there is no defending a title. You don't go into a season with a points advantage over anyone. So I don't think it's ever a title defence. I think you've got a different number on your bike, if you choose so, but everyone starts at zero again.
quotes.author: Casey Stoner

quotes.quote: To be a racing driver it's essential you have very good eyesight, and that's especially relevant at night. Your senses are heightened, you're travelling over 200mph, you need to focus on that 110-metre braking point and you have to have absolute faith and commitment in your driving.
quotes.author: Allan McNish

quotes.quote: Motocross is one of the most exciting forms of racing in the world.
quotes.author: Bryan Stealey

quotes.quote: Motocross races are run in both rain and sunshine. They usually involve close racing and lots of bumping. You might even see mind-blowing crashes! It is definitely not a sport for the timid.
quotes.author: Bryan Stealey

quotes.quote: If you're looking for thrills, you've come to the right place: motocross is one of the most exciting sports around.
quotes.author: Gary Freeman

quotes.quote: Racers need to be able to balance on the bike as well and control their speed on different parts of the track. Most of all they need a little courage: jumping a motocross bike is very exiting but scary too!
quotes.author: Gary Freeman

quotes.quote: Motocross is one of the most popular sports in the world. Riders race dirt bikes on outdoor courses with bumps, jumps, and sharp turns.
quotes.author: Jack David

quotes.quote: Dust flies as a pack of motocross races roars over a bumpy course. The riders lean right and left through the turns of the twisting course. Motocross racing is a tough sport.
quotes.author: Terri Sievert

quotes.quote: Motocross is an amazing way to have fun and keep fit.
quotes.author: Billie B. Brooklyn

quotes.quote: When you venture onto motocross track, you will encounter a variety of jumps that will challenge you.
quotes.author: Gary LaPlante

quotes.quote: Your best approach when racing motocross is to take every jump seriously and commit.
quotes.author: Gary LaPlante

quotes.quote: Motocross tracks are usually too crowded and present too many tough challenges right off the bat.
quotes.author: Gary LaPlante

quotes.quote: By far the most important piece of safety equipment for dirt biking is the helmet.
quotes.author: Gary LaPlante

quotes.quote: Even the best riders learn to ride on beginner bikes.
quotes.author: James Holter

quotes.quote: Beginner bikes are not built to handle big jumps, and they don't go as fast as race bikes.
quotes.author: James Holter

quotes.quote: I don't want a pickle, I just want ride on my motorcycle. I don't want to die, I just want a ride on my motorcycle.
quotes.author: Arlo Guthry

quotes.quote: When I'm riding my motorcycle, I'm glad to be alive. When I stop riding my motorcycle, I'm glad to be alive.
quotes.author: Neil Peart

quotes.quote: A woman who rides a motorcycle is in tune with the universe, a candidate for high adventure.
quotes.author: Celestine Sibley

quotes.quote: Anybody can jump a motorcycle. The trouble begins when you try to land it.
quotes.author: Evel Knievel

quotes.quote: Driving a motorcycle is like flying. All your senses are alive. Being House is like flying, too. He's free of the gravity of what people think.
quotes.author: Hugh Laurie

quotes.quote: You live more for five minutes going fast on a bike than other people do in all of their life.
quotes.author: Marco Simoncelli

quotes.quote: Passing my motorcycle theory test gave me a disproportionate feeling of greatness.
quotes.author: James McAvoy

quotes.quote: You do not need a therapist if you own a motorcycle, any kind of motorcycle!
quotes.author: Dan Aykroyd

quotes.quote: More books, more racing and more foolishness with cars and motorcycles are in the works.
quotes.author: Brock Yates

quotes.quote: I enjoy going on motorcycle trips and stopping in small towns and enjoying drinks with the locals.
quotes.author: George Clooney

quotes.quote: I want to ride my motorcycle up the side of the Luxor to the light and vanish.
quotes.author: Criss Angel

quotes.quote: I learned one thing from jumping motorcycles that was of great value on the golf course, the putting green especially: Whatever you do, don't come up short.
quotes.author: Evel Knievel

quotes.quote: Faster, faster, faster, until the thrill of speed overcomes the fear of death.
quotes.author: Hunter Thompson

quotes.quote: Try to remember the reason you started riding a motorcycle in the first place. For me, it was a couple of things but mostly rebellion.
quotes.author: Sonny Barger

quotes.quote: Love is the feeling you get when you like something as much as your motorcycle.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.quote: If I weren't doing what I'm doing today... I'd be traveling around the world on the back of a motorcycle.
quotes.author: Donna Karan

quotes.quote: It wasn't until I went to college and I got my first motorcycle that I understood the thrill of speed.
quotes.author: Vin Diesel

quotes.quote: I'm not the biggest motorcycle fan - they're cool and a lot of fun, but they're scary as well!
quotes.author: Taylor Lautner

quotes.quote: I look my best when I take my helmet off after a long motorcycle ride. I have a glow and a bit of helmet hair.
quotes.author: Eric Bana

quotes.quote: Note to self: Never ride a motorcycle in stilettos and a miniskirt.
quotes.author: Maggie Grace

quotes.quote: If you want to live a happy life, don't teach your wife how to drive a car or a motorcycle.
quotes.author: Junaid Jamshed

quotes.quote: I really love to ride my motorcycle. When I want to just get away and be by myself and clear my head, that's what I do.
quotes.author: Kyle Chandler

quotes.quote: And I to my motorcycle Parked like the soul of the junkyard Restored, a bicycle fleshed With power, and tore off Up Highway 106 continually Drunk on the wind in my mouth Wringing the handlebar for speed Wild to be wreckage forever.
quotes.author: James Dickey

quotes.quote: Although motorcycle riding is romantic, motorcycle maintenance is purely classic.
quotes.author: Robert M Pirsig

quotes.quote: That's all the motorcycle is, a system of concepts worked out in steel.
quotes.author: Robert M. Pirsig

quotes.quote: A motorcycle functions entirely in accordance with the laws of reason, and a study of the art of motorcycle maintenance is really a miniature study of the art of rationality itself.
quotes.author: Robert M. Pirsig

quotes.quote: Why are motorcycle dealers closed on Sundays? Because Sunday is for worship... Catholics go to church, Motorcyclists go to the track.
quotes.author: Justin Skalka

quotes.quote: Motorcycle adventures are the perfect antidote to middle age.
quotes.author: Alex Morritt

quotes.quote: Riding a motorcycle on today's highways, you have to ride in a very defensive manner. You have to be a good rider and you have to have both hands and both feet on the controls at all times.
quotes.author: Evel Knievel

quotes.quote: I try and stay limber, swim, run, ride motorcycles.
quotes.author: Matt Cameron

quotes.quote: I believe that the ascent of mountains forms an essential chapter in the complete duty of man, and that it is wrong to leave any district without setting foot on its highest peak.
quotes.author: Sir Leslie Stephen

quotes.quote: Mountains know secrets we need to learn. That it might take time, it might be hard, but if you just hold on long enough, you will find the strength to rise up.
quotes.author: Tyler Knott

quotes.quote: Mountains are not fair or unfair, they are just dangerous.
quotes.author: Reinhold Messner

quotes.quote: How glorious a greeting the sun gives the mountains!
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: Every mountain top is within reach if you just keep climbing.
quotes.author: Barry Finlay

quotes.quote: Over every mountain there is a path, although it may not be seen from the valley.
quotes.author: Theodore Roethke

quotes.quote: Somewhere between the bottom of the climb and the summit is the answer to the mystery why we climb.
quotes.author: Greg Child

quotes.quote: Its not the Mountain we conquer, but ourselves.
quotes.author: Edmund Hillary

quotes.quote: Great things are done when men and mountains meet; This is not done by jostling in the street.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Climb the mountain not to plant your flag, but to embrace the challenge, enjoy the air and behold the view. Climb it so you can see the world, not so the world can see you.
quotes.author: David McCullough Jr.

quotes.quote: Mountains have a way of dealing with overconfidence.
quotes.author: Nemann Buhl

quotes.quote: Mountains are not stadiums where I satisfy my ambition to achieve, they are the cathedrals where I practice my religion.
quotes.author: Anatoli Boukreev

quotes.quote: Each stone, each bend cries welcome to him. He identifies with the mountains and the streams, he sees something of his own soul in the plants and the animals and the birds of the field.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: I live not in myself, but I becom Portion of that around me: and to me High mountains are a feelin, but the hum of human cities torture.
quotes.author: George Byron

quotes.quote: Mountains are only a problem when they are bigger than you. You should develop yourself so much that you become bigger than the mountains you face.
quotes.author: Idowu Koyenikan

quotes.quote: Climb the mountains and get their good tidings.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: Although I deeply love oceans, deserts and other wild landscapes, it is only mountains that beckon me with that sort of painful magnetic pull to walk deeper and deeper into their beauty. They keep me continuously wanting to know more, feel more, see more.
quotes.author: Victoria Erickson

quotes.quote: I'm the sort of person who needs a big mountain in front of me to climb.
quotes.author: Katarina Witt

quotes.quote: The way up to the top of the mountain is always longer than you think. Don't fool yourself, the moment will arrive when what seemed so near is still very far.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Each fresh peak ascended teaches something.
quotes.author: Sir Martin Convay

quotes.quote: The cliche is that life is a mountain. You go up, reach the top and then go down.
quotes.author: Jeanne Moreau

quotes.quote: Mountains are the beginning and the end of all natural scenery.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: When we tire of well-worn ways, we seek for new. This restless craving in the souls of men spurs them to climb, and to seek the mountain view.
quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quotes.quote: Purposes, plans, and achievements of men may all disappear like yon cloud upon the mountain's summit; but, like the mountain itself, the things which are of God shall stand fast for ever and ever.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: The mountains have rules. they are harsh rules, but they are there, and if you keep to them you are safe. A mountain is not like men. A mountain is sincere. The weapons to conquer it exist inside you, inside your soul.
quotes.author: Walter Bonatti

quotes.quote: Jumping from boulder to boulder and never falling, with a heavy pack, is easier than it sounds; you just can't fall when you get into the rhythm of the dance.
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

quotes.quote: We are now in the mountains and they are in us, kindling enthusiasm, making every nerve quiver, filling every pore and cell of us.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: Those who travel to mountain-tops are half in love with themselves, and half in love with oblivion.
quotes.author: Robert Macfarlane

quotes.quote: He who climbs upon the highest mountains laughs at all tragedies, real or imaginary.
quotes.author: Friedrich Neitzsche

quotes.quote: I like the mountains because they make me feel small. They help me sort out what's important in life.
quotes.author: Mark Obmascik

quotes.quote: Climb the mountains and get their good tidings. Nature's peace will flow into you as sunshine flows into trees.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: Mountaineering is a relentless pursuit. One climbs further and further yet never reaches the destination. Perhaps that is what gives it its own particular charm. One is constantly searching for something never to be found.
quotes.author: Hermann Buhl

quotes.quote: The mountain decides whether you climb or not. The art of mountaineering is knowing when to go, when to stay, and when to retreat.
quotes.author: Ed Viesturs

quotes.quote: Mountaineering as a sport both emanates from and addresses itself back to and back against the normal patterns of middle class life. One of the dominant discourses of mountaineering positions it critically against bourgeois existence, even as the sport demands the resources made possible by such an existence.
quotes.author: Sherry B. Ortner

quotes.quote: Classic mountaineering grows out of a traditional romantic imagination. Its heart is the feeling, its path is blood, sweat and tears, and its restriction is God.
quotes.author: Wojciech Kurtyka

quotes.quote: In mountaineering, if we look for private experience rather than public history, even getting to the top becomes an optional narrative rather than the main point, and those who only wander in high places become part of the story.
quotes.author: Rebecca Solnit

quotes.quote: Difficult struggle in mountaineering is our rise above himself, is the voice of freedom.
quotes.author: Wojciech Kurtyka

quotes.quote: Those who travel to mountain-tops are half in love with themselves, and half in love with oblivion.
quotes.author: Robert Macfarlane

quotes.quote: Climbing a mountain represents a chance to be briefly free oneself of the small concerns of our common lives, to strip off nonessentials, to come down to the core of life itself. Food, shelter, and friends these are the essentials, these plus faith and purpose and a deep and unrelenting determination.
quotes.author: Mateo Cabello

quotes.quote: Mountaineering is the art of getting up mountains by foot and occasionally by hand, and though the climbing is usually emphasized, most ascents are mostly a matter of walking and since good climbers climb with their legs as much as possible, climbing could be called the art of taking a vertical walk.
quotes.author: Rebecca Solnit

quotes.quote: Mountaineering is a complex and unique way of life, interweaving elements of sport, art and mysticism. Success or failure depends on the ebb and flow of immense inspiration. Detecting a single rule governing this energy is difficult it arises and vanishes like the urge to dance and remains as mysterious as the phenomenon of life itself.
quotes.author: Wojciech Kurtyka

quotes.quote: To be a climber one has to accept that gratification is rarely immediate.
quotes.author: Bernadette McDonald

quotes.quote: Inner harmony is the prerequisite for any climber who seeks to push the frontiers; without it he should give up extreme mountaineering.
quotes.author: Bernadette McDonald

quotes.quote: Climbing to the top demands strength, whether it is to the top of Mount Everest or to the top of your career.
quotes.author: Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: Mountaineering is one of the most difficult sports we are away from routine life for days, living in tents, and it requires high degree of physical and mental strength.
quotes.author: Samina Baig

quotes.quote: Mountaineers are one of the few groups to celebrate before the finish line. More mountaineers die on the descent than on the ascent.
quotes.author: Susan Oakey-Baker

quotes.quote: One for the mouse, one for the crow, one to rot, one to grow.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The best-laid plans of mice and comedians usually wind up on the cutting-room floor.
quotes.author: Jon Stewart

quotes.quote: A mouse is small and can go unnoticed: but there is no limit to what a brave heart and a fearless spirit can achieve.
quotes.author: Brian Jacques

quotes.quote: The mouse that always trusts to one poor hol can never be a mouse of any soul.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: A mouse can be just as dangerous as a bullet or a bomb.
quotes.author: Lamar S Smith

quotes.quote: If a rat is a good model for your emotional life, you're in big trouble.
quotes.author: Robert M. Sapolsky

quotes.quote: A mouse who wishes to fool the cat doesn't simply scamper out of its hole whenever it feels the slightest urge.
quotes.author: Arthur Golden

quotes.quote: Mice are very difficult to do front on, but they have nicely human little hands and feet, and whiskers and tails are great for expressing emotion.
quotes.author: Helen Craig

quotes.quote: Rodents can come across as being quite vacant in the personality stakes.
quotes.author: Julian Clary

quotes.quote: A mouse never entrusts his life to only one hole.
quotes.author: Plautus

quotes.quote: The rats we met the size of small dogs and they watched us go by like they'd figured out that what People were for was feeding rats.
quotes.author: Sarah Monette

quotes.quote: The mouse that always trusts to one poor hole can never be a mouse of any soul.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: A little mouse of thought appears in the room, and even the mightiest potentates are thrown into panic. They make frantic efforts to bar our thoughts and words; they are afraid of the workings of the human mind.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The mouse that hath but one hole is quickly taken.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: Only a rat can win a rat race.
quotes.author: Michael Franti

quotes.quote: The mouse is a fair treat but this one would talk the hind legs off a donkey.
quotes.author: C S Lewis

quotes.quote: Rats and roaches live by competition under the laws of supply and demand; it is the privilege of human beings to live under the laws of justice and mercy.
quotes.author: Wendell Berry

quotes.quote: If one mouse is a spark then ten thousand are a conflagration.
quotes.author: Carmen Agra Deedy

quotes.quote: The history of using mice to stand in for humans in medical experiments is replete with failures.
quotes.author: Gary Wolf

quotes.quote: With the exception of certain rodents, no other vertebrate except Homo sapiens habitually destroys members of his own species.
quotes.author: Anthony Storr

quotes.quote: The mice which helplessly find themselves between the cats teeth acquire no merit from their enforced sacrifice.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: A rat in a maze is free to go anywhere, as long as it stays inside the maze.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: Mice are terribly chatty. They will chat about anything, and if there is nothing to chat about, they will chat about having nothing to chat about. Compared to mice, robins are reserved.
quotes.author: Robin McKinley

quotes.quote: Mice deficient in this protein, called p11, display depression-like behaviors, while those with sufficient amounts behave as if they have been treated with antidepressants.
quotes.author: Paul Greengard

quotes.quote: Really, in the market today, the most significant mover is the earnings. If earnings do well, the market will do well, if not, then the market won't.
quotes.author: Ram Kolluri

quotes.quote: To those who stay put, the world is but an imaginary place. But to the movers, the makers, and the shakers, the world is all around, an endless invitation.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: What is this love that more than all the cursed deadly or any other of its great movers so moves the soul and soul what is this soul that more than by any of its great movers is by love so moved?
quotes.author: Samuel Beckett

quotes.quote: It turns out that the grandest needle mover in your depth of control over your life is your outlook, the quality of the meaning you attach to the events in your life and your future. If this is true, it places you in a critical role in life â€“ to serve as guardian to and director of your outlook toward yourself, others, and the world.
quotes.author: Brendon Burchard

quotes.quote: The women are the movers and shakers in the community...they initiate things...they keep things going.
quotes.author: Pat O'Shane

quotes.quote: There must be must be a first mover existing above all â€“ and this we call God.
quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.quote: The changers. The movers. Those who stand behind civilization and push it forward. They do not seek to be accepted, even if their fight is for equality. You see, equality is not acceptance. Equality is insistence in the face of opposition, even if that means that you stand alone on your own two feet when all those around would rather rest on their knees.
quotes.author: M.B. Watson

quotes.quote: Let him that would move the world, first move himself.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: You are not a pawn in the chessgame of life, you are the mover of the pieces.
quotes.author: White Eagle

quotes.quote: Leadership calls for changing people's behavior. Influencers are those leaders who understand how to create rapid, profound, and sustainable behavior change.
quotes.author: Joseph Grenny

quotes.quote: The movers & shakers of the world are not imbued with special powers. Once you realize that, you too can attain your rightful mantle.
quotes.author: Mario J. Lucero

quotes.quote: Successful people are usually more lively than those who are unsuccessful. The quickening of the spirit they feel comes out of their creativity, and success detaches them from the more rigid outlook on life - it puts them in the flow. So the shakers and movers, by their very nature, are moving faster, taking more risks, and investing more in the world than their less active counterparts.
quotes.author: Stuart Wilde

quotes.quote: He who influences the thought of his times influences the times that follow.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: The movers and shakers have always been obsessive nuts.
quotes.author: Theodore Sturgeon

quotes.quote: Those people who develop the ability to continuously acquire new and better forms of knowledge that they can apply to their work and to their lives will be the movers and shakers in our society for the indefinite future.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: The movers and shakers on our planet, aren't the billionaires and generals, they are the incredible numbers of people around the world filled with love for neighbor and for the earth who are resisting, remaking, restoring, renewing and revitalising.
quotes.author: Bill McKibben

quotes.quote: Leaders instill in their people a hope for success and a belief in themselves. Positive leaders empower people to accomplish their goals.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Position yourself as a center of influence, the one who knows the movers and shakers. People will respond to that, and you'll soon become what you project.
quotes.author: Bob Burg

quotes.quote: Matter and energy moves itself. It has no exterior mover.
quotes.author: Jean Meslier

quotes.quote: There is no unmoving mover behind the movement. It is only movement. It is not correct to say that life is moving, but life is movement itself. Life and movement are not two different things. In other words, there is no thinker behind the thought. Thought itself is the thinker. If you remove the thought, there is no thinker to be found.
quotes.author: Walpola Rahula

quotes.quote: The two great movers of the human mind are the desire of good and the fear of evil.
quotes.author: Dr. Amit Abraham

quotes.quote: The future is taking shape now in our own beliefs and in the courage of our leaders. Ideas and leadership - not natural or social "forces" - are the prime movers in human affairs.
quotes.author: George Roche III

quotes.quote: The two prime movers in the Universe are Time and Luck.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: Leaders are creatures of their environment, but unlike most creatures, they are also movers of it. As movers of and within the organization, they push it forward, at the same time shaping it as much as it shapes them.
quotes.author: John Baldoni

quotes.quote: Influencersâ€Šâ€”â€Šthey're the best thing since sliced bread. But forget bread; they're selling like hot cakes. They're creating huge returns, and they're only set to keep growing!
quotes.author: Emily Warna

quotes.quote: The first mover is the mind.
quotes.author: Master Wei

quotes.quote: God always works with workers and moves with movers, but He does not sit with sitters.
quotes.author: Reinhard Bonnke

quotes.quote: Blessed is the influence of one true, loving human soul on another.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: The influential man is the successful man, whether he be rich or poor.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden
