quotes.quote: Movies are a complicated collision of literature, theatre, music and all the visual arts.
quotes.author: Yahoo Serious

quotes.quote: Movies can and do have tremendous influence in shaping young lives in the realm of entertainment towards the ideals and objectives of normal adulthood.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: A film is - or should be - more like music than like fiction. It should be a progression of moods and feelings. The theme, what's behind the emotion, the meaning, all that comes later.
quotes.author: Stanley Kubrick

quotes.quote: I don't take the movies seriously, and anyone who does is in for a headache.
quotes.author: Bette Davis

quotes.quote: Every great film should seem new every time you see it.
quotes.author: Roger Ebert

quotes.quote: The length of a film should be directly related to the endurance of the human bladder.
quotes.author: Alfred Hitchcock

quotes.quote: The secret to film is that it's an illusion.
quotes.author: George Lucas

quotes.quote: If my films don't show a profit, I know I'm doing something right.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Movies are like an expensive form of therapy for me.
quotes.author: Tim Burton

quotes.quote: The great art of films does not consist of descriptive movement of face and body but in the movements of thought and soul transmitted in a kind of intense isolation.
quotes.author: Louise Brooks

quotes.quote: A film is never really good unless the camera is an eye in the head of a poet.
quotes.author: Orson Welles

quotes.quote: A film is a petrified fountain of thought.
quotes.author: Jean Cocteau

quotes.quote: A good film is when the price of the dinner, the theatre admission and the babysitter were worth it.
quotes.author: Alfred Hitchcock

quotes.quote: The movies are the only business where you can go out front and applaud yourself.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: The movies we love and admire are to some extent a function of who we are when we see them.
quotes.author: Mary Schmich

quotes.quote: There's an electrical thing about movies.
quotes.author: Oliver Stone

quotes.quote: Learning to make films is very easy. Learning what to make films about is very hard.
quotes.author: George Lucas

quotes.quote: Movies are something people see all over the world because there is a certain need for it.
quotes.author: Wim Wenders

quotes.quote: Movies are an art form that is very available to the masses.
quotes.author: Richard King

quotes.quote: Nobody makes movies bad on purpose.
quotes.author: Roland Emmerich

quotes.quote: When you make a film you usually make a film about an idea.
quotes.author: Sydney Pollack

quotes.quote: In most movies there is a Prince Charming who rides up and saves the girl.
quotes.author: Zoe Lister-Jones

quotes.quote: Movies are the shadiest business in the world.
quotes.author: Jessica Alba

quotes.quote: Movies are not about the weekend that they're released, and in the grand scheme of things, that's probably the most unimportant time of a film's life.
quotes.author: Quentin Tarantino

quotes.quote: Movies can be instruments of enlightenment.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: Horror movies don't exist unless you go and see them, and people always will.
quotes.author: Joss Whedon

quotes.quote: Movies are hard work. The public doesn't see that. The critics don't see it. But they're a lot of work. A lot of work.
quotes.author: Robert De Niro

quotes.quote: Movies can't ruin books. They can only ruin movies.
quotes.author: S. E. Hinton

quotes.quote: I think movies glamorize violence, in the sense that they make it in a way that it's either cool or funny.
quotes.author: Matthew Vaughn

quotes.quote: It's not what a movie is about, it's how it is about it.
quotes.author: Roger Ebert

quotes.quote: A good-bye is never painful unless you're never going to say hello again.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Happy trails to you, until we meet again. Some trails are happy ones, others are blue. It's the way you ride the trail that counts, here's a happy one for you.
quotes.author: Dale Evans

quotes.quote: But fate ordains that dearest friends must part.
quotes.author: Edward Young

quotes.quote: Painful though parting be, I bow to you as I see you off to distant clouds.
quotes.author: Emperor Saga

quotes.quote: Don't be dismayed at goodbyes. A farewell is necessary before you can meet again. And meeting again, after moments or lifetime, is certain for those who are friends.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Man's feelings are always purest and most glowing in the hour of meeting and of farewell.
quotes.author: Jean Paul Richter

quotes.quote: Odd how much it hurts when a friend moves away- and leaves behind only silence.
quotes.author: Pam Brown

quotes.quote: Sometimes your friends are your lovers,or have been at one time
quotes.author: Axl Rose quote

quotes.quote: Be well, do good work, and keep in touch.
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.quote: Some people come into our lives and quickly go. Some stay for a while, leave footprints on our hearts, and we are never, ever the same.
quotes.author: Flavia Weedn

quotes.quote: Ever has it been that love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: We leave something of ourselves behind when we leave a place, we stay there, even though we go away. And there are things in us that we can find again only by going back there.
quotes.author: Pascal Mercier

quotes.quote: Never look back; you may only find what you left or let you go.
quotes.author: Stefanos Livos

quotes.quote: It may be that the satisfaction I need depends on my going away, so that when I've gone and come back, I'll find it at home.
quotes.author: Jalal ad-Din Rumi

quotes.quote: I am going away with him to an unknown country where I shall have no past and no name, and where I shall be born again with a new face and an untried heart.
quotes.author: Sidonie Gabrielle

quotes.quote: Sweet is the memory of distant friends! Like the mellow rays of the departing sun, it falls tenderly, yet sadly, on the heart.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: Time is a circus, always packing up and moving away.
quotes.author: Ben Hecht

quotes.quote: Its funny how people think moving away will make their life trouble and drama free.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: It is amazing how nice people are to you when they know you're going away.
quotes.author: Michael Arlen

quotes.quote: A house that does not have one worn, comfy chair in it is soulless.
quotes.author: May Sarton

quotes.quote: A man builds a fine house; and now he has a master, and a task for life: he is to furnish, watch, show it, and keep it in repair, the rest of his days.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The light is what guides you home, the warmth is what keeps you there.
quotes.author: Ellie Rodriguez

quotes.quote: I long, as does every human being, to be at home wherever I find myself.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: There's nothing half so pleasant as coming home again.
quotes.author: Margaret Elizabeth Sangster

quotes.quote: I am going awaywith him to an unknown country where I shall have no past and no name, and where I shall be born again with a new face and an untried heart.
quotes.author: Sidonie Gabrielle Colette

quotes.quote: I like working intensely, then going away and thinking about it, working out why it didn't work and then coming back to it. It makes the work richer, I think.
quotes.author: Miranda Otto

quotes.quote: It may be that the satisfaction I need depends on my going away, so that when I've gone and come back, I'll find it at home.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: There is a kind of magicness about going far away and then coming back all changed.
quotes.author: Kate Douglas Wiggin

quotes.quote: Never say goodbye because goodbye means going away and going away means forgetting.
quotes.author: J.M. Barrie

quotes.quote: Saying goodbye doesn't mean anything. It's the time we spent together that matters, not how we left it.
quotes.author: Trey Parker

quotes.quote: The truth is, unless you let go, unless you forgive yourself, unless you forgive the situation, unless you realize that the situation is over, you cannot move forward.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: It is always important to know when something has reached its end. Closing circles, shutting doors, finishing chapters, it doesn't matter what we call it; what matters is to leave in the past those moments in life that are over.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: The only thing a person can ever really do is keep moving forward. Take that big leap forward without hesitation, without once looking back. Simply forget the past and forge toward the future.
quotes.author: Alyson Noel

quotes.quote: As the year comes to an end, don't look back at yesterday's disappointment. Look ahead to God's promises yet to unfold.
quotes.author: Buky Ojelabi

quotes.quote: Stop focusing on your past mistakes. Don't be ashamed of the things that you've done. We ALL have made mistakes. Don't you see? All of those things helped shape you into the beautiful person that you are today! Hold your head up high because you didn't allow your past mistakes to consume you. You learned! You conquered! You became a better YOU. Be proud of who you are TODAY!
quotes.author: Stephanie Lahart

quotes.quote: Yesterday is not ours to recover, but tomorrow is ours to win or lose.
quotes.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quotes.quote: The only thing a person can ever really do is keep moving forward. Take that big leap forward without hesitation, without once looking back. Simply forget the past and forge toward the future.
quotes.author: Alyson Noel

quotes.quote: Some of us think holding on makes us strong, but sometimes it is letting go.
quotes.author: Herman Hesse

quotes.quote: You have to come to your closed doors before you get to your open doors... What if you knew you had to go through 32 closed doors before you got to your open door? Well, then you'd come to closed door number eight and you'd think, 'Great, I got another one out of the way'... Keep moving forward.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: In our culture, we grow up thinking that failure is a terrible thing, that it's a setback, or worse, the end. Often it turns out to be the beginning of something better.
quotes.author: Katherine Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: Breathe in the future, breathe out the past. No matter where you are or what you're going through, always believe that there is a light at the end of the tunnel. Never expect, assume, or demand. Just do your best, control the elements you can control, and then let it be. Because once you have done what you can, if it is meant to be, it will happen, or it will show you the next step that needs to be taken.
quotes.author: Marc Chernoff

quotes.quote: It's important to remember that whatever stage we are at in life, there is no need for regret. The process of regret is one that provides nothing but suffering for ourselves as we begin to allow the past to dictate how we should feel now. Instead, we can use the past as a reference point to understand what adjustments we would like to make moving forward. The adjustments do not have to come out of pain, sorrow, regret or judgment, but simply a choice to do things in a different way. We are learning all the time, we can very quickly slow that learning process down by getting stuck in the idea of regret. When it comes to making changes, be at peace with the past and remember that each moment is a new choice.
quotes.author: Joe Martino

quotes.quote: You may not control all the events that happen to you, but you can decide not to be reduced by them.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: The people who are good in the long run fail a lot, especially at the beginning. So, when you fail early, it might be worth realizing that this is part of the deal, the price you pay for being good in the long run. _Every rejection is a gift. A chance to learn and to do it better next time. An opportunity to figure out how to bounce, not break. Don't waste them.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: Don't dwell on what went wrong. Instead, focus on what to do next. Spend your energies on moving forward toward finding the answer.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: You can never regret anything you do in life. You kind of have to learn the lesson from whatever the experience is and take it with you on your journey forward.
quotes.author: Aubrey O'Day

quotes.quote: Press forward. Do not stop, do not linger in your journey, but strive for the mark set before you.
quotes.author: George Whitefield

quotes.quote: Losers live in the past. Winners learn from the past and enjoy working in the present toward the future.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: It takes strength to make your way through grief, to grab hold of life and let it pull you forward.
quotes.author: Patti Davis

quotes.quote: For years I kept a sign on my desk that helped me maintain the right perspective concerning yesterday. It simply said, 'yesterday ended last night'. It reminded me that no matter how badly I might have failed in the past, it's done, and today is a new day.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Mistakes should be examined, learned from, and discarded; not dwelled upon and stored.
quotes.author: Tim Fargo

quotes.quote: Moving forward is not always good, especially when there is a precipice ahead! Know to turn back! Know to step back! Sometimes moving backwards is moving forward!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: The quicker your forget unpleasant instances and forgive yourself or others for wrong deeds, the better are your chances of focusing on your aspirations and working towards them.
quotes.author: Vishwas Chavan

quotes.quote: When you get to the point where moving forward is the only thing your mind is willing to settle for, that's when amazing things start to unfold in your journey.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: Achievement seems to be connected with action. Successful men and women keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit.
quotes.author: Conrad Hilton

quotes.quote: Moving forward without honest efforts is moving backwards in disguise
quotes.author: Constance Chuks Friday

quotes.quote: Don't dwell on what went wrong. Instead, focus on what to do next. Spend your energies on moving forward toward finding the answer.
quotes.author: Denis E. Waitley

quotes.quote: Even though you may want to move forward in your life, you may have one foot on the brakes. In order to be free, we must learn how to let go. Release the hurt. Release the fear. Refuse to entertain your old pain. The energy it takes to hang onto the past is holding you back from a new life. What is it you would let go of today?
quotes.author: Mary Manin Morrissey

quotes.quote: Life moves forward. The old leaves wither, die and fall away, and the new growth extends forward into the light.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: When you're trying to motivate yourself, appreciate the fact that you're even thinking about making a change. And as you move forward, allow yourself to be good enough.
quotes.author: Alice Domar

quotes.quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Bad things do happen; how I respond to them defines my character and the quality of my life. I can choose to sit in perpetual sadness, immobilized by the gravity of my loss, or I can choose to rise from the pain and treasure the most precious gift I have - life itself.
quotes.author: Walter Anderson

quotes.quote: You build on failure. You use it as a stepping stone. Close the door on the past. You don't try to forget the mistakes, but you don't dwell on it. You don't let it have any of your energy, or any of your time, or any of your space.
quotes.author: Johnny Cash

quotes.quote: Forgiving does not erase the bitter past. A healed memory is not a deleted memory. Instead, forgiving what we cannot forget creates a new way to remember. We change the memory of our past into a hope for our future.
quotes.author: Lewis B. Smedes

quotes.quote: Every day is a new day, and you'll never be able to find happiness if you don't move on.
quotes.author: Carrie Underwood

quotes.quote: Don't dwell on what went wrong. Instead, focus on what to do next. Spend your energies on moving forward toward finding the answer.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Moving on, is a simple thing, what it leaves behind is hard.
quotes.author: Dave Mustaine

quotes.quote: It is only through labor and painful effort, by grim energy and resolute courage, that we move on to better things.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: We all have life storms, and when we get the rough times and we recover from them, we should celebrate that we got through it. No matter how bad it may seem, there's always something beautiful that you can find.
quotes.author: Mattie Stepanek

quotes.quote: You will find that it is necessary to let things go; simply for the reason that they are heavy. So let them go, let go of them. I tie no weights to my ankles.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: Letting go means to come to the realization that some people are a part of your history, but not a part of your destiny.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Sometimes the hardest part isn't letting go but rather learning to start over.
quotes.author: Nicole Sobon

quotes.quote: It is important that we forgive ourselves for making mistakes. We need to learn from our errors and move on.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: You can't look back - you just have to put the past behind you, and find something better in your future.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: Moving on is easy. It's staying moved on that's trickier.
quotes.author: Katerina Stoykova Klemer

quotes.quote: I demolish my bridges behind me...then there is no choice but to move forward
quotes.author: Fridtjof Nansen

quotes.quote: Yesterday is not ours to recover, but tomorrow is ours to win or lose.
quotes.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quotes.quote: The truth is, unless you let go, unless you forgive yourself, unless you forgive the situation, unless you realize that the situation is over, you cannot move forward.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Sooner or later we've all got to let go of our past.
quotes.author: Dan Brown

quotes.quote: The only thing a person can ever really do is keep moving forward. Take that big leap forward without hesitation, without once looking back. Simply forget the past and forge toward the future.
quotes.author: Alyson Noel

quotes.quote: We must be willing to let go of the life we've planned, so as to have the life that is waiting for us.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: I can choose to let it define me, confine me, refine me, outshine me - or I can choose to move on and leave them behind me.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Getting over a painful experience is much like crossing monkey bars. You have to let go at some point in order to move forward.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: In order to move on, you must understand why you felt what you did and why you no longer need to feel it.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: What's done is done. What's gone is gone. One of life's lesson is always moving on. It's okay to look back and think of fond memories but keep moving forward.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Moving on doesn't mean you forget about things, it just means you have to accept what happened and continue living.
quotes.author: Erza Scarlet

quotes.quote: Just because you miss someone doesn't mean you need them back in your life. Missing is just a part of moving on.
quotes.author: Macklemore

quotes.quote: Don't waste your time looking back for what you have lost, move on for life wasn't meant to be traveled backwards.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Once you've made the decision to move on, don't look back. You will never find your future in the rear view mirror.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Don't cry over the past, it's gone . Don't stress about the future, it hasn't arrived. Live in the present and make it beautiful.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Even mud gives the illusion of depth.
quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.quote: No mud can soil us but the mud we throw.
quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

quotes.quote: Give me some mud, and I will paint you a woman's flesh.
quotes.author: Eugene Delacroix

quotes.quote: How can you defame mud when such a beautiful flower grows from it?
quotes.author: RZA

quotes.quote: Never throw mud: you can miss the target, but your hands will remain dirty.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: If you have live in the mud for a while, you must not resist being a frog for a while!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: All soils are not fertile.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: Every soil does not produce every material.
quotes.author: Anne-Robert-Jacques Turgot, Baron de Laune

quotes.quote: Keep the soil healthy and the bad seed won't grow.
quotes.author: David Agus

quotes.quote: Fertility of the soil is the future of civilization.
quotes.author: Albert Howard

quotes.quote: Where soil is, men grow, Whether to weeds or flowers.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: The soil says, don't bring me your need, bring me your seed.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: The richest soil, if uncultivated, produces the rankest weeds.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: The soil of their native land is dear to all the hearts of mankind.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: The soil is the great connector of our lives, the source and destination of all.
quotes.author: Wendell Berry

quotes.quote: Every time it rains, the soil counts every drop to know exactly how many times to thank to God!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Soil is an almost magical substance, a living system that transforms the materials it encounters
quotes.author: George Monbiot

quotes.quote: Untilled soil, however fertile it may be, will bear thistles and thorns; so it is with man's mind.
quotes.author: Teresa of Avila

quotes.quote: The miracle of the seed and the soil is not available by affirmation; it is only available by labor.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: The soil under the grass is dreaming of a young forest, and under the pavement the soil is dreaming of grass.
quotes.author: Wendell Berry

quotes.quote: The soil out of which such men as he are made is good to be born on, good to live on, good to die for and to be buried in.
quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

quotes.quote: As the soil, however rich it may be, cannot be productive without cultivation, so the mind without culture can never produce good fruit
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: The same soil is good for men and for trees. A man's health requires as many acres of meadow to his prospect as his farm does loads of muck.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The most fertile soil does not necessarily produce the most abundant harvest. It is the use we make of our faculties which renders them valuable.
quotes.author: Thomas Wentworth Higginson

quotes.quote: Soil with a lot of manure in it produces abundant crops; water that is too clear has no fish. Therefore, enlightened people should maintain the capacity to accept impurities and should not be solitary perfectionists.
quotes.author: Zicheng Hong

quotes.quote: A soil adapted to the growth of plants, is necessarily prepared and carefully preserved; and, in the necessary waste of land which is inhabited, the foundation is laid for future continents, in order to support the system of the living world.
quotes.author: James Hutton

quotes.quote: He who slings mud generally loses ground.
quotes.author: Adlai Stevenson I

quotes.quote: Mud is the most poetical thing in the world.
quotes.author: Reginald Horace Blyth

quotes.quote: Even in the mud and scum of things, something always, always sings.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The soil is the gift of God to the living.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: The world is now multicultural the same way the world is round. It's not a selling point, it's not a 'quirky' feature, it's not a cynical marketing ploy, it's not an artistic statement, it's not even a plot device. It's a fact, like seedless grapes.
quotes.author: Zadie Smith

quotes.quote: In a multicultural, diverse society there are countless ways in which people negotiate the everyday lived experience and reality of diversity.
quotes.author: Randa Abdel-Fattah

quotes.quote: Multiculturalism may well be our saviour, wresting us out from the straitjacket of our history, thrusting the old continent into an environment where other ethnicities, less cynical and more positive, will play a big role in its future.
quotes.author: Loretta Napoleoni

quotes.quote: This multicultural approach, saying that we simply live side by side and live happily with each other has failed. Utterly failed.
quotes.author: Angela Merkel

quotes.quote: A multicultural society does not reject the culture of the other but is prepared to listen, to see, to dialogue and, in the final analysis, to possibly accept the other's culture without compromising its own.
quotes.author: Reuven Rivlin

quotes.quote: We needÂ multiculturalism, respect for diversity, tolerance, respect for diverse faiths.
quotes.author: Manmohan Singh

quotes.quote: We become not a melting pot but a beautiful mosaic. Different people, different beliefs, different yearnings, different hopes, different dreams.
quotes.author: Jimmy Carter

quotes.quote: Being in aÂ multiculturalÂ environment in childhood is going to give you intuition, reflexes and instincts. You may acquire basic responsiveness later on, but it's never going to be as spontaneous as when you have been bathing in this environment during childhood.
quotes.author: Carlos Ghosn

quotes.quote: Multiculturalism is based on the lie that all cultures are morally equal.
quotes.author: Michael Barone

quotes.quote: Multicultural is not a description of a category of American writing-it is a definition of all American writing.
quotes.author: Ishmael Reed

quotes.quote: Multiculturalism, if its logic is fully played out, is the ideology of national suicide.
quotes.author: Rich Lowry

quotes.quote: Multicultural societies are multi-conflict societies.
quotes.author: Marine Le Pen

quotes.quote: Look to a day when people will not be judged by the color of their skin.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: Multiculturalism is a good reminder that when standards are relative, there are no standards at all.
quotes.author: Victor Davis Hanson

quotes.quote: If you get into multicultural sort of casting for no other reason than to diversify, then it seems false.
quotes.author: Andrew Rannells

quotes.quote: A 'multicultural society' is a logical and physical impossibility.
quotes.author: Satoshi Kanazawa

quotes.quote: So, rather than becomingÂ multicultural, rather than becoming a person of several languages, rather than becoming confident in your knowledge of the world, you become just the opposite. You end up in college having to apologize for the fact that you no longer speak your native language.
quotes.author: Richard Rodriguez

quotes.quote: Pit race against race, religion against religion, prejudice against prejudice. Divide and conquer! We must not let that happen here.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Our ability to reach unity in diversity will be the beauty and the test of our civilization.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Diversity is about all of us and about us having to figure out how to walk through this world together.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Woodson

quotes.quote: Diversity and inclusion, which are the real grounds for creativity, must remain at the center of what we do.
quotes.author: Marco Bizzarri

quotes.quote: When we listen and celebrate what is both common and different, we become a wiser, more inclusive, and better organization.
quotes.author: Pat Wadors

quotes.quote: An individual has not started living until he can rise above the narrow confines of his individualistic concerns to the broader concerns of all humanity.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King

quotes.quote: A lot of different flowers make a bouquet.
quotes.author: Islamic Proverb

quotes.quote: We all live with the objective of being happy; our lives are all different and yet the same.
quotes.author: Teresa Barnes RN

quotes.quote: When everyone is included, everyone wins.
quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

quotes.quote: Diversity and Inclusion needs to be something that every single employee at the company has a stake in.
quotes.author: Bo Young Lee

quotes.quote: It is time for parents to teach young people early on that in diversity, there is beauty, and there is strength.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: What divides us pales in comparison to what unites us.
quotes.author: Ted Kennedy

quotes.quote: What greater thing is there for human souls than to feel that they are joined for life, to be with each other in silent unspeakable memories.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Multi-tasking is great in the kitchen when you are trying to time the chicken to be ready at the same time as the potatoes. But do not assume it is a great way to manage a workday.
quotes.author: Joanne Tombrakos

quotes.quote: Multitasking the art of doing twice as much as you should half as well as you could.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A woman becomes better at multitasking when she becomes a mother.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Multitasking is like constantly pulling up a plant. This kind of constant shifting of your attention means that new ideas and concepts have no chance to take root and flourish.
quotes.author: Barbara Oakley

quotes.quote: Sometimes multitasking with others heart can give you loss of time and money.
quotes.author: Vishal Sharma

quotes.quote: We miss extra bits of knowledge that can add value to our lives. We sort of lack empathy because we're multitasking all the time.
quotes.author: Kim Stolz

quotes.quote: Multitasking turns you into a super woman.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Most of the work on multitasking suggests that it generally makes you less efficient, not more.
quotes.author: James Surowiecki

quotes.quote: Multi-tasking is merely the opportunity to screw up more than one thing at a time.
quotes.author: Gary W. Keller

quotes.quote: Multitasking divides your attention and leads to confusion and weakened focus.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Multi-tasking arises out of distraction itself.
quotes.author: Marilyn vos Savant

quotes.quote: The secret to multitasking is that it isn't actually multitasking. It's just extreme focus and organization.
quotes.author: Joss Whedon

quotes.quote: Multitasking the art of driving and looking hot at the same time.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Multitasking, when it comes to paying attention, is a myth.
quotes.author: John Medina

quotes.quote: You can do two things at once, but you can't focus effectively on two things at once.
quotes.author: Gary Keller

quotes.quote: You can take care of several things at the same time you have already proved it once.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Ability to do many jobs at a time is not exactly success. But doing one job with utter perfection is the success sought after.
quotes.author: Mayank Singh Saini

quotes.quote: Multitasking doesn't save time it wastes time.
quotes.author: Gary Keller

quotes.quote: If you try to multitask in the classic sense of doing two things at once, what you end up doing is quasi-tasking. It's like being with children. You have to give it your full attention for however much time you have, and then you have to give something else your full attention.
quotes.author: Joss Whedon

quotes.quote: Many people feel they must multi-task because everybody else is multitasking, but this is partly because they are all interrupting each other so much.
quotes.author: Marilyn vos Savant

quotes.quote: Most of the time multitasking is an illusion. You think you are multitasking but in reality you're actually wasting time switching from one task to another.
quotes.author: Bosco Tjan

quotes.quote: The more you multitask, the less deliberative you become; the less able to think and reason out a problem.
quotes.author: Nicholas Carr

quotes.quote: If someone around you is multitasking, you pick up distraction like second-hand smoke.
quotes.author: Clay Shirky

quotes.quote: Multiasking is a myth, it's just an act of breaking your effiency into different tasks.
quotes.author: Adilogi

quotes.quote: What looks like multitasking is really switching back and forth between multiple tasks, which reduces productivity and increases mistakes by up to 50 percent.
quotes.author: Susan Cain

quotes.quote: When you multitask, you believe you're being exceptionally productive, but really, you're fooling yourself. Each time you switch tasks, you have to backtrack a little and remind yourself where you are in the process and what's next. Invariably. you are spending twice as much time on parts of the task.
quotes.author: Karen Finerman

quotes.quote: Eating toast in the shower is the ultimate multitask.
quotes.author: Harry Styles

quotes.quote: Multi-tasking means screwing up several thing at once.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Organizing is what you do before you do something, so that when you do it, it is not all mixed up.
quotes.author: A. A. Milne

quotes.quote: A book at the table, just as in all places, is never rude.
quotes.author: A.D. Aliwat

quotes.quote: My mum taught me to have a soul.
quotes.author: Stella Mccartney

quotes.quote: A mother's love liberates.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Mum always taught us that compassion and kindness were the most important things in life, that it was better to be kind than right.
quotes.author: Rebecca Gibney

quotes.quote: Most mothers are instinctive philosophers.
quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.quote: A mother is God’s deputy on earth.
quotes.author: Rahel Varnhagen

quotes.quote: Some are kissing mothers and some are scolding mothers, but it is love just the same, and most mothers kiss and scold together.
quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.quote: Motherhood is always an act of courage.
quotes.author: Stacy Schiff

quotes.quote: A mother who is really a mother is never free.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: Mothers reflect God's loving presence on earth.
quotes.author: William R. Webb

quotes.quote: One good mother is worth hundreds of schoolmasters.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: For when a child is born the mother also is born again.
quotes.author: Gilbert Parker

quotes.quote: A mother is a mother still, The holiest thing alive.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: Good mothers are underrated, just like good defense.
quotes.author: Andy Van Slyke

quotes.quote: All mothers have intuition. The great ones have radar.
quotes.author: Cathy Guisewite

quotes.quote: There's no way to repay a mother's love, or lack of it.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Mother: the most beautiful word on the lips of mankind.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: A mother is a child's first looking glass into the world.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: A mother always thinks twice: for herself and for the child
quotes.author: Sophia Loren

quotes.quote: Being mum is a number one job. That takes priority.
quotes.author: Jasmine Guinness

quotes.quote: Mum was the matriarch and the patriarch of the family.
quotes.author: Tony Scott

quotes.quote: My mum taught me always to see the funny side of things.
quotes.author: Michelle Dockery

quotes.quote: Being a mum is the best thing that has ever been given to me in my life.
quotes.author: Emilia Fox

quotes.quote: Being a mother is magical.
quotes.author: Ellen Pompeo

quotes.quote: Mother's love grows by giving.
quotes.author: Charles Lamb

quotes.quote: All mothers are working mothers.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: A mother is the heart of the home.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: A baby's mother also needs a mother.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: Mothers are the necessity of invention.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: A mother is the truest friend we have.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: Only a mother knows a mother's fondness.
quotes.author: Mary Wortley Montagu

quotes.quote: The brain is a muscle that can move the world.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Muscle has memory: the body knows things the mind will not admit.
quotes.author: Louise Doughty

quotes.quote: Muscles are in a most intimate and peculiar sense the organs of the will.
quotes.author: G. Stanley Hall

quotes.quote: We grow our courage muscles like we grow our physical muscles: by using them.
quotes.author: Gloria Feldt

quotes.quote: Determination is like a muscle. If you do not use it regularly, it fades away.
quotes.author: Lynn Jennings

quotes.quote: The tongue is the only muscle in the human body that never gets tired.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: A muscle is like a car. If you want it to run well early in the morning, you have to warm it up.
quotes.author: Florence Griffith Joyner

quotes.quote: Exercise of the muscles keeps the body in health, and exercise of the brain brings peace of mind.
quotes.author: John Lubbock

quotes.quote: The heart is a muscle, and you strengthen muscles by using them. The more I lead with my heart, the stronger it gets.
quotes.author: Mark Miller

quotes.quote: There are muscles that we have in our feet that most human beings don't even know that we have. The strength that we have is so detailed.
quotes.author: Misty Copeland

quotes.quote: Remember the mind is your best muscle. Big arms can move rocks, but big words can move mountains. Ride the brain train for success.
quotes.author: Sylvester Stallone

quotes.quote: The muscles used to make a smile actually send a biochemical message to our nervous system that it is safe to relax the flight of freeze response.
quotes.author: Tara Brach

quotes.quote: If you want to grow a muscle, you must lift something out of your comfort zone. Push beyond what is comfortable. If you don't there will be no growth.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: If you do not use a muscle or any part of the body, it tends to become atrophic. So is the case with the brain. The more you use it, the better it becomes.
quotes.author: Shakuntala Devi

quotes.quote: Just as we develop our physical muscles through overcoming opposition-- such as lifting weights--we develop our character muscles by overcoming challenges and adversity.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: Muscles are in a most intimate and peculiar sense the organs of the will. They have built all the roads, cities, and machines in the world, written all the books, spoken all the words, and, in fact done everything that man has accomplished with matter. Character might be a sense defined as a plexus of motor habits.
quotes.author: G. Stanley Hall

quotes.quote: Muscles come and go; flab lasts.
quotes.author: Bill Vaughan

quotes.quote: The brain has muscles for thinking as the legs have muscles for walking.
quotes.author: Julien Offray de La Mettrie

quotes.quote: Your ethical muscle grows stronger every time you choose right over wrong.
quotes.author: Price Pritchett

quotes.quote: It is necessary to relax your muscles when you can. Relaxing your brain is fatal.
quotes.author: Stirling Moss

quotes.quote: A story has to have muscle as well as meaning, and the meaning has to be in the muscle.
quotes.author: Flannery O'Connor

quotes.quote: Essentially, your voice is an instrument; it's a muscle, and you have to treat it like a muscle, and so you have to work it.
quotes.author: Kevin Spacey

quotes.quote: Ideally, our muscles should obey our will. Reasonably, our will should not be dominated by the reflex actions of our muscles.
quotes.author: Joseph Pilates

quotes.quote: The muscles of writing are not so visible, but they are just as powerful: determination, attention, curiosity, a passionate heart.
quotes.author: Natalie Goldberg

quotes.quote: If we do not begin to practice the muscles of having a possessive investment in each other's oppressions, then we are in some serious trouble.
quotes.author: Junot Diaz

quotes.quote: The most important day in any running program is rest. Rest days give your muscles time to recover so you can run again. Your muscles build in strength as you rest.
quotes.author: Hal Higdon

quotes.quote: For every thought supported by feeling, there is a muscle change. Primary muscle patterns being the biological heritage of man, man's whole body records his emotional thinking.
quotes.author: Mabel Elsworth Todd

quotes.quote: Each time you put the muscle back on, your body has that muscle memory and wants to hang on to it, so you just have be well underfed and over-trained to get it off and it's exhausting.
quotes.author: Chris Hemsworth

quotes.quote: You have to challenge yourself and your muscles. When you are really regimented, it's the same over and over and you start to get comfortable. Switching up the style of training works your muscles differently.
quotes.author: Curtis Jackson

quotes.quote: When all your muscles are properly developed, you will, as a matter of course, perform your work with minimum effort and maximum pleasure.
quotes.author: Joseph Pilates

quotes.quote: Real museums are places where Time is transformed into Space.
quotes.author: Orhan Pamuk

quotes.quote: A museum is a place where nothing was lost, just rediscovered…
quotes.author: Nanette L. Avery

quotes.quote: Some of our greatest historical and artistic treasures we place in museums; others, we take for walks.
quotes.author: Roger Caras

quotes.quote: Museums are custodians of epiphanies, and these epiphanies enter the central nervous system and deep recesses of the mind.
quotes.author: George Lois

quotes.quote: Museums are wormholes to other worlds. They are ecstasy machines. Follow your eyes to wherever they lead you…and the world should begin to change for you.
quotes.author: Jerry Saltz

quotes.quote: A museum has to renew its collection to be alive, but that does not mean we give on important old works.
quotes.author: David Rockefeller

quotes.quote: Museums are managers of consciousness. They give us an interpretation of history, of how to view the world and locate ourselves in it. They are, if you want to put it in positive terms, great educational institutions. If you want to put it in negative terms, they are propaganda machines.
quotes.author: Hans Haacke

quotes.quote: Living is like tearing through a museum. Not until later do you really start absorbing what you saw, thinking about it, looking it up in a book, and remembering - because you can't take it in all at once.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Museums are tombs, and it looks like everything is turning into a museum.
quotes.author: Robert Smithson

quotes.quote: The museum spreads its surfaces everywhere, and becomes an untitled collection of generalizations that mobilize the eye.
quotes.author: Robert Smithson

quotes.quote: The museums and parks are graveyards above the ground- congealed memories of the past that act as a pretext for reality.
quotes.author: Robert Smithson

quotes.quote: Museums are just a lot of lies, and the people who make art their business are mostly imposters. We have infected the pictures in museums with all our stupidities, all our mistakes, all our poverty of spirit. We have turned them into petty and ridiculous things.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Museums should be places where you raise questions, not just show stuff.
quotes.author: William Thorsell

quotes.quote: A museum is a place where one should lose one's head.
quotes.author: Renzo Piano

quotes.quote: The most basic task of any museum must be the protection of works of cultural significance entrusted to its care for the edification and pleasure of future generations.
quotes.author: Martin Filler

quotes.quote: A painting in a museum hears more ridiculous opinions than anything else in the world.
quotes.author: Edmond de Goncourt

quotes.quote: That which, perhaps, hears more nonsense than anything in the world, is a picture in a museum.
quotes.author: Jules de Goncourt

quotes.quote: Individually, museums are fine institutions, dedicated to the high values of preservation, education and truth; collectively, their growth in numbers points to the imaginative death of this country.
quotes.author: Robert Hewison

quotes.quote: The historical museum has to be very conservative and careful in its choices. The modern museum, on the other hand, has to be audacious, to take chances. It has to consider the probability that it would be wrong in a good many cases and take the consequences later.
quotes.author: Alfred H. Barr, Jr.

quotes.quote: A meal without mushrooms is like a day without rain.
quotes.author: John Cage

quotes.quote: Advice is like mushrooms. The wrong kind can prove fatal.
quotes.author: Charles E. McKenzie

quotes.quote: Mushrooms can be very fancy. It's the closest you can get to eating dirt.
quotes.author: Tom Colicchio

quotes.quote: Look around when you have got your first mushroom or made your first discovery: they grow in clusters.
quotes.author: George Polya

quotes.quote: The sudden appearance of mushrooms after a summer rain is one of the more impressive spectacles of the plant world.
quotes.author: John Tyler Bonner

quotes.quote: On the subject of wild mushrooms, it is easy to tell who is an expert and who is not: The expert is the one who is still alive.
quotes.author: Donal Henahan

quotes.quote: Never crowd a pan with too many mushrooms. They give off an enormous amount of moisture. And there's nothing worse than a braised mushroom, other than a lot of braised mushrooms.
quotes.author: Simon Schama

quotes.quote: Of all mushrooms commonly consumed, oyster mushrooms in the genus Pleurotus stand out as exceptional allies for improving human and environmental health. These mushrooms enjoy a terrific reputation as the easiest to cultivate, richly nutritious and medicinally supportive.
quotes.author: Paul Stamets

quotes.quote: Maitake mushrooms are known in Japan as the dancing mushroom. According to a Japanese legend, a group of Buddhist nuns and woodcutters met on a mountain trail, where they discovered a fruiting of maitake mushrooms emerging from the forest floor. Rejoicing at their discovery of this delicious mushroom, they danced to celebrate.
quotes.author: Paul Stamets

quotes.quote: Consuming mushrooms regularly has been associated with decreased risk of breast, stomach and colorectal cancers.
quotes.author: Joel Fuhrman

quotes.quote: Enoki mushrooms, a tasty variety commonly sold in grocery stores, were one of the first mushrooms studied for preventing cancer.
quotes.author: Paul Stamets

quotes.quote: Growing the mycelium of the Chaga mushroom under laboratory conditions provides an ecologically friendly alternative supply of this unique medicinal mushroom.
quotes.author: Paul Stamets

quotes.quote: Although oyster mushrooms have been studied extensively and support health in a number of ways, it is also extremely important to always cook oyster mushrooms!
quotes.author: Paul Stamets

quotes.quote: Chaga is one of the weirdest mushrooms you may ever see. A fungal parasite found on birch trees, Chaga is a hardened, blackened, crusty formation that looks like a bursting tumor.
quotes.author: Paul Stamets

quotes.quote: Mushrooms have many helpful nutrients, including beta glucans for immune enhancement, ergothioneines for antioxidative potentiation, nerve growth stimulators for helping brain function, and antimicrobial compounds for limiting viruses.
quotes.author: Paul Stamets

quotes.quote: In the wild, an enoki mushroom is often squat-looking and its stem is rarely more than twice as long as the cap is wide. When they are grown by farmers and hobbyists, however, their stems elongate, the caps are smaller, and a forest of golden colored needle-like mushrooms shoot up all at once.
quotes.author: Paul Stamets

quotes.quote: Mushrooms provide a vast array of potential medicinal compounds. Many mushrooms - such as portobello, oyster, reishi and maitake - are well-known for these properties, but the lion's mane mushroom, in particular, has drawn the attention of researchers for its notable nerve-regenerative properties.
quotes.author: Paul Stamets

quotes.quote: Even the softest and sweetest heart was made by design for extreme battle.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: Always keep your words soft and sweet, just in case you have to eat them
quotes.author: Andy Rooney

quotes.quote: Be soft, don't let the world make you hard. Be gentle, don't let the people make you difficult. Be kind, don't let the realities of life steal your sweetness and make you heartless.
quotes.author: Nurudeen Ushawu

quotes.quote: Softness of smile indicates softness of character.
quotes.author: Johann Kaspar Lavater

quotes.quote: Having a soft heart in a cruel world is courage not weakness.
quotes.author: Katherine Henson

quotes.quote: There is no pillow as soft as a clear conscience.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The soft heart is not a thing to harden but a treasure to protect. For soft hearts extend mercy, compassion, refuge, and God's redemption to the world.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: Softness is not weakness. It takes courage to stay delicate in a world this cruel.
quotes.author: Beau Taplin

quotes.quote: Soft words win hard hearts.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Be soft, even if you stand to get squashed.
quotes.author: E. M. Forster

quotes.quote: Soft and kind hearted people are not fools. They know what people did to them, but they forgive again and again because they have beautiful hearts.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Be soft for the sake of every hard heart; show them with every movement of your body that gentle does not mean weak.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Power of softness and kindness are the greatest.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Being both soft and hard is a combination very few have mastered.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Soft nature of a person does not mean weakness. Remember, nothing is softer than water, but its force can break the strongest of rocks.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Music is a moral law. It gives soul to the universe, wings to the mind, flight to the imagination, and charm and gaiety to life and to everything.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: If music be the food of love, play on.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Music doesn't lie. If there is something to be changed in this world, then it can only happen through music.
quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

quotes.quote: Music is the movement of sound to reach the soul for the education of its virtue.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: The world's most famous and popular language is music.
quotes.author: Psy

quotes.quote: Music is the strongest form of magic.
quotes.author: Marilyn Manson

quotes.quote: Music in the soul can be heard by the universe.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Music happens to be an art form that transcends language.
quotes.author: Herbie Hancock

quotes.quote: One good thing about music, when it hits you, you feel no pain.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: Music expresses that which cannot be put into words and that which cannot remain silent.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Music was my refuge. I could crawl into the space between the notes and curl my back to loneliness.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Music is what feelings sound like.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Music is the poetry of the air.
quotes.author: Richter

quotes.quote: Music is the art which is most nigh to tears and memory.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Music is well said to be the speech of angels.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Music is very spiritual, it has the power to bring people together.
quotes.author: Edgar Winter

quotes.quote: Music is a higher revelation than all wisdom and philosphy. Music is the electrical soil in which the spirit lives, thinks and invents.
quotes.author: Ludwig van Beethoven

quotes.quote: Music does bring people together. It allows us to experience the same emotions. People everywhere are the same in heart and spirit. No matter what language we speak, what color we are, the form of our politics or the expression of our love and our faith, music proves: We are the same.
quotes.author: John Denver

quotes.quote: Music washes away from the soul the dust of everyday life.
quotes.author: Berthold Auerbach

quotes.quote: Music cleanses the understanding; inspires it, and lifts it into a realm which it would not reach if it were left to itself.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Music gives a soul to the universe, wings to the mind, flight to the imagination and life to everything.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Without music, life would be a mistake.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Music is what tells us that the human race is greater than we realize.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Music produces a kind of pleasure which human nature cannot do without.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Music is the universal language of mankind.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: To stop the flow of music would be like the stopping of time itself, incredible and inconceivable.
quotes.author: Aaron Copland

quotes.quote: Music is love in search of a word.
quotes.author: Sidonie Gabrielle

quotes.quote: Music takes us out of the actual and whispers to us dim secrets that startle our wonder as to who we are, and for what, whence, and whereto.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Music is God's gift to man, the only art of Heaven given to earth, the only art of earth we take to Heaven.
quotes.author: Walter Savage Landor

quotes.quote: Music is the harmonious voice of creation; an echo of the invisible world.
quotes.author: Giuseppe Mazzini

quotes.quote: Without music, life would be a mistake.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Music can change the world because it can change people.
quotes.author: Bono

quotes.quote: Music in the soul can be heard by the universe.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: One good thing about music, when it hits you, you feel no pain.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: If music be the food of love, play on,Give me excess of it; that surfeiting,The appetite may sicken, and so die.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Some people have lives; some people have music.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: Music washes away from the soul the dust of everyday life.
quotes.author: Berthold Auerbach

quotes.quote: If I were to begin life again, I would devote it to music. It is the only cheap and unpunished rapture upon earth.
quotes.author: Sydney Smith

quotes.quote: If in the after life there is not music, we will have to import it.
quotes.author: Domenico Cieri Estrada

quotes.quote: Just as Jesus created wine from water, we humans are capable of transmuting emotion into music.
quotes.author: Carlos Santana

quotes.quote: Music is a higher revelation than all wisdom and philosphy. Music is the electrical soil in which the spirit lives, thinks and invents.
quotes.author: Ludwig van Beethoven

quotes.quote: Music does bring people together. It allows us to experience the same emotions. People everywhere are the same in heart and spirit.No matter what language we speak, what color we are, the form of our politics or the expression of our love and our faith, music proves: We are the same.
quotes.author: John Denver

quotes.quote: Music washes away from the soul the dust of everyday life.
quotes.author: Berthold Auerbach

quotes.quote: Do you know that our soul is composed of harmony?
quotes.author: Leonardo DaVinci

quotes.quote: One reason music is more effective than antidepressants is because if you listen close enough you might feel God telling you everything is going to be okay.
quotes.author: Paul Cardall

quotes.quote: The piano is a divinely inspired instrument, a mirror held up to its player's soul that captures the light and shadow of the performer and reflects them back to the listener.
quotes.author: David Lanz

quotes.quote: I've never known a musician who regretted being one. Whatever deceptions life may have in store for you, music itself is not going to let you down.
quotes.author: Virgil Thompson

quotes.quote: Without music, life would be a blank to me.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Life is like a beautiful melody, only the lyrics are messed up.
quotes.author: Hans Christian Andersen

quotes.quote: If I had my life to live over again, I would have made a rule to read some poetry and listen to some music at least once every week.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: There is nothing in the world so much like prayer as music is.
quotes.author: William P. Merrill

quotes.quote: Music produces a kind of pleasure which human nature cannot do without.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Music is to me like breathing. I don't get tired of breathing, I don't get tire of music!
quotes.author: Ray Charles

quotes.quote: What we play is life.
quotes.author: Louis Armstrong

quotes.quote: Music is by far the most wonderful method we have to remind us each day of the power of personal accomplishment.
quotes.author: Chris S. Salazar

quotes.quote: After silence that which comes nearest to expressing the inexpressible is music.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: Life is like music; it must be composed by ear, feeling, and instinct, not by rule.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: Music is moonlight in the gloomy night of life.
quotes.author: Jean Paul Richter

quotes.quote: Without music, life is a journey through a desert.
quotes.author: Pat Conroy

quotes.quote: Life can't be all bad when for ten dollars you can buy all the Beethoven sonatas and listen to them for ten years.
quotes.author: William F. Buckley, Jr.

quotes.quote: Music education opens doors that help children pass from school into the world around them a world of work, culture, intellectual activity, and human involvement. The future of our nation depends on providing our children with a complete education that includes music.
quotes.author: Gerald Ford

quotes.quote: Music education can help spark a child's imagination or ignite a lifetime of passion. When you provide a child with new worlds to explore and challenges to tackle, the possibilities are endless. Music education should not be a privilege for a lucky few, it should be a part of every child's world of possiblity.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.quote: I always loved music; whoso has skill in this art is of good temperament, fitted for all things. We must teach music inschools; a schoolmaster ought to have skill in music, or I would not regard him.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: And my career, the things that have happened have happened because of my music education background.
quotes.author: Jon Secada

quotes.quote: Music is about communication, creativity and cooperation. By studying music in school, students have the opportunity to build on these skills, enrich their lives and experience the world from a new perspective.
quotes.author: President Bill Clinton

quotes.quote: Some people think music education is a privilege, but I think it's essential to being human.
quotes.author: Jewel

quotes.quote: Education is extremely important, especially in my business, the music business.
quotes.author: Ludacris

quotes.quote: I can not imagine my life if I didn't have a music program in my school.
quotes.author: Beyonce

quotes.quote: Education isn't just about feeding the brain. Art and music feed the heart and soul.
quotes.author: Julie Garwood

quotes.quote: Our youth should also be educated with music and physical education.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Education in music is most sovereign because more than anything else rhythm and harmony find their way to the innermost soul and take strongest hold upon it
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Early Music training seems to shape the young brain, strengthening the neural connections and perhaps establishing new ones.
quotes.author: Dr. Frances Rauscher

quotes.quote: Music enhances the education of our children by helping them to make connections and broadening the depth with which they think and feel. If we are to hope for a society of culturally literate people, music must be a vital part of our children's education.
quotes.author: Yo-Yo Ma

quotes.quote: Music has a power of forming the character, and should therefore be introduced into the education of the young.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: I believe education in music, theater, dance, and the visual arts is one of the most I believe that as a part of the educational process, each child should have access to a music education program. That is part of a well-rounded education and can provide so much joy, now and in the future.
quotes.author: Rudolph W. Giuliani

quotes.quote: Music deserves to be the mandatory second language of all schools in the world.
quotes.author: Paul Carvel

quotes.quote: Music - that's been my education. There's not a day that goes by that I take it for granted.
quotes.author: Billie Joe Armstrong

quotes.quote: Art and music education help children develop abstract thinking that helps them in the business world.
quotes.author: Alan Greenspan

quotes.quote: What a tragedy it would be if we lived in a world where music was not taught to children.
quotes.author: H. Norman Schwarzkopf

quotes.quote: I don't think I would have become President if it were not for my school music program.
quotes.author: President Bill Clinton

quotes.quote: I would teach children music, physics, and philosophy; but most importantly music, for the patterns in music and all the arts are the keys to learning.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: If I had not studied music, there would be no Macintosh computers today.
quotes.author: Jef Raskin

quotes.quote: Music is a more potent instrument than any other for education.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Music education stimulates, challenges, and enriches our young people during their formative, school years; its value lasts a lifetime.
quotes.author: TAMMY BALDWIN

quotes.quote: We need highly skilled workers to think and create. That's why we're willing to put our money on the line to make a systemic change in the way young people are educated to the arts and sciences in this country.
quotes.author: HELGE H. WEHMEIER

quotes.quote: Music is the movement of sound to reach the soul for the education of its virtue.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Music education, so strongly rooted in performance traditions, has resulted in the virtual absence of creative problem solving processes in its teaching and learning practices.
quotes.author: Lee Willingham

quotes.quote: Another critical contextual issue in Music Education is the powerful presence of music technology as an aid to instruction and the support given to music teaching by Internet resources.
quotes.author: Peter R. Webster

quotes.quote: We currently have a professional body of music teachers may of whom are socially and evaluatively distanced both by the nature of their own musical education and their habitus, itself formed in part by their experiences in music education, from the pupils whom they teach.
quotes.author: Ruth Wright

quotes.quote: Music educators have embraced the theories with the argument that musical behavior, as part of the human behavior in general, is subject to the same laws that govern all of learning.
quotes.author: Ruth Wright

quotes.quote: I love anyone who breaks the rules, and musicians always break the rules in an aggressive way.
quotes.author: Donatella Versace

quotes.quote: Music is the mediator between the spiritual and the sensual life.
quotes.author: Ludwig van Beethoven

quotes.quote: Too many young musicians today want to win polls before they learn their instruments.
quotes.author: Benny Goodman

quotes.quote: Serious musicians are finding it harder and harder to have a voice in the world of music these days.
quotes.author: Kevin Eubanks

quotes.quote: Musicians more than most people are in the moment. That's the dual nature of that job.
quotes.author: Gail Zappa

quotes.quote: As musicians, and as people who sell material for people to hear and absorb, it's important that we use that voice wisely.
quotes.author: Roberta Flack

quotes.quote: If you play music with passion and love and honesty, then it will nourish your soul, heal your wounds and make your life worth living. Music is its own reward.
quotes.author: Sting

quotes.quote: The wise musicians are those who play what they can master.
quotes.author: Duke Ellington

quotes.quote: The great musicians are those who can reach people, who can make people feel something.
quotes.author: Sam Rivers

quotes.quote: A musician must make music, an artist must paint, a poet must write, if he is to be ultimately at peace with himself.
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.quote: As a musician, I hear the harmonic value of everything I just enjoy music.
quotes.author: Darren Criss

quotes.quote: Musicians have always had a better understanding of love than the rest of us. Over the years they have told us that love: is like a rock, is here to stay, is all you need, will find a way, will keep us together, will tear us apart, sucks.
quotes.author: Cuthbert Soup

quotes.quote: Music is a higher revelation than all wisdom and philosophy. Music is the electrical soil in which the spirit lives, thinks and invents.
quotes.author: Ludwig van Beethoven

quotes.quote: Musicians own music because music owns them.
quotes.author: Virgil Thomson

quotes.quote: The true beauty of music is that it connects people. It carries a message, and we, the musicians, are the messengers.
quotes.author: Roy Ayers

quotes.quote: Music is the divine way to tell beautiful, poetic things to the heart.
quotes.author: Pablo Casals

quotes.quote: The best musicians transpose consciousness into sound; painters do the same for color and shape.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: I've never known a musician who regretted being one. Music itself is not going to let you down.
quotes.author: Virgil Thomson

quotes.quote: All musicians are potential band leaders.
quotes.author: Thelonious Monk

quotes.quote: Musicians from the beginning of time have been there to express the mood and the musical feelings in the air for whatever's going on in that particular culture. It's the greatest joy as a musician to be able to translate that, be part of something and watch the scenery around you.
quotes.author: Trey Anastasio

quotes.quote: I believe musicians have a duty, a responsibility to reach out, to share your love or pain with others.
quotes.author: James Taylor

quotes.quote: A painter paints pictures on canvas. But musicians paint their pictures on silence.
quotes.author: Leopold Stokowski

quotes.quote: I'm a self taught musician, so I never really had the restrictions of any one instrument. I would always just sort of pick up instruments and make noise with em.
quotes.author: Adrian Grenier

quotes.quote: Musicians tend to get bored playing the same thing over and over, so I think it's natural to experiment.
quotes.author: Dimebag Darrell

quotes.quote: Musicians should not play music. Music should play musicians.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: Great musicians accept everything that they hear and find something good. They take what they like and they throw away what they don't like.
quotes.author: John Zorn

quotes.quote: Music to me is like breathing. I don't get tired of breathing, I don't get tired of music.
quotes.author: Ray Charles

quotes.quote: Musicians are always gigging and never have a chance to stop for a minute.
quotes.author: Keith Jarrett

quotes.quote: If some musicians put half as much effort in to the business side as they do their outer look and appearances, they could be twice as far.
quotes.author: Loren Weisman

quotes.quote: Musicians don't retire; they stop when there's no more music in them.
quotes.author: Louis Armstrong

quotes.quote: A lot of musicians aren't proud; they'll do other work, just to be able to play music. I guess that's the way it's always going to be - musicians will have to suffer to a certain degree in order to obtain their outlet.
quotes.author: Chico Hamilton

quotes.quote: We are in a position, as musicians, to touch the souls of those who listen.
quotes.author: Spencer W. Kimball

quotes.quote: Usually people think that it is the musicians who create the music, but in fact it is music who creates the musicians.
quotes.author: Robert Fripp

quotes.quote: Musicians from the beginning of time have been there to express the mood and the musical feelings in the air for whatever's going on in that particular culture. It's the greatest joy as a musician to be able to translate that, be part of something and watch the scenery around you.
quotes.author: Trey Anastasio

quotes.quote: Musicians exist independent of any of the marketing terms or the categorization.
quotes.author: Dwight Yoakam

quotes.quote: Musicians understand each other through means other that speaking.
quotes.author: Ry Cooder

quotes.quote: Musicians wake up and create a more loving community by creating heavier music.
quotes.author: Cass McCombs

quotes.quote: The best musicians answer something in you when you don't even know the question.
quotes.author: Allison Pearson

quotes.quote: Musicians like to converse. There's always interesting conversation with musicians - with classical musicians, with jazz musicians, musicians in general.
quotes.author: Wynton Marsalis

quotes.quote: That's the thing about musicians: The priority is to create something new that's never been before. And you put your life on the line every time that you play.
quotes.author: Charlie Haden

quotes.quote: Great musicians accept everything that they hear and find something good. They take what they like and they throw away what they don't like.
quotes.author: John Zorn

quotes.quote: Naturally, no one knows more about music than musicians. They talk about their own work all the time, but they rarely get to talk about other people's music.
quotes.author: Michael Azerrad

quotes.quote: All musicians are subconsciously mathematicians.
quotes.author: Thelonious Monk

quotes.quote: Musicians own music because music owns them.
quotes.author: Virgil Thomson

quotes.quote: Musicians are, by and large, not the most politically savvy crew.
quotes.author: Ben Shapiro

quotes.quote: Musicians are always gigging and never have a chance to stop for a minute.
quotes.author: Keith Jarrett

quotes.quote: Musicians don't retire; they stop when there's no more music in them.
quotes.author: Louis Armstrong

quotes.quote: All musicians start out with ideals but hanging on to them in the face of media scrutiny takes real integrity. Tougher still is to live up to the ideals of your dedicated fans.
quotes.author: Billy Bragg

quotes.quote: The best musicians or sound-artists are people who never considered themselves to be artists or musicians.
quotes.author: Aphex Twin

quotes.quote: Musicians rarely have a sense of humour, at least, about themselves.
quotes.author: Carolyn Wells

quotes.quote: Musicians want to be the loud voice for so many quiet hearts.
quotes.author: Billy Joel

quotes.quote: Great musicians are great musicians, whether they're playing a trombone or an electric guitar or a xylophone.
quotes.author: Chris Stapleton

quotes.quote: Sometimes, musicians worry too much about how beautifully they are playing.
quotes.author: Simon Rattle

quotes.quote: Musicians keep playing when the lights go out, when people are suffering, confused, or angry.
quotes.author: Stephen Hough

quotes.quote: Musicians are the architects of heaven.
quotes.author: Bobby McFerrin

quotes.quote: The wise musicians are those who play what they can master.
quotes.author: Duke Ellington

quotes.quote: The great musicians are those who can reach people, who can make people feel something.
quotes.author: Sam Rivers

quotes.quote: Musicians always have music in their heads about their perceptions of the world.
quotes.author: Pattie Boyd

quotes.quote: Musicians should not play music. Music should play musicians.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: He is the most perfect Muslim whose disposition is best; and the best of you are they who behave best to their wives.
quotes.author: Muhammad

quotes.quote: The Muslim world is threatened by religious fanaticism. The western world is threatened by secular fanaticism.
quotes.author: Dennis Prager

quotes.quote: As Muslim women, we have been liberated from this silent bondage. We don't need society's standard of beauty or fashion, to define our worth. We don't need to become just like men to be honored, and we don't need to wait for a prince to save or complete us. Our worth, our honor, our salvation, and our completion lie not in the slave. But, in the Lord of the slave.
quotes.author: Yasmin Mogahed

quotes.quote: The Muslim Brotherhood is a fundamentalist group.
quotes.author: Richard Engel

quotes.quote: The great majority of us are Muslims. We follow the teachings of the Prophet Mohammed (may peace be upon him). We are members of the brotherhood of Islam in which all are equal in rights, dignity and self-respect. Consequently, we have a special and a very deep sense of unity. But make no mistake: Pakistan is not a theocracy or anything like it.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

quotes.quote: Being a Muslim is not a joke but a challenge. If you think it is, come and live in Pakistan where you will know about Muslims' enemies around the globe.
quotes.author: Faisal Nawaz Maitlo

quotes.quote: It is difficult to be called a Muslim; if one is truly a Muslim, then he may be called one. First, let him savor the religion of the Prophet as sweet; then, let his pride of his possessions be scraped away.
quotes.author: Sri Guru Granth Sahib

quotes.quote: Muslims are the first victims of Islam. To liberate a Muslim from his religion is the best service that one can render him!
quotes.author: Ernest Renan

quotes.quote: As a Muslim, I try my best to avoid telling a lie.
quotes.author: Osama bin Laden

quotes.quote: A Muslim is a person who without question. Sharia is our law. No interpretation is needed, nor are laws made by men. Allah is the only lawmaker.
quotes.author: Abdul Sattar Abu Risha

quotes.quote: Muslim women must stand up and speak out about who we are, what we believe and where we are going. I think we need to know that our counterparts in the west are also willing to listen and reciprocate.
quotes.author: Queen Rania of Jordan

quotes.quote: Most Muslim women know it is fear and curiosity that cause people to stare. They know it is ignorance and stereotypes that cause people to suppose that a piece of material covering the hair strips a woman of the ability to speak English, pursue a career, work a remote control.
quotes.author: Randa Abdel-Fattah

quotes.quote: The Muslim Prophet Mohammed was a big believer in charity and firmly established helping those in need as a basis of the religion.
quotes.author: Richard Engel

quotes.quote: All too many Muslims fail to grasp Islam, which teaches one to be lenient towards others and to understand their value systems, knowing that these are tolerated by Islam as a religion.
quotes.author: Abdurrahman Wahid

quotes.quote: Muslim leaders should ask themselves what exactly their relationship is to a political movement that encourages young men to kill and maim on religious grounds.
quotes.author: Ayaan Hirsi Ali

quotes.quote: The Muslim Brotherhood is a global movement whose members cooperate with each other throughout the world, based on the same religious worldview - the spread of Islam, until it rules the world.
quotes.author: Mahdi Akef

quotes.quote: There are Muslim women wearing hijab in our nation's military. Whether it's hijab or beards or turbans, to cling to these outdated â€˜traditions' merely out of a sense of not wanting to change anything is, I think, untenable in this day and age and in our increasingly diverse society.
quotes.author: Ibrahim Hooper

quotes.quote: A perfect Muslim is he from whose tongue and hands mankind is safe.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Every Muslim must rise to defend his religion. The wind of faith is blowing.
quotes.author: Osama bin Laden

quotes.quote: That person is not a perfect Muslim who eateth his fill, and leaveth his neighbors hungry.
quotes.author: Muhammad

quotes.quote: A true Muslim is like rain, wherever it falls, it will benefit.
quotes.author: Habib Umar bin Hafiz

quotes.quote: Even as a Muslim minister in the Muslim movement, I have always said that I would work with any organization.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: Muslim' is not a political party. 'Muslim' is not a single culture. Muslims go to war with each other. There are more Muslims in India, Russia and China than in most Muslim-majority nations. 'Muslim' is not a homogenous entity.
quotes.author: Maajid Nawaz

quotes.quote: A Muslim has five duties towards another Muslim; to return a salutation, visit the sick, follow funerals, accept an invitation and say 'God have mercy on you' when one sneezes.
quotes.author: Muhammad

quotes.quote: Becoming a true Muslim, a disciple of the faith of Mohammed, let him put aside the delusion of death and life.
quotes.author: Sri Guru Granth Sahib

quotes.quote: A Muslim should be sincerely religious and politically aware.
quotes.author: Tariq Ramadan

quotes.quote: The Muslim call to prayer is one of the prettiest sounds on Earth at sunset.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: I am totally against the idea that a Muslim woman should not have the same opportunities as a Muslim man to learn, to open up, to work, help shape the future. To close Islam down to a sexist approach is totally intolerable and ridiculous. It's not Islam.
quotes.author: King Hussein I

quotes.quote: Everyone who is taken by death asks for more time, while everyone who still has time makes excuses for procrastination.
quotes.author: Ali Ibn Abi Talib

quotes.quote: Body is purified by water. Ego by tears. Intellect is purified by knowledge. And soul is purified with love.
quotes.author: Ali Ibn Abi Talib

quotes.quote: Gray hair shows age; a beard shows maturity; a mustache shows impudence.
quotes.author: Yoruba Proverb

quotes.quote: Let's play for your mustache, Ergorov! That flurry mustache of yours has bothered me for a long time. If I win, I'll cut off your mustache, okay?
quotes.author: Mikhail Zoshchecko

quotes.quote: He goes around with a mustache. I go around with a mustache; Don't you think a mustache can get lonely?
