quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: Never trust a man with a fancy mustache.
quotes.author: Karen Valentine

quotes.quote: If you are a boy, worry that you'll never be able to grow a mustache. If you are a girl, worry that you have a mustache.
quotes.author: Delia Ephron

quotes.quote: As his books and journalism flourished, Twain hit the road on the nineteenth-century equivalent of the stand-up comedy circuit. He gave public lectures and humorous talks all around the country, and his mop of curly hair, bushy white mustache, and the ever-present cigar became instantly recognizable everywhere.
quotes.author: James Geary

quotes.quote: Nature played a cruel trick on her by giving her a waxed mustache.
quotes.author: Alan Bennett

quotes.quote: Brunhilde and had a mustache and the mind of an Easter chick.
quotes.author: Anne Rivers Siddons

quotes.quote: The man came to us one day and said, 'I want short hair, no beards, no mustaches, and you'll wear ties and suits in public or it'll cost you $100 a day.' When he puts it that way, how can you resist?
quotes.author: Ted Simmons

quotes.quote: Like a Turkish thug, the only frightening about him is his big mustache.
quotes.author: Egyptian Proverb

quotes.quote: Kindness can pluck the hairs of a lion's mustache.
quotes.author: Sudan

quotes.quote: According to regulations, a man who shaved or cut his beard could be imprisoned until his beard grows back.
quotes.author: Harry Kawilarang

quotes.quote: When lofty trees I see barren of leaves, / Which erst from heat did canopy the herd, / And summer's green all girded up in sheaves, / Borne on the bier with white and bristly beard.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: He that hath a beard is more than a youth, and he that hath no beard is less than a man; and he that is more than a youth is not for me; and he that is less than a man I am not for him.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: A moustache to a man is the same as a fringe is to a woman. When you've got it, you want to grow it out; when you've grown it out, you want to cut it.
quotes.author: Billy Childish

quotes.quote: A mustache really defines your face. My dad had a mustache when I was growing up, and I can still remember when he shaved it, he looked like a completely different person.
quotes.author: Jason Sudeikis

quotes.quote: A good mustache makes a man for many reasons.
quotes.author: John Oates

quotes.quote: Most people presume my mustache is not real because it's much darker than my regular hair.
quotes.author: John Hodgman

quotes.quote: I will say, as a woman, when you put a mustache on, you find out a lot of things about yourself.
quotes.author: Carrie Brownstein

quotes.quote: A man without a mustache is a man without a soul.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Having a mustache and never smiling became a permanent component of my persona through the quaintly self-important decade of the seventies.
quotes.author: John Oates

quotes.quote: A kiss without a mustache is like an egg without salt.
quotes.author: Rose Wilder Lane

quotes.quote: Lord, I could not endure a husband with a beard on his face! I had rather lie in the woollen.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Nay, faith, let not me play a woman: I have a beard coming.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: A long beard and a rosary will not make you a priest.
quotes.author: Bambara

quotes.quote: A long beard does not prevent a house going to bed hungry.
quotes.author: Fulani

quotes.quote: What of his beard? Are you not of Homer's opinion, who says Youth is most charming when the beard first appears?
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: No matter what style you wear or what outfit you put on, the most important thing is to have fun with your mustache. Twist, wax, snip, or trim— just imagine your whiskers as a clean palette on which to create your brilliant masterpiece.
quotes.author: Lucien Edwards

quotes.quote: From prehistoric times to now, the moustache has evolved from a roughly hewn block of hair into a genuine work of art.
quotes.author: Lucien Edwards

quotes.quote: Regardless of its current standing in popular culture, the moustache will always be fashionable among those who can see through the fuzz and truly appreciate its subtle charms.
quotes.author: Lucien Edwards

quotes.quote: Mutual respect is the foundation of genuine harmony.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama XIV

quotes.quote: Mutual respect and mutual listening are the foundations of harmony within the family.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: Mutual respect is so important because as soon as it disappears in relations between you and the next person, there's trouble.
quotes.author: Dizzy Gillespie

quotes.quote: In many ways, effective communication begins with mutual respect, communication that inspires, encourages others to do their best.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: It is very difficult to sustain a high-quality relationship that has the kind of mutual intensity, that has a kind of mutual respect, without putting in time.
quotes.author: Cornel West

quotes.quote: The only society that works today is also one founded on mutual respect, on a recognition that we have a responsibility collectively and individually, to help each other on the basis of each other's equal worth. A selfish society is a contradiction in terms.
quotes.author: Tony Blair

quotes.quote: Where there's no mutual respect, there's trouble!
quotes.author: Dizzy Gillespie

quotes.quote: Mutual respect! That's what it takes to be friends.
quotes.author: Hugo Chavez

quotes.quote: It is mutual respect which makes friendship lasting.
quotes.author: John Henry Newman

quotes.quote: The diversity is the risk of war, the necessity of diversity is mutual respect.
quotes.author: Tariq Ramadan

quotes.quote: If Canada is to survive, it can only survive in mutual respect and in love for one another.
quotes.author: Pierre Trudeau

quotes.quote: We must work harder to build mutual respect, an attitude of tolerance, with forbearance one for another.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: The most special relationships, in my experience, are based on a combination of trust and mutual respect.
quotes.author: Charles Kennedy

quotes.quote: Mutual respect among everyone for one another and for one another's rights is an absolute prerequisite for peace.
quotes.author: Ryan Miller

quotes.quote: The need of the moment is not one religion, but mutual respect and tolerance of the devotees of the different religions.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: One effect of an individualistic culture that's poor at instilling mutual respect is that people jump more quickly to anger or violence.
quotes.author: Geoff Mulgan

quotes.quote: By mutual respect, understanding and with good will we can find acceptable solutions to any problems which exist or may arise between us.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: The more contact we have with one another and the more we come to understand each other's values, the greater will be our mutual respect.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Mutual tolerance is the stepping stone to mutual respect. A hospitable mind is the key to a neighboring or an alien spirit, looked by dogma and guarded by tradition.
quotes.author: Ameen Rihani

quotes.quote: After mutual respect and understanding are achieved, it is possible to establish real, sincere relationships, which is the foundation of a solid long-term collaboration.
quotes.author: Ron Garan

quotes.quote: Only through the development of mutual respect, and in a spirit of truth, can friendship come about. By these means it is possible to move human minds, but never by force.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama XIV

quotes.quote: When we continue to hate, we continue to lose. When we amplify mutual respect and love, we have a lot to gain. Quite simply, there is more for us to gain through love than hate.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: A better way to mutual respect is to engage directly with the moral convictions citizens bring to public life, rather than to require that people leave their deepest moral convictions outside politics before they enter.
quotes.author: Michael Sandel

quotes.quote: Mutual respect implies discretion and reserve even in love itself; it means preserving as much liberty as possible to those whose life we share. We must distrust our instinct of intervention, for the desire to make one's own will prevail is often disguised under the mask of solicitude.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: Freedom goes hand-in-hand with mutual respect.
quotes.author: Kay Rala Xanana Gusmao

quotes.quote: Love is about mutual respect, apart from attraction.
quotes.author: George Best

quotes.quote: We live in a society where mutual respect and appreciation should be considered one of the pillars of modern life.
quotes.author: Auliq Ice

quotes.quote: Where ever the spirit of Christ is known, there is much of good will, of mutual respect, of love and appreciation and kindness.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: The role of the leader is to foster mutual respect and build a complementary team where each strength is made productive and each weakness irrelevant.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: After mutual respect and understanding are achieved, it is possible to establish real, sincere relationships, which is the foundation of a solid long-term collaboration.
quotes.author: Ron Garan

quotes.quote: For a peaceful world, the golden rules to live by are mutual understanding, respect, tolerance, forgiveness, and love.
quotes.author: Debashis Mridha

quotes.quote: Through mutual understanding, sincerity and goodwill, and with great wisdom and broad views, the leaders on both sides should jointly initiate new opportunities for peace, stability, cooperation and mutual benefit.
quotes.author: Chen Shui-bian

quotes.quote: By mutual respect, understanding and with good will we can find acceptable solutions to any problems which exist or may arise between us.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: Let us not speak of tolerance. This negative word implies grudging concessions by smug consciences. Rather, let us speak of mutual understanding and mutual respect
quotes.author: Dominique Pire

quotes.quote: I don't have to agree with everything you say, but I should attempt at least to understand it, for the opposite of mutual understanding is, quite simply, war.
quotes.author: Ken Wilber

quotes.quote: Mutual understanding is the main backbone of every happy relationship.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: Words can travel thousands of miles. May my words create mutual understanding and love. May they be as beautiful as gems, as lovely as flowers.
quotes.author: Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: Relationships between governments are important, but relationships between people are the real foundation of mutual understanding.
quotes.author: J. Christopher Stevens

quotes.quote: Every success in limiting armaments is a sign that the will to achieve mutual understanding exists, and every such success thus supports the fight for international law and order.
quotes.author: Ludwig Quidde

quotes.quote: Democracy demands trust. It demands that sense of mutual understanding. And - it's a two way street. You've got to give - as much as you take.
quotes.author: Charles Kennedy

quotes.quote: The fact is that between the classes there is a vast gulf that precludes all mutual understanding, and makes simultaneous efforts simply impossible
quotes.author: Henryk Sienkiewicz

quotes.quote: At the beginning of the new century, it is the common aspiration of the peoples of the two countries to deepen mutual understanding, enhance trust, develop friendship and strengthen cooperation.
quotes.author: Li Peng

quotes.quote: We have deepened mutual understanding, strengthened political mutual trust, carried out fruitful cooperation in sectors such as economy, culture, education and sanitation and closely coordinated on the international arena.
quotes.author: Wu Bangguo

quotes.quote: Women's mutual understanding comes from the fact that they identify themselves with each other; but for the same reason each is against the others.
quotes.author: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.quote: It is no longer a question of a Christian going about to convert others to the faith, but of each one being ready to listen to the other and so to grow together in mutual understanding.
quotes.author: Bede Griffiths

quotes.quote: We believe PR should be practiced to serve the public interest, to develop mutual understanding between organizations and their publics.
quotes.author: James E. Grunig

quotes.quote: Resilience is really about collaboration and mutual understanding.
quotes.author: Roger Simpson

quotes.quote: Mystery is the basic element of all works of art.
quotes.author: Luis Bunuel

quotes.quote: She loved mysteries so much she became one.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The ultimate mystery is one's own self.
quotes.author: Sammy Davis Jr.

quotes.quote: It's mysterious what attracts you to a person.
quotes.author: Jeff Goldblum

quotes.quote: The mysterious is the very ground of our being--our hope and our destiny. No one ever knows the simplest thing unless one also feels there is more that has not been explained.
quotes.author: Richard Gilbert

quotes.quote: Mystery is the essence of divinity.
quotes.author: Zora Neale Hurston

quotes.quote: The mysterious is always attractive. People will always follow a vail.
quotes.author: Bede Jarret

quotes.quote: Don't ever empty the bucket of mystery. Never let people define what you do. It's not about zigging when you should zag. It's not about doing something unprecedented and unpredictable. It's just about never being a word, or something that is not in the process of transformation
quotes.author: Marilyn Manson

quotes.quote: The most beautiful things we can experience is the mysterious.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The true mystery of the world is the visible, not the invisible.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Mysteries abound where most we seek for answers.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: The less you reveal, the more people can wonder.
quotes.author: Emma Watson

quotes.quote: Mystery creates wonder and wonder is the basis of man's desire to understand.
quotes.author: Neil Armstrong

quotes.quote: Mystery is not the absence of meaning, but the presence of more meaning than we can comprehend.
quotes.author: Dennis Covington

quotes.quote: In a wolrd where everyone is over exposed, the coolest thing you can do is maintain your mystery.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Mystery is the soul of existence.
quotes.author: Kedar Joshi

quotes.quote: The mysterious eludes all words of explanation, but it is more significant than all that can be explained. There is always something beyond where we have gone.
quotes.author: Richard Gilbert

quotes.quote: Mystery is an intellectual process... But suspense is essentially an emotional process.
quotes.author: Alfred Hitchcock

quotes.quote: Mystery is more important than knowledge.
quotes.author: J. J. Abrams

quotes.quote: No object is mysterious. The mystery is your eye.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bowen

quotes.quote: Attraction is only intense when mystery is involved.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: To remain mysterious, say little and do nothing.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Characters can be mysterious and you're not really sure which way they might turn at a given point.
quotes.author: Michael Zaslow

quotes.quote: Do act mysterious. It always keeps them coming back for more.
quotes.author: Carolyn Keene

quotes.quote: Mystery is the number one conjurer of ideas.
quotes.author: David Lynch

quotes.quote: Don't be easy to define. Let them wonder about you.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Mystery is something that appeals to most everybody.Â
quotes.author: Angela Lansbury

quotes.quote: The more mysterious, the more imperfect; as darkness is, in comparison with light--so is mystery, in comparison with knowledge.
quotes.author: Benjamin Whichcote

quotes.quote: Mystery is delightful, but unscientific, since it depends upon ignorance.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Mystery is the fundamental emotion that stands at the cradle of true art and true science.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Mystical power, as you know, has a whole different flavor to it. It's much more raucous at times; it's much more poignant at times. It involves more of the emotional body.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Mystical explanations are thought to be deep; the truth is that they are not even shallow.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: A mystic is a man who separates heaven and earth even if he enjoys them both.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: The mystic lives and looks; and speaks the disconcerting language of first-hand experience.
quotes.author: Evelyn Underhill

quotes.quote: All mystical experience is coincidence; and vice versa, of course.
quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

quotes.quote: You want the mystical understanding of the cosmos to feel compatible with a scientific understanding of the cosmos, like it extends our understanding rather than unwriting it.
quotes.author: Jon Spaihts

quotes.quote: There are mystical, unbreakable bonds between all members of the natural world including humans and animals. Whether or not we remember or acknowledge this relatedness, it still exists.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Eiler

quotes.quote: Mystical experiences do not necessarily supply new ideas to the mind, rather, they transform what one believes into what one knows, converting abstract concepts, such as divine love, into vivid, personal, realities.
quotes.author: R.M. Jones

quotes.quote: Mystical references to society and its programs to help may warm the hearts of the gullible but what it really means is putting more power in the hands of bureaucrats.
quotes.author: Thomas Sowell

quotes.quote: Life is a mystical and tragic thing. It is a journey often full of fear, when it ought to be full of hope. It's fascinating to look back on your life and feel as though most of it was a precursor to the rest of it; to what was always supposed to be.
quotes.author: L.K. Hill

quotes.quote: Mystical insight and enlightenment occur when the veil between the worlds is lifted, the worlds are bridged, the gap closes, and we cross over.
quotes.author: Tom Cowan

quotes.quote: Mysticism' here means, in the literal sense, a change of sensory impressions and organ sensations into something unreal and beyond this world.
quotes.author: Wilhelm Reich

quotes.quote: A mystic is a hysteric who has met her confessor before her doctor.
quotes.author: Umberto Eco

quotes.quote: A mystical path requires courage as you must take a first step of faith so that the second may be of science. ?
quotes.author: Luis Marques

quotes.quote: The mystical is not how the world is, but that it is.
quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.quote: There is something divine, mystical, magical and unexplainable in the universe that is listening and responding to each of us.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: We must close our eyes and invoke a new manner of seeing, a wakefulness that is the birthright of us all, though few put it to use.
quotes.author: Plotinus

quotes.quote: Young people are fascinated with the idea of love, maybe because they havent experienced it. The older you get, the more jaded you become with this, like, mystical love thing. Its not as exciting because its not unknown.
quotes.author: Nikki Reed

quotes.quote: Mystical bliss, joy and rapture arises when you realize the inner Sun.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: We invent nothing, truly. We borrow and re-create. We uncover and discover. All has been given, as the mystics say. We have only to open our eyes and hearts, to become one with that which is.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: There's a mystical strain in every country, and eclipses are likely to bring that out.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: For most persons, the mystical kundalini energy is easier to initially perceive, unless you're extremely sensitive. It's more of a rush, a flash. There's an electric quality to it, a burning heat.
quotes.author: Frederick Lindemann

quotes.quote: Mystical powers develop primarily through the raising of the kundalini. The Kundalini is a type of energy that exists within all things. It's possible to pull that energy, to mass it, to transmit it.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: It's nothing mystical, necessarily. It's nothing secretive. It's just what we do with our body we do with our soul.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: A totally unmystical world would be a world totally blind and insane.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: You don't need to be able to absorb a tremendous amount of the mystical kundalini to realize God.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Something mystical can happen in the course of acting together that transcends words and ideologies people who do not agree on ideas can create common ground in the act of loving.
quotes.author: Shane Claiborne

quotes.quote: There are mystically in our faces certain characters which carry in them the motto of our souls, wherein he that cannot read may read our natures.
quotes.author: Thomas Browne

quotes.quote: Mystical experiences (unlike scientific conclusions) cannot be communicated from one person to another. Philosophers and little children are continually amazed that we, unaccountably, find ourselves in a somewhat intelligible world.
quotes.author: Sam Keen

quotes.quote: Many are the thyrsus-bearers, but few are the mystics.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: A myth is a religion in which no one any longer believes.
quotes.author: James Feibleman

quotes.quote: The myth of fame and the myth of success is cultivated because it is monetisable and it is profitable.
quotes.author: Hozier

quotes.quote: Myth is much more important and true than history. History is just journalism and you know how reliable that is.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Myth is supposed to bring us together, but fantasy alienates us.
quotes.author: Dustin Hoffman

quotes.quote: A myth is an image in terms of which we try to make sense of the world.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: Mythology is composed by poets out of their insights and realizations. Mythologies are not invented; they are found. You can no more tell us what your dream is going to be tonight than we can invent a myth. Myths come from the mystical region of essential experience.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: A myth is far truer than a history, for a history only gives a story of the shadows, whereas a myth gives a story of the substances that cast the shadows.
quotes.author: Annie Besant

quotes.quote: Myth is a past with a future, exercising itself in the present.
quotes.author: Carlos Fuentes

quotes.quote: Myths aren't fairy tales or legends they're an honest attempt to explain mysteries.
quotes.author: John J. Geddes

quotes.quote: Myths and creeds are heroic struggles to comprehend the truth in the world.
quotes.author: Ansel Adams

quotes.quote: A myth is a story that is more than true. Many stories are true because one person, somewhere, at some time, lived it. But a myth is more than true because it is lived by all of us, at some level. It's a story that connects and speaks to us all.
quotes.author: Lisa Seger

quotes.quote: Myth is a powerful medium because it talks to the emotions and not the head. It moves us into an area of mystery.
quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: Myths which are believed in tend to become true.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: If you take myth and folklore, and these things that speak in symbols, they can be interpreted in so many ways that although the actual image is clear enough, the interpretation is infinitely blurred, a sort of enormous rainbow of every possible colour you could imagine.
quotes.author: Diana Wynne Jones

quotes.quote: The mythology of your culture hums in your ears so constantly that no one pays the slightest bit of attention to it. Of course man is conquering space and the atom and the deserts and the oceans and the elements. According to your mythology, this is what he was born to do.
quotes.author: Daniel Quinn

quotes.quote: Myth embodies the nearest approach to absolute truth than can be stated in words.
quotes.author: Ananda Coomaraswamy

quotes.quote: Mythology is a subjective truth. Every culture imagines life a certain way.
quotes.author: Devdutt Pattanaik

quotes.quote: A myth is a way of making sense in a senseless world. Myths are narrative patterns that give significance to our existence.
quotes.author: Rollo May

quotes.quote: Myth is the foundation of life. It is the timeless pattern, the religious formula to which life shapes itself.
quotes.author: Thomas Mann

quotes.quote: Myth is an attempt to narrate a whole human experience, of which the purpose is too deep, going too deep in the blood and soul, for mental explanation or description.
quotes.author: David Herbert Lawrence

quotes.quote: Myth is the hidden part of every story, the buried part, the region that is still unexplored because there are as yet no words to enable us to get there. Myth is nourished by silence as well as by words.
quotes.author: Italo Calvino

quotes.quote: Mythology is studied in the school system because most of us come from it.
quotes.author: Bel Kaufman

quotes.quote: A myth is a metaphor for a mystery beyond human comprehension. It is a comparison that helps us understand, by analogy, some aspect of our mysterious selves. A myth, in this way of thinking, is not an untruth but a way of reaching a profound truth
quotes.author: Christopher Vogler

quotes.quote: The myth that everyone once read great literature is just a myth.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: Both dreams and myths are important communications from ourselves to ourselves. If we do not understand the language in which they are written, we miss a great deal of what we know and tell ourselves in those hours when we are not busy manipulating the outside world.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: Myths have a very long memory.
quotes.author: Bryan Sykes

quotes.quote: Myths are clues to the spiritual potentialities of the human life.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Myths are made for the imagination to breathe life into them.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Myths have a certain staying power because, really, they are aspirational not always who we are, but always who we want to be.
quotes.author: Richard Cohen

quotes.quote: All myths are stories, but not all stories are myths: among stories, myths hold a special place.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood
